hurrimat alaykum ummahatukum wabanatukum wa-akhawatukum wa'ammatukum wakhalatukum wabanatu al-akhi wabanatu al-ukh'ti wa-ummahatukumu allati arda'nakum wa-akhawatukum mina ar-rada'ati wa-ummahatu nisaikum warabaibukumu allati fi hujurikum min nisaikumu allati dakhaltum bihinna fa-in lam takunu dakhaltum bihinna fala junaha alaykum wahalailu abnaikumu alladhina min aslabikum wa-an tajma'u bayna al-ukh'tayni illa ma qad salafa inna al-laha kana ghafuran rahiman

wal-muh'sanatu mina an-nisai illa ma malakat aymanukum kitaba al-lahi alaykum wa-uhilla lakum ma waraa dhalikum an tabtaghu bi-amwalikum muh'sinina ghayra musafihina fama is'tamta'tum bihi min'hunna faatuhunna ujurahunna faridatan wala junaha alaykum fima taradaytum bihi min ba'di al-faridati inna al-laha kana aliman hakiman

waman lam yastati' minkum tawlan an yankiha al-muh'sanati al-mu'minati famin ma malakat aymanukum min fatayatikumu al-mu'minati wal-lahu a'lamu biimanikum ba'dukum min ba'din fa-inkihuhunna bi-idh'ni ahlihinna waatuhunna ujurahunna bil-ma'rufi muh'sanatin ghayra musafihatin wala muttakhidhati akhdanin fa-idha uh'sinna fa-in atayna bifahishatin fa'alayhinna nis'fu ma ala al-muh'sanati mina al-'adhabi dhalika liman khashiya al-'anata minkum wa-an tasbiru khayrun lakum wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
yuridu al-lahu liyubayyina lakum wayahdiyakum sunana alladhina min qablikum wayatuba alaykum wal-lahu alimun hakimun
wal-lahu yuridu an yatuba alaykum wayuridu alladhina yattabi'una as-shahawati an tamilu maylan aziman
yuridu al-lahu an yukhaffifa ankum wakhuliqa al-insanu da'ifan
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la takulu amwalakum baynakum bil-batili illa an takuna tijaratan an taradin minkum wala taqtulu anfusakum inna al-laha kana bikum rahiman
waman yaf 'al dhalika ud'wanan wazul'man fasawfa nus'lihi naran wakana dhalika ala al-lahi yasiran
in tajtanibu kabaira ma tun'hawna anhu nukaffir ankum sayyiatikum wanud'khil'kum mud'khalan kariman
wala tatamannaw ma faddala al-lahu bihi ba'dakum ala ba'din lilrrijali nasibun mimma ik'tasabu walilnnisai nasibun mimma ik'tasabna wasalu al-laha min fadlihi inna al-laha kana bikulli shayin aliman
walikullin ja'alna mawaliya mimma taraka al-walidani wal-aqrabuna wa-alladhina aqadat aymanukum faatuhum nasibahum inna al-laha kana ala kulli shayin shahidan

ar-rijalu qawwamuna ala an-nisai bima faddala al-lahu ba'dahum ala ba'din wabima anfaqu min amwalihim fas-salihatu qanitatun hafizatun lil'ghaybi bima hafiza al-lahu wa-allati takhafuna nushuzahunna fa'izuhunna wa-uh'juruhunna fi al-madaji'i wa-id'ribuhunna fa-in ata'nakum fala tabghu alayhinna sabilan inna al-laha kana aliyyan kabiran
wa-in khif'tum shiqaqa baynihima fa-ib'athu hakaman min ahlihi wahakaman min ahliha in yurida is'lahan yuwaffiqi al-lahu baynahuma inna al-laha kana aliman khabiran

wa-u'budu al-laha wala tush'riku bihi shayan wabil-walidayni ih'sanan wabidhi al-qur'ba wal-yatama wal-masakini wal-jari dhi al-qur'ba wal-jari al-junubi was-sahibi bil-janbi wa-ib'ni as-sabili wama malakat aymanukum inna al-laha la yuhibbu man kana mukh'talan fakhuran
alladhina yabkhaluna wayamuruna an-nasa bil-bukh'li wayaktumuna ma atahumu al-lahu min fadlihi wa-a'tadna lil'kafirina adhaban muhinan
wa-alladhina yunfiquna amwalahum riaa an-nasi wala yu'minuna bil-lahi wala bil-yawmi al-akhiri waman yakuni as-shaytanu lahu qarinan fasaa qarinan
wamadha alayhim law amanu bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wa-anfaqu mimma razaqahumu al-lahu wakana al-lahu bihim aliman
inna al-laha la yazlimu mith'qala dharratin wa-in taku hasanatan yuda'if'ha wayu'ti min ladun'hu ajran aziman
fakayfa idha ji'na min kulli ummatin bishahidin waji'na bika ala haulai shahidan
yawma-idhin yawaddu alladhina kafaru wa'asawu ar-rasula law tusawwa bihimu al-ardu wala yaktumuna al-laha hadithan

yaayyuha alladhina amanu la taqrabu as-salata wa-antum sukara hatta ta'lamu ma taquluna wala junuban illa abiri sabilin hatta taghtasilu wa-in kuntum marda aw ala safarin aw jaa ahadun minkum mina al-ghaiti aw lamastumu an-nisaa falam tajidu maan fatayammamu sa'idan tayyiban fa-im'sahu biwujuhikum wa-aydikum inna al-laha kana afuwwan ghafuran
alam tara ila alladhina utu nasiban mina al-kitabi yashtaruna ad-dalalata wayuriduna an tadillu as-sabila
wal-lahu a'lamu bi-a'daikum wakafa bil-lahi waliyyan wakafa bil-lahi nasiran

mina alladhina hadu yuharrifuna al-kalima an mawadi'ihi wayaquluna sami'na wa'asayna wa-is'ma' ghayra mus'ma'in wara'ina layyan bi-alsinatihim wata'nan fi ad-dini walaw annahum qalu sami'na wa-ata'na wa-is'ma' wa-unzur'na lakana khayran lahum wa-aqwama walakin la'anahumu al-lahu bikuf'rihim fala yu'minuna illa qalilan

yaayyuha alladhina utu al-kitaba aminu bima nazzalna musaddiqan lima ma'akum min qabli an natmisa wujuhan fanaruddaha ala adbariha aw nal'anahum kama la'anna ashaba as-sabti wakana amru al-lahi maf'ulan
inna al-laha la yaghfiru an yush'raka bihi wayaghfiru ma duna dhalika liman yashau waman yush'rik bil-lahi faqadi if'tara ith'man aziman
alam tara ila alladhina yuzakkuna anfusahum bali al-lahu yuzakki man yashau wala yuz'lamuna fatilan
unzur kayfa yaftaruna ala al-lahi al-kadhiba wakafa bihi ith'man mubinan
alam tara ila alladhina utu nasiban mina al-kitabi yu'minuna bil-jib'ti wat-taghuti wayaquluna lilladhina kafaru haulai ahda mina alladhina amanu sabilan
ulaika alladhina la'anahumu al-lahu waman yal'ani al-lahu falan tajida lahu nasiran
am lahum nasibun mina al-mul'ki fa-idhan la yu'tuna an-nasa naqiran
am yahsuduna an-nasa ala ma atahumu al-lahu min fadlihi faqad atayna ala ib'rahima al-kitaba wal-hik'mata waataynahum mul'kan aziman
famin'hum man amana bihi wamin'hum man sadda anhu wakafa bijahannama sa'iran
inna alladhina kafaru biayatina sawfa nus'lihim naran kullama nadijat juluduhum baddalnahum juludan ghayraha liyadhuqu al-'adhaba inna al-laha kana azizan hakiman
wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati sanud'khiluhum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha abadan lahum fiha azwajun mutahharatun wanud'khiluhum zillan zalilan
inna al-laha yamurukum an tu-addu al-amanati ila ahliha wa-idha hakamtum bayna an-nasi an tahkumu bil-'adli inna al-laha ni'imma ya'izukum bihi inna al-laha kana sami'an basiran

yaayyuha alladhina amanu ati'u al-laha wa-ati'u ar-rasula wa-uli al-amri minkum fa-in tanaza'tum fi shayin farudduhu ila al-lahi war-rasuli in kuntum tu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri dhalika khayrun wa-ahsanu tawilan

alam tara ila alladhina yaz'umuna annahum amanu bima unzila ilayka wama unzila min qablika yuriduna an yatahakamu ila at-taghuti waqad umiru an yakfuru bihi wayuridu as-shaytanu an yudillahum dalalan ba'idan
wa-idha qila lahum ta'alaw ila ma anzala al-lahu wa-ila ar-rasuli ra-ayta al-munafiqina yasudduna anka sududan
fakayfa idha asabathum musibatun bima qaddamat aydihim thumma jauka yahlifuna bil-lahi in aradna illa ih'sanan watawfiqan
ulaika alladhina ya'lamu al-lahu ma fi qulubihim fa-a'rid anhum wa'iz'hum waqul lahum fi anfusihim qawlan balighan
wama arsalna min rasulin illa liyuta'a bi-idh'ni al-lahi walaw annahum idh zalamu anfusahum jauka fa-is'taghfaru al-laha wa-is'taghfara lahumu ar-rasulu lawajadu al-laha tawwaban rahiman
fala warabbika la yu'minuna hatta yuhakkimuka fima shajara baynahum thumma la yajidu fi anfusihim harajan mimma qadayta wayusallimu tasliman
walaw anna katabna alayhim ani uq'tulu anfusakum awi ukh'ruju min diyarikum ma fa'aluhu illa qalilun min'hum walaw annahum fa'alu ma yu'azuna bihi lakana khayran lahum wa-ashadda tathbitan
wa-idhan laataynahum min ladunna ajran aziman
walahadaynahum siratan mus'taqiman
waman yuti'i al-laha war-rasula fa-ulaika ma'a alladhina an'ama al-lahu alayhim mina an-nabiyina was-sidiqina was-shuhadai was-salihina wahasuna ulaika rafiqan
dhalika al-fadlu mina al-lahi wakafa bil-lahi aliman
yaayyuha alladhina amanu khudhu hidh'rakum fa-infiru thubatin awi infiru jami'an
wa-inna minkum laman layubatti-anna fa-in asabatkum musibatun qala qad an'ama al-lahu alayya idh lam akun ma'ahum shahidan
wala-in asabakum fadlun mina al-lahi layaqulanna ka-an lam takun baynakum wabaynahu mawaddatun yalaytani kuntu ma'ahum fa-afuza fawzan aziman
falyuqatil fi sabili al-lahi alladhina yashruna al-hayata ad-dun'ya bil-akhirati waman yuqatil fi sabili al-lahi fayuq'tal aw yaghlib fasawfa nu'tihi ajran aziman

wama lakum la tuqatiluna fi sabili al-lahi wal-mus'tad'afina mina ar-rijali wan-nisai wal-wil'dani alladhina yaquluna rabbana akhrij'na min hadhihi al-qaryati az-zalimi ahluha wa-ij'al lana min ladunka waliyyan wa-ij'al lana min ladunka nasiran
alladhina amanu yuqatiluna fi sabili al-lahi wa-alladhina kafaru yuqatiluna fi sabili at-taghuti faqatilu awliyaa as-shaytani inna kayda as-shaytani kana da'ifan

alam tara ila alladhina qila lahum kuffu aydiyakum wa-aqimu as-salata waatu az-zakata falamma kutiba alayhimu al-qitalu idha fariqun min'hum yakhshawna an-nasa kakhashyati al-lahi aw ashadda khashyatan waqalu rabbana lima katabta alayna al-qitala lawla akhartana ila ajalin qaribin qul mata'u ad-dun'ya qalilun wal-akhiratu khayrun limani ittaqa wala tuz'lamuna fatilan

aynama takunu yud'rikkumu al-mawtu walaw kuntum fi burujin mushayyadatin wa-in tusib'hum hasanatun yaqulu hadhihi min indi al-lahi wa-in tusib'hum sayyi-atun yaqulu hadhihi min indika qul kullun min indi al-lahi famali haulai al-qawmi la yakaduna yafqahuna hadithan
ma asabaka min hasanatin famina al-lahi wama asabaka min sayyi-atin famin nafsika wa-arsalnaka lilnnasi rasulan wakafa bil-lahi shahidan
man yuti'i ar-rasula faqad ata'a al-laha waman tawalla fama arsalnaka alayhim hafizan
wayaquluna ta'atun fa-idha barazu min indika bayyata taifatun min'hum ghayra alladhi taqulu wal-lahu yaktubu ma yubayyituna fa-a'rid anhum watawakkal ala al-lahi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan
afala yatadabbaruna al-qur'ana walaw kana min indi ghayri al-lahi lawajadu fihi ikh'tilafan kathiran

wa-idha jaahum amrun mina al-amni awi al-khawfi adha'u bihi walaw radduhu ila ar-rasuli wa-ila uli al-amri min'hum la'alimahu alladhina yastanbitunahu min'hum walawla fadlu al-lahi alaykum warahmatuhu la-ittaba'tumu as-shaytana illa qalilan
faqatil fi sabili al-lahi la tukallafu illa nafsaka waharridi al-mu'minina asa al-lahu an yakuffa basa alladhina kafaru wal-lahu ashaddu basan wa-ashaddu tankilan
man yashfa' shafa'atan hasanatan yakun lahu nasibun min'ha waman yashfa' shafa'atan sayyi-atan yakun lahu kif'lun min'ha wakana al-lahu ala kulli shayin muqitan
wa-idha huyyitum bitahiyyatin fahayyu bi-ahsana min'ha aw rudduha inna al-laha kana ala kulli shayin hasiban
al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa layajma'annakum ila yawmi al-qiyamati la rayba fihi waman asdaqu mina al-lahi hadithan
fama lakum fi al-munafiqina fi-atayni wal-lahu arkasahum bima kasabu aturiduna an tahdu man adalla al-lahu waman yud'lili al-lahu falan tajida lahu sabilan

waddu law takfuruna kama kafaru fatakununa sawaan fala tattakhidhu min'hum awliyaa hatta yuhajiru fi sabili al-lahi fa-in tawallaw fakhudhuhum wa-uq'tuluhum haythu wajadttumuhum wala tattakhidhu min'hum waliyyan wala nasiran

illa alladhina yasiluna ila qawmin baynakum wabaynahum mithaqun aw jaukum hasirat suduruhum an yuqatilukum aw yuqatilu qawmahum walaw shaa al-lahu lasallatahum alaykum falaqatalukum fa-ini i'tazalukum falam yuqatilukum wa-alqaw ilaykumu as-salama fama ja'ala al-lahu lakum alayhim sabilan

satajiduna akharina yuriduna an yamanukum wayamanu qawmahum kulla ma ruddu ila al-fit'nati ur'kisu fiha fa-in lam ya'tazilukum wayul'qu ilaykumu as-salama wayakuffu aydiyahum fakhudhuhum wa-uq'tuluhum haythu thaqif'tumuhum wa-ulaikum ja'alna lakum alayhim sul'tanan mubinan

wama kana limu'minin an yaqtula mu'minan illa khata-an waman qatala mu'minan khata-an fatahriru raqabatin mu'minatin wadiyatun musallamatun ila ahlihi illa an yassaddaqu fa-in kana min qawmin aduwwin lakum wahuwa mu'minun fatahriru raqabatin mu'minatin wa-in kana min qawmin baynakum wabaynahum mithaqun fadiyatun musallamatun ila ahlihi watahriru raqabatin mu'minatin faman lam yajid fasiyamu shahrayni mutatabi'ayni tawbatan mina al-lahi wakana al-lahu aliman hakiman
waman yaqtul mu'minan muta'ammidan fajazauhu jahannamu khalidan fiha waghadiba al-lahu alayhi wala'anahu wa-a'adda lahu adhaban aziman

yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha darabtum fi sabili al-lahi fatabayyanu wala taqulu liman alqa ilaykumu as-salama lasta mu'minan tabtaghuna arada al-hayati ad-dun'ya fa'inda al-lahi maghanimu kathiratun kadhalika kuntum min qablu famanna al-lahu alaykum fatabayyanu inna al-laha kana bima ta'maluna khabiran

la yastawi al-qa'iduna mina al-mu'minina ghayru uli ad-darari wal-mujahiduna fi sabili al-lahi bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim faddala al-lahu al-mujahidina bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim ala al-qa'idina darajatan wakullan wa'ada al-lahu al-hus'na wafaddala al-lahu al-mujahidina ala al-qa'idina ajran aziman
darajatin min'hu wamaghfiratan warahmatan wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman

inna alladhina tawaffahumu al-malaikatu zalimi anfusihim qalu fima kuntum qalu kunna mus'tad'afina fi al-ardi qalu alam takun ardu al-lahi wasi'atan fatuhajiru fiha fa-ulaika mawahum jahannamu wasaat masiran
illa al-mus'tad'afina mina ar-rijali wan-nisai wal-wil'dani la yastati'una hilatan wala yahtaduna sabilan
fa-ulaika asa al-lahu an ya'fuwa anhum wakana al-lahu afuwwan ghafuran

waman yuhajir fi sabili al-lahi yajid fi al-ardi muraghaman kathiran wasa'atan waman yakhruj min baytihi muhajiran ila al-lahi warasulihi thumma yud'rik'hu al-mawtu faqad waqa'a ajruhu ala al-lahi wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
wa-idha darabtum fi al-ardi falaysa alaykum junahun an taqsuru mina as-salati in khif'tum an yaftinakumu alladhina kafaru inna al-kafirina kanu lakum aduwwan mubinan

wa-idha kunta fihim fa-aqamta lahumu as-salata faltaqum taifatun min'hum ma'aka walyakhudhu aslihatahum fa-idha sajadu falyakunu min waraikum waltati taifatun ukh'ra lam yusallu falyusallu ma'aka walyakhudhu hidh'rahum wa-aslihatahum wadda alladhina kafaru law taghfuluna an aslihatikum wa-amti'atikum fayamiluna alaykum maylatan wahidatan wala junaha alaykum in kana bikum adhan min matarin aw kuntum marda an tada'u aslihatakum wakhudhu hidh'rakum inna al-laha a'adda lil'kafirina adhaban muhinan
fa-idha qadaytumu as-salata fa-udh'kuru al-laha qiyaman waqu'udan wa'ala junubikum fa-idha it'manantum fa-aqimu as-salata inna as-salata kanat ala al-mu'minina kitaban mawqutan
wala tahinu fi ib'tighai al-qawmi in takunu talamuna fa-innahum yalamuna kama talamuna watarjuna mina al-lahi ma la yarjuna wakana al-lahu aliman hakiman
inna anzalna ilayka al-kitaba bil-haqi litahkuma bayna an-nasi bima araka al-lahu wala takun lil'khainina khasiman
wa-is'taghfiri al-laha inna al-laha kana ghafuran rahiman
wala tujadil ani alladhina yakhtanuna anfusahum inna al-laha la yuhibbu man kana khawwanan athiman
yastakhfuna mina an-nasi wala yastakhfuna mina al-lahi wahuwa ma'ahum idh yubayyituna ma la yarda mina al-qawli wakana al-lahu bima ya'maluna muhitan
haantum haulai jadaltum anhum fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya faman yujadilu al-laha anhum yawma al-qiyamati am man yakunu alayhim wakilan
waman ya'mal suan aw yazlim nafsahu thumma yastaghfiri al-laha yajidi al-laha ghafuran rahiman
waman yaksib ith'man fa-innama yaksibuhu ala nafsihi wakana al-lahu aliman hakiman
waman yaksib khatiatan aw ith'man thumma yarmi bihi barian faqadi ih'tamala buh'tanan wa-ith'man mubinan

walawla fadlu al-lahi alayka warahmatuhu lahammat taifatun min'hum an yudilluka wama yudilluna illa anfusahum wama yadurrunaka min shayin wa-anzala al-lahu alayka al-kitaba wal-hik'mata wa'allamaka ma lam takun ta'lamu wakana fadlu al-lahi alayka aziman
la khayra fi kathirin min najwahum illa man amara bisadaqatin aw ma'rufin aw is'lahin bayna an-nasi waman yaf 'al dhalika ib'tighaa mardati al-lahi fasawfa nu'tihi ajran aziman
waman yushaqiqi ar-rasula min ba'di ma tabayyana lahu al-huda wayattabi' ghayra sabili al-mu'minina nuwallihi ma tawalla wanus'lihi jahannama wasaat masiran
inna al-laha la yaghfiru an yush'raka bihi wayaghfiru ma duna dhalika liman yashau waman yush'rik bil-lahi faqad dalla dalalan ba'idan
in yad'una min dunihi illa inathan wa-in yad'una illa shaytanan maridan
la'anahu al-lahu waqala la-attakhidhanna min ibadika nasiban mafrudan

wala-udillannahum wala-umanniyannahum walaamurannahum falayubattikunna adhana al-an'ami walaamurannahum falayughayyirunna khalqa al-lahi waman yattakhidhi as-shaytana waliyyan min duni al-lahi faqad khasira khus'ranan mubinan
ya'iduhum wayumannihim wama ya'iduhumu as-shaytanu illa ghururan
ulaika mawahum jahannamu wala yajiduna anha mahisan
wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati sanud'khiluhum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha abadan wa'da al-lahi haqqan waman asdaqu mina al-lahi qilan
laysa bi-amaniyyikum wala amaniyyi ahli al-kitabi man ya'mal suan yuj'za bihi wala yajid lahu min duni al-lahi waliyyan wala nasiran
waman ya'mal mina as-salihati min dhakarin aw untha wahuwa mu'minun fa-ulaika yadkhuluna al-janata wala yuz'lamuna naqiran
waman ahsanu dinan mimman aslama wajhahu lillahi wahuwa muh'sinun wa-ittaba'a millata ib'rahima hanifan wa-ittakhadha al-lahu ib'rahima khalilan
walillahi ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi wakana al-lahu bikulli shayin muhitan

wayastaftunaka fi an-nisai quli al-lahu yuf'tikum fihinna wama yut'la alaykum fi al-kitabi fi yatama an-nisai allati la tu'tunahunna ma kutiba lahunna watarghabuna an tankihuhunna wal-mus'tad'afina mina al-wil'dani wa-an taqumu lil'yatama bil-qis'ti wama taf 'alu min khayrin fa-inna al-laha kana bihi aliman

wa-ini im'ra-atun khafat min ba'liha nushuzan aw i'radan fala junaha alayhima an yus'liha baynahuma sul'han was-sul'hu khayrun wa-uh'dirati al-anfusu as-shuha wa-in tuh'sinu watattaqu fa-inna al-laha kana bima ta'maluna khabiran
walan tastati'u an ta'dilu bayna an-nisai walaw harastum fala tamilu kulla al-mayli fatadharuha kal-mu'alaqati wa-in tus'lihu watattaqu fa-inna al-laha kana ghafuran rahiman
wa-in yatafarraqa yugh'ni al-lahu kullan min sa'atihi wakana al-lahu wasi'an hakiman

walillahi ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi walaqad wassayna alladhina utu al-kitaba min qablikum wa-iyyakum ani ittaqu al-laha wa-in takfuru fa-inna lillahi ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi wakana al-lahu ghaniyyan hamidan
walillahi ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan
in yasha yudh'hib'kum ayyuha an-nasu wayati biakharina wakana al-lahu ala dhalika qadiran
man kana yuridu thawaba ad-dun'ya fa'inda al-lahi thawabu ad-dun'ya wal-akhirati wakana al-lahu sami'an basiran

yaayyuha alladhina amanu kunu qawwamina bil-qis'ti shuhadaa lillahi walaw ala anfusikum awi al-walidayni wal-aqrabina in yakun ghaniyyan aw faqiran fal-lahu awla bihima fala tattabi'u al-hawa an ta'dilu wa-in talwu aw tu'ridu fa-inna al-laha kana bima ta'maluna khabiran

yaayyuha alladhina amanu aminu bil-lahi warasulihi wal-kitabi alladhi nazzala ala rasulihi wal-kitabi alladhi anzala min qablu waman yakfur bil-lahi wamalaikatihi wakutubihi warusulihi wal-yawmi al-akhiri faqad dalla dalalan ba'idan
inna alladhina amanu thumma kafaru thumma amanu thumma kafaru thumma iz'dadu kuf'ran lam yakuni al-lahu liyaghfira lahum wala liyahdiyahum sabilan
bashiri al-munafiqina bi-anna lahum adhaban aliman
alladhina yattakhidhuna al-kafirina awliyaa min duni al-mu'minina ayabtaghuna indahumu al-'izata fa-inna al-'izata lillahi jami'an

waqad nazzala alaykum fi al-kitabi an idha sami'tum ayati al-lahi yuk'faru biha wayus'tahza-u biha fala taq'udu ma'ahum hatta yakhudu fi hadithin ghayrihi innakum idhan mith'luhum inna al-laha jami'u al-munafiqina wal-kafirina fi jahannama jami'an

alladhina yatarabbasuna bikum fa-in kana lakum fathun mina al-lahi qalu alam nakun ma'akum wa-in kana lil'kafirina nasibun qalu alam nastahwidh alaykum wanamna'kum mina al-mu'minina fal-lahu yahkumu baynakum yawma al-qiyamati walan yaj'ala al-lahu lil'kafirina ala al-mu'minina sabilan
inna al-munafiqina yukhadi'una al-laha wahuwa khadi'uhum wa-idha qamu ila as-salati qamu kusala yurauna an-nasa wala yadhkuruna al-laha illa qalilan
mudhabdhabina bayna dhalika la ila haulai wala ila haulai waman yud'lili al-lahu falan tajida lahu sabilan
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattakhidhu al-kafirina awliyaa min duni al-mu'minina aturiduna an taj'alu lillahi alaykum sul'tanan mubinan
inna al-munafiqina fi ad-darki al-asfali mina an-nari walan tajida lahum nasiran
illa alladhina tabu wa-aslahu wa-i'tasamu bil-lahi wa-akhlasu dinahum lillahi fa-ulaika ma'a al-mu'minina wasawfa yu'ti al-lahu al-mu'minina ajran aziman
ma yaf 'alu al-lahu bi'adhabikum in shakartum waamantum wakana al-lahu shakiran aliman
la yuhibbu al-lahu al-jahra bil-sui mina al-qawli illa man zulima wakana al-lahu sami'an aliman
in tub'du khayran aw tukh'fuhu aw ta'fu an suin fa-inna al-laha kana afuwwan qadiran
inna alladhina yakfuruna bil-lahi warusulihi wayuriduna an yufarriqu bayna al-lahi warusulihi wayaquluna nu'minu biba'din wanakfuru biba'din wayuriduna an yattakhidhu bayna dhalika sabilan
ulaika humu al-kafiruna haqqan wa-a'tadna lil'kafirina adhaban muhinan
wa-alladhina amanu bil-lahi warusulihi walam yufarriqu bayna ahadin min'hum ulaika sawfa yu'tihim ujurahum wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman

yasaluka ahlu al-kitabi an tunazzila alayhim kitaban mina as-samai faqad sa-alu musa akbara min dhalika faqalu arina al-laha jahratan fa-akhadhathumu as-sa'iqatu bizul'mihim thumma ittakhadhu al-'ij'la min ba'di ma jaathumu al-bayinatu fa'afawna an dhalika waatayna musa sul'tanan mubinan
warafa'na fawqahumu at-tura bimithaqihim waqul'na lahumu ud'khulu al-baba sujjadan waqul'na lahum la ta'du fi as-sabti wa-akhadhna min'hum mithaqan ghalizan
fabima naqdihim mithaqahum wakuf'rihim biayati al-lahi waqatlihimu al-anbiyaa bighayri haqqin waqawlihim qulubuna ghul'fun bal taba'a al-lahu alayha bikuf'rihim fala yu'minuna illa qalilan
wabikuf'rihim waqawlihim ala maryama buh'tanan aziman

waqawlihim inna qatalna al-masiha isa ib'na maryama rasula al-lahi wama qataluhu wama salabuhu walakin shubbiha lahum wa-inna alladhina ikh'talafu fihi lafi shakkin min'hu ma lahum bihi min il'min illa ittiba'a az-zani wama qataluhu yaqinan
bal rafa'ahu al-lahu ilayhi wakana al-lahu azizan hakiman
wa-in min ahli al-kitabi illa layu'minanna bihi qabla mawtihi wayawma al-qiyamati yakunu alayhim shahidan
fabizul'min mina alladhina hadu harramna alayhim tayyibatin uhillat lahum wabisaddihim an sabili al-lahi kathiran
wa-akhdhihimu ar-riba waqad nuhu anhu wa-aklihim amwala an-nasi bil-batili wa-a'tadna lil'kafirina min'hum adhaban aliman

lakini ar-rasikhuna fi al-'il'mi min'hum wal-mu'minuna yu'minuna bima unzila ilayka wama unzila min qablika wal-muqimina as-salata wal-mu'tuna az-zakata wal-mu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri ulaika sanu'tihim ajran aziman

inna awhayna ilayka kama awhayna ila nuhin wan-nabiyina min ba'dihi wa-awhayna ila ib'rahima wa-is'ma'ila wa-is'haqa waya'quba wal-asbati wa'isa wa-ayyuba wayunusa waharuna wasulaymana waatayna dawuda zaburan
warusulan qad qasasnahum alayka min qablu warusulan lam naqsus'hum alayka wakallama al-lahu musa takliman
rusulan mubashirina wamundhirina li-alla yakuna lilnnasi ala al-lahi hujjatun ba'da ar-rusuli wakana al-lahu azizan hakiman
lakini al-lahu yashhadu bima anzala ilayka anzalahu bi'il'mihi wal-malaikatu yashhaduna wakafa bil-lahi shahidan
inna alladhina kafaru wasaddu an sabili al-lahi qad dallu dalalan ba'idan
inna alladhina kafaru wazalamu lam yakuni al-lahu liyaghfira lahum wala liyahdiyahum tariqan
illa tariqa jahannama khalidina fiha abadan wakana dhalika ala al-lahi yasiran
yaayyuha an-nasu qad jaakumu ar-rasulu bil-haqi min rabbikum faaminu khayran lakum wa-in takfuru fa-inna lillahi ma fi as-samawati wal-ardi wakana al-lahu aliman hakiman

yaahla al-kitabi la taghlu fi dinikum wala taqulu ala al-lahi illa al-haqa innama al-masihu isa ub'nu maryama rasulu al-lahi wakalimatuhu alqaha ila maryama waruhun min'hu faaminu bil-lahi warusulihi wala taqulu thalathatun intahu khayran lakum innama al-lahu ilahun wahidun sub'hanahu an yakuna lahu waladun lahu ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan
lan yastankifa al-masihu an yakuna abdan lillahi wala al-malaikatu al-muqarabuna waman yastankif an ibadatihi wayastakbir fasayahshuruhum ilayhi jami'an

fa-amma alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati fayuwaffihim ujurahum wayaziduhum min fadlihi wa-amma alladhina is'tankafu wa-is'takbaru fayu'adhibuhum adhaban aliman wala yajiduna lahum min duni al-lahi waliyyan wala nasiran
yaayyuha an-nasu qad jaakum bur'hanun min rabbikum wa-anzalna ilaykum nuran mubinan
fa-amma alladhina amanu bil-lahi wa-i'tasamu bihi fasayud'khiluhum fi rahmatin min'hu wafadlin wayahdihim ilayhi siratan mus'taqiman

yastaftunaka quli al-lahu yuf'tikum fi al-kalalati ini im'ru-on halaka laysa lahu waladun walahu ukh'tun falaha nis'fu ma taraka wahuwa yarithuha in lam yakun laha waladun fa-in kanata ith'natayni falahuma at-thuluthani mimma taraka wa-in kanu ikh'watan rijalan wanisaan falildhakari mith'lu hazzi al-unthayayni yubayyinu al-lahu lakum an tadillu wal-lahu bikulli shayin alimun
yaayyuha alladhina amanu awfu bil-'uqudi uhillat lakum bahimatu al-an'ami illa ma yut'la alaykum ghayra muhilli as-saydi wa-antum hurumun inna al-laha yahkumu ma yuridu

yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tuhillu sha'aira al-lahi wala as-shahra al-harama wala al-hadya wala al-qalaida wala ammina al-bayta al-harama yabtaghuna fadlan min rabbihim warid'wanan wa-idha halaltum fa-is'tadu wala yajrimannakum shanaanu qawmin an saddukum ani al-masjidi al-harami an ta'tadu wata'awanu ala al-biri wat-taqwa wala ta'awanu ala al-ith'mi wal-'ud'wani wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi

hurrimat alaykumu al-maytatu wad-damu walahmu al-khinziri wama uhilla lighayri al-lahi bihi wal-mun'khaniqatu wal-mawqudhatu wal-mutaradiyatu wan-natihatu wama akala as-sabu'u illa ma dhakkaytum wama dhubiha ala an-nusubi wa-an tastaqsimu bil-azlami dhalikum fis'qun al-yawma ya-isa alladhina kafaru min dinikum fala takhshawhum wa-ikh'shawni al-yawma akmaltu lakum dinakum wa-atmamtu alaykum ni'mati waraditu lakumu al-is'lama dinan famani ud'turra fi makhmasatin ghayra mutajanifin li-ith'min fa-inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun

yasalunaka madha uhilla lahum qul uhilla lakumu at-tayibatu wama allamtum mina al-jawarihi mukallibina tu'allimunahunna mimma allamakumu al-lahu fakulu mimma amsakna alaykum wa-udh'kuru is'ma al-lahi alayhi wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha sari'u al-hisabi

al-yawma uhilla lakumu at-tayibatu wata'amu alladhina utu al-kitaba hillun lakum wata'amukum hillun lahum wal-muh'sanatu mina al-mu'minati wal-muh'sanatu mina alladhina utu al-kitaba min qablikum idha ataytumuhunna ujurahunna muh'sinina ghayra musafihina wala muttakhidhi akhdanin waman yakfur bil-imani faqad habita amaluhu wahuwa fi al-akhirati mina al-khasirina

yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha qum'tum ila as-salati fa-igh'silu wujuhakum wa-aydiyakum ila al-marafiqi wa-im'sahu biruusikum wa-arjulakum ila al-ka'bayni wa-in kuntum junuban fa-ittahharu wa-in kuntum marda aw ala safarin aw jaa ahadun minkum mina al-ghaiti aw lamastumu an-nisaa falam tajidu maan fatayammamu sa'idan tayyiban fa-im'sahu biwujuhikum wa-aydikum min'hu ma yuridu al-lahu liyaj'ala alaykum min harajin walakin yuridu liyutahhirakum waliyutimma ni'matahu alaykum la'allakum tashkuruna
wa-udh'kuru ni'mata al-lahi alaykum wamithaqahu alladhi wathaqakum bihi idh qul'tum sami'na wa-ata'na wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha alimun bidhati as-suduri

yaayyuha alladhina amanu kunu qawwamina lillahi shuhadaa bil-qis'ti wala yajrimannakum shanaanu qawmin ala alla ta'dilu i'dilu huwa aqrabu lilttaqwa wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha khabirun bima ta'maluna
wa'ada al-lahu alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun azimun
wa-alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina ulaika ashabu al-jahimi
yaayyuha alladhina amanu udh'kuru ni'mata al-lahi alaykum idh hamma qawmun an yabsutu ilaykum aydiyahum fakaffa aydiyahum ankum wa-ittaqu al-laha wa'ala al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minuna

walaqad akhadha al-lahu mithaqa bani is'raila waba'athna min'humu ith'nay ashara naqiban waqala al-lahu inni ma'akum la-in aqamtumu as-salata waataytumu az-zakata waamantum birusuli wa'azzartumuhum wa-aqradtumu al-laha qardan hasanan la-ukaffiranna ankum sayyiatikum wala-ud'khilannakum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu faman kafara ba'da dhalika minkum faqad dalla sawaa as-sabili

fabima naqdihim mithaqahum la'annahum waja'alna qulubahum qasiyatan yuharrifuna al-kalima an mawadi'ihi wanasu hazzan mimma dhukkiru bihi wala tazalu tattali'u ala khainatin min'hum illa qalilan min'hum fa-u'fu anhum wa-is'fah inna al-laha yuhibbu al-muh'sinina

wamina alladhina qalu inna nasara akhadhna mithaqahum fanasu hazzan mimma dhukkiru bihi fa-aghrayna baynahumu al-'adawata wal-baghdaa ila yawmi al-qiyamati wasawfa yunabbi-uhumu al-lahu bima kanu yasna'una
yaahla al-kitabi qad jaakum rasuluna yubayyinu lakum kathiran mimma kuntum tukh'funa mina al-kitabi waya'fu an kathirin qad jaakum mina al-lahi nurun wakitabun mubinun
yahdi bihi al-lahu mani ittaba'a rid'wanahu subula as-salami wayukh'rijuhum mina az-zulumati ila an-nuri bi-idh'nihi wayahdihim ila siratin mus'taqimin

laqad kafara alladhina qalu inna al-laha huwa al-masihu ub'nu maryama qul faman yamliku mina al-lahi shayan in arada an yuh'lika al-masiha ib'na maryama wa-ummahu waman fi al-ardi jami'an walillahi mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma yakhluqu ma yashau wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun

waqalati al-yahudu wan-nasara nahnu abnau al-lahi wa-ahibbauhu qul falima yu'adhibukum bidhunubikum bal antum basharun mimman khalaqa yaghfiru liman yashau wayu'adhibu man yashau walillahi mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma wa-ilayhi al-masiru
yaahla al-kitabi qad jaakum rasuluna yubayyinu lakum ala fatratin mina ar-rusuli an taqulu ma jaana min bashirin wala nadhirin faqad jaakum bashirun wanadhirun wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
wa-idh qala musa liqawmihi yaqawmi udh'kuru ni'mata al-lahi alaykum idh ja'ala fikum anbiyaa waja'alakum mulukan waatakum ma lam yu'ti ahadan mina al-'alamina
yaqawmi ud'khulu al-arda al-muqadasata allati kataba al-lahu lakum wala tartaddu ala adbarikum fatanqalibu khasirina
qalu yamusa inna fiha qawman jabbarina wa-inna lan nadkhulaha hatta yakhruju min'ha fa-in yakhruju min'ha fa-inna dakhiluna
qala rajulani mina alladhina yakhafuna an'ama al-lahu alayhima ud'khulu alayhimu al-baba fa-idha dakhaltumuhu fa-innakum ghalibuna wa'ala al-lahi fatawakkalu in kuntum mu'minina
qalu yamusa inna lan nadkhulaha abadan ma damu fiha fa-idh'hab anta warabbuka faqatila inna hahuna qa'iduna
qala rabbi inni la amliku illa nafsi wa-akhi fa-uf'ruq baynana wabayna al-qawmi al-fasiqina
qala fa-innaha muharramatun alayhim arba'ina sanatan yatihuna fi al-ardi fala tasa ala al-qawmi al-fasiqina
wa-ut'lu alayhim naba-a ib'nay adama bil-haqi idh qarraba qur'banan fatuqubbila min ahadihima walam yutaqabbal mina al-akhari qala la-aqtulannaka qala innama yataqabbalu al-lahu mina al-mutaqina
la-in basatta ilayya yadaka litaqtulani ma ana bibasitin yadiya ilayka li-aqtulaka inni akhafu al-laha rabba al-'alamina
inni uridu an tabua bi-ith'mi wa-ith'mika fatakuna min ashabi an-nari wadhalika jazau az-zalimina
fatawwa'at lahu nafsuhu qatla akhihi faqatalahu fa-asbaha mina al-khasirina
faba'atha al-lahu ghuraban yabhathu fi al-ardi liyuriyahu kayfa yuwari sawata akhihi qala yawaylata a'ajaztu an akuna mith'la hadha al-ghurabi fa-uwariya sawata akhi fa-asbaha mina an-nadimina

min ajli dhalika katabna ala bani is'raila annahu man qatala nafsan bighayri nafsin aw fasadin fi al-ardi faka-annama qatala an-nasa jami'an waman ahyaha faka-annama ahya an-nasa jami'an walaqad jaathum rusuluna bil-bayinati thumma inna kathiran min'hum ba'da dhalika fi al-ardi lamus'rifuna

innama jazau alladhina yuharibuna al-laha warasulahu wayas'awna fi al-ardi fasadan an yuqattalu aw yusallabu aw tuqatta'a aydihim wa-arjuluhum min khilafin aw yunfaw mina al-ardi dhalika lahum khiz'yun fi ad-dun'ya walahum fi al-akhirati adhabun azimun
illa alladhina tabu min qabli an taqdiru alayhim fa-i'lamu anna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
yaayyuha alladhina amanu ittaqu al-laha wa-ib'taghu ilayhi al-wasilata wajahidu fi sabilihi la'allakum tuf'lihuna
inna alladhina kafaru law anna lahum ma fi al-ardi jami'an wamith'lahu ma'ahu liyaftadu bihi min adhabi yawmi al-qiyamati ma tuqubbila min'hum walahum adhabun alimun
yuriduna an yakhruju mina an-nari wama hum bikharijina min'ha walahum adhabun muqimun
was-sariqu was-sariqatu fa-iq'ta'u aydiyahuma jazaan bima kasaba nakalan mina al-lahi wal-lahu azizun hakimun
faman taba min ba'di zul'mihi wa-aslaha fa-inna al-laha yatubu alayhi inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
alam ta'lam anna al-laha lahu mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi yu'adhibu man yashau wayaghfiru liman yashau wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun

yaayyuha ar-rasulu la yahzunka alladhina yusari'una fi al-kuf'ri mina alladhina qalu amanna bi-afwahihim walam tu'min qulubuhum wamina alladhina hadu samma'una lil'kadhibi samma'una liqawmin akharina lam yatuka yuharrifuna al-kalima min ba'di mawadi'ihi yaquluna in utitum hadha fakhudhuhu wa-in lam tu'tawhu fa-ih'dharu waman yuridi al-lahu fit'natahu falan tamlika lahu mina al-lahi shayan ulaika alladhina lam yuridi al-lahu an yutahhira qulubahum lahum fi ad-dun'ya khiz'yun walahum fi al-akhirati adhabun azimun

samma'una lil'kadhibi akkaluna lilssuh'ti fa-in jauka fa-uh'kum baynahum aw a'rid anhum wa-in tu'rid anhum falan yadurruka shayan wa-in hakamta fa-uh'kum baynahum bil-qis'ti inna al-laha yuhibbu al-muq'sitina
wakayfa yuhakkimunaka wa'indahumu at-tawratu fiha huk'mu al-lahi thumma yatawallawna min ba'di dhalika wama ulaika bil-mu'minina

inna anzalna at-tawrata fiha hudan wanurun yahkumu biha an-nabiyuna alladhina aslamu lilladhina hadu war-rabaniyuna wal-ahbaru bima us'tuh'fizu min kitabi al-lahi wakanu alayhi shuhadaa fala takhshawu an-nasa wa-ikh'shawni wala tashtaru biayati thamanan qalilan waman lam yahkum bima anzala al-lahu fa-ulaika humu al-kafiruna

wakatabna alayhim fiha anna an-nafsa bil-nafsi wal-'ayna bil-'ayni wal-anfa bil-anfi wal-udhuna bil-udhuni was-sina bil-sini wal-juruha qisasun faman tasaddaqa bihi fahuwa kaffaratun lahu waman lam yahkum bima anzala al-lahu fa-ulaika humu az-zalimuna

waqaffayna ala atharihim bi'isa ib'ni maryama musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi mina at-tawrati waataynahu al-injila fihi hudan wanurun wamusaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi mina at-tawrati wahudan wamaw'izatan lil'muttaqina
walyahkum ahlu al-injili bima anzala al-lahu fihi waman lam yahkum bima anzala al-lahu fa-ulaika humu al-fasiquna

wa-anzalna ilayka al-kitaba bil-haqi musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi mina al-kitabi wamuhayminan alayhi fa-uh'kum baynahum bima anzala al-lahu wala tattabi' ahwaahum amma jaaka mina al-haqi likullin ja'alna minkum shir'atan wamin'hajan walaw shaa al-lahu laja'alakum ummatan wahidatan walakin liyabluwakum fi ma atakum fa-is'tabiqu al-khayrati ila al-lahi marji'ukum jami'an fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum fihi takhtalifuna

wa-ani uh'kum baynahum bima anzala al-lahu wala tattabi' ahwaahum wa-ih'dharhum an yaftinuka an ba'di ma anzala al-lahu ilayka fa-in tawallaw fa-i'lam annama yuridu al-lahu an yusibahum biba'di dhunubihim wa-inna kathiran mina an-nasi lafasiquna
afahuk'ma al-jahiliyati yabghuna waman ahsanu mina al-lahi huk'man liqawmin yuqinuna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattakhidhu al-yahuda wan-nasara awliyaa ba'duhum awliyau ba'din waman yatawallahum minkum fa-innahu min'hum inna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma az-zalimina
fatara alladhina fi qulubihim maradun yusari'una fihim yaquluna nakhsha an tusibana dairatun fa'asa al-lahu an yatiya bil-fathi aw amrin min indihi fayus'bihu ala ma asarru fi anfusihim nadimina
wayaqulu alladhina amanu ahaulai alladhina aqsamu bil-lahi jahda aymanihim innahum lama'akum habitat a'maluhum fa-asbahu khasirina

yaayyuha alladhina amanu man yartadda minkum an dinihi fasawfa yati al-lahu biqawmin yuhibbuhum wayuhibbunahu adhillatin ala al-mu'minina a'izzatin ala al-kafirina yujahiduna fi sabili al-lahi wala yakhafuna lawmata laimin dhalika fadlu al-lahi yu'tihi man yashau wal-lahu wasi'un alimun
innama waliyyukumu al-lahu warasuluhu wa-alladhina amanu alladhina yuqimuna as-salata wayu'tuna az-zakata wahum raki'una
waman yatawalla al-laha warasulahu wa-alladhina amanu fa-inna hiz'ba al-lahi humu al-ghalibuna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattakhidhu alladhina ittakhadhu dinakum huzuwan wala'iban mina alladhina utu al-kitaba min qablikum wal-kufara awliyaa wa-ittaqu al-laha in kuntum mu'minina
wa-idha nadaytum ila as-salati ittakhadhuha huzuwan wala'iban dhalika bi-annahum qawmun la ya'qiluna
qul yaahla al-kitabi hal tanqimuna minna illa an amanna bil-lahi wama unzila ilayna wama unzila min qablu wa-anna aktharakum fasiquna

qul hal unabbi-ukum bisharrin min dhalika mathubatan inda al-lahi man la'anahu al-lahu waghadiba alayhi waja'ala min'humu al-qiradata wal-khanazira wa'abada at-taghuta ulaika sharrun makanan wa-adallu an sawai as-sabili
wa-idha jaukum qalu amanna waqad dakhalu bil-kuf'ri wahum qad kharaju bihi wal-lahu a'lamu bima kanu yaktumuna
watara kathiran min'hum yusari'una fi al-ith'mi wal-'ud'wani wa-aklihimu as-suh'ta labi'sa ma kanu ya'maluna
lawla yanhahumu ar-rabaniyuna wal-ahbaru an qawlihimu al-ith'ma wa-aklihimu as-suh'ta labi'sa ma kanu yasna'una

waqalati al-yahudu yadu al-lahi maghlulatun ghullat aydihim walu'inu bima qalu bal yadahu mabsutatani yunfiqu kayfa yashau walayazidanna kathiran min'hum ma unzila ilayka min rabbika tugh'yanan wakuf'ran wa-alqayna baynahumu al-'adawata wal-baghdaa ila yawmi al-qiyamati kullama awqadu naran lil'harbi atfa-aha al-lahu wayas'awna fi al-ardi fasadan wal-lahu la yuhibbu al-muf'sidina
walaw anna ahla al-kitabi amanu wa-ittaqaw lakaffarna anhum sayyiatihim wala-adkhalnahum jannati an-na'imi
walaw annahum aqamu at-tawrata wal-injila wama unzila ilayhim min rabbihim la-akalu min fawqihim wamin tahti arjulihim min'hum ummatun muq'tasidatun wakathirun min'hum saa ma ya'maluna
yaayyuha ar-rasulu balligh ma unzila ilayka min rabbika wa-in lam taf 'al fama ballaghta risalatahu wal-lahu ya'simuka mina an-nasi inna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma al-kafirina

qul yaahla al-kitabi lastum ala shayin hatta tuqimu at-tawrata wal-injila wama unzila ilaykum min rabbikum walayazidanna kathiran min'hum ma unzila ilayka min rabbika tugh'yanan wakuf'ran fala tasa ala al-qawmi al-kafirina
inna alladhina amanu wa-alladhina hadu was-sabiuna wan-nasara man amana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wa'amila salihan fala khawfun alayhim wala hum yahzanuna
laqad akhadhna mithaqa bani is'raila wa-arsalna ilayhim rusulan kullama jaahum rasulun bima la tahwa anfusuhum fariqan kadhabu wafariqan yaqtuluna
wahasibu alla takuna fit'natun fa'amu wasammu thumma taba al-lahu alayhim thumma amu wasammu kathirun min'hum wal-lahu basirun bima ya'maluna

laqad kafara alladhina qalu inna al-laha huwa al-masihu ub'nu maryama waqala al-masihu yabani is'raila u'budu al-laha rabbi warabbakum innahu man yush'rik bil-lahi faqad harrama al-lahu alayhi al-janata wamawahu an-naru wama lilzzalimina min ansarin
laqad kafara alladhina qalu inna al-laha thalithu thalathatin wama min ilahin illa ilahun wahidun wa-in lam yantahu amma yaquluna layamassanna alladhina kafaru min'hum adhabun alimun
afala yatubuna ila al-lahi wayastaghfirunahu wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
ma al-masihu ub'nu maryama illa rasulun qad khalat min qablihi ar-rusulu wa-ummuhu siddiqatun kana yakulani at-ta'ama unzur kayfa nubayyinu lahumu al-ayati thumma unzur anna yu'fakuna
qul ata'buduna min duni al-lahi ma la yamliku lakum darran wala naf 'an wal-lahu huwa as-sami'u al-'alimu
qul yaahla al-kitabi la taghlu fi dinikum ghayra al-haqi wala tattabi'u ahwaa qawmin qad dallu min qablu wa-adallu kathiran wadallu an sawai as-sabili
lu'ina alladhina kafaru min bani is'raila ala lisani dawuda wa'isa ib'ni maryama dhalika bima asaw wakanu ya'taduna
kanu la yatanahawna an munkarin fa'aluhu labi'sa ma kanu yaf 'aluna
tara kathiran min'hum yatawallawna alladhina kafaru labi'sa ma qaddamat lahum anfusuhum an sakhita al-lahu alayhim wafi al-'adhabi hum khaliduna
walaw kanu yu'minuna bil-lahi wan-nabiyi wama unzila ilayhi ma ittakhadhuhum awliyaa walakinna kathiran min'hum fasiquna

latajidanna ashadda an-nasi adawatan lilladhina amanu al-yahuda wa-alladhina ashraku walatajidanna aqrabahum mawaddatan lilladhina amanu alladhina qalu inna nasara dhalika bi-anna min'hum qissisina waruh'banan wa-annahum la yastakbiruna
wa-idha sami'u ma unzila ila ar-rasuli tara a'yunahum tafidu mina ad-dam'i mimma arafu mina al-haqi yaquluna rabbana amanna fa-uk'tub'na ma'a as-shahidina
wama lana la nu'minu bil-lahi wama jaana mina al-haqi wanatma'u an yud'khilana rabbuna ma'a al-qawmi as-salihina
fa-athabahumu al-lahu bima qalu jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha wadhalika jazau al-muh'sinina
wa-alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina ulaika ashabu al-jahimi
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tuharrimu tayyibati ma ahalla al-lahu lakum wala ta'tadu inna al-laha la yuhibbu al-mu'tadina
wakulu mimma razaqakumu al-lahu halalan tayyiban wa-ittaqu al-laha alladhi antum bihi mu'minuna

la yuakhidhukumu al-lahu bil-laghwi fi aymanikum walakin yuakhidhukum bima aqqadttumu al-aymana fakaffaratuhu it'amu asharati masakina min awsati ma tut'imuna ahlikum aw kis'watuhum aw tahriru raqabatin faman lam yajid fasiyamu thalathati ayyamin dhalika kaffaratu aymanikum idha halaftum wa-ih'fazu aymanakum kadhalika yubayyinu al-lahu lakum ayatihi la'allakum tashkuruna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu innama al-khamru wal-maysiru wal-ansabu wal-azlamu rij'sun min amali as-shaytani fa-ij'tanibuhu la'allakum tuf'lihuna
innama yuridu as-shaytanu an yuqi'a baynakumu al-'adawata wal-baghdaa fi al-khamri wal-maysiri wayasuddakum an dhik'ri al-lahi wa'ani as-salati fahal antum muntahuna
wa-ati'u al-laha wa-ati'u ar-rasula wa-ih'dharu fa-in tawallaytum fa-i'lamu annama ala rasulina al-balaghu al-mubinu
laysa ala alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati junahun fima ta'imu idha ma ittaqaw waamanu wa'amilu as-salihati thumma ittaqaw waamanu thumma ittaqaw wa-ahsanu wal-lahu yuhibbu al-muh'sinina
yaayyuha alladhina amanu layabluwannakumu al-lahu bishayin mina as-saydi tanaluhu aydikum warimahukum liya'lama al-lahu man yakhafuhu bil-ghaybi famani i'tada ba'da dhalika falahu adhabun alimun

yaayyuha alladhina amanu la taqtulu as-sayda wa-antum hurumun waman qatalahu minkum muta'ammidan fajazaon mith'lu ma qatala mina an-na'ami yahkumu bihi dhawa adlin minkum hadyan baligha al-ka'bati aw kaffaratun ta'amu masakina aw adlu dhalika siyaman liyadhuqa wabala amrihi afa al-lahu amma salafa waman ada fayantaqimu al-lahu min'hu wal-lahu azizun dhu intiqamin
uhilla lakum saydu al-bahri wata'amuhu mata'an lakum walilssayyarati wahurrima alaykum saydu al-bari ma dum'tum huruman wa-ittaqu al-laha alladhi ilayhi tuh'sharuna

ja'ala al-lahu al-ka'bata al-bayta al-harama qiyaman lilnnasi was-shahra al-harama wal-hadya wal-qalaida dhalika lita'lamu anna al-laha ya'lamu ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi wa-anna al-laha bikulli shayin alimun
i'lamu anna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi wa-anna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
ma ala ar-rasuli illa al-balaghu wal-lahu ya'lamu ma tub'duna wama taktumuna
qul la yastawi al-khabithu wat-tayibu walaw a'jabaka kathratu al-khabithi fa-ittaqu al-laha yauli al-albabi la'allakum tuf'lihuna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tasalu an ashyaa in tub'da lakum tasu'kum wa-in tasalu anha hina yunazzalu al-qur'anu tub'da lakum afa al-lahu anha wal-lahu ghafurun halimun
qad sa-alaha qawmun min qablikum thumma asbahu biha kafirina
ma ja'ala al-lahu min bahiratin wala saibatin wala wasilatin wala hamin walakinna alladhina kafaru yaftaruna ala al-lahi al-kadhiba wa-aktharuhum la ya'qiluna
wa-idha qila lahum ta'alaw ila ma anzala al-lahu wa-ila ar-rasuli qalu hasbuna ma wajadna alayhi abaana awalaw kana abauhum la ya'lamuna shayan wala yahtaduna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu alaykum anfusakum la yadurrukum man dalla idha ih'tadaytum ila al-lahi marji'ukum jami'an fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna

yaayyuha alladhina amanu shahadatu baynikum idha hadara ahadakumu al-mawtu hina al-wasiyati ith'nani dhawa adlin minkum aw akharani min ghayrikum in antum darabtum fi al-ardi fa-asabatkum musibatu al-mawti tahbisunahuma min ba'di as-salati fayuq'simani bil-lahi ini ir'tabtum la nashtari bihi thamanan walaw kana dha qur'ba wala naktumu shahadata al-lahi inna idhan lamina al-athimina

fa-in uthira ala annahuma is'tahaqqa ith'man faakharani yaqumani maqamahuma mina alladhina is'tahaqqa alayhimu al-awlayani fayuq'simani bil-lahi lashahadatuna ahaqqu min shahadatihima wama i'tadayna inna idhan lamina az-zalimina
dhalika adna an yatu bil-shahadati ala wajhiha aw yakhafu an turadda aymanun ba'da aymanihim wa-ittaqu al-laha wa-is'ma'u wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-fasiqina
yawma yajma'u al-lahu ar-rusula fayaqulu madha ujib'tum qalu la il'ma lana innaka anta allamu al-ghuyubi

idh qala al-lahu ya'isa ib'na maryama udh'kur ni'mati alayka wa'ala walidatika idh ayyadttuka biruhi al-qudusi tukallimu an-nasa fi al-mahdi wakahlan wa-idh allamtuka al-kitaba wal-hik'mata wat-tawrata wal-injila wa-idh takhluqu mina at-tini kahayati at-tayri bi-idh'ni fatanfukhu fiha fatakunu tayran bi-idh'ni watub'ri-u al-akmaha wal-abrasa bi-idh'ni wa-idh tukh'riju al-mawta bi-idh'ni wa-idh kafaftu bani is'raila anka idh ji'tahum bil-bayinati faqala alladhina kafaru min'hum in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
wa-idh awhaytu ila al-hawariyina an aminu bi wabirasuli qalu amanna wa-ish'had bi-annana mus'limuna
idh qala al-hawariyuna ya'isa ib'na maryama hal yastati'u rabbuka an yunazzila alayna maidatan mina as-samai qala ittaqu al-laha in kuntum mu'minina
qalu nuridu an nakula min'ha watatma-inna qulubuna wana'lama an qad sadaqtana wanakuna alayha mina as-shahidina
qala isa ub'nu maryama al-lahuma rabbana anzil alayna maidatan mina as-samai takunu lana idan li-awwalina waakhirina waayatan minka wa-ur'zuq'na wa-anta khayru ar-raziqina
qala al-lahu inni munazziluha alaykum faman yakfur ba'du minkum fa-inni u'adhibuhu adhaban la u'adhibuhu ahadan mina al-'alamina

wa-idh qala al-lahu ya'isa ib'na maryama a-anta qul'ta lilnnasi ittakhidhuni wa-ummiya ilahayni min duni al-lahi qala sub'hanaka ma yakunu li an aqula ma laysa li bihaqqin in kuntu qul'tuhu faqad alim'tahu ta'lamu ma fi nafsi wala a'lamu ma fi nafsika innaka anta allamu al-ghuyubi
ma qul'tu lahum illa ma amartani bihi ani u'budu al-laha rabbi warabbakum wakuntu alayhim shahidan ma dum'tu fihim falamma tawaffaytani kunta anta ar-raqiba alayhim wa-anta ala kulli shayin shahidun
in tu'adhib'hum fa-innahum ibaduka wa-in taghfir lahum fa-innaka anta al-'azizu al-hakimu
qala al-lahu hadha yawmu yanfa'u as-sadiqina sid'quhum lahum jannatun tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha abadan radiya al-lahu anhum waradu anhu dhalika al-fawzu al-'azimu
lillahi mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi wama fihinna wahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
al-hamdu lillahi alladhi khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda waja'ala az-zulumati wan-nura thumma alladhina kafaru birabbihim ya'diluna
huwa alladhi khalaqakum min tinin thumma qada ajalan wa-ajalun musamman indahu thumma antum tamtaruna
wahuwa al-lahu fi as-samawati wafi al-ardi ya'lamu sirrakum wajahrakum waya'lamu ma taksibuna
wama tatihim min ayatin min ayati rabbihim illa kanu anha mu'ridina
faqad kadhabu bil-haqi lamma jaahum fasawfa yatihim anbau ma kanu bihi yastahziuna

alam yaraw kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarnin makkannahum fi al-ardi ma lam numakkin lakum wa-arsalna as-samaa alayhim mid'raran waja'alna al-anhara tajri min tahtihim fa-ahlaknahum bidhunubihim wa-anshana min ba'dihim qarnan akharina
walaw nazzalna alayka kitaban fi qir'tasin falamasuhu bi-aydihim laqala alladhina kafaru in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
waqalu lawla unzila alayhi malakun walaw anzalna malakan laqudiya al-amru thumma la yunzaruna
walaw ja'alnahu malakan laja'alnahu rajulan walalabasna alayhim ma yalbisuna
walaqadi us'tuh'zi-a birusulin min qablika fahaqa bi-alladhina sakhiru min'hum ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
qul siru fi al-ardi thumma unzuru kayfa kana aqibatu al-mukadhibina
qul liman ma fi as-samawati wal-ardi qul lillahi kataba ala nafsihi ar-rahmata layajma'annakum ila yawmi al-qiyamati la rayba fihi alladhina khasiru anfusahum fahum la yu'minuna
walahu ma sakana fi al-layli wan-nahari wahuwa as-sami'u al-'alimu
qul aghayra al-lahi attakhidhu waliyyan fatiri as-samawati wal-ardi wahuwa yut'imu wala yut'amu qul inni umir'tu an akuna awwala man aslama wala takunanna mina al-mush'rikina
qul inni akhafu in asaytu rabbi adhaba yawmin azimin
man yus'raf anhu yawma-idhin faqad rahimahu wadhalika al-fawzu al-mubinu
wa-in yamsaska al-lahu bidurrin fala kashifa lahu illa huwa wa-in yamsaska bikhayrin fahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
wahuwa al-qahiru fawqa ibadihi wahuwa al-hakimu al-khabiru

qul ayyu shayin akbaru shahadatan quli al-lahu shahidun bayni wabaynakum wauhiya ilayya hadha al-qur'anu li-undhirakum bihi waman balagha a-innakum latashhaduna anna ma'a al-lahi alihatan ukh'ra qul la ashhadu qul innama huwa ilahun wahidun wa-innani barion mimma tush'rikuna
alladhina ataynahumu al-kitaba ya'rifunahu kama ya'rifuna abnaahumu alladhina khasiru anfusahum fahum la yu'minuna
waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba biayatihi innahu la yuf'lihu az-zalimuna
wayawma nahshuruhum jami'an thumma naqulu lilladhina ashraku ayna shurakaukumu alladhina kuntum taz'umuna
thumma lam takun fit'natuhum illa an qalu wal-lahi rabbina ma kunna mush'rikina
unzur kayfa kadhabu ala anfusihim wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna

wamin'hum man yastami'u ilayka waja'alna ala qulubihim akinnatan an yafqahuhu wafi adhanihim waqran wa-in yaraw kulla ayatin la yu'minu biha hatta idha jauka yujadilunaka yaqulu alladhina kafaru in hadha illa asatiru al-awalina
wahum yanhawna anhu wayanawna anhu wa-in yuh'likuna illa anfusahum wama yash'uruna
walaw tara idh wuqifu ala an-nari faqalu yalaytana nuraddu wala nukadhiba biayati rabbina wanakuna mina al-mu'minina
bal bada lahum ma kanu yukh'funa min qablu walaw ruddu la'adu lima nuhu anhu wa-innahum lakadhibuna
waqalu in hiya illa hayatuna ad-dun'ya wama nahnu bimab'uthina
walaw tara idh wuqifu ala rabbihim qala alaysa hadha bil-haqi qalu bala warabbina qala fadhuqu al-'adhaba bima kuntum takfuruna
qad khasira alladhina kadhabu biliqai al-lahi hatta idha jaathumu as-sa'atu baghtatan qalu yahasratana ala ma farratna fiha wahum yahmiluna awzarahum ala zuhurihim ala saa ma yaziruna
wama al-hayatu ad-dun'ya illa la'ibun walahwun walalddaru al-akhiratu khayrun lilladhina yattaquna afala ta'qiluna
qad na'lamu innahu layahzunuka alladhi yaquluna fa-innahum la yukadhibunaka walakinna az-zalimina biayati al-lahi yajhaduna
walaqad kudhibat rusulun min qablika fasabaru ala ma kudhibu waudhu hatta atahum nasruna wala mubaddila likalimati al-lahi walaqad jaaka min naba-i al-mur'salina

wa-in kana kabura alayka i'raduhum fa-ini is'tata'ta an tabtaghiya nafaqan fi al-ardi aw sullaman fi as-samai fatatiyahum biayatin walaw shaa al-lahu lajama'ahum ala al-huda fala takunanna mina al-jahilina
innama yastajibu alladhina yasma'una wal-mawta yab'athuhumu al-lahu thumma ilayhi yur'ja'una
waqalu lawla nuzzila alayhi ayatun min rabbihi qul inna al-laha qadirun ala an yunazzila ayatan walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
wama min dabbatin fi al-ardi wala tairin yatiru bijanahayhi illa umamun amthalukum ma farratna fi al-kitabi min shayin thumma ila rabbihim yuh'sharuna
wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina summun wabuk'mun fi az-zulumati man yasha-i al-lahu yud'lil'hu waman yasha yaj'alhu ala siratin mus'taqimin
qul ara-aytakum in atakum adhabu al-lahi aw atatkumu as-sa'atu aghayra al-lahi tad'una in kuntum sadiqina
bal iyyahu tad'una fayakshifu ma tad'una ilayhi in shaa watansawna ma tush'rikuna
walaqad arsalna ila umamin min qablika fa-akhadhnahum bil-basai wad-darai la'allahum yatadarra'una
falawla idh jaahum basuna tadarra'u walakin qasat qulubuhum wazayyana lahumu as-shaytanu ma kanu ya'maluna
falamma nasu ma dhukkiru bihi fatahna alayhim abwaba kulli shayin hatta idha farihu bima utu akhadhnahum baghtatan fa-idha hum mub'lisuna
faquti'a dabiru al-qawmi alladhina zalamu wal-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
qul ara-aytum in akhadha al-lahu sam'akum wa-absarakum wakhatama ala qulubikum man ilahun ghayru al-lahi yatikum bihi unzur kayfa nusarrifu al-ayati thumma hum yasdifuna
qul ara-aytakum in atakum adhabu al-lahi baghtatan aw jahratan hal yuh'laku illa al-qawmu az-zalimuna
wama nur'silu al-mur'salina illa mubashirina wamundhirina faman amana wa-aslaha fala khawfun alayhim wala hum yahzanuna
wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina yamassuhumu al-'adhabu bima kanu yafsuquna
qul la aqulu lakum indi khazainu al-lahi wala a'lamu al-ghayba wala aqulu lakum inni malakun in attabi'u illa ma yuha ilayya qul hal yastawi al-a'ma wal-basiru afala tatafakkaruna
wa-andhir bihi alladhina yakhafuna an yuh'sharu ila rabbihim laysa lahum min dunihi waliyyun wala shafi'un la'allahum yattaquna
wala tatrudi alladhina yad'una rabbahum bil-ghadati wal-'ashiyi yuriduna wajhahu ma alayka min hisabihim min shayin wama min hisabika alayhim min shayin fatatrudahum fatakuna mina az-zalimina
wakadhalika fatanna ba'dahum biba'din liyaqulu ahaulai manna al-lahu alayhim min baynina alaysa al-lahu bi-a'lama bil-shakirina

wa-idha jaaka alladhina yu'minuna biayatina faqul salamun alaykum kataba rabbukum ala nafsihi ar-rahmata annahu man amila minkum suan bijahalatin thumma taba min ba'dihi wa-aslaha fa-annahu ghafurun rahimun
wakadhalika nufassilu al-ayati walitastabina sabilu al-muj'rimina
qul inni nuhitu an a'buda alladhina tad'una min duni al-lahi qul la attabi'u ahwaakum qad dalaltu idhan wama ana mina al-muh'tadina
qul inni ala bayyinatin min rabbi wakadhabtum bihi ma indi ma tasta'jiluna bihi ini al-huk'mu illa lillahi yaqussu al-haqa wahuwa khayru al-fasilina
qul law anna indi ma tasta'jiluna bihi laqudiya al-amru bayni wabaynakum wal-lahu a'lamu bil-zalimina

wa'indahu mafatihu al-ghaybi la ya'lamuha illa huwa waya'lamu ma fi al-bari wal-bahri wama tasqutu min waraqatin illa ya'lamuha wala habbatin fi zulumati al-ardi wala ratbin wala yabisin illa fi kitabin mubinin
wahuwa alladhi yatawaffakum bi-al-layli waya'lamu ma jarahtum bil-nahari thumma yab'athukum fihi liyuq'da ajalun musamman thumma ilayhi marji'ukum thumma yunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
wahuwa al-qahiru fawqa ibadihi wayur'silu alaykum hafazatan hatta idha jaa ahadakumu al-mawtu tawaffathu rusuluna wahum la yufarrituna
thumma ruddu ila al-lahi mawlahumu al-haqi ala lahu al-huk'mu wahuwa asra'u al-hasibina
qul man yunajjikum min zulumati al-bari wal-bahri tad'unahu tadarru'an wakhuf'yatan la-in anjana min hadhihi lanakunanna mina as-shakirina
quli al-lahu yunajjikum min'ha wamin kulli karbin thumma antum tush'rikuna
qul huwa al-qadiru ala an yab'atha alaykum adhaban min fawqikum aw min tahti arjulikum aw yalbisakum shiya'an wayudhiqa ba'dakum basa ba'din unzur kayfa nusarrifu al-ayati la'allahum yafqahuna
wakadhaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa al-haqu qul lastu alaykum biwakilin
likulli naba-in mus'taqarrun wasawfa ta'lamuna
wa-idha ra-ayta alladhina yakhuduna fi ayatina fa-a'rid anhum hatta yakhudu fi hadithin ghayrihi wa-imma yunsiyannaka as-shaytanu fala taq'ud ba'da ad-dhik'ra ma'a al-qawmi az-zalimina
wama ala alladhina yattaquna min hisabihim min shayin walakin dhik'ra la'allahum yattaquna

wadhari alladhina ittakhadhu dinahum la'iban walahwan wagharrathumu al-hayatu ad-dun'ya wadhakkir bihi an tub'sala nafsun bima kasabat laysa laha min duni al-lahi waliyyun wala shafi'un wa-in ta'dil kulla adlin la yu'khadh min'ha ulaika alladhina ub'silu bima kasabu lahum sharabun min hamimin wa'adhabun alimun bima kanu yakfuruna

qul anad'u min duni al-lahi ma la yanfa'una wala yadurruna wanuraddu ala a'qabina ba'da idh hadana al-lahu ka-alladhi is'tahwathu as-shayatinu fi al-ardi hayrana lahu ashabun yad'unahu ila al-huda i'tina qul inna huda al-lahi huwa al-huda wa-umir'na linus'lima lirabbi al-'alamina
wa-an aqimu as-salata wa-ittaquhu wahuwa alladhi ilayhi tuh'sharuna
wahuwa alladhi khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi wayawma yaqulu kun fayakunu qawluhu al-haqu walahu al-mul'ku yawma yunfakhu fi as-suri alimu al-ghaybi was-shahadati wahuwa al-hakimu al-khabiru
wa-idh qala ib'rahimu li-abihi azara atattakhidhu asnaman alihatan inni araka waqawmaka fi dalalin mubinin
wakadhalika nuri ib'rahima malakuta as-samawati wal-ardi waliyakuna mina al-muqinina
falamma janna alayhi al-laylu raa kawkaban qala hadha rabbi falamma afala qala la uhibbu al-afilina
falamma raa al-qamara bazighan qala hadha rabbi falamma afala qala la-in lam yahdini rabbi la-akunanna mina al-qawmi ad-dalina
falamma raa as-shamsa bazighatan qala hadha rabbi hadha akbaru falamma afalat qala yaqawmi inni barion mimma tush'rikuna
inni wajjahtu wajhiya lilladhi fatara as-samawati wal-arda hanifan wama ana mina al-mush'rikina
wahajjahu qawmuhu qala atuhajjunni fi al-lahi waqad hadani wala akhafu ma tush'rikuna bihi illa an yashaa rabbi shayan wasi'a rabbi kulla shayin il'man afala tatadhakkaruna
wakayfa akhafu ma ashraktum wala takhafuna annakum ashraktum bil-lahi ma lam yunazzil bihi alaykum sul'tanan fa-ayyu al-fariqayni ahaqqu bil-amni in kuntum ta'lamuna
alladhina amanu walam yalbisu imanahum bizul'min ulaika lahumu al-amnu wahum muh'taduna
watil'ka hujjatuna ataynaha ib'rahima ala qawmihi narfa'u darajatin man nashau inna rabbaka hakimun alimun
wawahabna lahu is'haqa waya'quba kullan hadayna wanuhan hadayna min qablu wamin dhurriyyatihi dawuda wasulaymana wa-ayyuba wayusufa wamusa waharuna wakadhalika najzi al-muh'sinina
wazakariyya wayahya wa'isa wa-il'yasa kullun mina as-salihina
wa-is'ma'ila wal-yasa'a wayunusa walutan wakullan faddalna ala al-'alamina
wamin abaihim wadhurriyyatihim wa-ikh'wanihim wa-ij'tabaynahum wahadaynahum ila siratin mus'taqimin
dhalika huda al-lahi yahdi bihi man yashau min ibadihi walaw ashraku lahabita anhum ma kanu ya'maluna
ulaika alladhina ataynahumu al-kitaba wal-huk'ma wan-nubuwata fa-in yakfur biha haulai faqad wakkalna biha qawman laysu biha bikafirina
ulaika alladhina hada al-lahu fabihudahumu iq'tadih qul la asalukum alayhi ajran in huwa illa dhik'ra lil'alamina

wama qadaru al-laha haqqa qadrihi idh qalu ma anzala al-lahu ala basharin min shayin qul man anzala al-kitaba alladhi jaa bihi musa nuran wahudan lilnnasi taj'alunahu qaratisa tub'dunaha watukh'funa kathiran wa'ullim'tum ma lam ta'lamu antum wala abaukum quli al-lahu thumma dharhum fi khawdihim yal'abuna
wahadha kitabun anzalnahu mubarakun musaddiqu alladhi bayna yadayhi walitundhira umma al-qura waman hawlaha wa-alladhina yu'minuna bil-akhirati yu'minuna bihi wahum ala salatihim yuhafizuna

waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw qala uhiya ilayya walam yuha ilayhi shayon waman qala sa-unzilu mith'la ma anzala al-lahu walaw tara idhi az-zalimuna fi ghamarati al-mawti wal-malaikatu basitu aydihim akhriju anfusakumu al-yawma tuj'zawna adhaba al-huni bima kuntum taquluna ala al-lahi ghayra al-haqi wakuntum an ayatihi tastakbiruna

walaqad ji'tumuna furada kama khalaqnakum awwala marratin wataraktum ma khawwalnakum waraa zuhurikum wama nara ma'akum shufa'aakumu alladhina za'amtum annahum fikum shurakau laqad taqatta'a baynakum wadalla ankum ma kuntum taz'umuna
inna al-laha faliqu al-habi wan-nawa yukh'riju al-haya mina al-mayiti wamukh'riju al-mayiti mina al-hayi dhalikumu al-lahu fa-anna tu'fakuna
faliqu al-is'bahi waja'ala al-layla sakanan was-shamsa wal-qamara hus'banan dhalika taqdiru al-'azizi al-'alimi
wahuwa alladhi ja'ala lakumu an-nujuma litahtadu biha fi zulumati al-bari wal-bahri qad fassalna al-ayati liqawmin ya'lamuna
wahuwa alladhi ansha-akum min nafsin wahidatin famus'taqarrun wamus'tawda'un qad fassalna al-ayati liqawmin yafqahuna

wahuwa alladhi anzala mina as-samai maan fa-akhrajna bihi nabata kulli shayin fa-akhrajna min'hu khadiran nukh'riju min'hu habban mutarakiban wamina an-nakhli min tal'iha qin'wanun daniyatun wajannatin min a'nabin waz-zaytuna war-rumana mush'tabihan waghayra mutashabihin unzuru ila thamarihi idha athmara wayan'ihi inna fi dhalikum laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
waja'alu lillahi shurakaa al-jina wakhalaqahum wakharaqu lahu banina wabanatin bighayri il'min sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yasifuna
badi'u as-samawati wal-ardi anna yakunu lahu waladun walam takun lahu sahibatun wakhalaqa kulla shayin wahuwa bikulli shayin alimun
dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum la ilaha illa huwa khaliqu kulli shayin fa-u'buduhu wahuwa ala kulli shayin wakilun
la tud'rikuhu al-absaru wahuwa yud'riku al-absara wahuwa al-latifu al-khabiru
qad jaakum basairu min rabbikum faman absara falinafsihi waman amiya fa'alayha wama ana alaykum bihafizin
wakadhalika nusarrifu al-ayati waliyaqulu darasta walinubayyinahu liqawmin ya'lamuna
ittabi' ma uhiya ilayka min rabbika la ilaha illa huwa wa-a'rid ani al-mush'rikina
walaw shaa al-lahu ma ashraku wama ja'alnaka alayhim hafizan wama anta alayhim biwakilin
wala tasubbu alladhina yad'una min duni al-lahi fayasubbu al-laha adwan bighayri il'min kadhalika zayyanna likulli ummatin amalahum thumma ila rabbihim marji'uhum fayunabbi-uhum bima kanu ya'maluna
wa-aqsamu bil-lahi jahda aymanihim la-in jaathum ayatun layu'minunna biha qul innama al-ayatu inda al-lahi wama yush'irukum annaha idha jaat la yu'minuna
wanuqallibu afidatahum wa-absarahum kama lam yu'minu bihi awwala marratin wanadharuhum fi tugh'yanihim ya'mahuna
walaw annana nazzalna ilayhimu al-malaikata wakallamahumu al-mawta wahasharna alayhim kulla shayin qubulan ma kanu liyu'minu illa an yashaa al-lahu walakinna aktharahum yajhaluna
wakadhalika ja'alna likulli nabiyyin aduwwan shayatina al-insi wal-jini yuhi ba'duhum ila ba'din zukh'rufa al-qawli ghururan walaw shaa rabbuka ma fa'aluhu fadharhum wama yaftaruna
walitasgha ilayhi afidatu alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati waliyardawhu waliyaqtarifu ma hum muq'tarifuna

afaghayra al-lahi abtaghi hakaman wahuwa alladhi anzala ilaykumu al-kitaba mufassalan wa-alladhina ataynahumu al-kitaba ya'lamuna annahu munazzalun min rabbika bil-haqi fala takunanna mina al-mum'tarina
watammat kalimatu rabbika sid'qan wa'adlan la mubaddila likalimatihi wahuwa as-sami'u al-'alimu
wa-in tuti' akthara man fi al-ardi yudilluka an sabili al-lahi in yattabi'una illa az-zana wa-in hum illa yakhrusuna
inna rabbaka huwa a'lamu man yadillu an sabilihi wahuwa a'lamu bil-muh'tadina
fakulu mimma dhukira us'mu al-lahi alayhi in kuntum biayatihi mu'minina

wama lakum alla takulu mimma dhukira us'mu al-lahi alayhi waqad fassala lakum ma harrama alaykum illa ma ud'turir'tum ilayhi wa-inna kathiran layudilluna bi-ahwaihim bighayri il'min inna rabbaka huwa a'lamu bil-mu'tadina
wadharu zahira al-ith'mi wabatinahu inna alladhina yaksibuna al-ith'ma sayuj'zawna bima kanu yaqtarifuna
wala takulu mimma lam yudh'kari us'mu al-lahi alayhi wa-innahu lafis'qun wa-inna as-shayatina layuhuna ila awliyaihim liyujadilukum wa-in ata'tumuhum innakum lamush'rikuna
awaman kana maytan fa-ahyaynahu waja'alna lahu nuran yamshi bihi fi an-nasi kaman mathaluhu fi az-zulumati laysa bikharijin min'ha kadhalika zuyyina lil'kafirina ma kanu ya'maluna
wakadhalika ja'alna fi kulli qaryatin akabira muj'rimiha liyamkuru fiha wama yamkuruna illa bi-anfusihim wama yash'uruna

wa-idha jaathum ayatun qalu lan nu'mina hatta nu'ta mith'la ma utiya rusulu al-lahi al-lahu a'lamu haythu yaj'alu risalatahu sayusibu alladhina ajramu sagharun inda al-lahi wa'adhabun shadidun bima kanu yamkuruna

faman yuridi al-lahu an yahdiyahu yashrah sadrahu lil'is'lami waman yurid an yudillahu yaj'al sadrahu dayyiqan harajan ka-annama yassa'adu fi as-samai kadhalika yaj'alu al-lahu ar-rij'sa ala alladhina la yu'minuna
wahadha siratu rabbika mus'taqiman qad fassalna al-ayati liqawmin yadhakkaruna
lahum daru as-salami inda rabbihim wahuwa waliyyuhum bima kanu ya'maluna

wayawma yahshuruhum jami'an yama'shara al-jini qadi is'takthartum mina al-insi waqala awliyauhum mina al-insi rabbana is'tamta'a ba'duna biba'din wabalaghna ajalana alladhi ajjalta lana qala an-naru mathwakum khalidina fiha illa ma shaa al-lahu inna rabbaka hakimun alimun
wakadhalika nuwalli ba'da az-zalimina ba'dan bima kanu yaksibuna

yama'shara al-jini wal-insi alam yatikum rusulun minkum yaqussuna alaykum ayati wayundhirunakum liqaa yawmikum hadha qalu shahid'na ala anfusina wagharrathumu al-hayatu ad-dun'ya washahidu ala anfusihim annahum kanu kafirina
dhalika an lam yakun rabbuka muh'lika al-qura bizul'min wa-ahluha ghafiluna
walikullin darajatun mimma amilu wama rabbuka bighafilin amma ya'maluna
warabbuka al-ghaniyu dhu ar-rahmati in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayastakhlif min ba'dikum ma yashau kama ansha-akum min dhurriyyati qawmin akharina
inna ma tu'aduna laatin wama antum bimu'jizina
qul yaqawmi i'malu ala makanatikum inni amilun fasawfa ta'lamuna man takunu lahu aqibatu ad-dari innahu la yuf'lihu az-zalimuna

waja'alu lillahi mimma dhara-a mina al-harthi wal-an'ami nasiban faqalu hadha lillahi biza'mihim wahadha lishurakaina fama kana lishurakaihim fala yasilu ila al-lahi wama kana lillahi fahuwa yasilu ila shurakaihim saa ma yahkumuna
wakadhalika zayyana likathirin mina al-mush'rikina qatla awladihim shurakauhum liyur'duhum waliyalbisu alayhim dinahum walaw shaa al-lahu ma fa'aluhu fadharhum wama yaftaruna

waqalu hadhihi an'amun waharthun hij'run la yat'amuha illa man nashau biza'mihim wa-an'amun hurrimat zuhuruha wa-an'amun la yadhkuruna is'ma al-lahi alayha if'tiraan alayhi sayajzihim bima kanu yaftaruna
waqalu ma fi butuni hadhihi al-an'ami khalisatun lidhukurina wamuharramun ala azwajina wa-in yakun maytatan fahum fihi shurakau sayajzihim wasfahum innahu hakimun alimun
qad khasira alladhina qatalu awladahum safahan bighayri il'min waharramu ma razaqahumu al-lahu if'tiraan ala al-lahi qad dallu wama kanu muh'tadina

wahuwa alladhi ansha-a jannatin ma'rushatin waghayra ma'rushatin wan-nakhla waz-zar'a mukh'talifan ukuluhu waz-zaytuna war-rumana mutashabihan waghayra mutashabihin kulu min thamarihi idha athmara waatu haqqahu yawma hasadihi wala tus'rifu innahu la yuhibbu al-mus'rifina
wamina al-an'ami hamulatan wafarshan kulu mimma razaqakumu al-lahu wala tattabi'u khutuwati as-shaytani innahu lakum aduwwun mubinun
thamaniyata azwajin mina ad-dani ith'nayni wamina al-ma'zi ith'nayni qul aldhakarayni harrama ami al-unthayayni amma ish'tamalat alayhi arhamu al-unthayayni nabbiuni bi'il'min in kuntum sadiqina

wamina al-ibili ith'nayni wamina al-baqari ith'nayni qul aldhakarayni harrama ami al-unthayayni amma ish'tamalat alayhi arhamu al-unthayayni am kuntum shuhadaa idh wassakumu al-lahu bihadha faman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban liyudilla an-nasa bighayri il'min inna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma az-zalimina

qul la ajidu fi ma uhiya ilayya muharraman ala ta'imin yat'amuhu illa an yakuna maytatan aw daman masfuhan aw lahma khinzirin fa-innahu rij'sun aw fis'qan uhilla lighayri al-lahi bihi famani ud'turra ghayra baghin wala adin fa-inna rabbaka ghafurun rahimun

wa'ala alladhina hadu harramna kulla dhi zufurin wamina al-baqari wal-ghanami harramna alayhim shuhumahuma illa ma hamalat zuhuruhuma awi al-hawaya aw ma ikh'talata bi'azmin dhalika jazaynahum bibaghyihim wa-inna lasadiquna
fa-in kadhabuka faqul rabbukum dhu rahmatin wasi'atin wala yuraddu basuhu ani al-qawmi al-muj'rimina

sayaqulu alladhina ashraku law shaa al-lahu ma ashrakna wala abauna wala harramna min shayin kadhalika kadhaba alladhina min qablihim hatta dhaqu basana qul hal indakum min il'min fatukh'rijuhu lana in tattabi'una illa az-zana wa-in antum illa takhrusuna
qul falillahi al-hujatu al-balighatu falaw shaa lahadakum ajma'ina

qul halumma shuhadaakumu alladhina yashhaduna anna al-laha harrama hadha fa-in shahidu fala tashhad ma'ahum wala tattabi' ahwaa alladhina kadhabu biayatina wa-alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati wahum birabbihim ya'diluna

qul ta'alaw atlu ma harrama rabbukum alaykum alla tush'riku bihi shayan wabil-walidayni ih'sanan wala taqtulu awladakum min im'laqin nahnu narzuqukum wa-iyyahum wala taqrabu al-fawahisha ma zahara min'ha wama batana wala taqtulu an-nafsa allati harrama al-lahu illa bil-haqi dhalikum wassakum bihi la'allakum ta'qiluna

wala taqrabu mala al-yatimi illa bi-allati hiya ahsanu hatta yablugha ashuddahu wa-awfu al-kayla wal-mizana bil-qis'ti la nukallifu nafsan illa wus'aha wa-idha qul'tum fa-i'dilu walaw kana dha qur'ba wabi'ahdi al-lahi awfu dhalikum wassakum bihi la'allakum tadhakkaruna
wa-anna hadha sirati mus'taqiman fa-ittabi'uhu wala tattabi'u as-subula fatafarraqa bikum an sabilihi dhalikum wassakum bihi la'allakum tattaquna
thumma atayna musa al-kitaba tamaman ala alladhi ahsana watafsilan likulli shayin wahudan warahmatan la'allahum biliqai rabbihim yu'minuna
wahadha kitabun anzalnahu mubarakun fa-ittabi'uhu wa-ittaqu la'allakum tur'hamuna
an taqulu innama unzila al-kitabu ala taifatayni min qablina wa-in kunna an dirasatihim laghafilina

aw taqulu law anna unzila alayna al-kitabu lakunna ahda min'hum faqad jaakum bayyinatun min rabbikum wahudan warahmatun faman azlamu mimman kadhaba biayati al-lahi wasadafa anha sanajzi alladhina yasdifuna an ayatina sua al-'adhabi bima kanu yasdifuna

hal yanzuruna illa an tatiyahumu al-malaikatu aw yatiya rabbuka aw yatiya ba'du ayati rabbika yawma yati ba'du ayati rabbika la yanfa'u nafsan imanuha lam takun amanat min qablu aw kasabat fi imaniha khayran quli intaziru inna muntaziruna
inna alladhina farraqu dinahum wakanu shiya'an lasta min'hum fi shayin innama amruhum ila al-lahi thumma yunabbi-uhum bima kanu yaf 'aluna
man jaa bil-hasanati falahu ashru amthaliha waman jaa bil-sayi-ati fala yuj'za illa mith'laha wahum la yuz'lamuna
qul innani hadani rabbi ila siratin mus'taqimin dinan qiyaman millata ib'rahima hanifan wama kana mina al-mush'rikina
qul inna salati wanusuki wamahyaya wamamati lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
la sharika lahu wabidhalika umir'tu wa-ana awwalu al-mus'limina

qul aghayra al-lahi abghi rabban wahuwa rabbu kulli shayin wala taksibu kullu nafsin illa alayha wala taziru waziratun wiz'ra ukh'ra thumma ila rabbikum marji'ukum fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum fihi takhtalifuna
wahuwa alladhi ja'alakum khalaifa al-ardi warafa'a ba'dakum fawqa ba'din darajatin liyabluwakum fi ma atakum inna rabbaka sari'u al-'iqabi wa-innahu laghafurun rahimun
alif-lam-meem-sad
kitabun unzila ilayka fala yakun fi sadrika harajun min'hu litundhira bihi wadhik'ra lil'mu'minina
ittabi'u ma unzila ilaykum min rabbikum wala tattabi'u min dunihi awliyaa qalilan ma tadhakkaruna
wakam min qaryatin ahlaknaha fajaaha basuna bayatan aw hum qailuna
fama kana da'wahum idh jaahum basuna illa an qalu inna kunna zalimina
falanasalanna alladhina ur'sila ilayhim walanasalanna al-mur'salina
falanaqussanna alayhim bi'il'min wama kunna ghaibina
wal-waznu yawma-idhin al-haqu faman thaqulat mawazinuhu fa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
waman khaffat mawazinuhu fa-ulaika alladhina khasiru anfusahum bima kanu biayatina yazlimuna
walaqad makkannakum fi al-ardi waja'alna lakum fiha ma'ayisha qalilan ma tashkuruna
walaqad khalaqnakum thumma sawwarnakum thumma qul'na lil'malaikati us'judu liadama fasajadu illa ib'lisa lam yakun mina as-sajidina
qala ma mana'aka alla tasjuda idh amartuka qala ana khayrun min'hu khalaqtani min narin wakhalaqtahu min tinin
qala fah'bit min'ha fama yakunu laka an tatakabbara fiha fa-ukh'ruj innaka mina as-saghirina
qala anzir'ni ila yawmi yub'athuna
qala innaka mina al-munzarina
qala fabima aghwaytani la-aq'udanna lahum sirataka al-mus'taqima
thumma laatiyannahum min bayni aydihim wamin khalfihim wa'an aymanihim wa'an shamailihim wala tajidu aktharahum shakirina
qala ukh'ruj min'ha madhuman madhuran laman tabi'aka min'hum la-amla-anna jahannama minkum ajma'ina
wayaadamu us'kun anta wazawjuka al-janata fakula min haythu shi'tuma wala taqraba hadhihi as-shajarata fatakuna mina az-zalimina
fawaswasa lahuma as-shaytanu liyub'diya lahuma ma wuriya anhuma min sawatihima waqala ma nahakuma rabbukuma an hadhihi as-shajarati illa an takuna malakayni aw takuna mina al-khalidina
waqasamahuma inni lakuma lamina an-nasihina

fadallahuma bighururin falamma dhaqa as-shajarata badat lahuma sawatuhuma watafiqa yakhsifani alayhima min waraqi al-janati wanadahuma rabbuhuma alam anhakuma an til'kuma as-shajarati wa-aqul lakuma inna as-shaytana lakuma aduwwun mubinun
qala rabbana zalamna anfusana wa-in lam taghfir lana watarhamna lanakunanna mina al-khasirina
qala ih'bitu ba'dukum liba'din aduwwun walakum fi al-ardi mus'taqarrun wamata'un ila hinin
qala fiha tahyawna wafiha tamutuna wamin'ha tukh'rajuna
yabani adama qad anzalna alaykum libasan yuwari sawatikum warishan walibasu at-taqwa dhalika khayrun dhalika min ayati al-lahi la'allahum yadhakkaruna

yabani adama la yaftinannakumu as-shaytanu kama akhraja abawaykum mina al-janati yanzi'u anhuma libasahuma liyuriyahuma sawatihima innahu yarakum huwa waqabiluhu min haythu la tarawnahum inna ja'alna as-shayatina awliyaa lilladhina la yu'minuna
wa-idha fa'alu fahishatan qalu wajadna alayha abaana wal-lahu amarana biha qul inna al-laha la yamuru bil-fahshai ataquluna ala al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna
qul amara rabbi bil-qis'ti wa-aqimu wujuhakum inda kulli masjidin wa-id'uhu mukh'lisina lahu ad-dina kama bada-akum ta'uduna
fariqan hada wafariqan haqqa alayhimu ad-dalalatu innahumu ittakhadhu as-shayatina awliyaa min duni al-lahi wayahsabuna annahum muh'taduna
yabani adama khudhu zinatakum inda kulli masjidin wakulu wa-ish'rabu wala tus'rifu innahu la yuhibbu al-mus'rifina

qul man harrama zinata al-lahi allati akhraja li'ibadihi wat-tayibati mina ar-riz'qi qul hiya lilladhina amanu fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya khalisatan yawma al-qiyamati kadhalika nufassilu al-ayati liqawmin ya'lamuna

qul innama harrama rabbiya al-fawahisha ma zahara min'ha wama batana wal-ith'ma wal-baghya bighayri al-haqi wa-an tush'riku bil-lahi ma lam yunazzil bihi sul'tanan wa-an taqulu ala al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna
walikulli ummatin ajalun fa-idha jaa ajaluhum la yastakhiruna sa'atan wala yastaqdimuna
yabani adama imma yatiyannakum rusulun minkum yaqussuna alaykum ayati famani ittaqa wa-aslaha fala khawfun alayhim wala hum yahzanuna
wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina wa-is'takbaru anha ulaika ashabu an-nari hum fiha khaliduna

faman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba biayatihi ulaika yanaluhum nasibuhum mina al-kitabi hatta idha jaathum rusuluna yatawaffawnahum qalu ayna ma kuntum tad'una min duni al-lahi qalu dallu anna washahidu ala anfusihim annahum kanu kafirina

qala ud'khulu fi umamin qad khalat min qablikum mina al-jini wal-insi fi an-nari kullama dakhalat ummatun la'anat ukh'taha hatta idha iddaraku fiha jami'an qalat ukh'rahum liulahum rabbana haulai adalluna faatihim adhaban di'fan mina an-nari qala likullin di'fun walakin la ta'lamuna
waqalat ulahum li-ukh'rahum fama kana lakum alayna min fadlin fadhuqu al-'adhaba bima kuntum taksibuna
inna alladhina kadhabu biayatina wa-is'takbaru anha la tufattahu lahum abwabu as-samai wala yadkhuluna al-janata hatta yalija al-jamalu fi sammi al-khiyati wakadhalika najzi al-muj'rimina
lahum min jahannama mihadun wamin fawqihim ghawashin wakadhalika najzi az-zalimina
wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati la nukallifu nafsan illa wus'aha ulaika ashabu al-janati hum fiha khaliduna

wanaza'na ma fi sudurihim min ghillin tajri min tahtihimu al-anharu waqalu al-hamdu lillahi alladhi hadana lihadha wama kunna linahtadiya lawla an hadana al-lahu laqad jaat rusulu rabbina bil-haqi wanudu an til'kumu al-janatu urith'tumuha bima kuntum ta'maluna
wanada ashabu al-janati ashaba an-nari an qad wajadna ma wa'adana rabbuna haqqan fahal wajadttum ma wa'ada rabbukum haqqan qalu na'am fa-adhana mu-adhinun baynahum an la'natu al-lahi ala az-zalimina
alladhina yasudduna an sabili al-lahi wayabghunaha iwajan wahum bil-akhirati kafiruna
wabaynahuma hijabun wa'ala al-a'rafi rijalun ya'rifuna kullan bisimahum wanadaw ashaba al-janati an salamun alaykum lam yadkhuluha wahum yatma'una
wa-idha surifat absaruhum til'qaa ashabi an-nari qalu rabbana la taj'alna ma'a al-qawmi az-zalimina
wanada ashabu al-a'rafi rijalan ya'rifunahum bisimahum qalu ma aghna ankum jam'ukum wama kuntum tastakbiruna
ahaulai alladhina aqsamtum la yanaluhumu al-lahu birahmatin ud'khulu al-janata la khawfun alaykum wala antum tahzanuna
wanada ashabu an-nari ashaba al-janati an afidu alayna mina al-mai aw mimma razaqakumu al-lahu qalu inna al-laha harramahuma ala al-kafirina
alladhina ittakhadhu dinahum lahwan wala'iban wagharrathumu al-hayatu ad-dun'ya fal-yawma nansahum kama nasu liqaa yawmihim hadha wama kanu biayatina yajhaduna
walaqad ji'nahum bikitabin fassalnahu ala il'min hudan warahmatan liqawmin yu'minuna

hal yanzuruna illa tawilahu yawma yati tawiluhu yaqulu alladhina nasuhu min qablu qad jaat rusulu rabbina bil-haqi fahal lana min shufa'aa fayashfa'u lana aw nuraddu fana'mala ghayra alladhi kunna na'malu qad khasiru anfusahum wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna

inna rabbakumu al-lahu alladhi khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi yugh'shi al-layla an-nahara yatlubuhu hathithan was-shamsa wal-qamara wan-nujuma musakharatin bi-amrihi ala lahu al-khalqu wal-amru tabaraka al-lahu rabbu al-'alamina
id'u rabbakum tadarru'an wakhuf'yatan innahu la yuhibbu al-mu'tadina
wala tuf'sidu fi al-ardi ba'da is'lahiha wa-id'uhu khawfan watama'an inna rahmata al-lahi qaribun mina al-muh'sinina

wahuwa alladhi yur'silu ar-riyaha bush'ran bayna yaday rahmatihi hatta idha aqallat sahaban thiqalan suq'nahu libaladin mayyitin fa-anzalna bihi al-maa fa-akhrajna bihi min kulli at-thamarati kadhalika nukh'riju al-mawta la'allakum tadhakkaruna
wal-baladu at-tayibu yakhruju nabatuhu bi-idh'ni rabbihi wa-alladhi khabutha la yakhruju illa nakidan kadhalika nusarrifu al-ayati liqawmin yashkuruna
laqad arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi faqala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu inni akhafu alaykum adhaba yawmin azimin
qala al-mala-u min qawmihi inna lanaraka fi dalalin mubinin
qala yaqawmi laysa bi dalalatun walakinni rasulun min rabbi al-'alamina
uballighukum risalati rabbi wa-ansahu lakum wa-a'lamu mina al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna
awa'ajib'tum an jaakum dhik'run min rabbikum ala rajulin minkum liyundhirakum walitattaqu wala'allakum tur'hamuna
fakadhabuhu fa-anjaynahu wa-alladhina ma'ahu fi al-ful'ki wa-aghraqna alladhina kadhabu biayatina innahum kanu qawman amina
wa-ila adin akhahum hudan qala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaquna
qala al-mala-u alladhina kafaru min qawmihi inna lanaraka fi safahatin wa-inna lanazunnuka mina al-kadhibina
qala yaqawmi laysa bi safahatun walakinni rasulun min rabbi al-'alamina
uballighukum risalati rabbi wa-ana lakum nasihun aminun

awa'ajib'tum an jaakum dhik'run min rabbikum ala rajulin minkum liyundhirakum wa-udh'kuru idh ja'alakum khulafaa min ba'di qawmi nuhin wazadakum fi al-khalqi bas'tatan fa-udh'kuru alaa al-lahi la'allakum tuf'lihuna
qalu aji'tana lina'buda al-laha wahdahu wanadhara ma kana ya'budu abauna fatina bima ta'iduna in kunta mina as-sadiqina
qala qad waqa'a alaykum min rabbikum rij'sun waghadabun atujadilunani fi asmain sammaytumuha antum waabaukum ma nazzala al-lahu biha min sul'tanin fa-intaziru inni ma'akum mina al-muntazirina
fa-anjaynahu wa-alladhina ma'ahu birahmatin minna waqata'na dabira alladhina kadhabu biayatina wama kanu mu'minina

wa-ila thamuda akhahum salihan qala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu qad jaatkum bayyinatun min rabbikum hadhihi naqatu al-lahi lakum ayatan fadharuha takul fi ardi al-lahi wala tamassuha bisuin fayakhudhakum adhabun alimun
wa-udh'kuru idh ja'alakum khulafaa min ba'di adin wabawwa-akum fi al-ardi tattakhidhuna min suhuliha qusuran watanhituna al-jibala buyutan fa-udh'kuru alaa al-lahi wala ta'thaw fi al-ardi muf'sidina
qala al-mala-u alladhina is'takbaru min qawmihi lilladhina us'tud'ifu liman amana min'hum ata'lamuna anna salihan mur'salun min rabbihi qalu inna bima ur'sila bihi mu'minuna
qala alladhina is'takbaru inna bi-alladhi amantum bihi kafiruna
