fa'aqaru an-naqata wa'ataw an amri rabbihim waqalu yasalihu i'tina bima ta'iduna in kunta mina al-mur'salina
fa-akhadhathumu ar-rajfatu fa-asbahu fi darihim jathimina
fatawalla anhum waqala yaqawmi laqad ablaghtukum risalata rabbi wanasahtu lakum walakin la tuhibbuna an-nasihina
walutan idh qala liqawmihi atatuna al-fahishata ma sabaqakum biha min ahadin mina al-'alamina
innakum latatuna ar-rijala shahwatan min duni an-nisai bal antum qawmun mus'rifuna
wama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qalu akhrijuhum min qaryatikum innahum unasun yatatahharuna
fa-anjaynahu wa-ahlahu illa im'ra-atahu kanat mina al-ghabirina
wa-amtarna alayhim mataran fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu al-muj'rimina

wa-ila madyana akhahum shu'ayban qala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu qad jaatkum bayyinatun min rabbikum fa-awfu al-kayla wal-mizana wala tabkhasu an-nasa ashyaahum wala tuf'sidu fi al-ardi ba'da is'lahiha dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum mu'minina
wala taq'udu bikulli siratin tu'iduna watasudduna an sabili al-lahi man amana bihi watabghunaha iwajan wa-udh'kuru idh kuntum qalilan fakatharakum wa-unzuru kayfa kana aqibatu al-muf'sidina
wa-in kana taifatun minkum amanu bi-alladhi ur'sil'tu bihi wataifatun lam yu'minu fa-is'biru hatta yahkuma al-lahu baynana wahuwa khayru al-hakimina
qala al-mala-u alladhina is'takbaru min qawmihi lanukh'rijannaka yashu'aybu wa-alladhina amanu ma'aka min qaryatina aw lata'udunna fi millatina qala awalaw kunna karihina

qadi if'tarayna ala al-lahi kadhiban in ud'na fi millatikum ba'da idh najjana al-lahu min'ha wama yakunu lana an na'uda fiha illa an yashaa al-lahu rabbuna wasi'a rabbuna kulla shayin il'man ala al-lahi tawakkalna rabbana if'tah baynana wabayna qawmina bil-haqi wa-anta khayru al-fatihina
waqala al-mala-u alladhina kafaru min qawmihi la-ini ittaba'tum shu'ayban innakum idhan lakhasiruna
fa-akhadhathumu ar-rajfatu fa-asbahu fi darihim jathimina
alladhina kadhabu shu'ayban ka-an lam yaghnaw fiha alladhina kadhabu shu'ayban kanu humu al-khasirina
fatawalla anhum waqala yaqawmi laqad ablaghtukum risalati rabbi wanasahtu lakum fakayfa asa ala qawmin kafirina
wama arsalna fi qaryatin min nabiyyin illa akhadhna ahlaha bil-basai wad-darai la'allahum yaddarra'una
thumma baddalna makana as-sayi-ati al-hasanata hatta afaw waqalu qad massa abaana ad-darau was-sarau fa-akhadhnahum baghtatan wahum la yash'uruna
walaw anna ahla al-qura amanu wa-ittaqaw lafatahna alayhim barakatin mina as-samai wal-ardi walakin kadhabu fa-akhadhnahum bima kanu yaksibuna
afa-amina ahlu al-qura an yatiyahum basuna bayatan wahum naimuna
awa-amina ahlu al-qura an yatiyahum basuna duhan wahum yal'abuna
afa-aminu makra al-lahi fala yamanu makra al-lahi illa al-qawmu al-khasiruna
awalam yahdi lilladhina yarithuna al-arda min ba'di ahliha an law nashau asabnahum bidhunubihim wanatba'u ala qulubihim fahum la yasma'una
til'ka al-qura naqussu alayka min anbaiha walaqad jaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati fama kanu liyu'minu bima kadhabu min qablu kadhalika yatba'u al-lahu ala qulubi al-kafirina
wama wajadna li-aktharihim min ahdin wa-in wajadna aktharahum lafasiqina
thumma ba'athna min ba'dihim musa biayatina ila fir'awna wamala-ihi fazalamu biha fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu al-muf'sidina
waqala musa yafir'awnu inni rasulun min rabbi al-'alamina
haqiqun ala an la aqula ala al-lahi illa al-haqa qad ji'tukum bibayyinatin min rabbikum fa-arsil ma'iya bani is'raila
qala in kunta ji'ta biayatin fati biha in kunta mina as-sadiqina
fa-alqa asahu fa-idha hiya thu'banun mubinun
wanaza'a yadahu fa-idha hiya baydau lilnnazirina
qala al-mala-u min qawmi fir'awna inna hadha lasahirun alimun
yuridu an yukh'rijakum min ardikum famadha tamuruna
qalu arjih wa-akhahu wa-arsil fi al-madaini hashirina
yatuka bikulli sahirin alimin
wajaa as-saharatu fir'awna qalu inna lana la-ajran in kunna nahnu al-ghalibina
qala na'am wa-innakum lamina al-muqarabina
qalu yamusa imma an tul'qiya wa-imma an nakuna nahnu al-mul'qina
qala alqu falamma alqaw saharu a'yuna an-nasi wa-is'tarhabuhum wajau bisih'rin azimin
wa-awhayna ila musa an alqi asaka fa-idha hiya talqafu ma yafikuna
fawaqa'a al-haqu wabatala ma kanu ya'maluna
faghulibu hunalika wa-inqalabu saghirina
wa-ul'qiya as-saharatu sajidina
qalu amanna birabbi al-'alamina
rabbi musa waharuna
qala fir'awnu amantum bihi qabla an adhana lakum inna hadha lamakrun makartumuhu fi al-madinati litukh'riju min'ha ahlaha fasawfa ta'lamuna
la-uqatti'anna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilafin thumma la-usallibannakum ajma'ina
qalu inna ila rabbina munqalibuna
wama tanqimu minna illa an amanna biayati rabbina lamma jaatna rabbana afrigh alayna sabran watawaffana mus'limina
waqala al-mala-u min qawmi fir'awna atadharu musa waqawmahu liyuf'sidu fi al-ardi wayadharaka waalihataka qala sanuqattilu abnaahum wanastahyi nisaahum wa-inna fawqahum qahiruna
qala musa liqawmihi is'ta'inu bil-lahi wa-is'biru inna al-arda lillahi yurithuha man yashau min ibadihi wal-'aqibatu lil'muttaqina
qalu udhina min qabli an tatiyana wamin ba'di ma ji'tana qala asa rabbukum an yuh'lika aduwwakum wayastakhlifakum fi al-ardi fayanzura kayfa ta'maluna
walaqad akhadhna ala fir'awna bil-sinina wanaqsin mina at-thamarati la'allahum yadhakkaruna
fa-idha jaathumu al-hasanatu qalu lana hadhihi wa-in tusib'hum sayyi-atun yattayyaru bimusa waman ma'ahu ala innama tairuhum inda al-lahi walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
waqalu mahma tatina bihi min ayatin litasharana biha fama nahnu laka bimu'minina
fa-arsalna alayhimu at-tufana wal-jarada wal-qumala wad-dafadi'a wad-dama ayatin mufassalatin fa-is'takbaru wakanu qawman muj'rimina
walamma waqa'a alayhimu ar-rij'zu qalu yamusa ud'u lana rabbaka bima ahida indaka la-in kashafta anna ar-rij'za lanu'minanna laka walanur'silanna ma'aka bani is'raila
falamma kashafna anhumu ar-rij'za ila ajalin hum balighuhu idha hum yankuthuna
fa-intaqamna min'hum fa-aghraqnahum fi al-yami bi-annahum kadhabu biayatina wakanu anha ghafilina

wa-awrathna al-qawma alladhina kanu yus'tad'afuna mashariqa al-ardi wamagharibaha allati barakna fiha watammat kalimatu rabbika al-hus'na ala bani is'raila bima sabaru wadammarna ma kana yasna'u fir'awnu waqawmuhu wama kanu ya'rishuna
wajawazna bibani is'raila al-bahra fa-ataw ala qawmin ya'kufuna ala asnamin lahum qalu yamusa ij'al lana ilahan kama lahum alihatun qala innakum qawmun tajhaluna
inna haulai mutabbarun ma hum fihi wabatilun ma kanu ya'maluna
qala aghayra al-lahi abghikum ilahan wahuwa faddalakum ala al-'alamina
wa-idh anjaynakum min ali fir'awna yasumunakum sua al-'adhabi yuqattiluna abnaakum wayastahyuna nisaakum wafi dhalikum balaon min rabbikum azimun
wawa'adna musa thalathina laylatan wa-atmamnaha bi'ashrin fatamma miqatu rabbihi arba'ina laylatan waqala musa li-akhihi haruna ukh'luf'ni fi qawmi wa-aslih wala tattabi' sabila al-muf'sidina

walamma jaa musa limiqatina wakallamahu rabbuhu qala rabbi arini anzur ilayka qala lan tarani walakini unzur ila al-jabali fa-ini is'taqarra makanahu fasawfa tarani falamma tajalla rabbuhu lil'jabali ja'alahu dakkan wakharra musa sa'iqan falamma afaqa qala sub'hanaka tub'tu ilayka wa-ana awwalu al-mu'minina
qala yamusa inni is'tafaytuka ala an-nasi birisalati wabikalami fakhudh ma ataytuka wakun mina as-shakirina
wakatabna lahu fi al-alwahi min kulli shayin maw'izatan watafsilan likulli shayin fakhudh'ha biquwwatin wamur qawmaka yakhudhu bi-ahsaniha sa-urikum dara al-fasiqina

sa-asrifu an ayatiya alladhina yatakabbaruna fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi wa-in yaraw kulla ayatin la yu'minu biha wa-in yaraw sabila ar-rush'di la yattakhidhuhu sabilan wa-in yaraw sabila al-ghayi yattakhidhuhu sabilan dhalika bi-annahum kadhabu biayatina wakanu anha ghafilina
wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina waliqai al-akhirati habitat a'maluhum hal yuj'zawna illa ma kanu ya'maluna
wa-ittakhadha qawmu musa min ba'dihi min huliyyihim ij'lan jasadan lahu khuwarun alam yaraw annahu la yukallimuhum wala yahdihim sabilan ittakhadhuhu wakanu zalimina
walamma suqita fi aydihim wara-aw annahum qad dallu qalu la-in lam yarhamna rabbuna wayaghfir lana lanakunanna mina al-khasirina

walamma raja'a musa ila qawmihi ghadbana asifan qala bi'sama khalaftumuni min ba'di a'ajil'tum amra rabbikum wa-alqa al-alwaha wa-akhadha birasi akhihi yajurruhu ilayhi qala ib'na umma inna al-qawma is'tad'afuni wakadu yaqtulunani fala tush'mit biya al-a'daa wala taj'alni ma'a al-qawmi az-zalimina
qala rabbi igh'fir li wali-akhi wa-adkhil'na fi rahmatika wa-anta arhamu ar-rahimina
inna alladhina ittakhadhu al-'ij'la sayanaluhum ghadabun min rabbihim wadhillatun fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya wakadhalika najzi al-muf'tarina
wa-alladhina amilu as-sayiati thumma tabu min ba'diha waamanu inna rabbaka min ba'diha laghafurun rahimun
walamma sakata an musa al-ghadabu akhadha al-alwaha wafi nus'khatiha hudan warahmatun lilladhina hum lirabbihim yarhabuna

wa-ikh'tara musa qawmahu sab'ina rajulan limiqatina falamma akhadhathumu ar-rajfatu qala rabbi law shi'ta ahlaktahum min qablu wa-iyyaya atuh'likuna bima fa'ala as-sufahau minna in hiya illa fit'natuka tudillu biha man tashau watahdi man tashau anta waliyyuna fa-igh'fir lana wa-ir'hamna wa-anta khayru al-ghafirina

wa-uk'tub lana fi hadhihi ad-dun'ya hasanatan wafi al-akhirati inna hud'na ilayka qala adhabi usibu bihi man ashau warahmati wasi'at kulla shayin fasa-aktubuha lilladhina yattaquna wayu'tuna az-zakata wa-alladhina hum biayatina yu'minuna

alladhina yattabi'una ar-rasula an-nabiya al-umiya alladhi yajidunahu maktuban indahum fi at-tawrati wal-injili yamuruhum bil-ma'rufi wayanhahum ani al-munkari wayuhillu lahumu at-tayibati wayuharrimu alayhimu al-khabaitha wayada'u anhum is'rahum wal-aghlala allati kanat alayhim fa-alladhina amanu bihi wa'azzaruhu wanasaruhu wa-ittaba'u an-nura alladhi unzila ma'ahu ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna

qul yaayyuha an-nasu inni rasulu al-lahi ilaykum jami'an alladhi lahu mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi la ilaha illa huwa yuh'yi wayumitu faaminu bil-lahi warasulihi an-nabiyi al-umiyi alladhi yu'minu bil-lahi wakalimatihi wa-ittabi'uhu la'allakum tahtaduna
wamin qawmi musa ummatun yahduna bil-haqi wabihi ya'diluna

waqatta'nahumu ith'natay ashrata asbatan umaman wa-awhayna ila musa idhi is'tasqahu qawmuhu ani id'rib bi'asaka al-hajara fa-inbajasat min'hu ith'nata ashrata aynan qad alima kullu unasin mashrabahum wazallalna alayhimu al-ghamama wa-anzalna alayhimu al-mana was-salwa kulu min tayyibati ma razaqnakum wama zalamuna walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna
wa-idh qila lahumu us'kunu hadhihi al-qaryata wakulu min'ha haythu shi'tum waqulu hittatun wa-ud'khulu al-baba sujjadan naghfir lakum khatiatikum sanazidu al-muh'sinina
fabaddala alladhina zalamu min'hum qawlan ghayra alladhi qila lahum fa-arsalna alayhim rij'zan mina as-samai bima kanu yazlimuna
wasalhum ani al-qaryati allati kanat hadirata al-bahri idh ya'duna fi as-sabti idh tatihim hitanuhum yawma sabtihim shurra'an wayawma la yasbituna la tatihim kadhalika nabluhum bima kanu yafsuquna
wa-idh qalat ummatun min'hum lima ta'izuna qawman al-lahu muh'likuhum aw mu'adhibuhum adhaban shadidan qalu ma'dhiratan ila rabbikum wala'allahum yattaquna
falamma nasu ma dhukkiru bihi anjayna alladhina yanhawna ani as-sui wa-akhadhna alladhina zalamu bi'adhabin baisin bima kanu yafsuquna
falamma ataw an ma nuhu anhu qul'na lahum kunu qiradatan khasiina
wa-idh ta-adhana rabbuka layab'athanna alayhim ila yawmi al-qiyamati man yasumuhum sua al-'adhabi inna rabbaka lasari'u al-'iqabi wa-innahu laghafurun rahimun
waqatta'nahum fi al-ardi umaman min'humu as-salihuna wamin'hum duna dhalika wabalawnahum bil-hasanati was-sayiati la'allahum yarji'una

fakhalafa min ba'dihim khalfun warithu al-kitaba yakhudhuna arada hadha al-adna wayaquluna sayugh'faru lana wa-in yatihim aradun mith'luhu yakhudhuhu alam yu'khadh alayhim mithaqu al-kitabi an la yaqulu ala al-lahi illa al-haqa wadarasu ma fihi wad-daru al-akhiratu khayrun lilladhina yattaquna afala ta'qiluna
wa-alladhina yumassikuna bil-kitabi wa-aqamu as-salata inna la nudi'u ajra al-mus'lihina
wa-idh nataqna al-jabala fawqahum ka-annahu zullatun wazannu annahu waqi'un bihim khudhu ma ataynakum biquwwatin wa-udh'kuru ma fihi la'allakum tattaquna
wa-idh akhadha rabbuka min bani adama min zuhurihim dhurriyyatahum wa-ashhadahum ala anfusihim alastu birabbikum qalu bala shahid'na an taqulu yawma al-qiyamati inna kunna an hadha ghafilina
aw taqulu innama ashraka abauna min qablu wakunna dhurriyyatan min ba'dihim afatuh'likuna bima fa'ala al-mub'tiluna
wakadhalika nufassilu al-ayati wala'allahum yarji'una
wa-ut'lu alayhim naba-a alladhi ataynahu ayatina fa-insalakha min'ha fa-atba'ahu as-shaytanu fakana mina al-ghawina

walaw shi'na larafa'nahu biha walakinnahu akhlada ila al-ardi wa-ittaba'a hawahu famathaluhu kamathali al-kalbi in tahmil alayhi yalhath aw tatruk'hu yalhath dhalika mathalu al-qawmi alladhina kadhabu biayatina fa-uq'susi al-qasasa la'allahum yatafakkaruna
saa mathalan al-qawmu alladhina kadhabu biayatina wa-anfusahum kanu yazlimuna
man yahdi al-lahu fahuwa al-muh'tadi waman yud'lil fa-ulaika humu al-khasiruna

walaqad dharana lijahannama kathiran mina al-jini wal-insi lahum qulubun la yafqahuna biha walahum a'yunun la yub'siruna biha walahum adhanun la yasma'una biha ulaika kal-an'ami bal hum adallu ulaika humu al-ghafiluna
walillahi al-asmau al-hus'na fa-id'uhu biha wadharu alladhina yul'hiduna fi asmaihi sayuj'zawna ma kanu ya'maluna
wamimman khalaqna ummatun yahduna bil-haqi wabihi ya'diluna
wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina sanastadrijuhum min haythu la ya'lamuna
wa-um'li lahum inna kaydi matinun
awalam yatafakkaru ma bisahibihim min jinnatin in huwa illa nadhirun mubinun
awalam yanzuru fi malakuti as-samawati wal-ardi wama khalaqa al-lahu min shayin wa-an asa an yakuna qadi iq'taraba ajaluhum fabi-ayyi hadithin ba'dahu yu'minuna
man yud'lili al-lahu fala hadiya lahu wayadharuhum fi tugh'yanihim ya'mahuna

yasalunaka ani as-sa'ati ayyana mur'saha qul innama il'muha inda rabbi la yujalliha liwaqtiha illa huwa thaqulat fi as-samawati wal-ardi la tatikum illa baghtatan yasalunaka ka-annaka hafiyyun anha qul innama il'muha inda al-lahi walakinna akthara an-nasi la ya'lamuna
qul la amliku linafsi naf 'an wala darran illa ma shaa al-lahu walaw kuntu a'lamu al-ghayba la-is'takthartu mina al-khayri wama massaniya as-suu in ana illa nadhirun wabashirun liqawmin yu'minuna

huwa alladhi khalaqakum min nafsin wahidatin waja'ala min'ha zawjaha liyaskuna ilayha falamma taghashaha hamalat hamlan khafifan famarrat bihi falamma athqalat da'awa al-laha rabbahuma la-in ataytana salihan lanakunanna mina as-shakirina
falamma atahuma salihan ja'ala lahu shurakaa fima atahuma fata'ala al-lahu amma yush'rikuna
ayush'rikuna ma la yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laquna
wala yastati'una lahum nasran wala anfusahum yansuruna
wa-in tad'uhum ila al-huda la yattabi'ukum sawaon alaykum ada'awtumuhum am antum samituna
inna alladhina tad'una min duni al-lahi ibadun amthalukum fa-id'uhum falyastajibu lakum in kuntum sadiqina
alahum arjulun yamshuna biha am lahum aydin yabtishuna biha am lahum a'yunun yub'siruna biha am lahum adhanun yasma'una biha quli id'u shurakaakum thumma kiduni fala tunziruni
inna waliyyiya al-lahu alladhi nazzala al-kitaba wahuwa yatawalla as-salihina
wa-alladhina tad'una min dunihi la yastati'una nasrakum wala anfusahum yansuruna
wa-in tad'uhum ila al-huda la yasma'u watarahum yanzuruna ilayka wahum la yub'siruna
khudhi al-'afwa wamur bil-'ur'fi wa-a'rid ani al-jahilina
wa-imma yanzaghannaka mina as-shaytani nazghun fa-is'ta'idh bil-lahi innahu sami'un alimun
inna alladhina ittaqaw idha massahum taifun mina as-shaytani tadhakkaru fa-idha hum mub'siruna
wa-ikh'wanuhum yamuddunahum fi al-ghayi thumma la yuq'siruna
wa-idha lam tatihim biayatin qalu lawla ij'tabaytaha qul innama attabi'u ma yuha ilayya min rabbi hadha basairu min rabbikum wahudan warahmatun liqawmin yu'minuna
wa-idha quri-a al-qur'anu fa-is'tami'u lahu wa-ansitu la'allakum tur'hamuna
wa-udh'kur rabbaka fi nafsika tadarru'an wakhifatan waduna al-jahri mina al-qawli bil-ghuduwi wal-asali wala takun mina al-ghafilina
inna alladhina inda rabbika la yastakbiruna an ibadatihi wayusabbihunahu walahu yasjuduna
yasalunaka ani al-anfali quli al-anfalu lillahi war-rasuli fa-ittaqu al-laha wa-aslihu dhata baynikum wa-ati'u al-laha warasulahu in kuntum mu'minina
innama al-mu'minuna alladhina idha dhukira al-lahu wajilat qulubuhum wa-idha tuliyat alayhim ayatuhu zadathum imanan wa'ala rabbihim yatawakkaluna
alladhina yuqimuna as-salata wamimma razaqnahum yunfiquna
ulaika humu al-mu'minuna haqqan lahum darajatun inda rabbihim wamaghfiratun wariz'qun karimun
kama akhrajaka rabbuka min baytika bil-haqi wa-inna fariqan mina al-mu'minina lakarihuna
yujadilunaka fi al-haqi ba'da ma tabayyana ka-annama yusaquna ila al-mawti wahum yanzuruna
wa-idh ya'idukumu al-lahu ih'da at-taifatayni annaha lakum watawadduna anna ghayra dhati as-shawkati takunu lakum wayuridu al-lahu an yuhiqqa al-haqa bikalimatihi wayaqta'a dabira al-kafirina
liyuhiqqa al-haqa wayub'tila al-batila walaw kariha al-muj'rimuna
idh tastaghithuna rabbakum fa-is'tajaba lakum anni mumiddukum bi-alfin mina al-malaikati mur'difina
wama ja'alahu al-lahu illa bush'ra walitatma-inna bihi qulubukum wama an-nasru illa min indi al-lahi inna al-laha azizun hakimun
idh yughashikumu an-nu'asa amanatan min'hu wayunazzilu alaykum mina as-samai maan liyutahhirakum bihi wayudh'hiba ankum rij'za as-shaytani waliyarbita ala qulubikum wayuthabbita bihi al-aqdama
idh yuhi rabbuka ila al-malaikati anni ma'akum fathabbitu alladhina amanu sa-ul'qi fi qulubi alladhina kafaru ar-ru'ba fa-id'ribu fawqa al-a'naqi wa-id'ribu min'hum kulla bananin
dhalika bi-annahum shaqqu al-laha warasulahu waman yushaqiqi al-laha warasulahu fa-inna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi
dhalikum fadhuquhu wa-anna lil'kafirina adhaba an-nari
yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha laqitumu alladhina kafaru zahfan fala tuwalluhumu al-adbara
waman yuwallihim yawma-idhin duburahu illa mutaharrifan liqitalin aw mutahayyizan ila fi-atin faqad baa bighadabin mina al-lahi wamawahu jahannamu wabi'sa al-masiru
falam taqtuluhum walakinna al-laha qatalahum wama ramayta idh ramayta walakinna al-laha rama waliyub'liya al-mu'minina min'hu balaan hasanan inna al-laha sami'un alimun
dhalikum wa-anna al-laha muhinu kaydi al-kafirina
in tastaftihu faqad jaakumu al-fathu wa-in tantahu fahuwa khayrun lakum wa-in ta'udu na'ud walan tugh'niya ankum fi-atukum shayan walaw kathurat wa-anna al-laha ma'a al-mu'minina
yaayyuha alladhina amanu ati'u al-laha warasulahu wala tawallaw anhu wa-antum tasma'una
wala takunu ka-alladhina qalu sami'na wahum la yasma'una
inna sharra ad-dawabi inda al-lahi as-sumu al-buk'mu alladhina la ya'qiluna
walaw alima al-lahu fihim khayran la-asma'ahum walaw asma'ahum latawallaw wahum mu'riduna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu is'tajibu lillahi walilrrasuli idha da'akum lima yuh'yikum wa-i'lamu anna al-laha yahulu bayna al-mari waqalbihi wa-annahu ilayhi tuh'sharuna
wa-ittaqu fit'natan la tusibanna alladhina zalamu minkum khassatan wa-i'lamu anna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi
wa-udh'kuru idh antum qalilun mus'tad'afuna fi al-ardi takhafuna an yatakhattafakumu an-nasu faawakum wa-ayyadakum binasrihi warazaqakum mina at-tayibati la'allakum tashkuruna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la takhunu al-laha war-rasula watakhunu amanatikum wa-antum ta'lamuna
wa-i'lamu annama amwalukum wa-awladukum fit'natun wa-anna al-laha indahu ajrun azimun
yaayyuha alladhina amanu in tattaqu al-laha yaj'al lakum fur'qanan wayukaffir ankum sayyiatikum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu dhu al-fadli al-'azimi
wa-idh yamkuru bika alladhina kafaru liyuth'bituka aw yaqtuluka aw yukh'rijuka wayamkuruna wayamkuru al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-makirina
wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna qalu qad sami'na law nashau laqul'na mith'la hadha in hadha illa asatiru al-awalina
wa-idh qalu al-lahuma in kana hadha huwa al-haqa min indika fa-amtir alayna hijaratan mina as-samai awi i'tina bi'adhabin alimin
wama kana al-lahu liyu'adhibahum wa-anta fihim wama kana al-lahu mu'adhibahum wahum yastaghfiruna
wama lahum alla yu'adhibahumu al-lahu wahum yasudduna ani al-masjidi al-harami wama kanu awliyaahu in awliyauhu illa al-mutaquna walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
wama kana salatuhum inda al-bayti illa mukaan watasdiyatan fadhuqu al-'adhaba bima kuntum takfuruna
inna alladhina kafaru yunfiquna amwalahum liyasuddu an sabili al-lahi fasayunfiqunaha thumma takunu alayhim hasratan thumma yugh'labuna wa-alladhina kafaru ila jahannama yuh'sharuna
liyamiza al-lahu al-khabitha mina at-tayibi wayaj'ala al-khabitha ba'dahu ala ba'din fayarkumahu jami'an fayaj'alahu fi jahannama ulaika humu al-khasiruna
qul lilladhina kafaru in yantahu yugh'far lahum ma qad salafa wa-in ya'udu faqad madat sunnatu al-awalina
waqatiluhum hatta la takuna fit'natun wayakuna ad-dinu kulluhu lillahi fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha bima ya'maluna basirun
wa-in tawallaw fa-i'lamu anna al-laha mawlakum ni'ma al-mawla wani'ma an-nasiru

wa-i'lamu annama ghanim'tum min shayin fa-anna lillahi khumusahu walilrrasuli walidhi al-qur'ba wal-yatama wal-masakini wa-ib'ni as-sabili in kuntum amantum bil-lahi wama anzalna ala abdina yawma al-fur'qani yawma at-taqa al-jam'ani wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun

idh antum bil-'ud'wati ad-dun'ya wahum bil-'ud'wati al-qus'wa war-rakbu asfala minkum walaw tawa'adttum la-ikh'talaftum fi al-mi'adi walakin liyaqdiya al-lahu amran kana maf'ulan liyahlika man halaka an bayyinatin wayahya man hayya an bayyinatin wa-inna al-laha lasami'un alimun
idh yurikahumu al-lahu fi manamika qalilan walaw arakahum kathiran lafashil'tum walatanaza'tum fi al-amri walakinna al-laha sallama innahu alimun bidhati as-suduri
wa-idh yurikumuhum idhi at-taqaytum fi a'yunikum qalilan wayuqallilukum fi a'yunihim liyaqdiya al-lahu amran kana maf'ulan wa-ila al-lahi tur'ja'u al-umuru
yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha laqitum fi-atan fa-uth'butu wa-udh'kuru al-laha kathiran la'allakum tuf'lihuna
wa-ati'u al-laha warasulahu wala tanaza'u fatafshalu watadhhaba rihukum wa-is'biru inna al-laha ma'a as-sabirina
wala takunu ka-alladhina kharaju min diyarihim bataran wariaa an-nasi wayasudduna an sabili al-lahi wal-lahu bima ya'maluna muhitun

wa-idh zayyana lahumu as-shaytanu a'malahum waqala la ghaliba lakumu al-yawma mina an-nasi wa-inni jarun lakum falamma taraati al-fi-atani nakasa ala aqibayhi waqala inni barion minkum inni ara ma la tarawna inni akhafu al-laha wal-lahu shadidu al-'iqabi
idh yaqulu al-munafiquna wa-alladhina fi qulubihim maradun gharra haulai dinuhum waman yatawakkal ala al-lahi fa-inna al-laha azizun hakimun
walaw tara idh yatawaffa alladhina kafaru al-malaikatu yadribuna wujuhahum wa-adbarahum wadhuqu adhaba al-hariqi
dhalika bima qaddamat aydikum wa-anna al-laha laysa bizallamin lil'abidi
kadabi ali fir'awna wa-alladhina min qablihim kafaru biayati al-lahi fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunubihim inna al-laha qawiyyun shadidu al-'iqabi
dhalika bi-anna al-laha lam yaku mughayyiran ni'matan an'amaha ala qawmin hatta yughayyiru ma bi-anfusihim wa-anna al-laha sami'un alimun
kadabi ali fir'awna wa-alladhina min qablihim kadhabu biayati rabbihim fa-ahlaknahum bidhunubihim wa-aghraqna ala fir'awna wakullun kanu zalimina
inna sharra ad-dawabi inda al-lahi alladhina kafaru fahum la yu'minuna
alladhina ahadtta min'hum thumma yanquduna ahdahum fi kulli marratin wahum la yattaquna
fa-imma tathqafannahum fi al-harbi fasharrid bihim man khalfahum la'allahum yadhakkaruna
wa-imma takhafanna min qawmin khiyanatan fa-inbidh ilayhim ala sawain inna al-laha la yuhibbu al-khainina
wala yahsabanna alladhina kafaru sabaqu innahum la yu'jizuna

wa-a'iddu lahum ma is'tata'tum min quwwatin wamin ribati al-khayli tur'hibuna bihi aduwwa al-lahi wa'aduwwakum waakharina min dunihim la ta'lamunahumu al-lahu ya'lamuhum wama tunfiqu min shayin fi sabili al-lahi yuwaffa ilaykum wa-antum la tuz'lamuna
wa-in janahu lilssalmi fa-ij'nah laha watawakkal ala al-lahi innahu huwa as-sami'u al-'alimu
wa-in yuridu an yakhda'uka fa-inna hasbaka al-lahu huwa alladhi ayyadaka binasrihi wabil-mu'minina
wa-allafa bayna qulubihim law anfaqta ma fi al-ardi jami'an ma allafta bayna qulubihim walakinna al-laha allafa baynahum innahu azizun hakimun
yaayyuha an-nabiyu hasbuka al-lahu wamani ittaba'aka mina al-mu'minina

yaayyuha an-nabiyu harridi al-mu'minina ala al-qitali in yakun minkum ish'runa sabiruna yaghlibu mi-atayni wa-in yakun minkum mi-atun yaghlibu alfan mina alladhina kafaru bi-annahum qawmun la yafqahuna
al-ana khaffafa al-lahu ankum wa'alima anna fikum da'fan fa-in yakun minkum mi-atun sabiratun yaghlibu mi-atayni wa-in yakun minkum alfun yaghlibu alfayni bi-idh'ni al-lahi wal-lahu ma'a as-sabirina
ma kana linabiyyin an yakuna lahu asra hatta yuth'khina fi al-ardi turiduna arada ad-dun'ya wal-lahu yuridu al-akhirata wal-lahu azizun hakimun
lawla kitabun mina al-lahi sabaqa lamassakum fima akhadhtum adhabun azimun
fakulu mimma ghanim'tum halalan tayyiban wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
yaayyuha an-nabiyu qul liman fi aydikum mina al-asra in ya'lami al-lahu fi qulubikum khayran yu'tikum khayran mimma ukhidha minkum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
wa-in yuridu khiyanataka faqad khanu al-laha min qablu fa-amkana min'hum wal-lahu alimun hakimun

inna alladhina amanu wahajaru wajahadu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim fi sabili al-lahi wa-alladhina awaw wanasaru ulaika ba'duhum awliyau ba'din wa-alladhina amanu walam yuhajiru ma lakum min walayatihim min shayin hatta yuhajiru wa-ini is'tansarukum fi ad-dini fa'alaykumu an-nasru illa ala qawmin baynakum wabaynahum mithaqun wal-lahu bima ta'maluna basirun
wa-alladhina kafaru ba'duhum awliyau ba'din illa taf 'aluhu takun fit'natun fi al-ardi wafasadun kabirun
wa-alladhina amanu wahajaru wajahadu fi sabili al-lahi wa-alladhina awaw wanasaru ulaika humu al-mu'minuna haqqan lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karimun
wa-alladhina amanu min ba'du wahajaru wajahadu ma'akum fa-ulaika minkum wa-ulu al-arhami ba'duhum awla biba'din fi kitabi al-lahi inna al-laha bikulli shayin alimun
baraatun mina al-lahi warasulihi ila alladhina ahadttum mina al-mush'rikina
fasihu fi al-ardi arba'ata ashhurin wa-i'lamu annakum ghayru mu'jizi al-lahi wa-anna al-laha mukh'zi al-kafirina

wa-adhanun mina al-lahi warasulihi ila an-nasi yawma al-haji al-akbari anna al-laha barion mina al-mush'rikina warasuluhu fa-in tub'tum fahuwa khayrun lakum wa-in tawallaytum fa-i'lamu annakum ghayru mu'jizi al-lahi wabashiri alladhina kafaru bi'adhabin alimin
illa alladhina ahadttum mina al-mush'rikina thumma lam yanqusukum shayan walam yuzahiru alaykum ahadan fa-atimmu ilayhim ahdahum ila muddatihim inna al-laha yuhibbu al-mutaqina

fa-idha insalakha al-ashhuru al-hurumu fa-uq'tulu al-mush'rikina haythu wajadttumuhum wakhudhuhum wa-uh'suruhum wa-uq'udu lahum kulla marsadin fa-in tabu wa-aqamu as-salata waatawu az-zakata fakhallu sabilahum inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
wa-in ahadun mina al-mush'rikina is'tajaraka fa-ajir'hu hatta yasma'a kalama al-lahi thumma abligh'hu mamanahu dhalika bi-annahum qawmun la ya'lamuna
kayfa yakunu lil'mush'rikina ahdun inda al-lahi wa'inda rasulihi illa alladhina ahadttum inda al-masjidi al-harami fama is'taqamu lakum fa-is'taqimu lahum inna al-laha yuhibbu al-mutaqina
kayfa wa-in yazharu alaykum la yarqubu fikum illan wala dhimmatan yur'dunakum bi-afwahihim wataba qulubuhum wa-aktharuhum fasiquna
ish'taraw biayati al-lahi thamanan qalilan fasaddu an sabilihi innahum saa ma kanu ya'maluna
la yarqubuna fi mu'minin illan wala dhimmatan wa-ulaika humu al-mu'taduna
fa-in tabu wa-aqamu as-salata waatawu az-zakata fa-ikh'wanukum fi ad-dini wanufassilu al-ayati liqawmin ya'lamuna
wa-in nakathu aymanahum min ba'di ahdihim wata'anu fi dinikum faqatilu a-immata al-kuf'ri innahum la aymana lahum la'allahum yantahuna
ala tuqatiluna qawman nakathu aymanahum wahammu bi-ikh'raji ar-rasuli wahum badaukum awwala marratin atakhshawnahum fal-lahu ahaqqu an takhshawhu in kuntum mu'minina
qatiluhum yu'adhib'humu al-lahu bi-aydikum wayukh'zihim wayansur'kum alayhim wayashfi sudura qawmin mu'minina
wayudh'hib ghayza qulubihim wayatubu al-lahu ala man yashau wal-lahu alimun hakimun
am hasib'tum an tut'raku walamma ya'lami al-lahu alladhina jahadu minkum walam yattakhidhu min duni al-lahi wala rasulihi wala al-mu'minina walijatan wal-lahu khabirun bima ta'maluna
ma kana lil'mush'rikina an ya'muru masajida al-lahi shahidina ala anfusihim bil-kuf'ri ulaika habitat a'maluhum wafi an-nari hum khaliduna
innama ya'muru masajida al-lahi man amana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wa-aqama as-salata waata az-zakata walam yakhsha illa al-laha fa'asa ulaika an yakunu mina al-muh'tadina
aja'altum siqayata al-haji wa'imarata al-masjidi al-harami kaman amana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wajahada fi sabili al-lahi la yastawuna inda al-lahi wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma az-zalimina
alladhina amanu wahajaru wajahadu fi sabili al-lahi bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim a'zamu darajatan inda al-lahi wa-ulaika humu al-faizuna
yubashiruhum rabbuhum birahmatin min'hu warid'wanin wajannatin lahum fiha na'imun muqimun
khalidina fiha abadan inna al-laha indahu ajrun azimun
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattakhidhu abaakum wa-ikh'wanakum awliyaa ini is'tahabbu al-kuf'ra ala al-imani waman yatawallahum minkum fa-ulaika humu az-zalimuna

qul in kana abaukum wa-abnaukum wa-ikh'wanukum wa-azwajukum wa'ashiratukum wa-amwalun iq'taraftumuha watijaratun takhshawna kasadaha wamasakinu tardawnaha ahabba ilaykum mina al-lahi warasulihi wajihadin fi sabilihi fatarabbasu hatta yatiya al-lahu bi-amrihi wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-fasiqina
laqad nasarakumu al-lahu fi mawatina kathiratin wayawma hunaynin idh a'jabatkum kathratukum falam tugh'ni ankum shayan wadaqat alaykumu al-ardu bima rahubat thumma wallaytum mud'birina
thumma anzala al-lahu sakinatahu ala rasulihi wa'ala al-mu'minina wa-anzala junudan lam tarawha wa'adhaba alladhina kafaru wadhalika jazau al-kafirina
thumma yatubu al-lahu min ba'di dhalika ala man yashau wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun

yaayyuha alladhina amanu innama al-mush'rikuna najasun fala yaqrabu al-masjida al-harama ba'da amihim hadha wa-in khif'tum aylatan fasawfa yugh'nikumu al-lahu min fadlihi in shaa inna al-laha alimun hakimun

qatilu alladhina la yu'minuna bil-lahi wala bil-yawmi al-akhiri wala yuharrimuna ma harrama al-lahu warasuluhu wala yadinuna dina al-haqi mina alladhina utu al-kitaba hatta yu'tu al-jiz'yata an yadin wahum saghiruna
waqalati al-yahudu uzayrun ub'nu al-lahi waqalati an-nasara al-masihu ub'nu al-lahi dhalika qawluhum bi-afwahihim yudahiuna qawla alladhina kafaru min qablu qatalahumu al-lahu anna yu'fakuna
ittakhadhu ahbarahum waruh'banahum arbaban min duni al-lahi wal-masiha ib'na maryama wama umiru illa liya'budu ilahan wahidan la ilaha illa huwa sub'hanahu amma yush'rikuna
yuriduna an yut'fiu nura al-lahi bi-afwahihim wayaba al-lahu illa an yutimma nurahu walaw kariha al-kafiruna
huwa alladhi arsala rasulahu bil-huda wadini al-haqi liyuz'hirahu ala ad-dini kullihi walaw kariha al-mush'rikuna

yaayyuha alladhina amanu inna kathiran mina al-ahbari war-ruh'bani layakuluna amwala an-nasi bil-batili wayasudduna an sabili al-lahi wa-alladhina yaknizuna ad-dhahaba wal-fidata wala yunfiqunaha fi sabili al-lahi fabashir'hum bi'adhabin alimin
yawma yuh'ma alayha fi nari jahannama fatuk'wa biha jibahuhum wajunubuhum wazuhuruhum hadha ma kanaztum li-anfusikum fadhuqu ma kuntum taknizuna

inna iddata as-shuhuri inda al-lahi ith'na ashara shahran fi kitabi al-lahi yawma khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda min'ha arba'atun hurumun dhalika ad-dinu al-qayimu fala tazlimu fihinna anfusakum waqatilu al-mush'rikina kaffatan kama yuqatilunakum kaffatan wa-i'lamu anna al-laha ma'a al-mutaqina

innama an-nasiu ziyadatun fi al-kuf'ri yudallu bihi alladhina kafaru yuhillunahu aman wayuharrimunahu aman liyuwatiu iddata ma harrama al-lahu fayuhillu ma harrama al-lahu zuyyina lahum suu a'malihim wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-kafirina

yaayyuha alladhina amanu ma lakum idha qila lakumu infiru fi sabili al-lahi ithaqaltum ila al-ardi araditum bil-hayati ad-dun'ya mina al-akhirati fama mata'u al-hayati ad-dun'ya fi al-akhirati illa qalilun
illa tanfiru yu'adhib'kum adhaban aliman wayastabdil qawman ghayrakum wala tadurruhu shayan wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun

illa tansuruhu faqad nasarahu al-lahu idh akhrajahu alladhina kafaru thaniya ith'nayni idh huma fi al-ghari idh yaqulu lisahibihi la tahzan inna al-laha ma'ana fa-anzala al-lahu sakinatahu alayhi wa-ayyadahu bijunudin lam tarawha waja'ala kalimata alladhina kafaru as-suf'la wakalimatu al-lahi hiya al-'ul'ya wal-lahu azizun hakimun
infiru khifafan wathiqalan wajahidu bi-amwalikum wa-anfusikum fi sabili al-lahi dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamuna

law kana aradan qariban wasafaran qasidan la-ittaba'uka walakin ba'udat alayhimu as-shuqatu wasayahlifuna bil-lahi lawi is'tata'na lakharajna ma'akum yuh'likuna anfusahum wal-lahu ya'lamu innahum lakadhibuna
afa al-lahu anka lima adhinta lahum hatta yatabayyana laka alladhina sadaqu wata'lama al-kadhibina
la yastadhinuka alladhina yu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri an yujahidu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim wal-lahu alimun bil-mutaqina
innama yastadhinuka alladhina la yu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wa-ir'tabat qulubuhum fahum fi raybihim yataraddaduna
walaw aradu al-khuruja la-a'addu lahu uddatan walakin kariha al-lahu inbi'athahum fathabbatahum waqila uq'udu ma'a al-qa'idina
law kharaju fikum ma zadukum illa khabalan wala-awda'u khilalakum yabghunakumu al-fit'nata wafikum samma'una lahum wal-lahu alimun bil-zalimina
laqadi ib'taghawu al-fit'nata min qablu waqallabu laka al-umura hatta jaa al-haqu wazahara amru al-lahi wahum karihuna
wamin'hum man yaqulu i'dhan li wala taftinni ala fi al-fit'nati saqatu wa-inna jahannama lamuhitatun bil-kafirina
in tusib'ka hasanatun tasu'hum wa-in tusib'ka musibatun yaqulu qad akhadhna amrana min qablu wayatawallaw wahum farihuna
qul lan yusibana illa ma kataba al-lahu lana huwa mawlana wa'ala al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minuna
qul hal tarabbasuna bina illa ih'da al-hus'nayayni wanahnu natarabbasu bikum an yusibakumu al-lahu bi'adhabin min indihi aw bi-aydina fatarabbasu inna ma'akum mutarabbisuna
qul anfiqu taw'an aw karhan lan yutaqabbala minkum innakum kuntum qawman fasiqina
wama mana'ahum an tuq'bala min'hum nafaqatuhum illa annahum kafaru bil-lahi wabirasulihi wala yatuna as-salata illa wahum kusala wala yunfiquna illa wahum karihuna
fala tu'jib'ka amwaluhum wala awladuhum innama yuridu al-lahu liyu'adhibahum biha fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kafiruna
wayahlifuna bil-lahi innahum laminkum wama hum minkum walakinnahum qawmun yafraquna
law yajiduna malja-an aw magharatin aw muddakhalan lawallaw ilayhi wahum yajmahuna
wamin'hum man yalmizuka fi as-sadaqati fa-in u'tu min'ha radu wa-in lam yu'taw min'ha idha hum yaskhatuna
walaw annahum radu ma atahumu al-lahu warasuluhu waqalu hasbuna al-lahu sayu'tina al-lahu min fadlihi warasuluhu inna ila al-lahi raghibuna

innama as-sadaqatu lil'fuqarai wal-masakini wal-'amilina alayha wal-mu-alafati qulubuhum wafi ar-riqabi wal-gharimina wafi sabili al-lahi wa-ib'ni as-sabili faridatan mina al-lahi wal-lahu alimun hakimun

wamin'humu alladhina yu'dhuna an-nabiya wayaquluna huwa udhunun qul udhunu khayrin lakum yu'minu bil-lahi wayu'minu lil'mu'minina warahmatun lilladhina amanu minkum wa-alladhina yu'dhuna rasula al-lahi lahum adhabun alimun
yahlifuna bil-lahi lakum liyur'dukum wal-lahu warasuluhu ahaqqu an yur'duhu in kanu mu'minina
alam ya'lamu annahu man yuhadidi al-laha warasulahu fa-anna lahu nara jahannama khalidan fiha dhalika al-khiz'yu al-'azimu
yahdharu al-munafiquna an tunazzala alayhim suratun tunabbi-uhum bima fi qulubihim quli is'tahziu inna al-laha mukh'rijun ma tahdharuna
wala-in sa-altahum layaqulunna innama kunna nakhudu wanal'abu qul abil-lahi waayatihi warasulihi kuntum tastahziuna
la ta'tadhiru qad kafartum ba'da imanikum in na'fu an taifatin minkum nu'adhib taifatan bi-annahum kanu muj'rimina
al-munafiquna wal-munafiqatu ba'duhum min ba'din yamuruna bil-munkari wayanhawna ani al-ma'rufi wayaqbiduna aydiyahum nasu al-laha fanasiyahum inna al-munafiqina humu al-fasiquna
wa'ada al-lahu al-munafiqina wal-munafiqati wal-kufara nara jahannama khalidina fiha hiya hasbuhum wala'anahumu al-lahu walahum adhabun muqimun

ka-alladhina min qablikum kanu ashadda minkum quwwatan wa-akthara amwalan wa-awladan fa-is'tamta'u bikhalaqihim fa-is'tamta'tum bikhalaqikum kama is'tamta'a alladhina min qablikum bikhalaqihim wakhud'tum ka-alladhi khadu ulaika habitat a'maluhum fi ad-dun'ya wal-akhirati wa-ulaika humu al-khasiruna

alam yatihim naba-u alladhina min qablihim qawmi nuhin wa'adin wathamuda waqawmi ib'rahima wa-ashabi madyana wal-mu'tafikati atathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati fama kana al-lahu liyazlimahum walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna

wal-mu'minuna wal-mu'minatu ba'duhum awliyau ba'din yamuruna bil-ma'rufi wayanhawna ani al-munkari wayuqimuna as-salata wayu'tuna az-zakata wayuti'una al-laha warasulahu ulaika sayarhamuhumu al-lahu inna al-laha azizun hakimun
wa'ada al-lahu al-mu'minina wal-mu'minati jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha wamasakina tayyibatan fi jannati adnin warid'wanun mina al-lahi akbaru dhalika huwa al-fawzu al-'azimu
yaayyuha an-nabiyu jahidi al-kufara wal-munafiqina wa-ugh'luz alayhim wamawahum jahannamu wabi'sa al-masiru

yahlifuna bil-lahi ma qalu walaqad qalu kalimata al-kuf'ri wakafaru ba'da is'lamihim wahammu bima lam yanalu wama naqamu illa an aghnahumu al-lahu warasuluhu min fadlihi fa-in yatubu yaku khayran lahum wa-in yatawallaw yu'adhib'humu al-lahu adhaban aliman fi ad-dun'ya wal-akhirati wama lahum fi al-ardi min waliyyin wala nasirin
wamin'hum man ahada al-laha la-in atana min fadlihi lanassaddaqanna walanakunanna mina as-salihina
falamma atahum min fadlihi bakhilu bihi watawallaw wahum mu'riduna
fa-a'qabahum nifaqan fi qulubihim ila yawmi yalqawnahu bima akhlafu al-laha ma wa'aduhu wabima kanu yakdhibuna
alam ya'lamu anna al-laha ya'lamu sirrahum wanajwahum wa-anna al-laha allamu al-ghuyubi
alladhina yalmizuna al-mutawi'ina mina al-mu'minina fi as-sadaqati wa-alladhina la yajiduna illa juh'dahum fayaskharuna min'hum sakhira al-lahu min'hum walahum adhabun alimun
is'taghfir lahum aw la tastaghfir lahum in tastaghfir lahum sab'ina marratan falan yaghfira al-lahu lahum dhalika bi-annahum kafaru bil-lahi warasulihi wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-fasiqina

fariha al-mukhalafuna bimaq'adihim khilafa rasuli al-lahi wakarihu an yujahidu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim fi sabili al-lahi waqalu la tanfiru fi al-hari qul naru jahannama ashaddu harran law kanu yafqahuna
falyadhaku qalilan walyabku kathiran jazaan bima kanu yaksibuna

fa-in raja'aka al-lahu ila taifatin min'hum fa-is'tadhanuka lil'khuruji faqul lan takhruju ma'iya abadan walan tuqatilu ma'iya aduwwan innakum raditum bil-qu'udi awwala marratin fa-uq'udu ma'a al-khalifina
wala tusalli ala ahadin min'hum mata abadan wala taqum ala qabrihi innahum kafaru bil-lahi warasulihi wamatu wahum fasiquna
wala tu'jib'ka amwaluhum wa-awladuhum innama yuridu al-lahu an yu'adhibahum biha fi ad-dun'ya watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kafiruna
wa-idha unzilat suratun an aminu bil-lahi wajahidu ma'a rasulihi is'tadhanaka ulu at-tawli min'hum waqalu dharna nakun ma'a al-qa'idina
radu bi-an yakunu ma'a al-khawalifi watubi'a ala qulubihim fahum la yafqahuna
lakini ar-rasulu wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu jahadu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim wa-ulaika lahumu al-khayratu wa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
a'adda al-lahu lahum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha dhalika al-fawzu al-'azimu
wajaa al-mu'adhiruna mina al-a'rabi liyu'dhana lahum waqa'ada alladhina kadhabu al-laha warasulahu sayusibu alladhina kafaru min'hum adhabun alimun
laysa ala ad-du'afai wala ala al-marda wala ala alladhina la yajiduna ma yunfiquna harajun idha nasahu lillahi warasulihi ma ala al-muh'sinina min sabilin wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
wala ala alladhina idha ma atawka litahmilahum qul'ta la ajidu ma ahmilukum alayhi tawallaw wa-a'yunuhum tafidu mina ad-dam'i hazanan alla yajidu ma yunfiquna
innama as-sabilu ala alladhina yastadhinunaka wahum aghniyau radu bi-an yakunu ma'a al-khawalifi wataba'a al-lahu ala qulubihim fahum la ya'lamuna

ya'tadhiruna ilaykum idha raja'tum ilayhim qul la ta'tadhiru lan nu'mina lakum qad nabba-ana al-lahu min akhbarikum wasayara al-lahu amalakum warasuluhu thumma turadduna ila alimi al-ghaybi was-shahadati fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
sayahlifuna bil-lahi lakum idha inqalabtum ilayhim litu'ridu anhum fa-a'ridu anhum innahum rij'sun wamawahum jahannamu jazaan bima kanu yaksibuna
yahlifuna lakum litardaw anhum fa-in tardaw anhum fa-inna al-laha la yarda ani al-qawmi al-fasiqina
al-a'rabu ashaddu kuf'ran wanifaqan wa-ajdaru alla ya'lamu hududa ma anzala al-lahu ala rasulihi wal-lahu alimun hakimun
wamina al-a'rabi man yattakhidhu ma yunfiqu maghraman wayatarabbasu bikumu ad-dawaira alayhim dairatu as-sawi wal-lahu sami'un alimun

wamina al-a'rabi man yu'minu bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wayattakhidhu ma yunfiqu qurubatin inda al-lahi wasalawati ar-rasuli ala innaha qur'batun lahum sayud'khiluhumu al-lahu fi rahmatihi inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun

was-sabiquna al-awaluna mina al-muhajirina wal-ansari wa-alladhina ittaba'uhum bi-ih'sanin radiya al-lahu anhum waradu anhu wa-a'adda lahum jannatin tajri tahtaha al-anharu khalidina fiha abadan dhalika al-fawzu al-'azimu
wamimman hawlakum mina al-a'rabi munafiquna wamin ahli al-madinati maradu ala an-nifaqi la ta'lamuhum nahnu na'lamuhum sanu'adhibuhum marratayni thumma yuradduna ila adhabin azimin
waakharuna i'tarafu bidhunubihim khalatu amalan salihan waakhara sayyi-an asa al-lahu an yatuba alayhim inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
khudh min amwalihim sadaqatan tutahhiruhum watuzakkihim biha wasalli alayhim inna salataka sakanun lahum wal-lahu sami'un alimun
alam ya'lamu anna al-laha huwa yaqbalu at-tawbata an ibadihi wayakhudhu as-sadaqati wa-anna al-laha huwa at-tawabu ar-rahimu
waquli i'malu fasayara al-lahu amalakum warasuluhu wal-mu'minuna wasaturadduna ila alimi al-ghaybi was-shahadati fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
waakharuna mur'jawna li-amri al-lahi imma yu'adhibuhum wa-imma yatubu alayhim wal-lahu alimun hakimun

wa-alladhina ittakhadhu masjidan diraran wakuf'ran watafriqan bayna al-mu'minina wa-ir'sadan liman haraba al-laha warasulahu min qablu walayahlifunna in aradna illa al-hus'na wal-lahu yashhadu innahum lakadhibuna
la taqum fihi abadan lamasjidun ussisa ala at-taqwa min awwali yawmin ahaqqu an taquma fihi fihi rijalun yuhibbuna an yatatahharu wal-lahu yuhibbu al-mutahirina
afaman assasa bun'yanahu ala taqwa mina al-lahi warid'wanin khayrun am man assasa bun'yanahu ala shafa jurufin harin fa-in'hara bihi fi nari jahannama wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma az-zalimina
la yazalu bun'yanuhumu alladhi banaw ribatan fi qulubihim illa an taqatta'a qulubuhum wal-lahu alimun hakimun

inna al-laha ish'tara mina al-mu'minina anfusahum wa-amwalahum bi-anna lahumu al-janata yuqatiluna fi sabili al-lahi fayaqtuluna wayuq'taluna wa'dan alayhi haqqan fi at-tawrati wal-injili wal-qur'ani waman awfa bi'ahdihi mina al-lahi fa-is'tabshiru bibay'ikumu alladhi baya'tum bihi wadhalika huwa al-fawzu al-'azimu
at-taibuna al-'abiduna al-hamiduna as-saihuna ar-raki'una as-sajiduna al-amiruna bil-ma'rufi wan-nahuna ani al-munkari wal-hafizuna lihududi al-lahi wabashiri al-mu'minina
ma kana lilnnabiyyi wa-alladhina amanu an yastaghfiru lil'mush'rikina walaw kanu uli qur'ba min ba'di ma tabayyana lahum annahum ashabu al-jahimi
wama kana is'tigh'faru ib'rahima li-abihi illa an maw'idatin wa'adaha iyyahu falamma tabayyana lahu annahu aduwwun lillahi tabarra-a min'hu inna ib'rahima la-awwahun halimun
wama kana al-lahu liyudilla qawman ba'da idh hadahum hatta yubayyina lahum ma yattaquna inna al-laha bikulli shayin alimun
inna al-laha lahu mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi yuh'yi wayumitu wama lakum min duni al-lahi min waliyyin wala nasirin
laqad taba al-lahu ala an-nabiyi wal-muhajirina wal-ansari alladhina ittaba'uhu fi sa'ati al-'us'rati min ba'di ma kada yazighu qulubu fariqin min'hum thumma taba alayhim innahu bihim raufun rahimun

wa'ala at-thalathati alladhina khullifu hatta idha daqat alayhimu al-ardu bima rahubat wadaqat alayhim anfusuhum wazannu an la malja-a mina al-lahi illa ilayhi thumma taba alayhim liyatubu inna al-laha huwa at-tawabu ar-rahimu
yaayyuha alladhina amanu ittaqu al-laha wakunu ma'a as-sadiqina

ma kana li-ahli al-madinati waman hawlahum mina al-a'rabi an yatakhallafu an rasuli al-lahi wala yarghabu bi-anfusihim an nafsihi dhalika bi-annahum la yusibuhum zama-on wala nasabun wala makhmasatun fi sabili al-lahi wala yatauna mawti-an yaghizu al-kufara wala yanaluna min aduwwin naylan illa kutiba lahum bihi amalun salihun inna al-laha la yudi'u ajra al-muh'sinina
wala yunfiquna nafaqatan saghiratan wala kabiratan wala yaqta'una wadiyan illa kutiba lahum liyajziyahumu al-lahu ahsana ma kanu ya'maluna
wama kana al-mu'minuna liyanfiru kaffatan falawla nafara min kulli fir'qatin min'hum taifatun liyatafaqqahu fi ad-dini waliyundhiru qawmahum idha raja'u ilayhim la'allahum yahdharuna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu qatilu alladhina yalunakum mina al-kufari walyajidu fikum ghil'zatan wa-i'lamu anna al-laha ma'a al-mutaqina
wa-idha ma unzilat suratun famin'hum man yaqulu ayyukum zadathu hadhihi imanan fa-amma alladhina amanu fazadathum imanan wahum yastabshiruna
wa-amma alladhina fi qulubihim maradun fazadathum rij'san ila rij'sihim wamatu wahum kafiruna
awala yarawna annahum yuf'tanuna fi kulli amin marratan aw marratayni thumma la yatubuna wala hum yadhakkaruna
wa-idha ma unzilat suratun nazara ba'duhum ila ba'din hal yarakum min ahadin thumma insarafu sarafa al-lahu qulubahum bi-annahum qawmun la yafqahuna
laqad jaakum rasulun min anfusikum azizun alayhi ma anittum harisun alaykum bil-mu'minina raufun rahimun
fa-in tawallaw faqul hasbiya al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa alayhi tawakkaltu wahuwa rabbu al-'arshi al-'azimi
alif-lam-ra til'ka ayatu al-kitabi al-hakimi
akana lilnnasi ajaban an awhayna ila rajulin min'hum an andhiri an-nasa wabashiri alladhina amanu anna lahum qadama sid'qin inda rabbihim qala al-kafiruna inna hadha lasahirun mubinun

inna rabbakumu al-lahu alladhi khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi yudabbiru al-amra ma min shafi'in illa min ba'di idh'nihi dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum fa-u'buduhu afala tadhakkaruna

ilayhi marji'ukum jami'an wa'da al-lahi haqqan innahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu liyajziya alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati bil-qis'ti wa-alladhina kafaru lahum sharabun min hamimin wa'adhabun alimun bima kanu yakfuruna
huwa alladhi ja'ala as-shamsa diyaan wal-qamara nuran waqaddarahu manazila lita'lamu adada as-sinina wal-hisaba ma khalaqa al-lahu dhalika illa bil-haqi yufassilu al-ayati liqawmin ya'lamuna
inna fi ikh'tilafi al-layli wan-nahari wama khalaqa al-lahu fi as-samawati wal-ardi laayatin liqawmin yattaquna
inna alladhina la yarjuna liqaana waradu bil-hayati ad-dun'ya wa-it'ma-annu biha wa-alladhina hum an ayatina ghafiluna
ulaika mawahumu an-naru bima kanu yaksibuna
inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati yahdihim rabbuhum biimanihim tajri min tahtihimu al-anharu fi jannati an-na'imi
da'wahum fiha sub'hanaka al-lahuma watahiyyatuhum fiha salamun waakhiru da'wahum ani al-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
walaw yu'ajjilu al-lahu lilnnasi as-shara is'ti'jalahum bil-khayri laqudiya ilayhim ajaluhum fanadharu alladhina la yarjuna liqaana fi tugh'yanihim ya'mahuna
wa-idha massa al-insana ad-duru da'ana lijanbihi aw qa'idan aw qaiman falamma kashafna anhu durrahu marra ka-an lam yad'una ila durrin massahu kadhalika zuyyina lil'mus'rifina ma kanu ya'maluna
walaqad ahlakna al-quruna min qablikum lamma zalamu wajaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati wama kanu liyu'minu kadhalika najzi al-qawma al-muj'rimina
thumma ja'alnakum khalaifa fi al-ardi min ba'dihim linanzura kayfa ta'maluna

wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qala alladhina la yarjuna liqaana i'ti biqur'anin ghayri hadha aw baddil'hu qul ma yakunu li an ubaddilahu min til'qai nafsi in attabi'u illa ma yuha ilayya inni akhafu in asaytu rabbi adhaba yawmin azimin
qul law shaa al-lahu ma talawtuhu alaykum wala adrakum bihi faqad labith'tu fikum umuran min qablihi afala ta'qiluna
faman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba biayatihi innahu la yuf'lihu al-muj'rimuna

waya'buduna min duni al-lahi ma la yadurruhum wala yanfa'uhum wayaquluna haulai shufa'auna inda al-lahi qul atunabbiuna al-laha bima la ya'lamu fi as-samawati wala fi al-ardi sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yush'rikuna
wama kana an-nasu illa ummatan wahidatan fa-ikh'talafu walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laqudiya baynahum fima fihi yakhtalifuna
wayaquluna lawla unzila alayhi ayatun min rabbihi faqul innama al-ghaybu lillahi fa-intaziru inni ma'akum mina al-muntazirina
wa-idha adhaqna an-nasa rahmatan min ba'di darraa massathum idha lahum makrun fi ayatina quli al-lahu asra'u makran inna rusulana yaktubuna ma tamkuruna

huwa alladhi yusayyirukum fi al-bari wal-bahri hatta idha kuntum fi al-ful'ki wajarayna bihim birihin tayyibatin wafarihu biha jaatha rihun asifun wajaahumu al-mawju min kulli makanin wazannu annahum uhita bihim da'awu al-laha mukh'lisina lahu ad-dina la-in anjaytana min hadhihi lanakunanna mina as-shakirina
falamma anjahum idha hum yabghuna fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi yaayyuha an-nasu innama baghyukum ala anfusikum mata'a al-hayati ad-dun'ya thumma ilayna marji'ukum fanunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna

innama mathalu al-hayati ad-dun'ya kamain anzalnahu mina as-samai fa-ikh'talata bihi nabatu al-ardi mimma yakulu an-nasu wal-an'amu hatta idha akhadhati al-ardu zukh'rufaha wa-izzayyanat wazanna ahluha annahum qadiruna alayha ataha amruna laylan aw naharan faja'alnaha hasidan ka-an lam taghna bil-amsi kadhalika nufassilu al-ayati liqawmin yatafakkaruna
wal-lahu yad'u ila dari as-salami wayahdi man yashau ila siratin mus'taqimin
lilladhina ahsanu al-hus'na waziyadatun wala yarhaqu wujuhahum qatarun wala dhillatun ulaika ashabu al-janati hum fiha khaliduna

wa-alladhina kasabu as-sayiati jazau sayyi-atin bimith'liha watarhaquhum dhillatun ma lahum mina al-lahi min asimin ka-annama ugh'shiyat wujuhuhum qita'an mina al-layli muz'liman ulaika ashabu an-nari hum fiha khaliduna
wayawma nahshuruhum jami'an thumma naqulu lilladhina ashraku makanakum antum washurakaukum fazayyalna baynahum waqala shurakauhum ma kuntum iyyana ta'buduna
fakafa bil-lahi shahidan baynana wabaynakum in kunna an ibadatikum laghafilina
hunalika tablu kullu nafsin ma aslafat waruddu ila al-lahi mawlahumu al-haqi wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna

qul man yarzuqukum mina as-samai wal-ardi amman yamliku as-sam'a wal-absara waman yukh'riju al-haya mina al-mayiti wayukh'riju al-mayita mina al-hayi waman yudabbiru al-amra fasayaquluna al-lahu faqul afala tattaquna
fadhalikumu al-lahu rabbukumu al-haqu famadha ba'da al-haqi illa ad-dalalu fa-anna tus'rafuna
kadhalika haqqat kalimatu rabbika ala alladhina fasaqu annahum la yu'minuna
qul hal min shurakaikum man yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu quli al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu fa-anna tu'fakuna
qul hal min shurakaikum man yahdi ila al-haqi quli al-lahu yahdi lil'haqqi afaman yahdi ila al-haqi ahaqqu an yuttaba'a amman la yahiddi illa an yuh'da fama lakum kayfa tahkumuna
wama yattabi'u aktharuhum illa zannan inna az-zana la yugh'ni mina al-haqi shayan inna al-laha alimun bima yaf 'aluna
wama kana hadha al-qur'anu an yuf'tara min duni al-lahi walakin tasdiqa alladhi bayna yadayhi watafsila al-kitabi la rayba fihi min rabbi al-'alamina
am yaquluna if'tarahu qul fatu bisuratin mith'lihi wa-id'u mani is'tata'tum min duni al-lahi in kuntum sadiqina
bal kadhabu bima lam yuhitu bi'il'mihi walamma yatihim tawiluhu kadhalika kadhaba alladhina min qablihim fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu az-zalimina
wamin'hum man yu'minu bihi wamin'hum man la yu'minu bihi warabbuka a'lamu bil-muf'sidina
wa-in kadhabuka faqul li amali walakum amalukum antum bariuna mimma a'malu wa-ana barion mimma ta'maluna
wamin'hum man yastami'una ilayka afa-anta tus'mi'u as-suma walaw kanu la ya'qiluna
wamin'hum man yanzuru ilayka afa-anta tahdi al-'um'ya walaw kanu la yub'siruna
inna al-laha la yazlimu an-nasa shayan walakinna an-nasa anfusahum yazlimuna
wayawma yahshuruhum ka-an lam yalbathu illa sa'atan mina an-nahari yata'arafuna baynahum qad khasira alladhina kadhabu biliqai al-lahi wama kanu muh'tadina
wa-imma nuriyannaka ba'da alladhi na'iduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilayna marji'uhum thumma al-lahu shahidun ala ma yaf 'aluna
walikulli ummatin rasulun fa-idha jaa rasuluhum qudiya baynahum bil-qis'ti wahum la yuz'lamuna
wayaquluna mata hadha al-wa'du in kuntum sadiqina
qul la amliku linafsi darran wala naf 'an illa ma shaa al-lahu likulli ummatin ajalun idha jaa ajaluhum fala yastakhiruna sa'atan wala yastaqdimuna
qul ara-aytum in atakum adhabuhu bayatan aw naharan madha yasta'jilu min'hu al-muj'rimuna
athumma idha ma waqa'a amantum bihi al'ana waqad kuntum bihi tasta'jiluna
thumma qila lilladhina zalamu dhuqu adhaba al-khul'di hal tuj'zawna illa bima kuntum taksibuna
wayastanbiunaka ahaqqun huwa qul i warabbi innahu lahaqqun wama antum bimu'jizina
walaw anna likulli nafsin zalamat ma fi al-ardi la-if'tadat bihi wa-asarru an-nadamata lamma ra-awu al-'adhaba waqudiya baynahum bil-qis'ti wahum la yuz'lamuna
ala inna lillahi ma fi as-samawati wal-ardi ala inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
huwa yuh'yi wayumitu wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
yaayyuha an-nasu qad jaatkum maw'izatun min rabbikum washifaon lima fi as-suduri wahudan warahmatun lil'mu'minina
qul bifadli al-lahi wabirahmatihi fabidhalika falyafrahu huwa khayrun mimma yajma'una
qul ara-aytum ma anzala al-lahu lakum min riz'qin faja'altum min'hu haraman wahalalan qul allahu adhina lakum am ala al-lahi taftaruna
wama zannu alladhina yaftaruna ala al-lahi al-kadhiba yawma al-qiyamati inna al-laha ladhu fadlin ala an-nasi walakinna aktharahum la yashkuruna

wama takunu fi shanin wama tatlu min'hu min qur'anin wala ta'maluna min amalin illa kunna alaykum shuhudan idh tufiduna fihi wama ya'zubu an rabbika min mith'qali dharratin fi al-ardi wala fi as-samai wala asghara min dhalika wala akbara illa fi kitabin mubinin
ala inna awliyaa al-lahi la khawfun alayhim wala hum yahzanuna
alladhina amanu wakanu yattaquna
lahumu al-bush'ra fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya wafi al-akhirati la tabdila likalimati al-lahi dhalika huwa al-fawzu al-'azimu
wala yahzunka qawluhum inna al-'izata lillahi jami'an huwa as-sami'u al-'alimu
ala inna lillahi man fi as-samawati waman fi al-ardi wama yattabi'u alladhina yad'una min duni al-lahi shurakaa in yattabi'una illa az-zana wa-in hum illa yakhrusuna
huwa alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-layla litaskunu fihi wan-nahara mub'siran inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yasma'una
qalu ittakhadha al-lahu waladan sub'hanahu huwa al-ghaniyu lahu ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi in indakum min sul'tanin bihadha ataquluna ala al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna
qul inna alladhina yaftaruna ala al-lahi al-kadhiba la yuf'lihuna
mata'un fi ad-dun'ya thumma ilayna marji'uhum thumma nudhiquhumu al-'adhaba as-shadida bima kanu yakfuruna

wa-ut'lu alayhim naba-a nuhin idh qala liqawmihi yaqawmi in kana kabura alaykum maqami watadhkiri biayati al-lahi fa'ala al-lahi tawakkaltu fa-ajmi'u amrakum washurakaakum thumma la yakun amrukum alaykum ghummatan thumma iq'du ilayya wala tunziruni
fa-in tawallaytum fama sa-altukum min ajrin in ajriya illa ala al-lahi wa-umir'tu an akuna mina al-mus'limina
fakadhabuhu fanajjaynahu waman ma'ahu fi al-ful'ki waja'alnahum khalaifa wa-aghraqna alladhina kadhabu biayatina fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu al-mundharina
thumma ba'athna min ba'dihi rusulan ila qawmihim fajauhum bil-bayinati fama kanu liyu'minu bima kadhabu bihi min qablu kadhalika natba'u ala qulubi al-mu'tadina
thumma ba'athna min ba'dihim musa waharuna ila fir'awna wamala-ihi biayatina fa-is'takbaru wakanu qawman muj'rimina
falamma jaahumu al-haqu min indina qalu inna hadha lasih'run mubinun
qala musa ataquluna lil'haqqi lamma jaakum asih'run hadha wala yuf'lihu as-sahiruna
qalu aji'tana litalfitana amma wajadna alayhi abaana watakuna lakuma al-kib'riyau fi al-ardi wama nahnu lakuma bimu'minina
waqala fir'awnu i'tuni bikulli sahirin alimin
falamma jaa as-saharatu qala lahum musa alqu ma antum mul'quna
falamma alqaw qala musa ma ji'tum bihi as-sih'ru inna al-laha sayub'tiluhu inna al-laha la yus'lihu amala al-muf'sidina
wayuhiqqu al-lahu al-haqa bikalimatihi walaw kariha al-muj'rimuna
fama amana limusa illa dhurriyyatun min qawmihi ala khawfin min fir'awna wamala-ihim an yaftinahum wa-inna fir'awna la'alin fi al-ardi wa-innahu lamina al-mus'rifina
waqala musa yaqawmi in kuntum amantum bil-lahi fa'alayhi tawakkalu in kuntum mus'limina
faqalu ala al-lahi tawakkalna rabbana la taj'alna fit'natan lil'qawmi az-zalimina
wanajjina birahmatika mina al-qawmi al-kafirina
wa-awhayna ila musa wa-akhihi an tabawwaa liqawmikuma bimis'ra buyutan wa-ij'alu buyutakum qib'latan wa-aqimu as-salata wabashiri al-mu'minina

waqala musa rabbana innaka atayta fir'awna wamala-ahu zinatan wa-amwalan fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya rabbana liyudillu an sabilika rabbana it'mis ala amwalihim wa-ush'dud ala qulubihim fala yu'minu hatta yarawu al-'adhaba al-alima
qala qad ujibat da'watukuma fa-is'taqima wala tattabi'anni sabila alladhina la ya'lamuna

wajawazna bibani is'raila al-bahra fa-atba'ahum fir'awnu wajunuduhu baghyan wa'adwan hatta idha adrakahu al-gharaqu qala amantu annahu la ilaha illa alladhi amanat bihi banu is'raila wa-ana mina al-mus'limina
al'ana waqad asayta qablu wakunta mina al-muf'sidina
fal-yawma nunajjika bibadanika litakuna liman khalfaka ayatan wa-inna kathiran mina an-nasi an ayatina laghafiluna
walaqad bawwana bani is'raila mubawwa-a sid'qin warazaqnahum mina at-tayibati fama ikh'talafu hatta jaahumu al-'il'mu inna rabbaka yaqdi baynahum yawma al-qiyamati fima kanu fihi yakhtalifuna
fa-in kunta fi shakkin mimma anzalna ilayka fasali alladhina yaqrauna al-kitaba min qablika laqad jaaka al-haqu min rabbika fala takunanna mina al-mum'tarina
wala takunanna mina alladhina kadhabu biayati al-lahi fatakuna mina al-khasirina
inna alladhina haqqat alayhim kalimatu rabbika la yu'minuna
walaw jaathum kullu ayatin hatta yarawu al-'adhaba al-alima
falawla kanat qaryatun amanat fanafa'aha imanuha illa qawma yunusa lamma amanu kashafna anhum adhaba al-khiz'yi fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya wamatta'nahum ila hinin
walaw shaa rabbuka laamana man fi al-ardi kulluhum jami'an afa-anta tuk'rihu an-nasa hatta yakunu mu'minina
wama kana linafsin an tu'mina illa bi-idh'ni al-lahi wayaj'alu ar-rij'sa ala alladhina la ya'qiluna
quli unzuru madha fi as-samawati wal-ardi wama tugh'ni al-ayatu wan-nudhuru an qawmin la yu'minuna
fahal yantaziruna illa mith'la ayyami alladhina khalaw min qablihim qul fa-intaziru inni ma'akum mina al-muntazirina
thumma nunajji rusulana wa-alladhina amanu kadhalika haqqan alayna nunji al-mu'minina
qul yaayyuha an-nasu in kuntum fi shakkin min dini fala a'budu alladhina ta'buduna min duni al-lahi walakin a'budu al-laha alladhi yatawaffakum wa-umir'tu an akuna mina al-mu'minina
wa-an aqim wajhaka lilddini hanifan wala takunanna mina al-mush'rikina
wala tad'u min duni al-lahi ma la yanfa'uka wala yadurruka fa-in fa'alta fa-innaka idhan mina az-zalimina
wa-in yamsaska al-lahu bidurrin fala kashifa lahu illa huwa wa-in yurid'ka bikhayrin fala radda lifadlihi yusibu bihi man yashau min ibadihi wahuwa al-ghafuru ar-rahimu
qul yaayyuha an-nasu qad jaakumu al-haqu min rabbikum famani ih'tada fa-innama yahtadi linafsihi waman dalla fa-innama yadillu alayha wama ana alaykum biwakilin
wa-ittabi' ma yuha ilayka wa-is'bir hatta yahkuma al-lahu wahuwa khayru al-hakimina
alif-lam-ra kitabun uh'kimat ayatuhu thumma fussilat min ladun hakimin khabirin
alla ta'budu illa al-laha innani lakum min'hu nadhirun wabashirun
wa-ani is'taghfiru rabbakum thumma tubu ilayhi yumatti'kum mata'an hasanan ila ajalin musamman wayu'ti kulla dhi fadlin fadlahu wa-in tawallaw fa-inni akhafu alaykum adhaba yawmin kabirin
ila al-lahi marji'ukum wahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
ala innahum yathnuna sudurahum liyastakhfu min'hu ala hina yastaghshuna thiyabahum ya'lamu ma yusirruna wama yu'linuna innahu alimun bidhati as-suduri
wama min dabbatin fi al-ardi illa ala al-lahi riz'quha waya'lamu mus'taqarraha wamus'tawda'aha kullun fi kitabin mubinin

wahuwa alladhi khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin wakana arshuhu ala al-mai liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu amalan wala-in qul'ta innakum mab'uthuna min ba'di al-mawti layaqulanna alladhina kafaru in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
wala-in akharna anhumu al-'adhaba ila ummatin ma'dudatin layaqulunna ma yahbisuhu ala yawma yatihim laysa masrufan anhum wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
wala-in adhaqna al-insana minna rahmatan thumma naza'naha min'hu innahu layausun kafurun
wala-in adhaqnahu na'maa ba'da darraa massathu layaqulanna dhahaba as-sayiatu anni innahu lafarihun fakhurun
illa alladhina sabaru wa'amilu as-salihati ulaika lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabirun
fala'allaka tarikun ba'da ma yuha ilayka wadaiqun bihi sadruka an yaqulu lawla unzila alayhi kanzun aw jaa ma'ahu malakun innama anta nadhirun wal-lahu ala kulli shayin wakilun
am yaquluna if'tarahu qul fatu bi'ashri suwarin mith'lihi muf'tarayatin wa-id'u mani is'tata'tum min duni al-lahi in kuntum sadiqina
fa-illam yastajibu lakum fa-i'lamu annama unzila bi'il'mi al-lahi wa-an la ilaha illa huwa fahal antum mus'limuna
man kana yuridu al-hayata ad-dun'ya wazinataha nuwaffi ilayhim a'malahum fiha wahum fiha la yub'khasuna
ulaika alladhina laysa lahum fi al-akhirati illa an-naru wahabita ma sana'u fiha wabatilun ma kanu ya'maluna

afaman kana ala bayyinatin min rabbihi wayatluhu shahidun min'hu wamin qablihi kitabu musa imaman warahmatan ulaika yu'minuna bihi waman yakfur bihi mina al-ahzabi fan-naru maw'iduhu fala taku fi mir'yatin min'hu innahu al-haqu min rabbika walakinna akthara an-nasi la yu'minuna
waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban ulaika yu'raduna ala rabbihim wayaqulu al-ashhadu haulai alladhina kadhabu ala rabbihim ala la'natu al-lahi ala az-zalimina
alladhina yasudduna an sabili al-lahi wayabghunaha iwajan wahum bil-akhirati hum kafiruna
ulaika lam yakunu mu'jizina fi al-ardi wama kana lahum min duni al-lahi min awliyaa yuda'afu lahumu al-'adhabu ma kanu yastati'una as-sam'a wama kanu yub'siruna
ulaika alladhina khasiru anfusahum wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
la jarama annahum fi al-akhirati humu al-akhsaruna
inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati wa-akhbatu ila rabbihim ulaika ashabu al-janati hum fiha khaliduna
mathalu al-fariqayni kal-a'ma wal-asami wal-basiri was-sami'i hal yastawiyani mathalan afala tadhakkaruna
walaqad arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi inni lakum nadhirun mubinun
an la ta'budu illa al-laha inni akhafu alaykum adhaba yawmin alimin

faqala al-mala-u alladhina kafaru min qawmihi ma naraka illa basharan mith'lana wama naraka ittaba'aka illa alladhina hum aradhiluna badiya ar-rayi wama nara lakum alayna min fadlin bal nazunnukum kadhibina
qala yaqawmi ara-aytum in kuntu ala bayyinatin min rabbi waatani rahmatan min indihi fa'ummiyat alaykum anul'zimukumuha wa-antum laha karihuna
wayaqawmi la asalukum alayhi malan in ajriya illa ala al-lahi wama ana bitaridi alladhina amanu innahum mulaqu rabbihim walakinni arakum qawman tajhaluna
wayaqawmi man yansuruni mina al-lahi in taradttuhum afala tadhakkaruna

wala aqulu lakum indi khazainu al-lahi wala a'lamu al-ghayba wala aqulu inni malakun wala aqulu lilladhina tazdari a'yunukum lan yu'tiyahumu al-lahu khayran al-lahu a'lamu bima fi anfusihim inni idhan lamina az-zalimina
qalu yanuhu qad jadaltana fa-aktharta jidalana fatina bima ta'iduna in kunta mina as-sadiqina
qala innama yatikum bihi al-lahu in shaa wama antum bimu'jizina
wala yanfa'ukum nus'hi in aradttu an ansaha lakum in kana al-lahu yuridu an yugh'wiyakum huwa rabbukum wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
am yaquluna if'tarahu qul ini if'taraytuhu fa'alayya ij'rami wa-ana barion mimma tuj'rimuna
wauhiya ila nuhin annahu lan yu'mina min qawmika illa man qad amana fala tabta-is bima kanu yaf 'aluna
wa-is'na'i al-ful'ka bi-a'yunina wawahyina wala tukhatib'ni fi alladhina zalamu innahum mugh'raquna
wayasna'u al-ful'ka wakullama marra alayhi mala-on min qawmihi sakhiru min'hu qala in taskharu minna fa-inna naskharu minkum kama taskharuna
fasawfa ta'lamuna man yatihi adhabun yukh'zihi wayahillu alayhi adhabun muqimun
hatta idha jaa amruna wafara at-tanuru qul'na ih'mil fiha min kullin zawjayni ith'nayni wa-ahlaka illa man sabaqa alayhi al-qawlu waman amana wama amana ma'ahu illa qalilun
waqala ir'kabu fiha bis'mi al-lahi majraha wamur'saha inna rabbi laghafurun rahimun
wahiya tajri bihim fi mawjin kal-jibali wanada nuhun ib'nahu wakana fi ma'zilin yabunayya ir'kab ma'ana wala takun ma'a al-kafirina
qala saawi ila jabalin ya'simuni mina al-mai qala la asima al-yawma min amri al-lahi illa man rahima wahala baynahuma al-mawju fakana mina al-mugh'raqina
waqila yaardu ib'la'i maaki wayasamau aqli'i waghida al-mau waqudiya al-amru wa-is'tawat ala al-judiyi waqila bu'dan lil'qawmi az-zalimina
wanada nuhun rabbahu faqala rabbi inna ib'ni min ahli wa-inna wa'daka al-haqu wa-anta ahkamu al-hakimina
qala yanuhu innahu laysa min ahlika innahu amalun ghayru salihin fala tasalni ma laysa laka bihi il'mun inni a'izuka an takuna mina al-jahilina
qala rabbi inni a'udhu bika an asalaka ma laysa li bihi il'mun wa-illa taghfir li watarhamni akun mina al-khasirina
qila yanuhu ih'bit bisalamin minna wabarakatin alayka wa'ala umamin mimman ma'aka wa-umamun sanumatti'uhum thumma yamassuhum minna adhabun alimun
til'ka min anbai al-ghaybi nuhiha ilayka ma kunta ta'lamuha anta wala qawmuka min qabli hadha fa-is'bir inna al-'aqibata lil'muttaqina
wa-ila adin akhahum hudan qala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu in antum illa muf'taruna
yaqawmi la asalukum alayhi ajran in ajriya illa ala alladhi fatarani afala ta'qiluna
wayaqawmi is'taghfiru rabbakum thumma tubu ilayhi yur'sili as-samaa alaykum mid'raran wayazid'kum quwwatan ila quwwatikum wala tatawallaw muj'rimina
qalu yahudu ma ji'tana bibayyinatin wama nahnu bitariki alihatina an qawlika wama nahnu laka bimu'minina
in naqulu illa i'taraka ba'du alihatina bisuin qala inni ush'hidu al-laha wa-ish'hadu anni barion mimma tush'rikuna
min dunihi fakiduni jami'an thumma la tunziruni
inni tawakkaltu ala al-lahi rabbi warabbikum ma min dabbatin illa huwa akhidhun binasiyatiha inna rabbi ala siratin mus'taqimin
fa-in tawallaw faqad ablaghtukum ma ur'sil'tu bihi ilaykum wayastakhlifu rabbi qawman ghayrakum wala tadurrunahu shayan inna rabbi ala kulli shayin hafizun
walamma jaa amruna najjayna hudan wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu birahmatin minna wanajjaynahum min adhabin ghalizin
watil'ka adun jahadu biayati rabbihim wa'asaw rusulahu wa-ittaba'u amra kulli jabbarin anidin
wa-ut'bi'u fi hadhihi ad-dun'ya la'natan wayawma al-qiyamati ala inna adan kafaru rabbahum ala bu'dan li'adin qawmi hudin

wa-ila thamuda akhahum salihan qala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu huwa ansha-akum mina al-ardi wa-is'ta'marakum fiha fa-is'taghfiruhu thumma tubu ilayhi inna rabbi qaribun mujibun
qalu yasalihu qad kunta fina marjuwwan qabla hadha atanhana an na'buda ma ya'budu abauna wa-innana lafi shakkin mimma tad'una ilayhi muribin
qala yaqawmi ara-aytum in kuntu ala bayyinatin min rabbi waatani min'hu rahmatan faman yansuruni mina al-lahi in asaytuhu fama tazidunani ghayra takhsirin
wayaqawmi hadhihi naqatu al-lahi lakum ayatan fadharuha takul fi ardi al-lahi wala tamassuha bisuin fayakhudhakum adhabun qaribun
fa'aqaruha faqala tamatta'u fi darikum thalathata ayyamin dhalika wa'dun ghayru makdhubin
falamma jaa amruna najjayna salihan wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu birahmatin minna wamin khiz'yi yawmi-idhin inna rabbaka huwa al-qawiyu al-'azizu
wa-akhadha alladhina zalamu as-sayhatu fa-asbahu fi diyarihim jathimina
ka-an lam yaghnaw fiha ala inna thamuda kafaru rabbahum ala bu'dan lithamuda
walaqad jaat rusuluna ib'rahima bil-bush'ra qalu salaman qala salamun fama labitha an jaa bi'ij'lin hanidhin
falamma raa aydiyahum la tasilu ilayhi nakirahum wa-awjasa min'hum khifatan qalu la takhaf inna ur'sil'na ila qawmi lutin
wa-im'ra-atuhu qaimatun fadahikat fabasharnaha bi-is'haqa wamin warai is'haqa ya'quba
qalat yawaylata a-alidu wa-ana ajuzun wahadha ba'li shaykhan inna hadha lashayon ajibun
qalu ata'jabina min amri al-lahi rahmatu al-lahi wabarakatuhu alaykum ahla al-bayti innahu hamidun majidun
falamma dhahaba an ib'rahima ar-raw'u wajaathu al-bush'ra yujadiluna fi qawmi lutin
inna ib'rahima lahalimun awwahun munibun
yaib'rahimu a'rid an hadha innahu qad jaa amru rabbika wa-innahum atihim adhabun ghayru mardudin
walamma jaat rusuluna lutan sia bihim wadaqa bihim dhar'an waqala hadha yawmun asibun
wajaahu qawmuhu yuh'ra'una ilayhi wamin qablu kanu ya'maluna as-sayiati qala yaqawmi haulai banati hunna atharu lakum fa-ittaqu al-laha wala tukh'zuni fi dayfi alaysa minkum rajulun rashidun
qalu laqad alim'ta ma lana fi banatika min haqqin wa-innaka lata'lamu ma nuridu
qala law anna li bikum quwwatan aw awi ila ruk'nin shadidin

qalu yalutu inna rusulu rabbika lan yasilu ilayka fa-asri bi-ahlika biqit'in mina al-layli wala yaltafit minkum ahadun illa im'ra-ataka innahu musibuha ma asabahum inna maw'idahumu as-sub'hu alaysa as-sub'hu biqaribin
falamma jaa amruna ja'alna aliyaha safilaha wa-amtarna alayha hijaratan min sijjilin mandudin
musawwamatan inda rabbika wama hiya mina az-zalimina biba'idin
wa-ila madyana akhahum shu'ayban qala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu wala tanqusu al-mik'yala wal-mizana inni arakum bikhayrin wa-inni akhafu alaykum adhaba yawmin muhitin
wayaqawmi awfu al-mik'yala wal-mizana bil-qis'ti wala tabkhasu an-nasa ashyaahum wala ta'thaw fi al-ardi muf'sidina
baqiyyatu al-lahi khayrun lakum in kuntum mu'minina wama ana alaykum bihafizin
qalu yashu'aybu asalatuka tamuruka an natruka ma ya'budu abauna aw an naf 'ala fi amwalina ma nashau innaka la-anta al-halimu ar-rashidu

qala yaqawmi ara-aytum in kuntu ala bayyinatin min rabbi warazaqani min'hu riz'qan hasanan wama uridu an ukhalifakum ila ma anhakum anhu in uridu illa al-is'laha ma is'tata'tu wama tawfiqi illa bil-lahi alayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi unibu
wayaqawmi la yajrimannakum shiqaqi an yusibakum mith'lu ma asaba qawma nuhin aw qawma hudin aw qawma salihin wama qawmu lutin minkum biba'idin
wa-is'taghfiru rabbakum thumma tubu ilayhi inna rabbi rahimun wadudun
qalu yashu'aybu ma nafqahu kathiran mimma taqulu wa-inna lanaraka fina da'ifan walawla rahtuka larajamnaka wama anta alayna bi'azizin
qala yaqawmi arahti a'azzu alaykum mina al-lahi wa-ittakhadhtumuhu waraakum zih'riyyan inna rabbi bima ta'maluna muhitun
wayaqawmi i'malu ala makanatikum inni amilun sawfa ta'lamuna man yatihi adhabun yukh'zihi waman huwa kadhibun wa-ir'taqibu inni ma'akum raqibun
walamma jaa amruna najjayna shu'ayban wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu birahmatin minna wa-akhadhati alladhina zalamu as-sayhatu fa-asbahu fi diyarihim jathimina
ka-an lam yaghnaw fiha ala bu'dan limadyana kama ba'idat thamudu
walaqad arsalna musa biayatina wasul'tanin mubinin
ila fir'awna wamala-ihi fa-ittaba'u amra fir'awna wama amru fir'awna birashidin
yaqdumu qawmahu yawma al-qiyamati fa-awradahumu an-nara wabi'sa al-wir'du al-mawrudu
wa-ut'bi'u fi hadhihi la'natan wayawma al-qiyamati bi'sa ar-rif'du al-marfudu
dhalika min anbai al-qura naqussuhu alayka min'ha qaimun wahasidun
wama zalamnahum walakin zalamu anfusahum fama aghnat anhum alihatuhumu allati yad'una min duni al-lahi min shayin lamma jaa amru rabbika wama zaduhum ghayra tatbibin
wakadhalika akhdhu rabbika idha akhadha al-qura wahiya zalimatun inna akhdhahu alimun shadidun
inna fi dhalika laayatan liman khafa adhaba al-akhirati dhalika yawmun majmu'un lahu an-nasu wadhalika yawmun mashhudun
wama nu-akhiruhu illa li-ajalin ma'dudin
yawma yati la takallamu nafsun illa bi-idh'nihi famin'hum shaqiyyun wasa'idun
fa-amma alladhina shaqu fafi an-nari lahum fiha zafirun washahiqun
khalidina fiha ma damati as-samawatu wal-ardu illa ma shaa rabbuka inna rabbaka fa'alun lima yuridu
wa-amma alladhina su'idu fafi al-janati khalidina fiha ma damati as-samawatu wal-ardu illa ma shaa rabbuka ataan ghayra majdhudhin
fala taku fi mir'yatin mimma ya'budu haulai ma ya'buduna illa kama ya'budu abauhum min qablu wa-inna lamuwaffuhum nasibahum ghayra manqusin
walaqad atayna musa al-kitaba fa-ukh'tulifa fihi walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laqudiya baynahum wa-innahum lafi shakkin min'hu muribin
wa-inna kullan lamma layuwaffiyannahum rabbuka a'malahum innahu bima ya'maluna khabirun
fa-is'taqim kama umir'ta waman taba ma'aka wala tatghaw innahu bima ta'maluna basirun
wala tarkanu ila alladhina zalamu fatamassakumu an-naru wama lakum min duni al-lahi min awliyaa thumma la tunsaruna
wa-aqimi as-salata tarafayi an-nahari wazulafan mina al-layli inna al-hasanati yudh'hib'na as-sayiati dhalika dhik'ra lildhakirina
wa-is'bir fa-inna al-laha la yudi'u ajra al-muh'sinina
falawla kana mina al-quruni min qablikum ulu baqiyyatin yanhawna ani al-fasadi fi al-ardi illa qalilan mimman anjayna min'hum wa-ittaba'a alladhina zalamu ma ut'rifu fihi wakanu muj'rimina
wama kana rabbuka liyuh'lika al-qura bizul'min wa-ahluha mus'lihuna
walaw shaa rabbuka laja'ala an-nasa ummatan wahidatan wala yazaluna mukh'talifina
illa man rahima rabbuka walidhalika khalaqahum watammat kalimatu rabbika la-amla-anna jahannama mina al-jinati wan-nasi ajma'ina
wakullan naqussu alayka min anbai ar-rusuli ma nuthabbitu bihi fuadaka wajaaka fi hadhihi al-haqu wamaw'izatun wadhik'ra lil'mu'minina
waqul lilladhina la yu'minuna i'malu ala makanatikum inna amiluna
wa-intaziru inna muntaziruna
walillahi ghaybu as-samawati wal-ardi wa-ilayhi yur'ja'u al-amru kulluhu fa-u'bud'hu watawakkal alayhi wama rabbuka bighafilin amma ta'maluna
alif-lam-ra til'ka ayatu al-kitabi al-mubini
inna anzalnahu qur'anan arabiyyan la'allakum ta'qiluna
nahnu naqussu alayka ahsana al-qasasi bima awhayna ilayka hadha al-qur'ana wa-in kunta min qablihi lamina al-ghafilina
idh qala yusufu li-abihi yaabati inni ra-aytu ahada ashara kawkaban was-shamsa wal-qamara ra-aytuhum li sajidina
qala yabunayya la taqsus ru'yaka ala ikh'watika fayakidu laka kaydan inna as-shaytana lil'insani aduwwun mubinun
wakadhalika yajtabika rabbuka wayu'allimuka min tawili al-ahadithi wayutimmu ni'matahu alayka wa'ala ali ya'quba kama atammaha ala abawayka min qablu ib'rahima wa-is'haqa inna rabbaka alimun hakimun
laqad kana fi yusufa wa-ikh'watihi ayatun lilssailina
idh qalu layusufu wa-akhuhu ahabbu ila abina minna wanahnu us'batun inna abana lafi dalalin mubinin
uq'tulu yusufa awi it'rahuhu ardan yakhlu lakum wajhu abikum watakunu min ba'dihi qawman salihina
qala qailun min'hum la taqtulu yusufa wa-alquhu fi ghayabati al-jubi yaltaqit'hu ba'du as-sayarati in kuntum fa'ilina
qalu yaabana ma laka la tamanna ala yusufa wa-inna lahu lanasihuna
arsil'hu ma'ana ghadan yarta' wayal'ab wa-inna lahu lahafizuna
qala inni layahzununi an tadhhabu bihi wa-akhafu an yakulahu ad-dhi'bu wa-antum anhu ghafiluna
qalu la-in akalahu ad-dhi'bu wanahnu us'batun inna idhan lakhasiruna
falamma dhahabu bihi wa-ajma'u an yaj'aluhu fi ghayabati al-jubi wa-awhayna ilayhi latunabbi-annahum bi-amrihim hadha wahum la yash'uruna
wajau abahum ishaan yabkuna
qalu yaabana inna dhahabna nastabiqu watarakna yusufa inda mata'ina fa-akalahu ad-dhi'bu wama anta bimu'minin lana walaw kunna sadiqina
wajau ala qamisihi bidamin kadhibin qala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran fasabrun jamilun wal-lahu al-mus'ta'anu ala ma tasifuna
wajaat sayyaratun fa-arsalu waridahum fa-adla dalwahu qala yabush'ra hadha ghulamun wa-asarruhu bida'atan wal-lahu alimun bima ya'maluna
washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darahima ma'dudatin wakanu fihi mina az-zahidina

waqala alladhi ish'tarahu min mis'ra li-im'ra-atihi akrimi mathwahu asa an yanfa'ana aw nattakhidhahu waladan wakadhalika makkanna liyusufa fi al-ardi walinu'allimahu min tawili al-ahadithi wal-lahu ghalibun ala amrihi walakinna akthara an-nasi la ya'lamuna
walamma balagha ashuddahu ataynahu huk'man wa'il'man wakadhalika najzi al-muh'sinina
warawadathu allati huwa fi baytiha an nafsihi waghallaqati al-abwaba waqalat hayta laka qala ma'adha al-lahi innahu rabbi ahsana mathwaya innahu la yuf'lihu az-zalimuna
walaqad hammat bihi wahamma biha lawla an raa bur'hana rabbihi kadhalika linasrifa anhu as-sua wal-fahshaa innahu min ibadina al-mukh'lasina
wa-is'tabaqa al-baba waqaddat qamisahu min duburin wa-alfaya sayyidaha lada al-babi qalat ma jazau man arada bi-ahlika suan illa an yus'jana aw adhabun alimun
qala hiya rawadatni an nafsi washahida shahidun min ahliha in kana qamisuhu qudda min qubulin fasadaqat wahuwa mina al-kadhibina
wa-in kana qamisuhu qudda min duburin fakadhabat wahuwa mina as-sadiqina
falamma raa qamisahu qudda min duburin qala innahu min kaydikunna inna kaydakunna azimun
yusufu a'rid an hadha wa-is'taghfiri lidhanbiki innaki kunti mina al-khatiina
waqala nis'watun fi al-madinati im'ra-atu al-'azizi turawidu fataha an nafsihi qad shaghafaha hubban inna lanaraha fi dalalin mubinin

falamma sami'at bimakrihinna arsalat ilayhinna wa-a'tadat lahunna muttaka-an waatat kulla wahidatin min'hunna sikkinan waqalati ukh'ruj alayhinna falamma ra-aynahu akbarnahu waqatta'na aydiyahunna waqul'na hasha lillahi ma hadha basharan in hadha illa malakun karimun
qalat fadhalikunna alladhi lum'tunnani fihi walaqad rawadttuhu an nafsihi fa-is'ta'sama wala-in lam yaf 'al ma amuruhu layus'jananna walayakunan mina as-saghirina
qala rabbi as-sij'nu ahabbu ilayya mimma yad'unani ilayhi wa-illa tasrif anni kaydahunna asbu ilayhinna wa-akun mina al-jahilina
fa-is'tajaba lahu rabbuhu fasarafa anhu kaydahunna innahu huwa as-sami'u al-'alimu
thumma bada lahum min ba'di ma ra-awu al-ayati layasjununnahu hatta hinin

wadakhala ma'ahu as-sij'na fatayani qala ahaduhuma inni arani a'siru khamran waqala al-akharu inni arani ahmilu fawqa rasi khub'zan takulu at-tayru min'hu nabbi'na bitawilihi inna naraka mina al-muh'sinina
qala la yatikuma ta'amun tur'zaqanihi illa nabbatukuma bitawilihi qabla an yatiyakuma dhalikuma mimma allamani rabbi inni taraktu millata qawmin la yu'minuna bil-lahi wahum bil-akhirati hum kafiruna
wa-ittaba'tu millata abai ib'rahima wa-is'haqa waya'quba ma kana lana an nush'rika bil-lahi min shayin dhalika min fadli al-lahi alayna wa'ala an-nasi walakinna akthara an-nasi la yashkuruna
yasahibayi as-sij'ni a-arbabun mutafarriquna khayrun ami al-lahu al-wahidu al-qaharu

ma ta'buduna min dunihi illa asmaan sammaytumuha antum waabaukum ma anzala al-lahu biha min sul'tanin ini al-huk'mu illa lillahi amara alla ta'budu illa iyyahu dhalika ad-dinu al-qayimu walakinna akthara an-nasi la ya'lamuna
yasahibayi as-sij'ni amma ahadukuma fayasqi rabbahu khamran wa-amma al-akharu fayus'labu fatakulu at-tayru min rasihi qudiya al-amru alladhi fihi tastaftiyani
waqala lilladhi zanna annahu najin min'huma udh'kur'ni inda rabbika fa-ansahu as-shaytanu dhik'ra rabbihi falabitha fi as-sij'ni bid'a sinina
waqala al-maliku inni ara sab'a baqaratin simanin yakuluhunna sab'un ijafun wasab'a sunbulatin khud'rin wa-ukhara yabisatin yaayyuha al-mala-u aftuni fi ru'yaya in kuntum lilrru'ya ta'buruna
qalu adghathu ahlamin wama nahnu bitawili al-ahlami bi'alimina
waqala alladhi naja min'huma wa-iddakara ba'da ummatin ana unabbi-ukum bitawilihi fa-arsiluni
yusufu ayyuha as-sidiqu aftina fi sab'i baqaratin simanin yakuluhunna sab'un ijafun wasab'i sunbulatin khud'rin wa-ukhara yabisatin la'alli arji'u ila an-nasi la'allahum ya'lamuna
qala tazra'una sab'a sinina da-aban fama hasadttum fadharuhu fi sunbulihi illa qalilan mimma takuluna
thumma yati min ba'di dhalika sab'un shidadun yakul'na ma qaddamtum lahunna illa qalilan mimma tuh'sinuna
thumma yati min ba'di dhalika amun fihi yughathu an-nasu wafihi ya'siruna
