waqala al-maliku i'tuni bihi falamma jaahu ar-rasulu qala ir'ji' ila rabbika fasalhu ma balu an-nis'wati allati qatta'na aydiyahunna inna rabbi bikaydihinna alimun

qala ma khatbukunna idh rawadttunna yusufa an nafsihi qul'na hasha lillahi ma alim'na alayhi min suin qalati im'ra-atu al-'azizi al-ana hashasa al-haqu ana rawadttuhu an nafsihi wa-innahu lamina as-sadiqina
dhalika liya'lama anni lam akhun'hu bil-ghaybi wa-anna al-laha la yahdi kayda al-khainina
wama ubarri-u nafsi inna an-nafsa la-ammaratun bil-sui illa ma rahima rabbi inna rabbi ghafurun rahimun
waqala al-maliku i'tuni bihi astakhlis'hu linafsi falamma kallamahu qala innaka al-yawma ladayna makinun aminun
qala ij'alni ala khazaini al-ardi inni hafizun alimun
wakadhalika makkanna liyusufa fi al-ardi yatabawwa-u min'ha haythu yashau nusibu birahmatina man nashau wala nudi'u ajra al-muh'sinina
wala-ajru al-akhirati khayrun lilladhina amanu wakanu yattaquna
wajaa ikh'watu yusufa fadakhalu alayhi fa'arafahum wahum lahu munkiruna
walamma jahhazahum bijahazihim qala i'tuni bi-akhin lakum min abikum ala tarawna anni ufi al-kayla wa-ana khayru al-munzilina
fa-in lam tatuni bihi fala kayla lakum indi wala taqrabuni
qalu sanurawidu anhu abahu wa-inna lafa'iluna
waqala lifit'yanihi ij'alu bida'atahum fi rihalihim la'allahum ya'rifunaha idha inqalabu ila ahlihim la'allahum yarji'una
falamma raja'u ila abihim qalu yaabana muni'a minna al-kaylu fa-arsil ma'ana akhana naktal wa-inna lahu lahafizuna
qala hal amanukum alayhi illa kama amintukum ala akhihi min qablu fal-lahu khayrun hafizan wahuwa arhamu ar-rahimina
walamma fatahu mata'ahum wajadu bida'atahum ruddat ilayhim qalu yaabana ma nabghi hadhihi bida'atuna ruddat ilayna wanamiru ahlana wanahfazu akhana wanazdadu kayla ba'irin dhalika kaylun yasirun
qala lan ur'silahu ma'akum hatta tu'tuni mawthiqan mina al-lahi latatunnani bihi illa an yuhata bikum falamma atawhu mawthiqahum qala al-lahu ala ma naqulu wakilun

waqala yabaniyya la tadkhulu min babin wahidin wa-ud'khulu min abwabin mutafarriqatin wama ugh'ni ankum mina al-lahi min shayin ini al-huk'mu illa lillahi alayhi tawakkaltu wa'alayhi falyatawakkali al-mutawakiluna

walamma dakhalu min haythu amarahum abuhum ma kana yugh'ni anhum mina al-lahi min shayin illa hajatan fi nafsi ya'quba qadaha wa-innahu ladhu il'min lima allamnahu walakinna akthara an-nasi la ya'lamuna
walamma dakhalu ala yusufa awa ilayhi akhahu qala inni ana akhuka fala tabta-is bima kanu ya'maluna
falamma jahhazahum bijahazihim ja'ala as-siqayata fi rahli akhihi thumma adhana mu-adhinun ayyatuha al-'iru innakum lasariquna
qalu wa-aqbalu alayhim madha tafqiduna
qalu nafqidu suwa'a al-maliki waliman jaa bihi him'lu ba'irin wa-ana bihi za'imun
qalu tal-lahi laqad alim'tum ma ji'na linuf'sida fi al-ardi wama kunna sariqina
qalu fama jazauhu in kuntum kadhibina
qalu jazauhu man wujida fi rahlihi fahuwa jazauhu kadhalika najzi az-zalimina

fabada-a bi-aw'iyatihim qabla wi'ai akhihi thumma is'takhrajaha min wi'ai akhihi kadhalika kid'na liyusufa ma kana liyakhudha akhahu fi dini al-maliki illa an yashaa al-lahu narfa'u darajatin man nashau wafawqa kulli dhi il'min alimun
qalu in yasriq faqad saraqa akhun lahu min qablu fa-asarraha yusufu fi nafsihi walam yub'diha lahum qala antum sharrun makanan wal-lahu a'lamu bima tasifuna
qalu yaayyuha al-'azizu inna lahu aban shaykhan kabiran fakhudh ahadana makanahu inna naraka mina al-muh'sinina
qala ma'adha al-lahi an nakhudha illa man wajadna mata'ana indahu inna idhan lazalimuna

falamma is'tayasu min'hu khalasu najiyyan qala kabiruhum alam ta'lamu anna abakum qad akhadha alaykum mawthiqan mina al-lahi wamin qablu ma farrattum fi yusufa falan abraha al-arda hatta yadhana li abi aw yahkuma al-lahu li wahuwa khayru al-hakimina
ir'ji'u ila abikum faqulu yaabana inna ib'naka saraqa wama shahid'na illa bima alim'na wama kunna lil'ghaybi hafizina
wasali al-qaryata allati kunna fiha wal-'ira allati aqbalna fiha wa-inna lasadiquna
qala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran fasabrun jamilun asa al-lahu an yatiyani bihim jami'an innahu huwa al-'alimu al-hakimu
watawalla anhum waqala yaasafa ala yusufa wa-ib'yaddat aynahu mina al-huz'ni fahuwa kazimun
qalu tal-lahi tafta-u tadhkuru yusufa hatta takuna haradan aw takuna mina al-halikina
qala innama ashku bathi wahuz'ni ila al-lahi wa-a'lamu mina al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna
yabaniyya idh'habu fatahassasu min yusufa wa-akhihi wala tay'asu min rawhi al-lahi innahu la yay'asu min rawhi al-lahi illa al-qawmu al-kafiruna
falamma dakhalu alayhi qalu yaayyuha al-'azizu massana wa-ahlana ad-duru waji'na bibida'atin muz'jatin fa-awfi lana al-kayla watasaddaq alayna inna al-laha yajzi al-mutasadiqina
qala hal alim'tum ma fa'altum biyusufa wa-akhihi idh antum jahiluna
qalu a-innaka la-anta yusufu qala ana yusufu wahadha akhi qad manna al-lahu alayna innahu man yattaqi wayasbir fa-inna al-laha la yudi'u ajra al-muh'sinina
qalu tal-lahi laqad atharaka al-lahu alayna wa-in kunna lakhatiina
qala la tathriba alaykumu al-yawma yaghfiru al-lahu lakum wahuwa arhamu ar-rahimina
idh'habu biqamisi hadha fa-alquhu ala wajhi abi yati basiran watuni bi-ahlikum ajma'ina
walamma fasalati al-'iru qala abuhum inni la-ajidu riha yusufa lawla an tufanniduni
qalu tal-lahi innaka lafi dalalika al-qadimi
falamma an jaa al-bashiru alqahu ala wajhihi fa-ir'tadda basiran qala alam aqul lakum inni a'lamu mina al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna
qalu yaabana is'taghfir lana dhunubana inna kunna khatiina
qala sawfa astaghfiru lakum rabbi innahu huwa al-ghafuru ar-rahimu
falamma dakhalu ala yusufa awa ilayhi abawayhi waqala ud'khulu mis'ra in shaa al-lahu aminina

warafa'a abawayhi ala al-'arshi wakharru lahu sujjadan waqala yaabati hadha tawilu ru'yaya min qablu qad ja'alaha rabbi haqqan waqad ahsana bi idh akhrajani mina as-sij'ni wajaa bikum mina al-badwi min ba'di an nazagha as-shaytanu bayni wabayna ikh'wati inna rabbi latifun lima yashau innahu huwa al-'alimu al-hakimu
rabbi qad ataytani mina al-mul'ki wa'allamtani min tawili al-ahadithi fatira as-samawati wal-ardi anta waliyyi fi ad-dun'ya wal-akhirati tawaffani mus'liman wa-alhiq'ni bil-salihina
dhalika min anbai al-ghaybi nuhihi ilayka wama kunta ladayhim idh ajma'u amrahum wahum yamkuruna
wama aktharu an-nasi walaw harasta bimu'minina
wama tasaluhum alayhi min ajrin in huwa illa dhik'run lil'alamina
waka-ayyin min ayatin fi as-samawati wal-ardi yamurruna alayha wahum anha mu'riduna
wama yu'minu aktharuhum bil-lahi illa wahum mush'rikuna
afa-aminu an tatiyahum ghashiyatun min adhabi al-lahi aw tatiyahumu as-sa'atu baghtatan wahum la yash'uruna
qul hadhihi sabili ad'u ila al-lahi ala basiratin ana wamani ittaba'ani wasub'hana al-lahi wama ana mina al-mush'rikina

wama arsalna min qablika illa rijalan nuhi ilayhim min ahli al-qura afalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablihim waladaru al-akhirati khayrun lilladhina ittaqaw afala ta'qiluna
hatta idha is'tayasa ar-rusulu wazannu annahum qad kudhibu jaahum nasruna fanujjiya man nashau wala yuraddu basuna ani al-qawmi al-muj'rimina
laqad kana fi qasasihim ib'ratun li-uli al-albabi ma kana hadithan yuf'tara walakin tasdiqa alladhi bayna yadayhi watafsila kulli shayin wahudan warahmatan liqawmin yu'minuna
alif-lam-meem-ra til'ka ayatu al-kitabi wa-alladhi unzila ilayka min rabbika al-haqu walakinna akthara an-nasi la yu'minuna

al-lahu alladhi rafa'a as-samawati bighayri amadin tarawnaha thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi wasakhara as-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri li-ajalin musamman yudabbiru al-amra yufassilu al-ayati la'allakum biliqai rabbikum tuqinuna
wahuwa alladhi madda al-arda waja'ala fiha rawasiya wa-anharan wamin kulli at-thamarati ja'ala fiha zawjayni ith'nayni yugh'shi al-layla an-nahara inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yatafakkaruna

wafi al-ardi qita'un mutajawiratun wajannatun min a'nabin wazar'un wanakhilun sin'wanun waghayru sin'wanin yus'qa bimain wahidin wanufaddilu ba'daha ala ba'din fi al-ukuli inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin ya'qiluna
wa-in ta'jab fa'ajabun qawluhum a-idha kunna turaban a-inna lafi khalqin jadidin ulaika alladhina kafaru birabbihim wa-ulaika al-aghlalu fi a'naqihim wa-ulaika ashabu an-nari hum fiha khaliduna
wayasta'jilunaka bil-sayi-ati qabla al-hasanati waqad khalat min qablihimu al-mathulatu wa-inna rabbaka ladhu maghfiratin lilnnasi ala zul'mihim wa-inna rabbaka lashadidu al-'iqabi
wayaqulu alladhina kafaru lawla unzila alayhi ayatun min rabbihi innama anta mundhirun walikulli qawmin hadin
al-lahu ya'lamu ma tahmilu kullu untha wama taghidu al-arhamu wama tazdadu wakullu shayin indahu bimiq'darin
alimu al-ghaybi was-shahadati al-kabiru al-muta'ali
sawaon minkum man asarra al-qawla waman jahara bihi waman huwa mus'takhfin bi-al-layli wasaribun bil-nahari

lahu mu'aqqibatun min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi yahfazunahu min amri al-lahi inna al-laha la yughayyiru ma biqawmin hatta yughayyiru ma bi-anfusihim wa-idha arada al-lahu biqawmin suan fala maradda lahu wama lahum min dunihi min walin
huwa alladhi yurikumu al-barqa khawfan watama'an wayunshi-u as-sahaba at-thiqala
wayusabbihu ar-ra'du bihamdihi wal-malaikatu min khifatihi wayur'silu as-sawa'iqa fayusibu biha man yashau wahum yujadiluna fi al-lahi wahuwa shadidu al-mihali
lahu da'watu al-haqi wa-alladhina yad'una min dunihi la yastajibuna lahum bishayin illa kabasiti kaffayhi ila al-mai liyablugha fahu wama huwa bibalighihi wama du'au al-kafirina illa fi dalalin
walillahi yasjudu man fi as-samawati wal-ardi taw'an wakarhan wazilaluhum bil-ghuduwi wal-asali

qul man rabbu as-samawati wal-ardi quli al-lahu qul afa-ittakhadhtum min dunihi awliyaa la yamlikuna li-anfusihim naf 'an wala darran qul hal yastawi al-a'ma wal-basiru am hal tastawi az-zulumatu wan-nuru am ja'alu lillahi shurakaa khalaqu kakhalqihi fatashabaha al-khalqu alayhim quli al-lahu khaliqu kulli shayin wahuwa al-wahidu al-qaharu

anzala mina as-samai maan fasalat awdiyatun biqadariha fa-ih'tamala as-saylu zabadan rabiyan wamimma yuqiduna alayhi fi an-nari ib'tighaa hil'yatin aw mata'in zabadun mith'luhu kadhalika yadribu al-lahu al-haqa wal-batila fa-amma az-zabadu fayadhhabu jufaan wa-amma ma yanfa'u an-nasa fayamkuthu fi al-ardi kadhalika yadribu al-lahu al-amthala

lilladhina is'tajabu lirabbihimu al-hus'na wa-alladhina lam yastajibu lahu law anna lahum ma fi al-ardi jami'an wamith'lahu ma'ahu la-if'tadaw bihi ulaika lahum suu al-hisabi wamawahum jahannamu wabi'sa al-mihadu
afaman ya'lamu annama unzila ilayka min rabbika al-haqu kaman huwa a'ma innama yatadhakkaru ulu al-albabi
alladhina yufuna bi'ahdi al-lahi wala yanquduna al-mithaqa
wa-alladhina yasiluna ma amara al-lahu bihi an yusala wayakhshawna rabbahum wayakhafuna sua al-hisabi
wa-alladhina sabaru ib'tighaa wajhi rabbihim wa-aqamu as-salata wa-anfaqu mimma razaqnahum sirran wa'alaniyatan wayadrauna bil-hasanati as-sayi-ata ulaika lahum uq'ba ad-dari
jannatu adnin yadkhulunaha waman salaha min abaihim wa-azwajihim wadhurriyyatihim wal-malaikatu yadkhuluna alayhim min kulli babin
salamun alaykum bima sabartum fani'ma uq'ba ad-dari
wa-alladhina yanquduna ahda al-lahi min ba'di mithaqihi wayaqta'una ma amara al-lahu bihi an yusala wayuf'siduna fi al-ardi ulaika lahumu al-la'natu walahum suu ad-dari
al-lahu yabsutu ar-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru wafarihu bil-hayati ad-dun'ya wama al-hayatu ad-dun'ya fi al-akhirati illa mata'un
wayaqulu alladhina kafaru lawla unzila alayhi ayatun min rabbihi qul inna al-laha yudillu man yashau wayahdi ilayhi man anaba
alladhina amanu watatma-innu qulubuhum bidhik'ri al-lahi ala bidhik'ri al-lahi tatma-innu al-qulubu
alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati tuba lahum wahus'nu maabin
kadhalika arsalnaka fi ummatin qad khalat min qabliha umamun litatluwa alayhimu alladhi awhayna ilayka wahum yakfuruna bil-rahmani qul huwa rabbi la ilaha illa huwa alayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi matabi

walaw anna qur'anan suyyirat bihi al-jibalu aw qutti'at bihi al-ardu aw kullima bihi al-mawta bal lillahi al-amru jami'an afalam yay'asi alladhina amanu an law yashau al-lahu lahada an-nasa jami'an wala yazalu alladhina kafaru tusibuhum bima sana'u qari'atun aw tahullu qariban min darihim hatta yatiya wa'du al-lahi inna al-laha la yukh'lifu al-mi'ada
walaqadi us'tuh'zi-a birusulin min qablika fa-amlaytu lilladhina kafaru thumma akhadhtuhum fakayfa kana iqabi

afaman huwa qaimun ala kulli nafsin bima kasabat waja'alu lillahi shurakaa qul sammuhum am tunabbiunahu bima la ya'lamu fi al-ardi am bizahirin mina al-qawli bal zuyyina lilladhina kafaru makruhum wasuddu ani as-sabili waman yud'lili al-lahu fama lahu min hadin
lahum adhabun fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya wala'adhabu al-akhirati ashaqqu wama lahum mina al-lahi min waqin
mathalu al-janati allati wu'ida al-mutaquna tajri min tahtiha al-anharu ukuluha daimun wazilluha til'ka uq'ba alladhina ittaqaw wa'uq'ba al-kafirina an-naru
wa-alladhina ataynahumu al-kitaba yafrahuna bima unzila ilayka wamina al-ahzabi man yunkiru ba'dahu qul innama umir'tu an a'buda al-laha wala ush'rika bihi ilayhi ad'u wa-ilayhi maabi
wakadhalika anzalnahu huk'man arabiyyan wala-ini ittaba'ta ahwaahum ba'dama jaaka mina al-'il'mi ma laka mina al-lahi min waliyyin wala waqin
walaqad arsalna rusulan min qablika waja'alna lahum azwajan wadhurriyyatan wama kana lirasulin an yatiya biayatin illa bi-idh'ni al-lahi likulli ajalin kitabun
yamhu al-lahu ma yashau wayuth'bitu wa'indahu ummu al-kitabi
wa-in ma nuriyannaka ba'da alladhi na'iduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-innama alayka al-balaghu wa'alayna al-hisabu
awalam yaraw anna nati al-arda nanqusuha min atrafiha wal-lahu yahkumu la mu'aqqiba lihuk'mihi wahuwa sari'u al-hisabi
waqad makara alladhina min qablihim falillahi al-makru jami'an ya'lamu ma taksibu kullu nafsin wasaya'lamu al-kufaru liman uq'ba ad-dari
wayaqulu alladhina kafaru lasta mur'salan qul kafa bil-lahi shahidan bayni wabaynakum waman indahu il'mu al-kitabi
alif-lam-ra kitabun anzalnahu ilayka litukh'rija an-nasa mina az-zulumati ila an-nuri bi-idh'ni rabbihim ila sirati al-'azizi al-hamidi
al-lahi alladhi lahu ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi wawaylun lil'kafirina min adhabin shadidin
alladhina yastahibbuna al-hayata ad-dun'ya ala al-akhirati wayasudduna an sabili al-lahi wayabghunaha iwajan ulaika fi dalalin ba'idin
wama arsalna min rasulin illa bilisani qawmihi liyubayyina lahum fayudillu al-lahu man yashau wayahdi man yashau wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
walaqad arsalna musa biayatina an akhrij qawmaka mina az-zulumati ila an-nuri wadhakkir'hum bi-ayyami al-lahi inna fi dhalika laayatin likulli sabbarin shakurin

wa-idh qala musa liqawmihi udh'kuru ni'mata al-lahi alaykum idh anjakum min ali fir'awna yasumunakum sua al-'adhabi wayudhabbihuna abnaakum wayastahyuna nisaakum wafi dhalikum balaon min rabbikum azimun
wa-idh ta-adhana rabbukum la-in shakartum la-azidannakum wala-in kafartum inna adhabi lashadidun
waqala musa in takfuru antum waman fi al-ardi jami'an fa-inna al-laha laghaniyyun hamidun

alam yatikum naba-u alladhina min qablikum qawmi nuhin wa'adin wathamuda wa-alladhina min ba'dihim la ya'lamuhum illa al-lahu jaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati faraddu aydiyahum fi afwahihim waqalu inna kafarna bima ur'sil'tum bihi wa-inna lafi shakkin mimma tad'unana ilayhi muribin

qalat rusuluhum afi al-lahi shakkun fatiri as-samawati wal-ardi yad'ukum liyaghfira lakum min dhunubikum wayu-akhirakum ila ajalin musamman qalu in antum illa basharun mith'luna turiduna an tasudduna amma kana ya'budu abauna fatuna bisul'tanin mubinin

qalat lahum rusuluhum in nahnu illa basharun mith'lukum walakinna al-laha yamunnu ala man yashau min ibadihi wama kana lana an natiyakum bisul'tanin illa bi-idh'ni al-lahi wa'ala al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minuna
wama lana alla natawakkala ala al-lahi waqad hadana subulana walanasbiranna ala ma adhaytumuna wa'ala al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mutawakiluna
waqala alladhina kafaru lirusulihim lanukh'rijannakum min ardina aw lata'udunna fi millatina fa-awha ilayhim rabbuhum lanuh'likanna az-zalimina
walanus'kinannakumu al-arda min ba'dihim dhalika liman khafa maqami wakhafa wa'idi
wa-is'taftahu wakhaba kullu jabbarin anidin
min waraihi jahannamu wayus'qa min main sadidin
yatajarra'uhu wala yakadu yusighuhu wayatihi al-mawtu min kulli makanin wama huwa bimayyitin wamin waraihi adhabun ghalizun
mathalu alladhina kafaru birabbihim a'maluhum karamadin ish'taddat bihi ar-rihu fi yawmin asifin la yaqdiruna mimma kasabu ala shayin dhalika huwa ad-dalalu al-ba'idu
alam tara anna al-laha khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadidin
wama dhalika ala al-lahi bi'azizin

wabarazu lillahi jami'an faqala ad-du'afau lilladhina is'takbaru inna kunna lakum taba'an fahal antum mugh'nuna anna min adhabi al-lahi min shayin qalu law hadana al-lahu lahadaynakum sawaon alayna ajazi'na am sabarna ma lana min mahisin

waqala as-shaytanu lamma qudiya al-amru inna al-laha wa'adakum wa'da al-haqi wawa'adttukum fa-akhlaftukum wama kana liya alaykum min sul'tanin illa an da'awtukum fa-is'tajabtum li fala talumuni walumu anfusakum ma ana bimus'rikhikum wama antum bimus'rikhiyya inni kafartu bima ashraktumuni min qablu inna az-zalimina lahum adhabun alimun
wa-ud'khila alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha bi-idh'ni rabbihim tahiyyatuhum fiha salamun
alam tara kayfa daraba al-lahu mathalan kalimatan tayyibatan kashajaratin tayyibatin asluha thabitun wafar'uha fi as-samai
tu'ti ukulaha kulla hinin bi-idh'ni rabbiha wayadribu al-lahu al-amthala lilnnasi la'allahum yatadhakkaruna
wamathalu kalimatin khabithatin kashajaratin khabithatin uj'tuthat min fawqi al-ardi ma laha min qararin
yuthabbitu al-lahu alladhina amanu bil-qawli at-thabiti fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya wafi al-akhirati wayudillu al-lahu az-zalimina wayaf 'alu al-lahu ma yashau
alam tara ila alladhina baddalu ni'mata al-lahi kuf'ran wa-ahallu qawmahum dara al-bawari
jahannama yaslawnaha wabi'sa al-qararu
waja'alu lillahi andadan liyudillu an sabilihi qul tamatta'u fa-inna masirakum ila an-nari
qul li'ibadiya alladhina amanu yuqimu as-salata wayunfiqu mimma razaqnahum sirran wa'alaniyatan min qabli an yatiya yawmun la bay'un fihi wala khilalun

al-lahu alladhi khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda wa-anzala mina as-samai maan fa-akhraja bihi mina at-thamarati riz'qan lakum wasakhara lakumu al-ful'ka litajriya fi al-bahri bi-amrihi wasakhara lakumu al-anhara
wasakhara lakumu as-shamsa wal-qamara daibayni wasakhara lakumu al-layla wan-nahara
waatakum min kulli ma sa-altumuhu wa-in ta'uddu ni'mata al-lahi la tuh'suha inna al-insana lazalumun kaffarun
wa-idh qala ib'rahimu rabbi ij'al hadha al-balada aminan wa-uj'nub'ni wabaniyya an na'buda al-asnama
rabbi innahunna adlalna kathiran mina an-nasi faman tabi'ani fa-innahu minni waman asani fa-innaka ghafurun rahimun

rabbana inni askantu min dhurriyyati biwadin ghayri dhi zar'in inda baytika al-muharami rabbana liyuqimu as-salata fa-ij'al afidatan mina an-nasi tahwi ilayhim wa-ur'zuq'hum mina at-thamarati la'allahum yashkuruna
rabbana innaka ta'lamu ma nukh'fi wama nu'linu wama yakhfa ala al-lahi min shayin fi al-ardi wala fi as-samai
al-hamdu lillahi alladhi wahaba li ala al-kibari is'ma'ila wa-is'haqa inna rabbi lasami'u ad-du'ai
rabbi ij'alni muqima as-salati wamin dhurriyyati rabbana wataqabbal du'ai
rabbana igh'fir li waliwalidayya walil'mu'minina yawma yaqumu al-hisabu
wala tahsabanna al-laha ghafilan amma ya'malu az-zalimuna innama yu-akhiruhum liyawmin tashkhasu fihi al-absaru
muh'ti'ina muq'ni'i ruusihim la yartaddu ilayhim tarfuhum wa-afidatuhum hawaon
wa-andhiri an-nasa yawma yatihimu al-'adhabu fayaqulu alladhina zalamu rabbana akhir'na ila ajalin qaribin nujib da'wataka wanattabi'i ar-rusula awalam takunu aqsamtum min qablu ma lakum min zawalin
wasakantum fi masakini alladhina zalamu anfusahum watabayyana lakum kayfa fa'alna bihim wadarabna lakumu al-amthala
waqad makaru makrahum wa'inda al-lahi makruhum wa-in kana makruhum litazula min'hu al-jibalu
fala tahsabanna al-laha mukh'lifa wa'dihi rusulahu inna al-laha azizun dhu intiqamin
yawma tubaddalu al-ardu ghayra al-ardi was-samawatu wabarazu lillahi al-wahidi al-qahari
watara al-muj'rimina yawma-idhin muqarranina fi al-asfadi
sarabiluhum min qatiranin wataghsha wujuhahumu an-naru
liyajziya al-lahu kulla nafsin ma kasabat inna al-laha sari'u al-hisabi
hadha balaghun lilnnasi waliyundharu bihi waliya'lamu annama huwa ilahun wahidun waliyadhakkara ulu al-albabi
alif-lam-ra til'ka ayatu al-kitabi waqur'anin mubinin
rubama yawaddu alladhina kafaru law kanu mus'limina
dharhum yakulu wayatamatta'u wayul'hihimu al-amalu fasawfa ya'lamuna
wama ahlakna min qaryatin illa walaha kitabun ma'lumun
ma tasbiqu min ummatin ajalaha wama yastakhiruna
waqalu yaayyuha alladhi nuzzila alayhi ad-dhik'ru innaka lamajnunun
law ma tatina bil-malaikati in kunta mina as-sadiqina
ma nunazzilu al-malaikata illa bil-haqi wama kanu idhan munzarina
inna nahnu nazzalna ad-dhik'ra wa-inna lahu lahafizuna
walaqad arsalna min qablika fi shiya'i al-awalina
wama yatihim min rasulin illa kanu bihi yastahziuna
kadhalika naslukuhu fi qulubi al-muj'rimina
la yu'minuna bihi waqad khalat sunnatu al-awalina
walaw fatahna alayhim baban mina as-samai fazallu fihi ya'rujuna
laqalu innama sukkirat absaruna bal nahnu qawmun mashuruna
walaqad ja'alna fi as-samai burujan wazayyannaha lilnnazirina
wahafiz'naha min kulli shaytanin rajimin
illa mani is'taraqa as-sam'a fa-atba'ahu shihabun mubinun
wal-arda madadnaha wa-alqayna fiha rawasiya wa-anbatna fiha min kulli shayin mawzunin
waja'alna lakum fiha ma'ayisha waman lastum lahu biraziqina
wa-in min shayin illa indana khazainuhu wama nunazziluhu illa biqadarin ma'lumin
wa-arsalna ar-riyaha lawaqiha fa-anzalna mina as-samai maan fa-asqaynakumuhu wama antum lahu bikhazinina
wa-inna lanahnu nuh'yi wanumitu wanahnu al-warithuna
walaqad alim'na al-mus'taqdimina minkum walaqad alim'na al-mus'takhirina
wa-inna rabbaka huwa yahshuruhum innahu hakimun alimun
walaqad khalaqna al-insana min salsalin min hama-in masnunin
wal-jana khalaqnahu min qablu min nari as-samumi
wa-idh qala rabbuka lil'malaikati inni khaliqun basharan min salsalin min hama-in masnunin
fa-idha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fihi min ruhi faqa'u lahu sajidina
fasajada al-malaikatu kulluhum ajma'una
illa ib'lisa aba an yakuna ma'a as-sajidina
qala yaib'lisu ma laka alla takuna ma'a as-sajidina
qala lam akun li-asjuda libasharin khalaqtahu min salsalin min hama-in masnunin
qala fa-ukh'ruj min'ha fa-innaka rajimun
wa-inna alayka al-la'nata ila yawmi ad-dini
qala rabbi fa-anzir'ni ila yawmi yub'athuna
qala fa-innaka mina al-munzarina
ila yawmi al-waqti al-ma'lumi
qala rabbi bima aghwaytani la-uzayyinanna lahum fi al-ardi wala-ugh'wiyannahum ajma'ina
illa ibadaka min'humu al-mukh'lasina
qala hadha siratun alayya mus'taqimun
inna ibadi laysa laka alayhim sul'tanun illa mani ittaba'aka mina al-ghawina
wa-inna jahannama lamaw'iduhum ajma'ina
laha sab'atu abwabin likulli babin min'hum juz'on maqsumun
inna al-mutaqina fi jannatin wa'uyunin
ud'khuluha bisalamin aminina
wanaza'na ma fi sudurihim min ghillin ikh'wanan ala sururin mutaqabilina
la yamassuhum fiha nasabun wama hum min'ha bimukh'rajina
nabbi ibadi anni ana al-ghafuru ar-rahimu
wa-anna adhabi huwa al-'adhabu al-alimu
wanabbi'hum an dayfi ib'rahima
idh dakhalu alayhi faqalu salaman qala inna minkum wajiluna
qalu la tawjal inna nubashiruka bighulamin alimin
qala abashartumuni ala an massaniya al-kibaru fabima tubashiruna
qalu basharnaka bil-haqi fala takun mina al-qanitina
qala waman yaqnatu min rahmati rabbihi illa ad-daluna
qala fama khatbukum ayyuha al-mur'saluna
qalu inna ur'sil'na ila qawmin muj'rimina
illa ala lutin inna lamunajjuhum ajma'ina
illa im'ra-atahu qaddarna innaha lamina al-ghabirina
falamma jaa ala lutin al-mur'saluna
qala innakum qawmun munkaruna
qalu bal ji'naka bima kanu fihi yamtaruna
wa-ataynaka bil-haqi wa-inna lasadiquna
fa-asri bi-ahlika biqit'in mina al-layli wa-ittabi' adbarahum wala yaltafit minkum ahadun wa-im'du haythu tu'maruna
waqadayna ilayhi dhalika al-amra anna dabira haulai maqtu'un mus'bihina
wajaa ahlu al-madinati yastabshiruna
qala inna haulai dayfi fala tafdahuni
wa-ittaqu al-laha wala tukh'zuni
qalu awalam nanhaka ani al-'alamina
qala haulai banati in kuntum fa'ilina
la'amruka innahum lafi sakratihim ya'mahuna
fa-akhadhathumu as-sayhatu mush'riqina
faja'alna aliyaha safilaha wa-amtarna alayhim hijaratan min sijjilin
inna fi dhalika laayatin lil'mutawassimina
wa-innaha labisabilin muqimin
inna fi dhalika laayatan lil'mu'minina
wa-in kana ashabu al-aykati lazalimina
fa-intaqamna min'hum wa-innahuma labi-imamin mubinin
walaqad kadhaba ashabu al-hij'ri al-mur'salina
waataynahum ayatina fakanu anha mu'ridina
wakanu yanhituna mina al-jibali buyutan aminina
fa-akhadhathumu as-sayhatu mus'bihina
fama aghna anhum ma kanu yaksibuna
wama khalaqna as-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma illa bil-haqi wa-inna as-sa'ata laatiyatun fa-is'fahi as-safha al-jamila
inna rabbaka huwa al-khalaqu al-'alimu
walaqad ataynaka sab'an mina al-mathani wal-qur'ana al-'azima
la tamuddanna aynayka ila ma matta'na bihi azwajan min'hum wala tahzan alayhim wa-ikh'fid janahaka lil'mu'minina
waqul inni ana an-nadhiru al-mubinu
kama anzalna ala al-muq'tasimina
alladhina ja'alu al-qur'ana idina
fawarabbika lanasalannahum ajma'ina
amma kanu ya'maluna
fa-is'da' bima tu'maru wa-a'rid ani al-mush'rikina
inna kafaynaka al-mus'tahziina
alladhina yaj'aluna ma'a al-lahi ilahan akhara fasawfa ya'lamuna
walaqad na'lamu annaka yadiqu sadruka bima yaquluna
fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wakun mina as-sajidina
wa-u'bud rabbaka hatta yatiyaka al-yaqinu
ata amru al-lahi fala tasta'jiluhu sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yush'rikuna
yunazzilu al-malaikata bil-ruhi min amrihi ala man yashau min ibadihi an andhiru annahu la ilaha illa ana fa-ittaquni
khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi ta'ala amma yush'rikuna
khalaqa al-insana min nut'fatin fa-idha huwa khasimun mubinun
wal-an'ama khalaqaha lakum fiha dif'on wamanafi'u wamin'ha takuluna
walakum fiha jamalun hina turihuna wahina tasrahuna
watahmilu athqalakum ila baladin lam takunu balighihi illa bishiqqi al-anfusi inna rabbakum laraufun rahimun
wal-khayla wal-bighala wal-hamira litarkabuha wazinatan wayakhluqu ma la ta'lamuna
wa'ala al-lahi qasdu as-sabili wamin'ha jairun walaw shaa lahadakum ajma'ina
huwa alladhi anzala mina as-samai maan lakum min'hu sharabun wamin'hu shajarun fihi tusimuna
yunbitu lakum bihi az-zar'a waz-zaytuna wan-nakhila wal-a'naba wamin kulli at-thamarati inna fi dhalika laayatan liqawmin yatafakkaruna
wasakhara lakumu al-layla wan-nahara was-shamsa wal-qamara wan-nujumu musakharatun bi-amrihi inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin ya'qiluna
wama dhara-a lakum fi al-ardi mukh'talifan alwanuhu inna fi dhalika laayatan liqawmin yadhakkaruna
wahuwa alladhi sakhara al-bahra litakulu min'hu lahman tariyyan watastakhriju min'hu hil'yatan talbasunaha watara al-ful'ka mawakhira fihi walitabtaghu min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuruna
wa-alqa fi al-ardi rawasiya an tamida bikum wa-anharan wasubulan la'allakum tahtaduna
wa'alamatin wabil-najmi hum yahtaduna
afaman yakhluqu kaman la yakhluqu afala tadhakkaruna
wa-in ta'uddu ni'mata al-lahi la tuh'suha inna al-laha laghafurun rahimun
wal-lahu ya'lamu ma tusirruna wama tu'linuna
wa-alladhina yad'una min duni al-lahi la yakhluquna shayan wahum yukh'laquna
amwatun ghayru ahyain wama yash'uruna ayyana yub'athuna
ilahukum ilahun wahidun fa-alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati qulubuhum munkiratun wahum mus'takbiruna
la jarama anna al-laha ya'lamu ma yusirruna wama yu'linuna innahu la yuhibbu al-mus'takbirina
wa-idha qila lahum madha anzala rabbukum qalu asatiru al-awalina
liyahmilu awzarahum kamilatan yawma al-qiyamati wamin awzari alladhina yudillunahum bighayri il'min ala saa ma yaziruna
qad makara alladhina min qablihim fa-ata al-lahu bun'yanahum mina al-qawa'idi fakharra alayhimu as-saqfu min fawqihim wa-atahumu al-'adhabu min haythu la yash'uruna
thumma yawma al-qiyamati yukh'zihim wayaqulu ayna shurakaiya alladhina kuntum tushaqquna fihim qala alladhina utu al-'il'ma inna al-khiz'ya al-yawma was-sua ala al-kafirina
alladhina tatawaffahumu al-malaikatu zalimi anfusihim fa-alqawu as-salama ma kunna na'malu min suin bala inna al-laha alimun bima kuntum ta'maluna
fa-ud'khulu abwaba jahannama khalidina fiha falabi'sa mathwa al-mutakabirina
waqila lilladhina ittaqaw madha anzala rabbukum qalu khayran lilladhina ahsanu fi hadhihi ad-dun'ya hasanatun waladaru al-akhirati khayrun walani'ma daru al-mutaqina
jannatu adnin yadkhulunaha tajri min tahtiha al-anharu lahum fiha ma yashauna kadhalika yajzi al-lahu al-mutaqina
alladhina tatawaffahumu al-malaikatu tayyibina yaquluna salamun alaykumu ud'khulu al-janata bima kuntum ta'maluna
hal yanzuruna illa an tatiyahumu al-malaikatu aw yatiya amru rabbika kadhalika fa'ala alladhina min qablihim wama zalamahumu al-lahu walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna
fa-asabahum sayyiatu ma amilu wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna

waqala alladhina ashraku law shaa al-lahu ma abadna min dunihi min shayin nahnu wala abauna wala harramna min dunihi min shayin kadhalika fa'ala alladhina min qablihim fahal ala ar-rusuli illa al-balaghu al-mubinu

walaqad ba'athna fi kulli ummatin rasulan ani u'budu al-laha wa-ij'tanibu at-taghuta famin'hum man hada al-lahu wamin'hum man haqqat alayhi ad-dalalatu fasiru fi al-ardi fa-unzuru kayfa kana aqibatu al-mukadhibina
in tahris ala hudahum fa-inna al-laha la yahdi man yudillu wama lahum min nasirina
wa-aqsamu bil-lahi jahda aymanihim la yab'athu al-lahu man yamutu bala wa'dan alayhi haqqan walakinna akthara an-nasi la ya'lamuna
liyubayyina lahumu alladhi yakhtalifuna fihi waliya'lama alladhina kafaru annahum kanu kadhibina
innama qawluna lishayin idha aradnahu an naqula lahu kun fayakunu
wa-alladhina hajaru fi al-lahi min ba'di ma zulimu lanubawwi-annahum fi ad-dun'ya hasanatan wala-ajru al-akhirati akbaru law kanu ya'lamuna
alladhina sabaru wa'ala rabbihim yatawakkaluna
wama arsalna min qablika illa rijalan nuhi ilayhim fasalu ahla ad-dhik'ri in kuntum la ta'lamuna
bil-bayinati waz-zuburi wa-anzalna ilayka ad-dhik'ra litubayyina lilnnasi ma nuzzila ilayhim wala'allahum yatafakkaruna
afa-amina alladhina makaru as-sayiati an yakhsifa al-lahu bihimu al-arda aw yatiyahumu al-'adhabu min haythu la yash'uruna
aw yakhudhahum fi taqallubihim fama hum bimu'jizina
aw yakhudhahum ala takhawwufin fa-inna rabbakum laraufun rahimun
awalam yaraw ila ma khalaqa al-lahu min shayin yatafayya-u zilaluhu ani al-yamini was-shamaili sujjadan lillahi wahum dakhiruna
walillahi yasjudu ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi min dabbatin wal-malaikatu wahum la yastakbiruna
yakhafuna rabbahum min fawqihim wayaf 'aluna ma yu'maruna
waqala al-lahu la tattakhidhu ilahayni ith'nayni innama huwa ilahun wahidun fa-iyyaya fa-ir'habuni
walahu ma fi as-samawati wal-ardi walahu ad-dinu wasiban afaghayra al-lahi tattaquna
wama bikum min ni'matin famina al-lahi thumma idha massakumu ad-duru fa-ilayhi tajaruna
thumma idha kashafa ad-dura ankum idha fariqun minkum birabbihim yush'rikuna
liyakfuru bima ataynahum fatamatta'u fasawfa ta'lamuna
wayaj'aluna lima la ya'lamuna nasiban mimma razaqnahum tal-lahi latus'alunna amma kuntum taftaruna
wayaj'aluna lillahi al-banati sub'hanahu walahum ma yashtahuna
wa-idha bushira ahaduhum bil-untha zalla wajhuhu mus'waddan wahuwa kazimun
yatawara mina al-qawmi min sui ma bushira bihi ayum'sikuhu ala hunin am yadussuhu fi at-turabi ala saa ma yahkumuna
lilladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati mathalu as-sawi walillahi al-mathalu al-a'la wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
walaw yuakhidhu al-lahu an-nasa bizul'mihim ma taraka alayha min dabbatin walakin yu-akhiruhum ila ajalin musamman fa-idha jaa ajaluhum la yastakhiruna sa'atan wala yastaqdimuna
wayaj'aluna lillahi ma yakrahuna watasifu alsinatuhumu al-kadhiba anna lahumu al-hus'na la jarama anna lahumu an-nara wa-annahum muf'ratuna
tal-lahi laqad arsalna ila umamin min qablika fazayyana lahumu as-shaytanu a'malahum fahuwa waliyyuhumu al-yawma walahum adhabun alimun
wama anzalna alayka al-kitaba illa litubayyina lahumu alladhi ikh'talafu fihi wahudan warahmatan liqawmin yu'minuna
wal-lahu anzala mina as-samai maan fa-ahya bihi al-arda ba'da mawtiha inna fi dhalika laayatan liqawmin yasma'una
wa-inna lakum fi al-an'ami la'ib'ratan nus'qikum mimma fi butunihi min bayni farthin wadamin labanan khalisan saighan lilsharibina
wamin thamarati an-nakhili wal-a'nabi tattakhidhuna min'hu sakaran wariz'qan hasanan inna fi dhalika laayatan liqawmin ya'qiluna
wa-awha rabbuka ila an-nahli ani ittakhidhi mina al-jibali buyutan wamina as-shajari wamimma ya'rishuna
thumma kuli min kulli at-thamarati fa-us'luki subula rabbiki dhululan yakhruju min butuniha sharabun mukh'talifun alwanuhu fihi shifaon lilnnasi inna fi dhalika laayatan liqawmin yatafakkaruna
wal-lahu khalaqakum thumma yatawaffakum waminkum man yuraddu ila ardhali al-'umuri likay la ya'lama ba'da il'min shayan inna al-laha alimun qadirun
wal-lahu faddala ba'dakum ala ba'din fi ar-riz'qi fama alladhina fuddilu biraddi riz'qihim ala ma malakat aymanuhum fahum fihi sawaon afabini'mati al-lahi yajhaduna
wal-lahu ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwajan waja'ala lakum min azwajikum banina wahafadatan warazaqakum mina at-tayibati afabil-batili yu'minuna wabini'mati al-lahi hum yakfuruna
waya'buduna min duni al-lahi ma la yamliku lahum riz'qan mina as-samawati wal-ardi shayan wala yastati'una
fala tadribu lillahi al-amthala inna al-laha ya'lamu wa-antum la ta'lamuna
daraba al-lahu mathalan abdan mamlukan la yaqdiru ala shayin waman razaqnahu minna riz'qan hasanan fahuwa yunfiqu min'hu sirran wajahran hal yastawuna al-hamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna

wadaraba al-lahu mathalan rajulayni ahaduhuma abkamu la yaqdiru ala shayin wahuwa kallun ala mawlahu aynama yuwajjihhu la yati bikhayrin hal yastawi huwa waman yamuru bil-'adli wahuwa ala siratin mus'taqimin
walillahi ghaybu as-samawati wal-ardi wama amru as-sa'ati illa kalamhi al-basari aw huwa aqrabu inna al-laha ala kulli shayin qadirun
wal-lahu akhrajakum min butuni ummahatikum la ta'lamuna shayan waja'ala lakumu as-sam'a wal-absara wal-afidata la'allakum tashkuruna
alam yaraw ila at-tayri musakharatin fi jawwi as-samai ma yum'sikuhunna illa al-lahu inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna

wal-lahu ja'ala lakum min buyutikum sakanan waja'ala lakum min juludi al-an'ami buyutan tastakhiffunaha yawma za'nikum wayawma iqamatikum wamin aswafiha wa-awbariha wa-ash'ariha athathan wamata'an ila hinin

wal-lahu ja'ala lakum mimma khalaqa zilalan waja'ala lakum mina al-jibali aknanan waja'ala lakum sarabila taqikumu al-hara wasarabila taqikum basakum kadhalika yutimmu ni'matahu alaykum la'allakum tus'limuna
fa-in tawallaw fa-innama alayka al-balaghu al-mubinu
ya'rifuna ni'mata al-lahi thumma yunkirunaha wa-aktharuhumu al-kafiruna
wayawma nab'athu min kulli ummatin shahidan thumma la yu'dhanu lilladhina kafaru wala hum yus'ta'tabuna
wa-idha raa alladhina zalamu al-'adhaba fala yukhaffafu anhum wala hum yunzaruna
wa-idha raa alladhina ashraku shurakaahum qalu rabbana haulai shurakauna alladhina kunna nad'u min dunika fa-alqaw ilayhimu al-qawla innakum lakadhibuna
wa-alqaw ila al-lahi yawma-idhin as-salama wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
alladhina kafaru wasaddu an sabili al-lahi zid'nahum adhaban fawqa al-'adhabi bima kanu yuf'siduna
wayawma nab'athu fi kulli ummatin shahidan alayhim min anfusihim waji'na bika shahidan ala haulai wanazzalna alayka al-kitaba tib'yanan likulli shayin wahudan warahmatan wabush'ra lil'mus'limina
inna al-laha yamuru bil-'adli wal-ih'sani waitai dhi al-qur'ba wayanha ani al-fahshai wal-munkari wal-baghyi ya'izukum la'allakum tadhakkaruna
wa-awfu bi'ahdi al-lahi idha ahadttum wala tanqudu al-aymana ba'da tawkidiha waqad ja'altumu al-laha alaykum kafilan inna al-laha ya'lamu ma taf 'aluna

wala takunu ka-allati naqadat ghazlaha min ba'di quwwatin ankathan tattakhidhuna aymanakum dakhalan baynakum an takuna ummatun hiya arba min ummatin innama yablukumu al-lahu bihi walayubayyinanna lakum yawma al-qiyamati ma kuntum fihi takhtalifuna
walaw shaa al-lahu laja'alakum ummatan wahidatan walakin yudillu man yashau wayahdi man yashau walatus'alunna amma kuntum ta'maluna
wala tattakhidhu aymanakum dakhalan baynakum fatazilla qadamun ba'da thubutiha watadhuqu as-sua bima sadadttum an sabili al-lahi walakum adhabun azimun
wala tashtaru bi'ahdi al-lahi thamanan qalilan innama inda al-lahi huwa khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamuna
ma indakum yanfadu wama inda al-lahi baqin walanajziyanna alladhina sabaru ajrahum bi-ahsani ma kanu ya'maluna
man amila salihan min dhakarin aw untha wahuwa mu'minun falanuh'yiyannahu hayatan tayyibatan walanajziyannahum ajrahum bi-ahsani ma kanu ya'maluna
fa-idha qarata al-qur'ana fa-is'ta'idh bil-lahi mina as-shaytani ar-rajimi
innahu laysa lahu sul'tanun ala alladhina amanu wa'ala rabbihim yatawakkaluna
innama sul'tanuhu ala alladhina yatawallawnahu wa-alladhina hum bihi mush'rikuna
wa-idha baddalna ayatan makana ayatin wal-lahu a'lamu bima yunazzilu qalu innama anta muf'tarin bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna
qul nazzalahu ruhu al-qudusi min rabbika bil-haqi liyuthabbita alladhina amanu wahudan wabush'ra lil'mus'limina
walaqad na'lamu annahum yaquluna innama yu'allimuhu basharun lisanu alladhi yul'hiduna ilayhi a'jamiyyun wahadha lisanun arabiyyun mubinun
inna alladhina la yu'minuna biayati al-lahi la yahdihimu al-lahu walahum adhabun alimun
innama yaftari al-kadhiba alladhina la yu'minuna biayati al-lahi wa-ulaika humu al-kadhibuna
man kafara bil-lahi min ba'di imanihi illa man uk'riha waqalbuhu mut'ma-innun bil-imani walakin man sharaha bil-kuf'ri sadran fa'alayhim ghadabun mina al-lahi walahum adhabun azimun
dhalika bi-annahumu is'tahabbu al-hayata ad-dun'ya ala al-akhirati wa-anna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma al-kafirina
ulaika alladhina taba'a al-lahu ala qulubihim wasam'ihim wa-absarihim wa-ulaika humu al-ghafiluna
la jarama annahum fi al-akhirati humu al-khasiruna
thumma inna rabbaka lilladhina hajaru min ba'di ma futinu thumma jahadu wasabaru inna rabbaka min ba'diha laghafurun rahimun
yawma tati kullu nafsin tujadilu an nafsiha watuwaffa kullu nafsin ma amilat wahum la yuz'lamuna

wadaraba al-lahu mathalan qaryatan kanat aminatan mut'ma-innatan yatiha riz'quha raghadan min kulli makanin fakafarat bi-an'umi al-lahi fa-adhaqaha al-lahu libasa al-ju'i wal-khawfi bima kanu yasna'una
walaqad jaahum rasulun min'hum fakadhabuhu fa-akhadhahumu al-'adhabu wahum zalimuna
fakulu mimma razaqakumu al-lahu halalan tayyiban wa-ush'kuru ni'mata al-lahi in kuntum iyyahu ta'buduna
innama harrama alaykumu al-maytata wad-dama walahma al-khinziri wama uhilla lighayri al-lahi bihi famani ud'turra ghayra baghin wala adin fa-inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
wala taqulu lima tasifu alsinatukumu al-kadhiba hadha halalun wahadha haramun litaftaru ala al-lahi al-kadhiba inna alladhina yaftaruna ala al-lahi al-kadhiba la yuf'lihuna
mata'un qalilun walahum adhabun alimun
wa'ala alladhina hadu harramna ma qasasna alayka min qablu wama zalamnahum walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna
thumma inna rabbaka lilladhina amilu as-sua bijahalatin thumma tabu min ba'di dhalika wa-aslahu inna rabbaka min ba'diha laghafurun rahimun
inna ib'rahima kana ummatan qanitan lillahi hanifan walam yaku mina al-mush'rikina
shakiran li-an'umihi ij'tabahu wahadahu ila siratin mus'taqimin
waataynahu fi ad-dun'ya hasanatan wa-innahu fi al-akhirati lamina as-salihina
thumma awhayna ilayka ani ittabi' millata ib'rahima hanifan wama kana mina al-mush'rikina
innama ju'ila as-sabtu ala alladhina ikh'talafu fihi wa-inna rabbaka layahkumu baynahum yawma al-qiyamati fima kanu fihi yakhtalifuna
ud'u ila sabili rabbika bil-hik'mati wal-maw'izati al-hasanati wajadil'hum bi-allati hiya ahsanu inna rabbaka huwa a'lamu biman dalla an sabilihi wahuwa a'lamu bil-muh'tadina
wa-in aqabtum fa'aqibu bimith'li ma uqib'tum bihi wala-in sabartum lahuwa khayrun lilssabirina
wa-is'bir wama sabruka illa bil-lahi wala tahzan alayhim wala taku fi dayqin mimma yamkuruna
inna al-laha ma'a alladhina ittaqaw wa-alladhina hum muh'sinuna
sub'hana alladhi asra bi'abdihi laylan mina al-masjidi al-harami ila al-masjidi al-aqsa alladhi barakna hawlahu linuriyahu min ayatina innahu huwa as-sami'u al-basiru
waatayna musa al-kitaba waja'alnahu hudan libani is'raila alla tattakhidhu min duni wakilan
dhurriyyata man hamalna ma'a nuhin innahu kana abdan shakuran
waqadayna ila bani is'raila fi al-kitabi latuf'sidunna fi al-ardi marratayni walata'lunna uluwwan kabiran
fa-idha jaa wa'du ulahuma ba'athna alaykum ibadan lana uli basin shadidin fajasu khilala ad-diyari wakana wa'dan maf'ulan
thumma radadna lakumu al-karata alayhim wa-amdadnakum bi-amwalin wabanina waja'alnakum akthara nafiran
in ahsantum ahsantum li-anfusikum wa-in asatum falaha fa-idha jaa wa'du al-akhirati liyasuu wujuhakum waliyadkhulu al-masjida kama dakhaluhu awwala marratin waliyutabbiru ma alaw tatbiran
asa rabbukum an yarhamakum wa-in udttum ud'na waja'alna jahannama lil'kafirina hasiran
inna hadha al-qur'ana yahdi lillati hiya aqwamu wayubashiru al-mu'minina alladhina ya'maluna as-salihati anna lahum ajran kabiran
wa-anna alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati a'tadna lahum adhaban aliman
wayad'u al-insanu bil-shari du'aahu bil-khayri wakana al-insanu ajulan

waja'alna al-layla wan-nahara ayatayni famahawna ayata al-layli waja'alna ayata an-nahari mub'siratan litabtaghu fadlan min rabbikum walita'lamu adada as-sinina wal-hisaba wakulla shayin fassalnahu tafsilan
wakulla insanin alzamnahu tairahu fi unuqihi wanukh'riju lahu yawma al-qiyamati kitaban yalqahu manshuran
iq'ra kitabaka kafa binafsika al-yawma alayka hasiban
mani ih'tada fa-innama yahtadi linafsihi waman dalla fa-innama yadillu alayha wala taziru waziratun wiz'ra ukh'ra wama kunna mu'adhibina hatta nab'atha rasulan
wa-idha aradna an nuh'lika qaryatan amarna mut'rafiha fafasaqu fiha fahaqqa alayha al-qawlu fadammarnaha tadmiran
wakam ahlakna mina al-quruni min ba'di nuhin wakafa birabbika bidhunubi ibadihi khabiran basiran
man kana yuridu al-'ajilata ajjalna lahu fiha ma nashau liman nuridu thumma ja'alna lahu jahannama yaslaha madhmuman madhuran
waman arada al-akhirata wasa'a laha sa'yaha wahuwa mu'minun fa-ulaika kana sa'yuhum mashkuran
kullan numiddu haulai wahaulai min atai rabbika wama kana atau rabbika mahzuran
unzur kayfa faddalna ba'dahum ala ba'din walalakhiratu akbaru darajatin wa-akbaru tafdilan
la taj'al ma'a al-lahi ilahan akhara fataq'uda madhmuman makhdhulan
waqada rabbuka alla ta'budu illa iyyahu wabil-walidayni ih'sanan imma yablughanna indaka al-kibara ahaduhuma aw kilahuma fala taqul lahuma uffin wala tanharhuma waqul lahuma qawlan kariman
wa-ikh'fid lahuma janaha ad-dhuli mina ar-rahmati waqul rabbi ir'hamhuma kama rabbayani saghiran
rabbukum a'lamu bima fi nufusikum in takunu salihina fa-innahu kana lil'awwabina ghafuran
waati dha al-qur'ba haqqahu wal-mis'kina wa-ib'na as-sabili wala tubadhir tabdhiran
inna al-mubadhirina kanu ikh'wana as-shayatini wakana as-shaytanu lirabbihi kafuran
wa-imma tu'ridanna anhumu ib'tighaa rahmatin min rabbika tarjuha faqul lahum qawlan maysuran
wala taj'al yadaka maghlulatan ila unuqika wala tabsut'ha kulla al-basti fataq'uda maluman mahsuran
inna rabbaka yabsutu ar-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru innahu kana bi'ibadihi khabiran basiran
wala taqtulu awladakum khashyata im'laqin nahnu narzuquhum wa-iyyakum inna qatlahum kana khit'an kabiran
wala taqrabu az-zina innahu kana fahishatan wasaa sabilan
wala taqtulu an-nafsa allati harrama al-lahu illa bil-haqi waman qutila mazluman faqad ja'alna liwaliyyihi sul'tanan fala yus'rif fi al-qatli innahu kana mansuran
wala taqrabu mala al-yatimi illa bi-allati hiya ahsanu hatta yablugha ashuddahu wa-awfu bil-'ahdi inna al-'ahda kana masulan
wa-awfu al-kayla idha kil'tum wazinu bil-qis'tasi al-mus'taqimi dhalika khayrun wa-ahsanu tawilan
wala taqfu ma laysa laka bihi il'mun inna as-sam'a wal-basara wal-fuada kullu ulaika kana anhu masulan
wala tamshi fi al-ardi marahan innaka lan takhriqa al-arda walan tablugha al-jibala tulan
kullu dhalika kana sayyi-uhu inda rabbika makruhan
dhalika mimma awha ilayka rabbuka mina al-hik'mati wala taj'al ma'a al-lahi ilahan akhara fatul'qa fi jahannama maluman madhuran
afa-asfakum rabbukum bil-banina wa-ittakhadha mina al-malaikati inathan innakum lataquluna qawlan aziman
walaqad sarrafna fi hadha al-qur'ani liyadhakkaru wama yaziduhum illa nufuran
qul law kana ma'ahu alihatun kama yaquluna idhan la-ib'taghaw ila dhi al-'arshi sabilan
sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yaquluna uluwwan kabiran
tusabbihu lahu as-samawatu as-sab'u wal-ardu waman fihinna wa-in min shayin illa yusabbihu bihamdihi walakin la tafqahuna tasbihahum innahu kana haliman ghafuran
wa-idha qarata al-qur'ana ja'alna baynaka wabayna alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati hijaban masturan
waja'alna ala qulubihim akinnatan an yafqahuhu wafi adhanihim waqran wa-idha dhakarta rabbaka fi al-qur'ani wahdahu wallaw ala adbarihim nufuran
nahnu a'lamu bima yastami'una bihi idh yastami'una ilayka wa-idh hum najwa idh yaqulu az-zalimuna in tattabi'una illa rajulan mashuran
unzur kayfa darabu laka al-amthala fadallu fala yastati'una sabilan
waqalu a-idha kunna izaman warufatan a-inna lamab'uthuna khalqan jadidan
qul kunu hijaratan aw hadidan
aw khalqan mimma yakburu fi sudurikum fasayaquluna man yu'iduna quli alladhi fatarakum awwala marratin fasayun'ghiduna ilayka ruusahum wayaquluna mata huwa qul asa an yakuna qariban
yawma yad'ukum fatastajibuna bihamdihi watazunnuna in labith'tum illa qalilan
waqul li'ibadi yaqulu allati hiya ahsanu inna as-shaytana yanzaghu baynahum inna as-shaytana kana lil'insani aduwwan mubinan
rabbukum a'lamu bikum in yasha yarhamkum aw in yasha yu'adhib'kum wama arsalnaka alayhim wakilan
warabbuka a'lamu biman fi as-samawati wal-ardi walaqad faddalna ba'da an-nabiyina ala ba'din waatayna dawuda zaburan
quli id'u alladhina za'amtum min dunihi fala yamlikuna kashfa ad-duri ankum wala tahwilan
ulaika alladhina yad'una yabtaghuna ila rabbihimu al-wasilata ayyuhum aqrabu wayarjuna rahmatahu wayakhafuna adhabahu inna adhaba rabbika kana mahdhuran
wa-in min qaryatin illa nahnu muh'likuha qabla yawmi al-qiyamati aw mu'adhibuha adhaban shadidan kana dhalika fi al-kitabi masturan
wama mana'ana an nur'sila bil-ayati illa an kadhaba biha al-awaluna waatayna thamuda an-naqata mub'siratan fazalamu biha wama nur'silu bil-ayati illa takhwifan

wa-idh qul'na laka inna rabbaka ahata bil-nasi wama ja'alna ar-ru'ya allati araynaka illa fit'natan lilnnasi was-shajarata al-mal'unata fi al-qur'ani wanukhawwifuhum fama yaziduhum illa tugh'yanan kabiran
wa-idh qul'na lil'malaikati us'judu liadama fasajadu illa ib'lisa qala a-asjudu liman khalaqta tinan
qala ara-aytaka hadha alladhi karramta alayya la-in akhartani ila yawmi al-qiyamati la-ahtanikanna dhurriyyatahu illa qalilan
qala idh'hab faman tabi'aka min'hum fa-inna jahannama jazaukum jazaan mawfuran
wa-is'tafziz mani is'tata'ta min'hum bisawtika wa-ajlib alayhim bikhaylika warajilika washarik'hum fi al-amwali wal-awladi wa'id'hum wama ya'iduhumu as-shaytanu illa ghururan
inna ibadi laysa laka alayhim sul'tanun wakafa birabbika wakilan
rabbukumu alladhi yuz'ji lakumu al-ful'ka fi al-bahri litabtaghu min fadlihi innahu kana bikum rahiman
wa-idha massakumu ad-duru fi al-bahri dalla man tad'una illa iyyahu falamma najjakum ila al-bari a'radtum wakana al-insanu kafuran
afa-amintum an yakhsifa bikum janiba al-bari aw yur'sila alaykum hasiban thumma la tajidu lakum wakilan
am amintum an yu'idakum fihi taratan ukh'ra fayur'sila alaykum qasifan mina ar-rihi fayugh'riqakum bima kafartum thumma la tajidu lakum alayna bihi tabi'an
walaqad karramna bani adama wahamalnahum fi al-bari wal-bahri warazaqnahum mina at-tayibati wafaddalnahum ala kathirin mimman khalaqna tafdilan
yawma nad'u kulla unasin bi-imamihim faman utiya kitabahu biyaminihi fa-ulaika yaqrauna kitabahum wala yuz'lamuna fatilan
waman kana fi hadhihi a'ma fahuwa fi al-akhirati a'ma wa-adallu sabilan
wa-in kadu layaftinunaka ani alladhi awhayna ilayka litaftariya alayna ghayrahu wa-idhan la-ittakhadhuka khalilan
walawla an thabbatnaka laqad kidtta tarkanu ilayhim shayan qalilan
idhan la-adhaqnaka di'fa al-hayati wadi'fa al-mamati thumma la tajidu laka alayna nasiran
wa-in kadu layastafizzunaka mina al-ardi liyukh'rijuka min'ha wa-idhan la yalbathuna khilafaka illa qalilan
sunnata man qad arsalna qablaka min rusulina wala tajidu lisunnatina tahwilan
aqimi as-salata liduluki as-shamsi ila ghasaqi al-layli waqur'ana al-fajri inna qur'ana al-fajri kana mashhudan
wamina al-layli fatahajjad bihi nafilatan laka asa an yab'athaka rabbuka maqaman mahmudan
waqul rabbi adkhil'ni mud'khala sid'qin wa-akhrij'ni mukh'raja sid'qin wa-ij'al li min ladunka sul'tanan nasiran
waqul jaa al-haqu wazahaqa al-batilu inna al-batila kana zahuqan
wanunazzilu mina al-qur'ani ma huwa shifaon warahmatun lil'mu'minina wala yazidu az-zalimina illa khasaran
wa-idha an'amna ala al-insani a'rada wanaa bijanibihi wa-idha massahu as-sharu kana yausan
qul kullun ya'malu ala shakilatihi farabbukum a'lamu biman huwa ahda sabilan
wayasalunaka ani ar-ruhi quli ar-ruhu min amri rabbi wama utitum mina al-'il'mi illa qalilan
wala-in shi'na lanadhhabanna bi-alladhi awhayna ilayka thumma la tajidu laka bihi alayna wakilan
illa rahmatan min rabbika inna fadlahu kana alayka kabiran
qul la-ini ij'tama'ati al-insu wal-jinu ala an yatu bimith'li hadha al-qur'ani la yatuna bimith'lihi walaw kana ba'duhum liba'din zahiran
walaqad sarrafna lilnnasi fi hadha al-qur'ani min kulli mathalin fa-aba aktharu an-nasi illa kufuran
waqalu lan nu'mina laka hatta tafjura lana mina al-ardi yanbu'an
aw takuna laka jannatun min nakhilin wa'inabin fatufajjira al-anhara khilalaha tafjiran
aw tus'qita as-samaa kama za'amta alayna kisafan aw tatiya bil-lahi wal-malaikati qabilan
aw yakuna laka baytun min zukh'rufin aw tarqa fi as-samai walan nu'mina liruqiyyika hatta tunazzila alayna kitaban naqra-uhu qul sub'hana rabbi hal kuntu illa basharan rasulan
wama mana'a an-nasa an yu'minu idh jaahumu al-huda illa an qalu aba'atha al-lahu basharan rasulan
qul law kana fi al-ardi malaikatun yamshuna mut'ma-innina lanazzalna alayhim mina as-samai malakan rasulan
qul kafa bil-lahi shahidan bayni wabaynakum innahu kana bi'ibadihi khabiran basiran

waman yahdi al-lahu fahuwa al-muh'tadi waman yud'lil falan tajida lahum awliyaa min dunihi wanahshuruhum yawma al-qiyamati ala wujuhihim um'yan wabuk'man wasumman mawahum jahannamu kullama khabat zid'nahum sa'iran
dhalika jazauhum bi-annahum kafaru biayatina waqalu a-idha kunna izaman warufatan a-inna lamab'uthuna khalqan jadidan
awalam yaraw anna al-laha alladhi khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda qadirun ala an yakhluqa mith'lahum waja'ala lahum ajalan la rayba fihi fa-aba az-zalimuna illa kufuran
qul law antum tamlikuna khazaina rahmati rabbi idhan la-amsaktum khashyata al-infaqi wakana al-insanu qaturan
walaqad atayna musa tis'a ayatin bayyinatin fasal bani is'raila idh jaahum faqala lahu fir'awnu inni la-azunnuka yamusa mashuran
qala laqad alim'ta ma anzala haulai illa rabbu as-samawati wal-ardi basaira wa-inni la-azunnuka yafir'awnu mathburan
fa-arada an yastafizzahum mina al-ardi fa-aghraqnahu waman ma'ahu jami'an
waqul'na min ba'dihi libani is'raila us'kunu al-arda fa-idha jaa wa'du al-akhirati ji'na bikum lafifan
wabil-haqi anzalnahu wabil-haqi nazala wama arsalnaka illa mubashiran wanadhiran
waqur'anan faraqnahu litaqra-ahu ala an-nasi ala muk'thin wanazzalnahu tanzilan
qul aminu bihi aw la tu'minu inna alladhina utu al-'il'ma min qablihi idha yut'la alayhim yakhirruna lil'adhqani sujjadan
wayaquluna sub'hana rabbina in kana wa'du rabbina lamaf'ulan
wayakhirruna lil'adhqani yabkuna wayaziduhum khushu'an
quli id'u al-laha awi id'u ar-rahmana ayyan ma tad'u falahu al-asmau al-hus'na wala tajhar bisalatika wala tukhafit biha wa-ib'taghi bayna dhalika sabilan
waquli al-hamdu lillahi alladhi lam yattakhidh waladan walam yakun lahu sharikun fi al-mul'ki walam yakun lahu waliyyun mina ad-dhuli wakabbir'hu takbiran
al-hamdu lillahi alladhi anzala ala abdihi al-kitaba walam yaj'al lahu iwaja
qayyiman liyundhira basan shadidan min ladun'hu wayubashira al-mu'minina alladhina ya'maluna as-salihati anna lahum ajran hasanan
makithina fihi abadan
wayundhira alladhina qalu ittakhadha al-lahu waladan
ma lahum bihi min il'min wala liabaihim kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwahihim in yaquluna illa kadhiban
fala'allaka bakhi'un nafsaka ala atharihim in lam yu'minu bihadha al-hadithi asafan
inna ja'alna ma ala al-ardi zinatan laha linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu amalan
wa-inna laja'iluna ma alayha sa'idan juruzan
am hasib'ta anna ashaba al-kahfi war-raqimi kanu min ayatina ajaban
idh awa al-fit'yatu ila al-kahfi faqalu rabbana atina min ladunka rahmatan wahayyi lana min amrina rashadan
fadarabna ala adhanihim fi al-kahfi sinina adadan
thumma ba'athnahum lina'lama ayyu al-hiz'bayni ahsa lima labithu amadan
nahnu naqussu alayka naba-ahum bil-haqi innahum fit'yatun amanu birabbihim wazid'nahum hudan
warabatna ala qulubihim idh qamu faqalu rabbuna rabbu as-samawati wal-ardi lan nad'uwa min dunihi ilahan laqad qul'na idhan shatatan
haulai qawmuna ittakhadhu min dunihi alihatan lawla yatuna alayhim bisul'tanin bayyinin faman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban
wa-idhi i'tazaltumuhum wama ya'buduna illa al-laha fawu ila al-kahfi yanshur lakum rabbukum min rahmatihi wayuhayyi lakum min amrikum mir'faqan

watara as-shamsa idha tala'at tazawaru an kahfihim dhata al-yamini wa-idha gharabat taqriduhum dhata as-shimali wahum fi fajwatin min'hu dhalika min ayati al-lahi man yahdi al-lahu fahuwa al-muh'tadi waman yud'lil falan tajida lahu waliyyan mur'shidan

watahsabuhum ayqazan wahum ruqudun wanuqallibuhum dhata al-yamini wadhata as-shimali wakalbuhum basitun dhira'ayhi bil-wasidi lawi ittala'ta alayhim lawallayta min'hum firaran walamuli'ta min'hum ru'ban

wakadhalika ba'athnahum liyatasaalu baynahum qala qailun min'hum kam labith'tum qalu labith'na yawman aw ba'da yawmin qalu rabbukum a'lamu bima labith'tum fa-ib'athu ahadakum biwariqikum hadhihi ila al-madinati falyanzur ayyuha azka ta'aman falyatikum biriz'qin min'hu walyatalattaf wala yush'iranna bikum ahadan
innahum in yazharu alaykum yarjumukum aw yu'idukum fi millatihim walan tuf'lihu idhan abadan

wakadhalika a'tharna alayhim liya'lamu anna wa'da al-lahi haqqun wa-anna as-sa'ata la rayba fiha idh yatanaza'una baynahum amrahum faqalu ib'nu alayhim bun'yanan rabbuhum a'lamu bihim qala alladhina ghalabu ala amrihim lanattakhidhanna alayhim masjidan

sayaquluna thalathatun rabi'uhum kalbuhum wayaquluna khamsatun sadisuhum kalbuhum rajman bil-ghaybi wayaquluna sab'atun wathaminuhum kalbuhum qul rabbi a'lamu bi'iddatihim ma ya'lamuhum illa qalilun fala tumari fihim illa miraan zahiran wala tastafti fihim min'hum ahadan
wala taqulanna lishay'in inni fa'ilun dhalika ghadan
illa an yashaa al-lahu wa-udh'kur rabbaka idha nasita waqul asa an yahdiyani rabbi li-aqraba min hadha rashadan
walabithu fi kahfihim thalatha mi-atin sinina wa-iz'dadu tis'an
quli al-lahu a'lamu bima labithu lahu ghaybu as-samawati wal-ardi absir bihi wa-asmi' ma lahum min dunihi min waliyyin wala yush'riku fi huk'mihi ahadan
wa-ut'lu ma uhiya ilayka min kitabi rabbika la mubaddila likalimatihi walan tajida min dunihi mul'tahadan

wa-is'bir nafsaka ma'a alladhina yad'una rabbahum bil-ghadati wal-'ashiyi yuriduna wajhahu wala ta'du aynaka anhum turidu zinata al-hayati ad-dun'ya wala tuti' man aghfalna qalbahu an dhik'rina wa-ittaba'a hawahu wakana amruhu furutan

waquli al-haqu min rabbikum faman shaa falyu'min waman shaa falyakfur inna a'tadna lilzzalimina naran ahata bihim suradiquha wa-in yastaghithu yughathu bimain kal-muh'li yashwi al-wujuha bi'sa as-sharabu wasaat mur'tafaqan
inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati inna la nudi'u ajra man ahsana amalan

ulaika lahum jannatu adnin tajri min tahtihimu al-anharu yuhallawna fiha min asawira min dhahabin wayalbasuna thiyaban khud'ran min sundusin wa-is'tabraqin muttakiina fiha ala al-araiki ni'ma at-thawabu wahasunat mur'tafaqan
wa-id'rib lahum mathalan rajulayni ja'alna li-ahadihima jannatayni min a'nabin wahafafnahuma binakhlin waja'alna baynahuma zar'an
kil'ta al-janatayni atat ukulaha walam tazlim min'hu shayan wafajjarna khilalahuma naharan
wakana lahu thamarun faqala lisahibihi wahuwa yuhawiruhu ana aktharu minka malan wa-a'azzu nafaran
wadakhala jannatahu wahuwa zalimun linafsihi qala ma azunnu an tabida hadhihi abadan
wama azunnu as-sa'ata qaimatan wala-in rudidttu ila rabbi la-ajidanna khayran min'ha munqalaban
qala lahu sahibuhu wahuwa yuhawiruhu akafarta bi-alladhi khalaqaka min turabin thumma min nut'fatin thumma sawwaka rajulan
lakinna huwa al-lahu rabbi wala ush'riku birabbi ahadan
walawla idh dakhalta jannataka qul'ta ma shaa al-lahu la quwwata illa bil-lahi in tarani ana aqalla minka malan wawaladan
fa'asa rabbi an yu'tiyani khayran min jannatika wayur'sila alayha hus'banan mina as-samai fatus'biha sa'idan zalaqan
aw yus'biha mauha ghawran falan tastati'a lahu talaban
wa-uhita bithamarihi fa-asbaha yuqallibu kaffayhi ala ma anfaqa fiha wahiya khawiyatun ala urushiha wayaqulu yalaytani lam ush'rik birabbi ahadan
walam takun lahu fi-atun yansurunahu min duni al-lahi wama kana muntasiran
hunalika al-walayatu lillahi al-haqi huwa khayrun thawaban wakhayrun uq'ban
wa-id'rib lahum mathala al-hayati ad-dun'ya kamain anzalnahu mina as-samai fa-ikh'talata bihi nabatu al-ardi fa-asbaha hashiman tadhruhu ar-riyahu wakana al-lahu ala kulli shayin muq'tadiran
al-malu wal-banuna zinatu al-hayati ad-dun'ya wal-baqiyatu as-salihatu khayrun inda rabbika thawaban wakhayrun amalan
wayawma nusayyiru al-jibala watara al-arda barizatan wahasharnahum falam nughadir min'hum ahadan
wa'uridu ala rabbika saffan laqad ji'tumuna kama khalaqnakum awwala marratin bal za'amtum allan naj'ala lakum maw'idan

wawudi'a al-kitabu fatara al-muj'rimina mush'fiqina mimma fihi wayaquluna yawaylatana mali hadha al-kitabi la yughadiru saghiratan wala kabiratan illa ahsaha wawajadu ma amilu hadiran wala yazlimu rabbuka ahadan

wa-idh qul'na lil'malaikati us'judu liadama fasajadu illa ib'lisa kana mina al-jini fafasaqa an amri rabbihi afatattakhidhunahu wadhurriyyatahu awliyaa min duni wahum lakum aduwwun bi'sa lilzzalimina badalan
ma ashhadttuhum khalqa as-samawati wal-ardi wala khalqa anfusihim wama kuntu muttakhidha al-mudilina adudan
wayawma yaqulu nadu shurakaiya alladhina za'amtum fada'awhum falam yastajibu lahum waja'alna baynahum mawbiqan
waraa al-muj'rimuna an-nara fazannu annahum muwaqi'uha walam yajidu anha masrifan
walaqad sarrafna fi hadha al-qur'ani lilnnasi min kulli mathalin wakana al-insanu akthara shayin jadalan
wama mana'a an-nasa an yu'minu idh jaahumu al-huda wayastaghfiru rabbahum illa an tatiyahum sunnatu al-awalina aw yatiyahumu al-'adhabu qubulan
wama nur'silu al-mur'salina illa mubashirina wamundhirina wayujadilu alladhina kafaru bil-batili liyud'hidu bihi al-haqa wa-ittakhadhu ayati wama undhiru huzuwan

waman azlamu mimman dhukkira biayati rabbihi fa-a'rada anha wanasiya ma qaddamat yadahu inna ja'alna ala qulubihim akinnatan an yafqahuhu wafi adhanihim waqran wa-in tad'uhum ila al-huda falan yahtadu idhan abadan
warabbuka al-ghafuru dhu ar-rahmati law yuakhidhuhum bima kasabu la'ajjala lahumu al-'adhaba bal lahum maw'idun lan yajidu min dunihi mawilan
watil'ka al-qura ahlaknahum lamma zalamu waja'alna limahlikihim maw'idan
wa-idh qala musa lifatahu la abrahu hatta ablugha majma'a al-bahrayni aw amdiya huquban
falamma balagha majma'a baynihima nasiya hutahuma fa-ittakhadha sabilahu fi al-bahri saraban
falamma jawaza qala lifatahu atina ghadaana laqad laqina min safarina hadha nasaban
qala ara-ayta idh awayna ila as-sakhrati fa-inni nasitu al-huta wama ansanihu illa as-shaytanu an adhkurahu wa-ittakhadha sabilahu fi al-bahri ajaban
qala dhalika ma kunna nabghi fa-ir'tadda ala atharihima qasasan
fawajada abdan min ibadina ataynahu rahmatan min indina wa'allamnahu min ladunna il'man
qala lahu musa hal attabi'uka ala an tu'allimani mimma ullim'ta rush'dan
qala innaka lan tastati'a ma'iya sabran
wakayfa tasbiru ala ma lam tuhit bihi khub'ran
qala satajiduni in shaa al-lahu sabiran wala a'si laka amran
qala fa-ini ittaba'tani fala tasalni an shayin hatta uh'ditha laka min'hu dhik'ran
fa-intalaqa hatta idha rakiba fi as-safinati kharaqaha qala akharaqtaha litugh'riqa ahlaha laqad ji'ta shayan im'ran
qala alam aqul innaka lan tastati'a ma'iya sabran
qala la tuakhidh'ni bima nasitu wala tur'hiq'ni min amri us'ran
fa-intalaqa hatta idha laqiya ghulaman faqatalahu qala aqatalta nafsan zakiyyatan bighayri nafsin laqad ji'ta shayan nuk'ran
qala alam aqul laka innaka lan tastati'a ma'iya sabran
qala in sa-altuka an shayin ba'daha fala tusahib'ni qad balaghta min ladunni udh'ran
fa-intalaqa hatta idha ataya ahla qaryatin is'tat'ama ahlaha fa-abaw an yudayyifuhuma fawajada fiha jidaran yuridu an yanqadda fa-aqamahu qala law shi'ta lattakhadhta alayhi ajran
qala hadha firaqu bayni wabaynika sa-unabbi-uka bitawili ma lam tastati' alayhi sabran
amma as-safinatu fakanat limasakina ya'maluna fi al-bahri fa-aradttu an a'ibaha wakana waraahum malikun yakhudhu kulla safinatin ghasban
wa-amma al-ghulamu fakana abawahu mu'minayni fakhashina an yur'hiqahuma tugh'yanan wakuf'ran
fa-aradna an yub'dilahuma rabbuhuma khayran min'hu zakatan wa-aqraba ruh'man

wa-amma al-jidaru fakana lighulamayni yatimayni fi al-madinati wakana tahtahu kanzun lahuma wakana abuhuma salihan fa-arada rabbuka an yablugha ashuddahuma wayastakhrija kanzahuma rahmatan min rabbika wama fa'altuhu an amri dhalika tawilu ma lam tasti' alayhi sabran
wayasalunaka an dhi al-qarnayni qul sa-atlu alaykum min'hu dhik'ran
inna makkanna lahu fi al-ardi waataynahu min kulli shayin sababan
fa-atba'a sababan
hatta idha balagha maghriba as-shamsi wajadaha taghrubu fi aynin hami-atin wawajada indaha qawman qul'na yadha al-qarnayni imma an tu'adhiba wa-imma an tattakhidha fihim hus'nan
qala amma man zalama fasawfa nu'adhibuhu thumma yuraddu ila rabbihi fayu'adhibuhu adhaban nuk'ran
wa-amma man amana wa'amila salihan falahu jazaan al-hus'na wasanaqulu lahu min amrina yus'ran
thumma atba'a sababan
hatta idha balagha matli'a as-shamsi wajadaha tatlu'u ala qawmin lam naj'al lahum min duniha sit'ran
kadhalika waqad ahatna bima ladayhi khub'ran
thumma atba'a sababan
hatta idha balagha bayna as-sadayni wajada min dunihima qawman la yakaduna yafqahuna qawlan
qalu yadha al-qarnayni inna yajuja wamajuja muf'siduna fi al-ardi fahal naj'alu laka kharjan ala an taj'ala baynana wabaynahum saddan
qala ma makkanni fihi rabbi khayrun fa-a'inuni biquwwatin aj'al baynakum wabaynahum radman
atuni zubara al-hadidi hatta idha sawa bayna as-sadafayni qala unfukhu hatta idha ja'alahu naran qala atuni uf'righ alayhi qit'ran
fama is'ta'u an yazharuhu wama is'tata'u lahu naqban
qala hadha rahmatun min rabbi fa-idha jaa wa'du rabbi ja'alahu dakkaa wakana wa'du rabbi haqqan
watarakna ba'dahum yawma-idhin yamuju fi ba'din wanufikha fi as-suri fajama'nahum jam'an
wa'aradna jahannama yawma-idhin lil'kafirina ardan
alladhina kanat a'yunuhum fi ghitain an dhik'ri wakanu la yastati'una sam'an
afahasiba alladhina kafaru an yattakhidhu ibadi min duni awliyaa inna a'tadna jahannama lil'kafirina nuzulan
qul hal nunabbi-ukum bil-akhsarina a'malan
alladhina dalla sa'yuhum fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya wahum yahsabuna annahum yuh'sinuna sun'an
ulaika alladhina kafaru biayati rabbihim waliqaihi fahabitat a'maluhum fala nuqimu lahum yawma al-qiyamati waznan
dhalika jazauhum jahannamu bima kafaru wa-ittakhadhu ayati warusuli huzuwan
inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati kanat lahum jannatu al-fir'dawsi nuzulan
khalidina fiha la yabghuna anha hiwalan
qul law kana al-bahru midadan likalimati rabbi lanafida al-bahru qabla an tanfada kalimatu rabbi walaw ji'na bimith'lihi madadan
qul innama ana basharun mith'lukum yuha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahun wahidun faman kana yarju liqaa rabbihi falya'mal amalan salihan wala yush'rik bi'ibadati rabbihi ahadan
kaf-ha-ya-ain-sad
dhik'ru rahmati rabbika abdahu zakariyya
idh nada rabbahu nidaan khafiyyan
qala rabbi inni wahana al-'azmu minni wa-ish'ta'ala ar-rasu shayban walam akun bidu'aika rabbi shaqiyyan
wa-inni khif'tu al-mawaliya min warai wakanati im'ra-ati aqiran fahab li min ladunka waliyyan
yarithuni wayarithu min ali ya'quba wa-ij'alhu rabbi radiyyan
yazakariyya inna nubashiruka bighulamin us'muhu yahya lam naj'al lahu min qablu samiyyan
qala rabbi anna yakunu li ghulamun wakanati im'ra-ati aqiran waqad balaghtu mina al-kibari itiyyan
qala kadhalika qala rabbuka huwa alayya hayyinun waqad khalaqtuka min qablu walam taku shayan
qala rabbi ij'al li ayatan qala ayatuka alla tukallima an-nasa thalatha layalin sawiyyan
fakharaja ala qawmihi mina al-mih'rabi fa-awha ilayhim an sabbihu buk'ratan wa'ashiyyan
yayahya khudhi al-kitaba biquwwatin waataynahu al-huk'ma sabiyyan
wahananan min ladunna wazakatan wakana taqiyyan
wabarran biwalidayhi walam yakun jabbaran asiyyan
wasalamun alayhi yawma wulida wayawma yamutu wayawma yub'athu hayyan
wa-udh'kur fi al-kitabi maryama idhi intabadhat min ahliha makanan sharqiyyan
fa-ittakhadhat min dunihim hijaban fa-arsalna ilayha ruhana fatamathala laha basharan sawiyyan
qalat inni a'udhu bil-rahmani minka in kunta taqiyyan
qala innama ana rasulu rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulaman zakiyyan
qalat anna yakunu li ghulamun walam yamsasni basharun walam aku baghiyyan
qala kadhaliki qala rabbuki huwa alayya hayyinun walinaj'alahu ayatan lilnnasi warahmatan minna wakana amran maqdiyyan
fahamalathu fa-intabadhat bihi makanan qasiyyan
fa-ajaaha al-makhadu ila jidh'i an-nakhlati qalat yalaytani mittu qabla hadha wakuntu nasyan mansiyyan
fanadaha min tahtiha alla tahzani qad ja'ala rabbuki tahtaki sariyyan
wahuzzi ilayki bijidh'i an-nakhlati tusaqit alayki rutaban janiyyan
fakuli wa-ish'rabi waqarri aynan fa-imma tarayinna mina al-bashari ahadan faquli inni nadhartu lilrrahmani sawman falan ukallima al-yawma insiyyan
fa-atat bihi qawmaha tahmiluhu qalu yamaryamu laqad ji'ti shayan fariyyan
yaukh'ta haruna ma kana abuki im'ra-a sawin wama kanat ummuki baghiyyan
fa-asharat ilayhi qalu kayfa nukallimu man kana fi al-mahdi sabiyyan
qala inni abdu al-lahi ataniya al-kitaba waja'alani nabiyyan
waja'alani mubarakan ayna ma kuntu wa-awsani bil-salati waz-zakati ma dum'tu hayyan
wabarran biwalidati walam yaj'alni jabbaran shaqiyyan
was-salamu alayya yawma wulidttu wayawma amutu wayawma ub'athu hayyan
dhalika isa ub'nu maryama qawla al-haqi alladhi fihi yamtaruna
ma kana lillahi an yattakhidha min waladin sub'hanahu idha qada amran fa-innama yaqulu lahu kun fayakunu
wa-inna al-laha rabbi warabbukum fa-u'buduhu hadha siratun mus'taqimun
fa-ikh'talafa al-ahzabu min baynihim fawaylun lilladhina kafaru min mashhadi yawmin azimin
asmi' bihim wa-absir yawma yatunana lakini az-zalimuna al-yawma fi dalalin mubinin
wa-andhir'hum yawma al-hasrati idh qudiya al-amru wahum fi ghaflatin wahum la yu'minuna
inna nahnu narithu al-arda waman alayha wa-ilayna yur'ja'una
wa-udh'kur fi al-kitabi ib'rahima innahu kana siddiqan nabiyyan
idh qala li-abihi yaabati lima ta'budu ma la yasma'u wala yub'siru wala yugh'ni anka shayan
yaabati inni qad jaani mina al-'il'mi ma lam yatika fa-ittabi'ni ahdika siratan sawiyyan
yaabati la ta'budi as-shaytana inna as-shaytana kana lilrrahmani asiyyan
yaabati inni akhafu an yamassaka adhabun mina ar-rahmani fatakuna lilshaytani waliyyan
qala araghibun anta an alihati yaib'rahimu la-in lam tantahi la-arjumannaka wa-uh'jur'ni maliyyan
qala salamun alayka sa-astaghfiru laka rabbi innahu kana bi hafiyyan
wa-a'tazilukum wama tad'una min duni al-lahi wa-ad'u rabbi asa alla akuna bidu'ai rabbi shaqiyyan
falamma i'tazalahum wama ya'buduna min duni al-lahi wahabna lahu is'haqa waya'quba wakullan ja'alna nabiyyan
wawahabna lahum min rahmatina waja'alna lahum lisana sid'qin aliyyan
wa-udh'kur fi al-kitabi musa innahu kana mukh'lasan wakana rasulan nabiyyan
wanadaynahu min janibi at-turi al-aymani waqarrabnahu najiyyan
wawahabna lahu min rahmatina akhahu haruna nabiyyan
wa-udh'kur fi al-kitabi is'ma'ila innahu kana sadiqa al-wa'di wakana rasulan nabiyyan
wakana yamuru ahlahu bil-salati waz-zakati wakana inda rabbihi mardiyyan
wa-udh'kur fi al-kitabi id'risa innahu kana siddiqan nabiyyan
warafa'nahu makanan aliyyan

ulaika alladhina an'ama al-lahu alayhim mina an-nabiyina min dhurriyyati adama wamimman hamalna ma'a nuhin wamin dhurriyyati ib'rahima wa-is'raila wamimman hadayna wa-ij'tabayna idha tut'la alayhim ayatu ar-rahmani kharru sujjadan wabukiyyan
fakhalafa min ba'dihim khalfun ada'u as-salata wa-ittaba'u as-shahawati fasawfa yalqawna ghayyan
illa man taba waamana wa'amila salihan fa-ulaika yadkhuluna al-janata wala yuz'lamuna shayan
jannati adnin allati wa'ada ar-rahmanu ibadahu bil-ghaybi innahu kana wa'duhu matiyyan
la yasma'una fiha laghwan illa salaman walahum riz'quhum fiha buk'ratan wa'ashiyyan
til'ka al-janatu allati nurithu min ibadina man kana taqiyyan
wama natanazzalu illa bi-amri rabbika lahu ma bayna aydina wama khalfana wama bayna dhalika wama kana rabbuka nasiyyan
rabbu as-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma fa-u'bud'hu wa-is'tabir li'ibadatihi hal ta'lamu lahu samiyyan

ma yatihim min dhik'rin min rabbihim muh'dathin illa is'tama'uhu wahum yal'abuna

ma amanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknaha afahum yu'minuna
wama arsalna qablaka illa rijalan nuhi ilayhim fasalu ahla ad-dhik'ri in kuntum la ta'lamuna
wama ja'alnahum jasadan la yakuluna at-ta'ama wama kanu khalidina
thumma sadaqnahumu al-wa'da fa-anjaynahum waman nashau wa-ahlakna al-mus'rifina
laqad anzalna ilaykum kitaban fihi dhik'rukum afala ta'qiluna

falamma ahassu basana idha hum min'ha yarkuduna
la tarkudu wa-ir'ji'u ila ma ut'rif'tum fihi wamasakinikum la'allakum tus'aluna
qalu yawaylana inna kunna zalimina
fama zalat til'ka da'wahum hatta ja'alnahum hasidan khamidina
wama khalaqna as-samaa wal-arda wama baynahuma la'ibina
law aradna an nattakhidha lahwan la-ittakhadhnahu min ladunna in kunna fa'ilina
bal naqdhifu bil-haqi ala al-batili fayadmaghuhu fa-idha huwa zahiqun walakumu al-waylu mimma tasifuna
walahu man fi as-samawati wal-ardi waman indahu la yastakbiruna an ibadatihi wala yastahsiruna
yusabbihuna al-layla wan-nahara la yafturuna
ami ittakhadhu alihatan mina al-ardi hum yunshiruna
law kana fihima alihatun illa al-lahu lafasadata fasub'hana al-lahi rabbi al-'arshi amma yasifuna
la yus'alu amma yaf 'alu wahum yus'aluna
ami ittakhadhu min dunihi alihatan qul hatu bur'hanakum hadha dhik'ru man ma'iya wadhik'ru man qabli bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna al-haqa fahum mu'riduna
wama arsalna min qablika min rasulin illa nuhi ilayhi annahu la ilaha illa ana fa-u'buduni
waqalu ittakhadha ar-rahmanu waladan sub'hanahu bal ibadun muk'ramuna
la yasbiqunahu bil-qawli wahum bi-amrihi ya'maluna
ya'lamu ma bayna aydihim wama khalfahum wala yashfa'una illa limani ir'tada wahum min khashyatihi mush'fiquna
waman yaqul min'hum inni ilahun min dunihi fadhalika najzihi jahannama kadhalika najzi az-zalimina
awalam yara alladhina kafaru anna as-samawati wal-arda kanata ratqan fafataqnahuma waja'alna mina al-mai kulla shayin hayyin afala yu'minuna
waja'alna fi al-ardi rawasiya an tamida bihim waja'alna fiha fijajan subulan la'allahum yahtaduna
waja'alna as-samaa saqfan mahfuzan wahum an ayatiha mu'riduna
wahuwa alladhi khalaqa al-layla wan-nahara was-shamsa wal-qamara kullun fi falakin yasbahuna
wama ja'alna libasharin min qablika al-khul'da afa-in mitta fahumu al-khaliduna
kullu nafsin dhaiqatu al-mawti wanablukum bil-shari wal-khayri fit'natan wa-ilayna tur'ja'una
wa-idha raaka alladhina kafaru in yattakhidhunaka illa huzuwan ahadha alladhi yadhkuru alihatakum wahum bidhik'ri ar-rahmani hum kafiruna
khuliqa al-insanu min ajalin sa-urikum ayati fala tasta'jiluni
wayaquluna mata hadha al-wa'du in kuntum sadiqina
law ya'lamu alladhina kafaru hina la yakuffuna an wujuhihimu an-nara wala an zuhurihim wala hum yunsaruna
bal tatihim baghtatan fatabhatuhum fala yastati'una raddaha wala hum yunzaruna
walaqadi us'tuh'zi-a birusulin min qablika fahaqa bi-alladhina sakhiru min'hum ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
qul man yakla-ukum bi-al-layli wan-nahari mina ar-rahmani bal hum an dhik'ri rabbihim mu'riduna
am lahum alihatun tamna'uhum min dunina la yastati'una nasra anfusihim wala hum minna yus'habuna
bal matta'na haulai waabaahum hatta tala alayhimu al-'umuru afala yarawna anna nati al-arda nanqusuha min atrafiha afahumu al-ghalibuna
qul innama undhirukum bil-wahyi wala yasma'u as-sumu ad-du'aa idha ma yundharuna
wala-in massathum nafhatun min adhabi rabbika layaqulunna yawaylana inna kunna zalimina

wahadha dhik'run mubarakun anzalnahu afa-antum lahu munkiruna

idh qala li-abihi waqawmihi ma hadhihi at-tamathilu allati antum laha akifuna

qalu sami'na fatan yadhkuruhum yuqalu lahu ib'rahimu
