waja'alnahum a-immatan yahduna bi-amrina wa-awhayna ilayhim fi'la al-khayrati wa-iqama as-salati waitaa az-zakati wakanu lana abidina
walutan ataynahu huk'man wa'il'man wanajjaynahu mina al-qaryati allati kanat ta'malu al-khabaitha innahum kanu qawma sawin fasiqina
wa-adkhalnahu fi rahmatina innahu mina as-salihina
wanuhan idh nada min qablu fa-is'tajabna lahu fanajjaynahu wa-ahlahu mina al-karbi al-'azimi
wanasarnahu mina al-qawmi alladhina kadhabu biayatina innahum kanu qawma sawin fa-aghraqnahum ajma'ina
wadawuda wasulaymana idh yahkumani fi al-harthi idh nafashat fihi ghanamu al-qawmi wakunna lihuk'mihim shahidina
fafahhamnaha sulaymana wakullan atayna huk'man wa'il'man wasakharna ma'a dawuda al-jibala yusabbih'na wat-tayra wakunna fa'ilina
wa'allamnahu san'ata labusin lakum lituh'sinakum min basikum fahal antum shakiruna
walisulaymana ar-riha asifatan tajri bi-amrihi ila al-ardi allati barakna fiha wakunna bikulli shayin alimina
wamina as-shayatini man yaghusuna lahu waya'maluna amalan duna dhalika wakunna lahum hafizina
wa-ayyuba idh nada rabbahu anni massaniya ad-duru wa-anta arhamu ar-rahimina
fa-is'tajabna lahu fakashafna ma bihi min durrin waataynahu ahlahu wamith'lahum ma'ahum rahmatan min indina wadhik'ra lil'abidina
wa-is'ma'ila wa-id'risa wadha al-kif'li kullun mina as-sabirina
wa-adkhalnahum fi rahmatina innahum mina as-salihina
wadha an-nuni idh dhahaba mughadiban fazanna an lan naqdira alayhi fanada fi az-zulumati an la ilaha illa anta sub'hanaka inni kuntu mina az-zalimina
fa-is'tajabna lahu wanajjaynahu mina al-ghami wakadhalika nunji al-mu'minina
wazakariyya idh nada rabbahu rabbi la tadharni fardan wa-anta khayru al-warithina
fa-is'tajabna lahu wawahabna lahu yahya wa-aslahna lahu zawjahu innahum kanu yusari'una fi al-khayrati wayad'unana raghaban warahaban wakanu lana khashi'ina
wa-allati ahsanat farjaha fanafakhna fiha min ruhina waja'alnaha wa-ib'naha ayatan lil'alamina
inna hadhihi ummatukum ummatan wahidatan wa-ana rabbukum fa-u'buduni
wataqatta'u amrahum baynahum kullun ilayna raji'una
faman ya'mal mina as-salihati wahuwa mu'minun fala kuf'rana lisa'yihi wa-inna lahu katibuna
waharamun ala qaryatin ahlaknaha annahum la yarji'una
hatta idha futihat yajuju wamajuju wahum min kulli hadabin yansiluna
wa-iq'taraba al-wa'du al-haqu fa-idha hiya shakhisatun absaru alladhina kafaru yawaylana qad kunna fi ghaflatin min hadha bal kunna zalimina
innakum wama ta'buduna min duni al-lahi hasabu jahannama antum laha wariduna
law kana haulai alihatan ma waraduha wakullun fiha khaliduna
lahum fiha zafirun wahum fiha la yasma'una
inna alladhina sabaqat lahum minna al-hus'na ulaika anha mub'aduna
la yasma'una hasisaha wahum fi ma ish'tahat anfusuhum khaliduna
la yahzunuhumu al-faza'u al-akbaru watatalaqqahumu al-malaikatu hadha yawmukumu alladhi kuntum tu'aduna
yawma natwi as-samaa katayyi as-sijili lil'kutubi kama badana awwala khalqin nu'iduhu wa'dan alayna inna kunna fa'ilina
walaqad katabna fi az-zaburi min ba'di ad-dhik'ri anna al-arda yarithuha ibadiya as-salihuna
inna fi hadha labalaghan liqawmin abidina
wama arsalnaka illa rahmatan lil'alamina
qul innama yuha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahun wahidun fahal antum mus'limuna
fa-in tawallaw faqul adhantukum ala sawain wa-in adri aqaribun am ba'idun ma tu'aduna
innahu ya'lamu al-jahra mina al-qawli waya'lamu ma taktumuna
wa-in adri la'allahu fit'natun lakum wamata'un ila hinin
qala rabbi uh'kum bil-haqi warabbuna ar-rahmanu al-mus'ta'anu ala ma tasifuna
yaayyuha an-nasu ittaqu rabbakum inna zalzalata as-sa'ati shayon azimun
yawma tarawnaha tadhhalu kullu mur'di'atin amma arda'at watada'u kullu dhati hamlin hamlaha watara an-nasa sukara wama hum bisukara walakinna adhaba al-lahi shadidun
wamina an-nasi man yujadilu fi al-lahi bighayri il'min wayattabi'u kulla shaytanin maridin
kutiba alayhi annahu man tawallahu fa-annahu yudilluhu wayahdihi ila adhabi as-sa'iri

yaayyuha an-nasu in kuntum fi raybin mina al-ba'thi fa-inna khalaqnakum min turabin thumma min nut'fatin thumma min alaqatin thumma min mud'ghatin mukhallaqatin waghayri mukhallaqatin linubayyina lakum wanuqirru fi al-arhami ma nashau ila ajalin musamman thumma nukh'rijukum tif'lan thumma litablughu ashuddakum waminkum man yutawaffa waminkum man yuraddu ila ardhali al-'umuri likayla ya'lama min ba'di il'min shayan watara al-arda hamidatan fa-idha anzalna alayha al-maa ih'tazzat warabat wa-anbatat min kulli zawjin bahijin
dhalika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-haqu wa-annahu yuh'yi al-mawta wa-annahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
wa-anna as-sa'ata atiyatun la rayba fiha wa-anna al-laha yab'athu man fi al-quburi
wamina an-nasi man yujadilu fi al-lahi bighayri il'min wala hudan wala kitabin munirin
thaniya it'fihi liyudilla an sabili al-lahi lahu fi ad-dun'ya khiz'yun wanudhiquhu yawma al-qiyamati adhaba al-hariqi
dhalika bima qaddamat yadaka wa-anna al-laha laysa bizallamin lil'abidi
wamina an-nasi man ya'budu al-laha ala harfin fa-in asabahu khayrun it'ma-anna bihi wa-in asabathu fit'natun inqalaba ala wajhihi khasira ad-dun'ya wal-akhirata dhalika huwa al-khus'ranu al-mubinu
yad'u min duni al-lahi ma la yadurruhu wama la yanfa'uhu dhalika huwa ad-dalalu al-ba'idu
yad'u laman darruhu aqrabu min naf'ihi labi'sa al-mawla walabi'sa al-'ashiru
inna al-laha yud'khilu alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu inna al-laha yaf 'alu ma yuridu
man kana yazunnu an lan yansurahu al-lahu fi ad-dun'ya wal-akhirati falyamdud bisababin ila as-samai thumma l'yaqta' falyanzur hal yudh'hibanna kayduhu ma yaghizu
wakadhalika anzalnahu ayatin bayyinatin wa-anna al-laha yahdi man yuridu
inna alladhina amanu wa-alladhina hadu was-sabiina wan-nasara wal-majusa wa-alladhina ashraku inna al-laha yafsilu baynahum yawma al-qiyamati inna al-laha ala kulli shayin shahidun

alam tara anna al-laha yasjudu lahu man fi as-samawati waman fi al-ardi was-shamsu wal-qamaru wan-nujumu wal-jibalu was-shajaru wad-dawabu wakathirun mina an-nasi wakathirun haqqa alayhi al-'adhabu waman yuhini al-lahu fama lahu min muk'rimin inna al-laha yaf 'alu ma yashau
hadhani khasmani ikh'tasamu fi rabbihim fa-alladhina kafaru qutti'at lahum thiyabun min narin yusabbu min fawqi ruusihimu al-hamimu
yus'haru bihi ma fi butunihim wal-juludu
walahum maqami'u min hadidin
kullama aradu an yakhruju min'ha min ghammin u'idu fiha wadhuqu adhaba al-hariqi
inna al-laha yud'khilu alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu yuhallawna fiha min asawira min dhahabin walu'lu-an walibasuhum fiha harirun
wahudu ila at-tayibi mina al-qawli wahudu ila sirati al-hamidi
inna alladhina kafaru wayasudduna an sabili al-lahi wal-masjidi al-harami alladhi ja'alnahu lilnnasi sawaan al-'akifu fihi wal-badi waman yurid fihi bi-il'hadin bizul'min nudhiq'hu min adhabin alimin
wa-idh bawwana li-ib'rahima makana al-bayti an la tush'rik bi shayan watahhir baytiya lilttaifina wal-qaimina war-ruka'i as-sujudi
wa-adhin fi an-nasi bil-haji yatuka rijalan wa'ala kulli damirin yatina min kulli fajjin amiqin
liyashhadu manafi'a lahum wayadhkuru is'ma al-lahi fi ayyamin ma'lumatin ala ma razaqahum min bahimati al-an'ami fakulu min'ha wa-at'imu al-baisa al-faqira
thumma l'yaqdu tafathahum walyufu nudhurahum walyattawwafu bil-bayti al-'atiqi
dhalika waman yu'azzim hurumati al-lahi fahuwa khayrun lahu inda rabbihi wa-uhillat lakumu al-an'amu illa ma yut'la alaykum fa-ij'tanibu ar-rij'sa mina al-awthani wa-ij'tanibu qawla az-zuri
hunafaa lillahi ghayra mush'rikina bihi waman yush'rik bil-lahi faka-annama kharra mina as-samai fatakhtafuhu at-tayru aw tahwi bihi ar-rihu fi makanin sahiqin
dhalika waman yu'azzim sha'aira al-lahi fa-innaha min taqwa al-qulubi
lakum fiha manafi'u ila ajalin musamman thumma mahilluha ila al-bayti al-'atiqi
walikulli ummatin ja'alna mansakan liyadhkuru is'ma al-lahi ala ma razaqahum min bahimati al-an'ami fa-ilahukum ilahun wahidun falahu aslimu wabashiri al-mukh'bitina
alladhina idha dhukira al-lahu wajilat qulubuhum was-sabirina ala ma asabahum wal-muqimi as-salati wamimma razaqnahum yunfiquna

wal-bud'na ja'alnaha lakum min sha'airi al-lahi lakum fiha khayrun fa-udh'kuru is'ma al-lahi alayha sawaffa fa-idha wajabat junubuha fakulu min'ha wa-at'imu al-qani'a wal-mu'tara kadhalika sakharnaha lakum la'allakum tashkuruna
lan yanala al-laha luhumuha wala dimauha walakin yanaluhu at-taqwa minkum kadhalika sakharaha lakum litukabbiru al-laha ala ma hadakum wabashiri al-muh'sinina
inna al-laha yudafi'u ani alladhina amanu inna al-laha la yuhibbu kulla khawwanin kafurin
udhina lilladhina yuqataluna bi-annahum zulimu wa-inna al-laha ala nasrihim laqadirun

alladhina ukh'riju min diyarihim bighayri haqqin illa an yaqulu rabbuna al-lahu walawla daf'u al-lahi an-nasa ba'dahum biba'din lahuddimat sawami'u wabiya'un wasalawatun wamasajidu yudh'karu fiha us'mu al-lahi kathiran walayansuranna al-lahu man yansuruhu inna al-laha laqawiyyun azizun
alladhina in makkannahum fi al-ardi aqamu as-salata waatawu az-zakata wa-amaru bil-ma'rufi wanahaw ani al-munkari walillahi aqibatu al-umuri
wa-in yukadhibuka faqad kadhabat qablahum qawmu nuhin wa'adun wathamudu
waqawmu ib'rahima waqawmu lutin
wa-ashabu madyana wakudhiba musa fa-amlaytu lil'kafirina thumma akhadhtuhum fakayfa kana nakiri
faka-ayyin min qaryatin ahlaknaha wahiya zalimatun fahiya khawiyatun ala urushiha wabi'rin mu'attalatin waqasrin mashidin
afalam yasiru fi al-ardi fatakuna lahum qulubun ya'qiluna biha aw adhanun yasma'una biha fa-innaha la ta'ma al-absaru walakin ta'ma al-qulubu allati fi as-suduri
wayasta'jilunaka bil-'adhabi walan yukh'lifa al-lahu wa'dahu wa-inna yawman inda rabbika ka-alfi sanatin mimma ta'udduna
waka-ayyin min qaryatin amlaytu laha wahiya zalimatun thumma akhadhtuha wa-ilayya al-masiru
qul yaayyuha an-nasu innama ana lakum nadhirun mubinun
fa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karimun
wa-alladhina sa'aw fi ayatina mu'ajizina ulaika ashabu al-jahimi
wama arsalna min qablika min rasulin wala nabiyyin illa idha tamanna alqa as-shaytanu fi um'niyyatihi fayansakhu al-lahu ma yul'qi as-shaytanu thumma yuh'kimu al-lahu ayatihi wal-lahu alimun hakimun
liyaj'ala ma yul'qi as-shaytanu fit'natan lilladhina fi qulubihim maradun wal-qasiyati qulubuhum wa-inna az-zalimina lafi shiqaqin ba'idin
waliya'lama alladhina utu al-'il'ma annahu al-haqu min rabbika fayu'minu bihi fatukh'bita lahu qulubuhum wa-inna al-laha lahadi alladhina amanu ila siratin mus'taqimin
wala yazalu alladhina kafaru fi mir'yatin min'hu hatta tatiyahumu as-sa'atu baghtatan aw yatiyahum adhabu yawmin aqimin
al-mul'ku yawma-idhin lillahi yahkumu baynahum fa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati fi jannati an-na'imi
wa-alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina fa-ulaika lahum adhabun muhinun
wa-alladhina hajaru fi sabili al-lahi thumma qutilu aw matu layarzuqannahumu al-lahu riz'qan hasanan wa-inna al-laha lahuwa khayru ar-raziqina
layud'khilannahum mud'khalan yardawnahu wa-inna al-laha la'alimun halimun
dhalika waman aqaba bimith'li ma uqiba bihi thumma bughiya alayhi layansurannahu al-lahu inna al-laha la'afuwwun ghafurun
dhalika bi-anna al-laha yuliju al-layla fi an-nahari wayuliju an-nahara fi al-layli wa-anna al-laha sami'un basirun
dhalika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-haqu wa-anna ma yad'una min dunihi huwa al-batilu wa-anna al-laha huwa al-'aliyu al-kabiru
alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina as-samai maan fatus'bihu al-ardu mukh'darratan inna al-laha latifun khabirun
lahu ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi wa-inna al-laha lahuwa al-ghaniyu al-hamidu
alam tara anna al-laha sakhara lakum ma fi al-ardi wal-ful'ka tajri fi al-bahri bi-amrihi wayum'siku as-samaa an taqa'a ala al-ardi illa bi-idh'nihi inna al-laha bil-nasi laraufun rahimun
wahuwa alladhi ahyakum thumma yumitukum thumma yuh'yikum inna al-insana lakafurun
likulli ummatin ja'alna mansakan hum nasikuhu fala yunazi'unnaka fi al-amri wa-ud'u ila rabbika innaka la'ala hudan mus'taqimin
wa-in jadaluka faquli al-lahu a'lamu bima ta'maluna
al-lahu yahkumu baynakum yawma al-qiyamati fima kuntum fihi takhtalifuna
alam ta'lam anna al-laha ya'lamu ma fi as-samai wal-ardi inna dhalika fi kitabin inna dhalika ala al-lahi yasirun
waya'buduna min duni al-lahi ma lam yunazzil bihi sul'tanan wama laysa lahum bihi il'mun wama lilzzalimina min nasirin

wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin ta'rifu fi wujuhi alladhina kafaru al-munkara yakaduna yastuna bi-alladhina yatluna alayhim ayatina qul afa-unabbi-ukum bisharrin min dhalikumu an-naru wa'adaha al-lahu alladhina kafaru wabi'sa al-masiru

yaayyuha an-nasu duriba mathalun fa-is'tami'u lahu inna alladhina tad'una min duni al-lahi lan yakhluqu dhubaban walawi ij'tama'u lahu wa-in yaslub'humu ad-dhubabu shayan la yastanqidhuhu min'hu da'ufa at-talibu wal-matlubu
ma qadaru al-laha haqqa qadrihi inna al-laha laqawiyyun azizun
al-lahu yastafi mina al-malaikati rusulan wamina an-nasi inna al-laha sami'un basirun
ya'lamu ma bayna aydihim wama khalfahum wa-ila al-lahi tur'ja'u al-umuru
yaayyuha alladhina amanu ir'ka'u wa-us'judu wa-u'budu rabbakum wa-if'alu al-khayra la'allakum tuf'lihuna

wajahidu fi al-lahi haqqa jihadihi huwa ij'tabakum wama ja'ala alaykum fi ad-dini min harajin millata abikum ib'rahima huwa sammakumu al-mus'limina min qablu wafi hadha liyakuna ar-rasulu shahidan alaykum watakunu shuhadaa ala an-nasi fa-aqimu as-salata waatu az-zakata wa-i'tasimu bil-lahi huwa mawlakum fani'ma al-mawla wani'ma an-nasiru
qad aflaha al-mu'minuna
alladhina hum fi salatihim khashi'una
wa-alladhina hum ani al-laghwi mu'riduna
wa-alladhina hum lilzzakati fa'iluna
wa-alladhina hum lifurujihim hafizuna
illa ala azwajihim aw ma malakat aymanuhum fa-innahum ghayru malumina
famani ib'tagha waraa dhalika fa-ulaika humu al-'aduna
wa-alladhina hum li-amanatihim wa'ahdihim ra'una
wa-alladhina hum ala salawatihim yuhafizuna
ulaika humu al-warithuna
alladhina yarithuna al-fir'dawsa hum fiha khaliduna
walaqad khalaqna al-insana min sulalatin min tinin
thumma ja'alnahu nut'fatan fi qararin makinin
thumma khalaqna an-nut'fata alaqatan fakhalaqna al-'alaqata mud'ghatan fakhalaqna al-mud'ghata izaman fakasawna al-'izama lahman thumma anshanahu khalqan akhara fatabaraka al-lahu ahsanu al-khaliqina
thumma innakum ba'da dhalika lamayyituna
thumma innakum yawma al-qiyamati tub'athuna
walaqad khalaqna fawqakum sab'a taraiqa wama kunna ani al-khalqi ghafilina
wa-anzalna mina as-samai maan biqadarin fa-askannahu fi al-ardi wa-inna ala dhahabin bihi laqadiruna
fa-anshana lakum bihi jannatin min nakhilin wa-a'nabin lakum fiha fawakihu kathiratun wamin'ha takuluna
washajaratan takhruju min turi saynaa tanbutu bil-duh'ni wasib'ghin lil'akilina
wa-inna lakum fi al-an'ami la'ib'ratan nus'qikum mimma fi butuniha walakum fiha manafi'u kathiratun wamin'ha takuluna
wa'alayha wa'ala al-ful'ki tuh'maluna
walaqad arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi faqala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaquna
faqala al-mala-u alladhina kafaru min qawmihi ma hadha illa basharun mith'lukum yuridu an yatafaddala alaykum walaw shaa al-lahu la-anzala malaikatan ma sami'na bihadha fi abaina al-awalina
in huwa illa rajulun bihi jinnatun fatarabbasu bihi hatta hinin
qala rabbi unsur'ni bima kadhabuni

fa-awhayna ilayhi ani is'na'i al-ful'ka bi-a'yunina wawahyina fa-idha jaa amruna wafara at-tanuru fa-us'luk fiha min kullin zawjayni ith'nayni wa-ahlaka illa man sabaqa alayhi al-qawlu min'hum wala tukhatib'ni fi alladhina zalamu innahum mugh'raquna
fa-idha is'tawayta anta waman ma'aka ala al-ful'ki faquli al-hamdu lillahi alladhi najjana mina al-qawmi az-zalimina
waqul rabbi anzil'ni munzalan mubarakan wa-anta khayru al-munzilina
inna fi dhalika laayatin wa-in kunna lamub'talina
thumma anshana min ba'dihim qarnan akharina
fa-arsalna fihim rasulan min'hum ani u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaquna

waqala al-mala-u min qawmihi alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biliqai al-akhirati wa-atrafnahum fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya ma hadha illa basharun mith'lukum yakulu mimma takuluna min'hu wayashrabu mimma tashrabuna
wala-in ata'tum basharan mith'lakum innakum idhan lakhasiruna
aya'idukum annakum idha mittum wakuntum turaban wa'izaman annakum mukh'rajuna
hayhata hayhata lima tu'aduna
in hiya illa hayatuna ad-dun'ya namutu wanahya wama nahnu bimab'uthina
in huwa illa rajulun if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban wama nahnu lahu bimu'minina
qala rabbi unsur'ni bima kadhabuni
qala amma qalilin layus'bihunna nadimina
fa-akhadhathumu as-sayhatu bil-haqi faja'alnahum ghuthaan fabu'dan lil'qawmi az-zalimina
thumma anshana min ba'dihim qurunan akharina
ma tasbiqu min ummatin ajalaha wama yastakhiruna
thumma arsalna rusulana tatra kulla ma jaa ummatan rasuluha kadhabuhu fa-atba'na ba'dahum ba'dan waja'alnahum ahaditha fabu'dan liqawmin la yu'minuna
thumma arsalna musa wa-akhahu haruna biayatina wasul'tanin mubinin
ila fir'awna wamala-ihi fa-is'takbaru wakanu qawman alina
faqalu anu'minu libasharayni mith'lina waqawmuhuma lana abiduna
fakadhabuhuma fakanu mina al-muh'lakina
walaqad atayna musa al-kitaba la'allahum yahtaduna
waja'alna ib'na maryama wa-ummahu ayatan waawaynahuma ila rabwatin dhati qararin wama'inin
yaayyuha ar-rusulu kulu mina at-tayibati wa-i'malu salihan inni bima ta'maluna alimun
wa-inna hadhihi ummatukum ummatan wahidatan wa-ana rabbukum fa-ittaquni
fataqatta'u amrahum baynahum zuburan kullu hiz'bin bima ladayhim farihuna
fadharhum fi ghamratihim hatta hinin
ayahsabuna annama numidduhum bihi min malin wabanina
nusari'u lahum fi al-khayrati bal la yash'uruna
inna alladhina hum min khashyati rabbihim mush'fiquna
wa-alladhina hum biayati rabbihim yu'minuna
wa-alladhina hum birabbihim la yush'rikuna
wa-alladhina yu'tuna ma ataw waqulubuhum wajilatun annahum ila rabbihim raji'una
ulaika yusari'una fi al-khayrati wahum laha sabiquna
wala nukallifu nafsan illa wus'aha waladayna kitabun yantiqu bil-haqi wahum la yuz'lamuna
bal qulubuhum fi ghamratin min hadha walahum a'malun min duni dhalika hum laha amiluna
hatta idha akhadhna mut'rafihim bil-'adhabi idha hum yajaruna
la tajaru al-yawma innakum minna la tunsaruna
qad kanat ayati tut'la alaykum fakuntum ala a'qabikum tankisuna
mus'takbirina bihi samiran tahjuruna
afalam yaddabbaru al-qawla am jaahum ma lam yati abaahumu al-awalina
am lam ya'rifu rasulahum fahum lahu munkiruna
am yaquluna bihi jinnatun bal jaahum bil-haqi wa-aktharuhum lil'haqqi karihuna
walawi ittaba'a al-haqu ahwaahum lafasadati as-samawatu wal-ardu waman fihinna bal ataynahum bidhik'rihim fahum an dhik'rihim mu'riduna
am tasaluhum kharjan fakharaju rabbika khayrun wahuwa khayru ar-raziqina
wa-innaka latad'uhum ila siratin mus'taqimin
wa-inna alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati ani as-sirati lanakibuna
walaw rahim'nahum wakashafna ma bihim min durrin lalajju fi tugh'yanihim ya'mahuna
walaqad akhadhnahum bil-'adhabi fama is'takanu lirabbihim wama yatadarra'una
hatta idha fatahna alayhim baban dha adhabin shadidin idha hum fihi mub'lisuna
wahuwa alladhi ansha-a lakumu as-sam'a wal-absara wal-afidata qalilan ma tashkuruna
wahuwa alladhi dhara-akum fi al-ardi wa-ilayhi tuh'sharuna
wahuwa alladhi yuh'yi wayumitu walahu ikh'tilafu al-layli wan-nahari afala ta'qiluna
bal qalu mith'la ma qala al-awaluna
qalu a-idha mit'na wakunna turaban wa'izaman a-inna lamab'uthuna
laqad wu'id'na nahnu waabauna hadha min qablu in hadha illa asatiru al-awalina
qul limani al-ardu waman fiha in kuntum ta'lamuna
sayaquluna lillahi qul afala tadhakkaruna
qul man rabbu as-samawati as-sab'i warabbu al-'arshi al-'azimi
sayaquluna lillahi qul afala tattaquna
qul man biyadihi malakutu kulli shayin wahuwa yujiru wala yujaru alayhi in kuntum ta'lamuna
sayaquluna lillahi qul fa-anna tus'haruna
bal ataynahum bil-haqi wa-innahum lakadhibuna
ma ittakhadha al-lahu min waladin wama kana ma'ahu min ilahin idhan ladhahaba kullu ilahin bima khalaqa wala'ala ba'duhum ala ba'din sub'hana al-lahi amma yasifuna
alimi al-ghaybi was-shahadati fata'ala amma yush'rikuna
qul rabbi imma turiyanni ma yu'aduna
rabbi fala taj'alni fi al-qawmi az-zalimina
wa-inna ala an nuriyaka ma na'iduhum laqadiruna
id'fa' bi-allati hiya ahsanu as-sayi-ata nahnu a'lamu bima yasifuna
waqul rabbi a'udhu bika min hamazati as-shayatini
wa-a'udhu bika rabbi an yahduruni
hatta idha jaa ahadahumu al-mawtu qala rabbi ir'ji'uni
la'alli a'malu salihan fima taraktu kalla innaha kalimatun huwa qailuha wamin waraihim barzakhun ila yawmi yub'athuna
fa-idha nufikha fi as-suri fala ansaba baynahum yawma-idhin wala yatasaaluna
faman thaqulat mawazinuhu fa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
waman khaffat mawazinuhu fa-ulaika alladhina khasiru anfusahum fi jahannama khaliduna
talfahu wujuhahumu an-naru wahum fiha kalihuna
alam takun ayati tut'la alaykum fakuntum biha tukadhibuna
qalu rabbana ghalabat alayna shiq'watuna wakunna qawman dallina
rabbana akhrij'na min'ha fa-in ud'na fa-inna zalimuna
qala ikh'sau fiha wala tukallimuni
innahu kana fariqun min ibadi yaquluna rabbana amanna fa-igh'fir lana wa-ir'hamna wa-anta khayru ar-rahimina
fa-ittakhadhtumuhum sikh'riyyan hatta ansawkum dhik'ri wakuntum min'hum tadhakuna
inni jazaytuhumu al-yawma bima sabaru annahum humu al-faizuna
qala kam labith'tum fi al-ardi adada sinina
qalu labith'na yawman aw ba'da yawmin fasali al-'adina
qala in labith'tum illa qalilan law annakum kuntum ta'lamuna
afahasib'tum annama khalaqnakum abathan wa-annakum ilayna la tur'ja'una
fata'ala al-lahu al-maliku al-haqu la ilaha illa huwa rabbu al-'arshi al-karimi
waman yad'u ma'a al-lahi ilahan akhara la bur'hana lahu bihi fa-innama hisabuhu inda rabbihi innahu la yuf'lihu al-kafiruna
waqul rabbi igh'fir wa-ir'ham wa-anta khayru ar-rahimina
suratun anzalnaha wafaradnaha wa-anzalna fiha ayatin bayyinatin la'allakum tadhakkaruna

az-zaniyatu waz-zani fa-ij'lidu kulla wahidin min'huma mi-ata jaldatin wala takhudh'kum bihima rafatun fi dini al-lahi in kuntum tu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri walyashhad adhabahuma taifatun mina al-mu'minina
az-zani la yankihu illa zaniyatan aw mush'rikatan waz-zaniyatu la yankihuha illa zanin aw mush'rikun wahurrima dhalika ala al-mu'minina
wa-alladhina yarmuna al-muh'sanati thumma lam yatu bi-arba'ati shuhadaa fa-ij'liduhum thamanina jaldatan wala taqbalu lahum shahadatan abadan wa-ulaika humu al-fasiquna
illa alladhina tabu min ba'di dhalika wa-aslahu fa-inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
wa-alladhina yarmuna azwajahum walam yakun lahum shuhadau illa anfusuhum fashahadatu ahadihim arba'u shahadatin bil-lahi innahu lamina as-sadiqina
wal-khamisatu anna la'nata al-lahi alayhi in kana mina al-kadhibina
wayadra-u anha al-'adhaba an tashhada arba'a shahadatin bil-lahi innahu lamina al-kadhibina
wal-khamisata anna ghadaba al-lahi alayha in kana mina as-sadiqina
walawla fadlu al-lahi alaykum warahmatuhu wa-anna al-laha tawwabun hakimun

inna alladhina jau bil-if'ki us'batun minkum la tahsabuhu sharran lakum bal huwa khayrun lakum likulli im'ri-in min'hum ma ik'tasaba mina al-ith'mi wa-alladhi tawalla kib'rahu min'hum lahu adhabun azimun
lawla idh sami'tumuhu zanna al-mu'minuna wal-mu'minatu bi-anfusihim khayran waqalu hadha if'kun mubinun
lawla jau alayhi bi-arba'ati shuhadaa fa-idh lam yatu bil-shuhadai fa-ulaika inda al-lahi humu al-kadhibuna
walawla fadlu al-lahi alaykum warahmatuhu fi ad-dun'ya wal-akhirati lamassakum fi ma afadtum fihi adhabun azimun
idh talaqqawnahu bi-alsinatikum wataquluna bi-afwahikum ma laysa lakum bihi il'mun watahsabunahu hayyinan wahuwa inda al-lahi azimun
walawla idh sami'tumuhu qul'tum ma yakunu lana an natakallama bihadha sub'hanaka hadha buh'tanun azimun
ya'izukumu al-lahu an ta'udu limith'lihi abadan in kuntum mu'minina
wayubayyinu al-lahu lakumu al-ayati wal-lahu alimun hakimun
inna alladhina yuhibbuna an tashi'a al-fahishatu fi alladhina amanu lahum adhabun alimun fi ad-dun'ya wal-akhirati wal-lahu ya'lamu wa-antum la ta'lamuna
walawla fadlu al-lahi alaykum warahmatuhu wa-anna al-laha raufun rahimun

yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattabi'u khutuwati as-shaytani waman yattabi' khutuwati as-shaytani fa-innahu yamuru bil-fahshai wal-munkari walawla fadlu al-lahi alaykum warahmatuhu ma zaka minkum min ahadin abadan walakinna al-laha yuzakki man yashau wal-lahu sami'un alimun
wala yatali ulu al-fadli minkum was-sa'ati an yu'tu uli al-qur'ba wal-masakina wal-muhajirina fi sabili al-lahi walya'fu walyasfahu ala tuhibbuna an yaghfira al-lahu lakum wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
inna alladhina yarmuna al-muh'sanati al-ghafilati al-mu'minati lu'inu fi ad-dun'ya wal-akhirati walahum adhabun azimun
yawma tashhadu alayhim alsinatuhum wa-aydihim wa-arjuluhum bima kanu ya'maluna
yawma-idhin yuwaffihimu al-lahu dinahumu al-haqa waya'lamuna anna al-laha huwa al-haqu al-mubinu
al-khabithatu lil'khabithina wal-khabithuna lil'khabithati wat-tayibatu lilttayyibina wat-tayibuna lilttayyibati ulaika mubarrauna mimma yaquluna lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karimun
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tadkhulu buyutan ghayra buyutikum hatta tastanisu watusallimu ala ahliha dhalikum khayrun lakum la'allakum tadhakkaruna
fa-in lam tajidu fiha ahadan fala tadkhuluha hatta yu'dhana lakum wa-in qila lakumu ir'ji'u fa-ir'ji'u huwa azka lakum wal-lahu bima ta'maluna alimun
laysa alaykum junahun an tadkhulu buyutan ghayra maskunatin fiha mata'un lakum wal-lahu ya'lamu ma tub'duna wama taktumuna
qul lil'mu'minina yaghuddu min absarihim wayahfazu furujahum dhalika azka lahum inna al-laha khabirun bima yasna'una

waqul lil'mu'minati yaghdud'na min absarihinna wayahfazna furujahunna wala yub'dina zinatahunna illa ma zahara min'ha walyadrib'na bikhumurihinna ala juyubihinna wala yub'dina zinatahunna illa libu'ulatihinna aw abaihinna aw abai bu'ulatihinna aw abnaihinna aw abnai bu'ulatihinna aw ikh'wanihinna aw bani ikh'wanihinna aw bani akhawatihinna aw nisaihinna aw ma malakat aymanuhunna awi at-tabi'ina ghayri uli al-ir'bati mina ar-rijali awi at-tif'li alladhina lam yazharu ala awrati an-nisai wala yadrib'na bi-arjulihinna liyu'lama ma yukh'fina min zinatihinna watubu ila al-lahi jami'an ayyuha al-mu'minuna la'allakum tuf'lihuna
wa-ankihu al-ayama minkum was-salihina min ibadikum wa-imaikum in yakunu fuqaraa yugh'nihimu al-lahu min fadlihi wal-lahu wasi'un alimun

walyasta'fifi alladhina la yajiduna nikahan hatta yugh'niyahumu al-lahu min fadlihi wa-alladhina yabtaghuna al-kitaba mimma malakat aymanukum fakatibuhum in alim'tum fihim khayran waatuhum min mali al-lahi alladhi atakum wala tuk'rihu fatayatikum ala al-bighai in aradna tahassunan litabtaghu arada al-hayati ad-dun'ya waman yuk'rihhunna fa-inna al-laha min ba'di ik'rahihinna ghafurun rahimun
walaqad anzalna ilaykum ayatin mubayyinatin wamathalan mina alladhina khalaw min qablikum wamaw'izatan lil'muttaqina

al-lahu nuru as-samawati wal-ardi mathalu nurihi kamish'katin fiha mis'bahun al-mis'bahu fi zujajatin az-zujajatu ka-annaha kawkabun durriyyun yuqadu min shajaratin mubarakatin zaytunatin la sharqiyyatin wala gharbiyyatin yakadu zaytuha yudiu walaw lam tamsashu narun nurun ala nurin yahdi al-lahu linurihi man yashau wayadribu al-lahu al-amthala lilnnasi wal-lahu bikulli shayin alimun
fi buyutin adhina al-lahu an tur'fa'a wayudh'kara fiha us'muhu yusabbihu lahu fiha bil-ghuduwi wal-asali
rijalun la tul'hihim tijaratun wala bay'un an dhik'ri al-lahi wa-iqami as-salati waitai az-zakati yakhafuna yawman tataqallabu fihi al-qulubu wal-absaru
liyajziyahumu al-lahu ahsana ma amilu wayazidahum min fadlihi wal-lahu yarzuqu man yashau bighayri hisabin
wa-alladhina kafaru a'maluhum kasarabin biqi'atin yahsabuhu az-zamanu maan hatta idha jaahu lam yajid'hu shayan wawajada al-laha indahu fawaffahu hisabahu wal-lahu sari'u al-hisabi

aw kazulumatin fi bahrin lujjiyyin yaghshahu mawjun min fawqihi mawjun min fawqihi sahabun zulumatun ba'duha fawqa ba'din idha akhraja yadahu lam yakad yaraha waman lam yaj'ali al-lahu lahu nuran fama lahu min nurin
alam tara anna al-laha yusabbihu lahu man fi as-samawati wal-ardi wat-tayru saffatin kullun qad alima salatahu watasbihahu wal-lahu alimun bima yaf 'aluna
walillahi mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi wa-ila al-lahi al-masiru

alam tara anna al-laha yuz'ji sahaban thumma yu-allifu baynahu thumma yaj'aluhu rukaman fatara al-wadqa yakhruju min khilalihi wayunazzilu mina as-samai min jibalin fiha min baradin fayusibu bihi man yashau wayasrifuhu an man yashau yakadu sana barqihi yadhhabu bil-absari
yuqallibu al-lahu al-layla wan-nahara inna fi dhalika la'ib'ratan li-uli al-absari

wal-lahu khalaqa kulla dabbatin min main famin'hum man yamshi ala batnihi wamin'hum man yamshi ala rij'layni wamin'hum man yamshi ala arba'in yakhluqu al-lahu ma yashau inna al-laha ala kulli shayin qadirun
laqad anzalna ayatin mubayyinatin wal-lahu yahdi man yashau ila siratin mus'taqimin
wayaquluna amanna bil-lahi wabil-rasuli wa-ata'na thumma yatawalla fariqun min'hum min ba'di dhalika wama ulaika bil-mu'minina
wa-idha du'u ila al-lahi warasulihi liyahkuma baynahum idha fariqun min'hum mu'riduna
wa-in yakun lahumu al-haqu yatu ilayhi mudh'inina
afi qulubihim maradun ami ir'tabu am yakhafuna an yahifa al-lahu alayhim warasuluhu bal ulaika humu az-zalimuna
innama kana qawla al-mu'minina idha du'u ila al-lahi warasulihi liyahkuma baynahum an yaqulu sami'na wa-ata'na wa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
waman yuti'i al-laha warasulahu wayakhsha al-laha wayattaqhi fa-ulaika humu al-faizuna
wa-aqsamu bil-lahi jahda aymanihim la-in amartahum layakhrujunna qul la tuq'simu ta'atun ma'rufatun inna al-laha khabirun bima ta'maluna
qul ati'u al-laha wa-ati'u ar-rasula fa-in tawallaw fa-innama alayhi ma hummila wa'alaykum ma hummil'tum wa-in tuti'uhu tahtadu wama ala ar-rasuli illa al-balaghu al-mubinu

wa'ada al-lahu alladhina amanu minkum wa'amilu as-salihati layastakhlifannahum fi al-ardi kama is'takhlafa alladhina min qablihim walayumakkinanna lahum dinahumu alladhi ir'tada lahum walayubaddilannahum min ba'di khawfihim amnan ya'budunani la yush'rikuna bi shayan waman kafara ba'da dhalika fa-ulaika humu al-fasiquna
wa-aqimu as-salata waatu az-zakata wa-ati'u ar-rasula la'allakum tur'hamuna
la tahsabanna alladhina kafaru mu'jizina fi al-ardi wamawahumu an-naru walabi'sa al-masiru

yaayyuha alladhina amanu liyastadhinkumu alladhina malakat aymanukum wa-alladhina lam yablughu al-huluma minkum thalatha marratin min qabli salati al-fajri wahina tada'una thiyabakum mina az-zahirati wamin ba'di salati al-'ishai thalathu awratin lakum laysa alaykum wala alayhim junahun ba'dahunna tawwafuna alaykum ba'dukum ala ba'din kadhalika yubayyinu al-lahu lakumu al-ayati wal-lahu alimun hakimun
wa-idha balagha al-atfalu minkumu al-huluma falyastadhinu kama is'tadhana alladhina min qablihim kadhalika yubayyinu al-lahu lakum ayatihi wal-lahu alimun hakimun
wal-qawa'idu mina an-nisai allati la yarjuna nikahan falaysa alayhinna junahun an yada'na thiyabahunna ghayra mutabarrijatin bizinatin wa-an yasta'fif'na khayrun lahunna wal-lahu sami'un alimun

laysa ala al-a'ma harajun wala ala al-a'raji harajun wala ala al-maridi harajun wala ala anfusikum an takulu min buyutikum aw buyuti abaikum aw buyuti ummahatikum aw buyuti ikh'wanikum aw buyuti akhawatikum aw buyuti a'mamikum aw buyuti ammatikum aw buyuti akhwalikum aw buyuti khalatikum aw ma malaktum mafatihahu aw sadiqikum laysa alaykum junahun an takulu jami'an aw ashtatan fa-idha dakhaltum buyutan fasallimu ala anfusikum tahiyyatan min indi al-lahi mubarakatan tayyibatan kadhalika yubayyinu al-lahu lakumu al-ayati la'allakum ta'qiluna

innama al-mu'minuna alladhina amanu bil-lahi warasulihi wa-idha kanu ma'ahu ala amrin jami'in lam yadhhabu hatta yastadhinuhu inna alladhina yastadhinunaka ulaika alladhina yu'minuna bil-lahi warasulihi fa-idha is'tadhanuka liba'di shanihim fadhan liman shi'ta min'hum wa-is'taghfir lahumu al-laha inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun

la taj'alu du'aa ar-rasuli baynakum kadu'ai ba'dikum ba'dan qad ya'lamu al-lahu alladhina yatasallaluna minkum liwadhan falyahdhari alladhina yukhalifuna an amrihi an tusibahum fit'natun aw yusibahum adhabun alimun
ala inna lillahi ma fi as-samawati wal-ardi qad ya'lamu ma antum alayhi wayawma yur'ja'una ilayhi fayunabbi-uhum bima amilu wal-lahu bikulli shayin alimun
tabaraka alladhi nazzala al-fur'qana ala abdihi liyakuna lil'alamina nadhiran
alladhi lahu mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi walam yattakhidh waladan walam yakun lahu sharikun fi al-mul'ki wakhalaqa kulla shayin faqaddarahu taqdiran
wa-ittakhadhu min dunihi alihatan la yakhluquna shayan wahum yukh'laquna wala yamlikuna li-anfusihim darran wala naf 'an wala yamlikuna mawtan wala hayatan wala nushuran
waqala alladhina kafaru in hadha illa if'kun if'tarahu wa-a'anahu alayhi qawmun akharuna faqad jau zul'man wazuran
waqalu asatiru al-awalina ik'tatabaha fahiya tum'la alayhi buk'ratan wa-asilan
qul anzalahu alladhi ya'lamu as-sira fi as-samawati wal-ardi innahu kana ghafuran rahiman
waqalu mali hadha ar-rasuli yakulu at-ta'ama wayamshi fi al-aswaqi lawla unzila ilayhi malakun fayakuna ma'ahu nadhiran
aw yul'qa ilayhi kanzun aw takunu lahu jannatun yakulu min'ha waqala az-zalimuna in tattabi'una illa rajulan mashuran
unzur kayfa darabu laka al-amthala fadallu fala yastati'una sabilan
tabaraka alladhi in shaa ja'ala laka khayran min dhalika jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu wayaj'al laka qusuran
bal kadhabu bil-sa'ati wa-a'tadna liman kadhaba bil-sa'ati sa'iran
idha ra-athum min makanin ba'idin sami'u laha taghayyuzan wazafiran
wa-idha ul'qu min'ha makanan dayyiqan muqarranina da'aw hunalika thuburan
la tad'u al-yawma thuburan wahidan wa-id'u thuburan kathiran
qul adhalika khayrun am jannatu al-khul'di allati wu'ida al-mutaquna kanat lahum jazaan wamasiran
lahum fiha ma yashauna khalidina kana ala rabbika wa'dan masulan
wayawma yahshuruhum wama ya'buduna min duni al-lahi fayaqulu a-antum adlaltum ibadi haulai am hum dallu as-sabila
qalu sub'hanaka ma kana yanbaghi lana an nattakhidha min dunika min awliyaa walakin matta'tahum waabaahum hatta nasu ad-dhik'ra wakanu qawman buran
faqad kadhabukum bima taquluna fama tastati'una sarfan wala nasran waman yazlim minkum nudhiq'hu adhaban kabiran
wama arsalna qablaka mina al-mur'salina illa innahum layakuluna at-ta'ama wayamshuna fi al-aswaqi waja'alna ba'dakum liba'din fit'natan atasbiruna wakana rabbuka basiran
waqala alladhina la yarjuna liqaana lawla unzila alayna al-malaikatu aw nara rabbana laqadi is'takbaru fi anfusihim wa'ataw utuwwan kabiran
yawma yarawna al-malaikata la bush'ra yawma-idhin lil'muj'rimina wayaquluna hij'ran mahjuran
waqadim'na ila ma amilu min amalin faja'alnahu habaan manthuran
ashabu al-janati yawma-idhin khayrun mus'taqarran wa-ahsanu maqilan
wayawma tashaqqaqu as-samau bil-ghamami wanuzzila al-malaikatu tanzilan
al-mul'ku yawma-idhin al-haqu lilrrahmani wakana yawman ala al-kafirina asiran
wayawma ya'addu az-zalimu ala yadayhi yaqulu yalaytani ittakhadhtu ma'a ar-rasuli sabilan
yawaylata laytani lam attakhidh fulanan khalilan
laqad adallani ani ad-dhik'ri ba'da idh jaani wakana as-shaytanu lil'insani khadhulan
waqala ar-rasulu yarabbi inna qawmi ittakhadhu hadha al-qur'ana mahjuran
wakadhalika ja'alna likulli nabiyyin aduwwan mina al-muj'rimina wakafa birabbika hadiyan wanasiran
waqala alladhina kafaru lawla nuzzila alayhi al-qur'anu jum'latan wahidatan kadhalika linuthabbita bihi fuadaka warattalnahu tartilan
wala yatunaka bimathalin illa ji'naka bil-haqi wa-ahsana tafsiran
alladhina yuh'sharuna ala wujuhihim ila jahannama ulaika sharrun makanan wa-adallu sabilan
walaqad atayna musa al-kitaba waja'alna ma'ahu akhahu haruna waziran
faqul'na idh'haba ila al-qawmi alladhina kadhabu biayatina fadammarnahum tadmiran
waqawma nuhin lamma kadhabu ar-rusula aghraqnahum waja'alnahum lilnnasi ayatan wa-a'tadna lilzzalimina adhaban aliman
wa'adan wathamuda wa-ashaba ar-rasi waqurunan bayna dhalika kathiran
wakullan darabna lahu al-amthala wakullan tabbarna tatbiran
walaqad ataw ala al-qaryati allati um'tirat matara as-sawi afalam yakunu yarawnaha bal kanu la yarjuna nushuran
wa-idha ra-awka in yattakhidhunaka illa huzuwan ahadha alladhi ba'atha al-lahu rasulan
in kada layudilluna an alihatina lawla an sabarna alayha wasawfa ya'lamuna hina yarawna al-'adhaba man adallu sabilan
ara-ayta mani ittakhadha ilahahu hawahu afa-anta takunu alayhi wakilan
am tahsabu anna aktharahum yasma'una aw ya'qiluna in hum illa kal-an'ami bal hum adallu sabilan
alam tara ila rabbika kayfa madda az-zila walaw shaa laja'alahu sakinan thumma ja'alna as-shamsa alayhi dalilan
thumma qabadnahu ilayna qabdan yasiran
wahuwa alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-layla libasan wan-nawma subatan waja'ala an-nahara nushuran
wahuwa alladhi arsala ar-riyaha bush'ran bayna yaday rahmatihi wa-anzalna mina as-samai maan tahuran
