wa-anjayna alladhina amanu wakanu yattaquna
walutan idh qala liqawmihi atatuna al-fahishata wa-antum tub'siruna
a-innakum latatuna ar-rijala shahwatan min duni an-nisai bal antum qawmun tajhaluna
fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qalu akhriju ala lutin min qaryatikum innahum unasun yatatahharuna
fa-anjaynahu wa-ahlahu illa im'ra-atahu qaddarnaha mina al-ghabirina
wa-amtarna alayhim mataran fasaa mataru al-mundharina
quli al-hamdu lillahi wasalamun ala ibadihi alladhina is'tafa allahu khayrun amma yush'rikuna
amman khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda wa-anzala lakum mina as-samai maan fa-anbatna bihi hadaiqa dhata bahjatin ma kana lakum an tunbitu shajaraha a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi bal hum qawmun ya'diluna
amman ja'ala al-arda qararan waja'ala khilalaha anharan waja'ala laha rawasiya waja'ala bayna al-bahrayni hajizan a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna
amman yujibu al-mud'tara idha da'ahu wayakshifu as-sua wayaj'alukum khulafaa al-ardi a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi qalilan ma tadhakkaruna
amman yahdikum fi zulumati al-bari wal-bahri waman yur'silu ar-riyaha bush'ran bayna yaday rahmatihi a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi ta'ala al-lahu amma yush'rikuna
amman yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu waman yarzuqukum mina as-samai wal-ardi a-ilahun ma'a al-lahi qul hatu bur'hanakum in kuntum sadiqina
qul la ya'lamu man fi as-samawati wal-ardi al-ghayba illa al-lahu wama yash'uruna ayyana yub'athuna
bali iddaraka il'muhum fi al-akhirati bal hum fi shakkin min'ha bal hum min'ha amuna
waqala alladhina kafaru a-idha kunna turaban waabauna a-inna lamukh'rajuna
laqad wu'id'na hadha nahnu waabauna min qablu in hadha illa asatiru al-awalina
qul siru fi al-ardi fa-unzuru kayfa kana aqibatu al-muj'rimina
wala tahzan alayhim wala takun fi dayqin mimma yamkuruna
wayaquluna mata hadha al-wa'du in kuntum sadiqina
qul asa an yakuna radifa lakum ba'du alladhi tasta'jiluna
wa-inna rabbaka ladhu fadlin ala an-nasi walakinna aktharahum la yashkuruna
wa-inna rabbaka laya'lamu ma tukinnu suduruhum wama yu'linuna
wama min ghaibatin fi as-samai wal-ardi illa fi kitabin mubinin
inna hadha al-qur'ana yaqussu ala bani is'raila akthara alladhi hum fihi yakhtalifuna
wa-innahu lahudan warahmatun lil'mu'minina
inna rabbaka yaqdi baynahum bihuk'mihi wahuwa al-'azizu al-'alimu
fatawakkal ala al-lahi innaka ala al-haqi al-mubini
innaka la tus'mi'u al-mawta wala tus'mi'u as-suma ad-du'aa idha wallaw mud'birina
wama anta bihadi al-'um'yi an dalalatihim in tus'mi'u illa man yu'minu biayatina fahum mus'limuna
wa-idha waqa'a al-qawlu alayhim akhrajna lahum dabbatan mina al-ardi tukallimuhum anna an-nasa kanu biayatina la yuqinuna
wayawma nahshuru min kulli ummatin fawjan mimman yukadhibu biayatina fahum yuza'una
hatta idha jau qala akadhabtum biayati walam tuhitu biha il'man ammadha kuntum ta'maluna
wawaqa'a al-qawlu alayhim bima zalamu fahum la yantiquna
alam yaraw anna ja'alna al-layla liyaskunu fihi wan-nahara mub'siran inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
wayawma yunfakhu fi as-suri fafazi'a man fi as-samawati waman fi al-ardi illa man shaa al-lahu wakullun atawhu dakhirina
watara al-jibala tahsabuha jamidatan wahiya tamurru marra as-sahabi sun'a al-lahi alladhi atqana kulla shayin innahu khabirun bima taf 'aluna
man jaa bil-hasanati falahu khayrun min'ha wahum min faza'in yawma-idhin aminuna
waman jaa bil-sayi-ati fakubbat wujuhuhum fi an-nari hal tuj'zawna illa ma kuntum ta'maluna
innama umir'tu an a'buda rabba hadhihi al-baldati alladhi harramaha walahu kullu shayin wa-umir'tu an akuna mina al-mus'limina
wa-an atluwa al-qur'ana famani ih'tada fa-innama yahtadi linafsihi waman dalla faqul innama ana mina al-mundhirina
waquli al-hamdu lillahi sayurikum ayatihi fata'rifunaha wama rabbuka bighafilin amma ta'maluna
ta-seen-meem
til'ka ayatu al-kitabi al-mubini
natlu alayka min naba-i musa wafir'awna bil-haqi liqawmin yu'minuna
inna fir'awna ala fi al-ardi waja'ala ahlaha shiya'an yastad'ifu taifatan min'hum yudhabbihu abnaahum wayastahyi nisaahum innahu kana mina al-muf'sidina
wanuridu an namunna ala alladhina us'tud'ifu fi al-ardi wanaj'alahum a-immatan wanaj'alahumu al-warithina
wanumakkina lahum fi al-ardi wanuriya fir'awna wahamana wajunudahuma min'hum ma kanu yahdharuna
wa-awhayna ila ummi musa an ardi'ihi fa-idha khif'ti alayhi fa-alqihi fi al-yami wala takhafi wala tahzani inna radduhu ilayki waja'iluhu mina al-mur'salina
fat-taqatahu alu fir'awna liyakuna lahum aduwwan wahazanan inna fir'awna wahamana wajunudahuma kanu khatiina
waqalati im'ra-atu fir'awna qurratu aynin li walaka la taqtuluhu asa an yanfa'ana aw nattakhidhahu waladan wahum la yash'uruna
wa-asbaha fuadu ummi musa farighan in kadat latub'di bihi lawla an rabatna ala qalbiha litakuna mina al-mu'minina
waqalat li-ukh'tihi qussihi fabasurat bihi an junubin wahum la yash'uruna
waharramna alayhi al-maradi'a min qablu faqalat hal adullukum ala ahli baytin yakfulunahu lakum wahum lahu nasihuna
faradadnahu ila ummihi kay taqarra aynuha wala tahzana walita'lama anna wa'da al-lahi haqqun walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
walamma balagha ashuddahu wa-is'tawa ataynahu huk'man wa'il'man wakadhalika najzi al-muh'sinina

wadakhala al-madinata ala hini ghaflatin min ahliha fawajada fiha rajulayni yaqtatilani hadha min shi'atihi wahadha min aduwwihi fa-is'taghathahu alladhi min shi'atihi ala alladhi min aduwwihi fawakazahu musa faqada alayhi qala hadha min amali as-shaytani innahu aduwwun mudillun mubinun
qala rabbi inni zalamtu nafsi fa-igh'fir li faghafara lahu innahu huwa al-ghafuru ar-rahimu
qala rabbi bima an'amta alayya falan akuna zahiran lil'muj'rimina
fa-asbaha fi al-madinati khaifan yataraqqabu fa-idha alladhi is'tansarahu bil-amsi yastasrikhuhu qala lahu musa innaka laghawiyyun mubinun

falamma an arada an yabtisha bi-alladhi huwa aduwwun lahuma qala yamusa aturidu an taqtulani kama qatalta nafsan bil-amsi in turidu illa an takuna jabbaran fi al-ardi wama turidu an takuna mina al-mus'lihina
wajaa rajulun min aqsa al-madinati yas'a qala yamusa inna al-mala-a yatamiruna bika liyaqtuluka fa-ukh'ruj inni laka mina an-nasihina
fakharaja min'ha khaifan yataraqqabu qala rabbi najjini mina al-qawmi az-zalimina
walamma tawajjaha til'qaa madyana qala asa rabbi an yahdiyani sawaa as-sabili
walamma warada maa madyana wajada alayhi ummatan mina an-nasi yasquna wawajada min dunihimu im'ra-atayni tadhudani qala ma khatbukuma qalata la nasqi hatta yus'dira ar-ri'au wa-abuna shaykhun kabirun
fasaqa lahuma thumma tawalla ila az-zili faqala rabbi inni lima anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqirun
fajaathu ih'dahuma tamshi ala is'tih'yain qalat inna abi yad'uka liyajziyaka ajra ma saqayta lana falamma jaahu waqassa alayhi al-qasasa qala la takhaf najawta mina al-qawmi az-zalimina
qalat ih'dahuma yaabati is'tajir'hu inna khayra mani is'tajarta al-qawiyu al-aminu
qala inni uridu an unkihaka ih'da ib'natayya hatayni ala an tajurani thamaniya hijajin fa-in atmamta ashran famin indika wama uridu an ashuqqa alayka satajiduni in shaa al-lahu mina as-salihina
qala dhalika bayni wabaynaka ayyama al-ajalayni qadaytu fala ud'wana alayya wal-lahu ala ma naqulu wakilun
falamma qada musa al-ajala wasara bi-ahlihi anasa min janibi at-turi naran qala li-ahlihi um'kuthu inni anastu naran la'alli atikum min'ha bikhabarin aw jadhwatin mina an-nari la'allakum tastaluna
falamma ataha nudiya min shati-i al-wadi al-aymani fi al-buq'ati al-mubarakati mina as-shajarati an yamusa inni ana al-lahu rabbu al-'alamina
wa-an alqi asaka falamma raaha tahtazzu ka-annaha jannun walla mud'biran walam yu'aqqib yamusa aqbil wala takhaf innaka mina al-aminina
us'luk yadaka fi jaybika takhruj baydaa min ghayri suin wa-ud'mum ilayka janahaka mina ar-rahbi fadhanika bur'hanani min rabbika ila fir'awna wamala-ihi innahum kanu qawman fasiqina
qala rabbi inni qataltu min'hum nafsan fa-akhafu an yaqtuluni
wa-akhi harunu huwa afsahu minni lisanan fa-arsil'hu ma'iya rid'an yusaddiquni inni akhafu an yukadhibuni
qala sanashuddu adudaka bi-akhika wanaj'alu lakuma sul'tanan fala yasiluna ilaykuma biayatina antuma wamani ittaba'akuma al-ghalibuna
falamma jaahum musa biayatina bayyinatin qalu ma hadha illa sih'run muf'taran wama sami'na bihadha fi abaina al-awalina
waqala musa rabbi a'lamu biman jaa bil-huda min indihi waman takunu lahu aqibatu ad-dari innahu la yuf'lihu az-zalimuna
waqala fir'awnu yaayyuha al-mala-u ma alim'tu lakum min ilahin ghayri fa-awqid li yahamanu ala at-tini fa-ij'al li sarhan la'alli attali'u ila ilahi musa wa-inni la-azunnuhu mina al-kadhibina
wa-is'takbara huwa wajunuduhu fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi wazannu annahum ilayna la yur'ja'una
fa-akhadhnahu wajunudahu fanabadhnahum fi al-yami fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu az-zalimina
waja'alnahum a-immatan yad'una ila an-nari wayawma al-qiyamati la yunsaruna
wa-atba'nahum fi hadhihi ad-dun'ya la'natan wayawma al-qiyamati hum mina al-maqbuhina
walaqad atayna musa al-kitaba min ba'di ma ahlakna al-quruna al-ula basaira lilnnasi wahudan warahmatan la'allahum yatadhakkaruna
wama kunta bijanibi al-gharbiyi idh qadayna ila musa al-amra wama kunta mina as-shahidina
walakinna anshana qurunan fatatawala alayhimu al-'umuru wama kunta thawiyan fi ahli madyana tatlu alayhim ayatina walakinna kunna mur'silina
wama kunta bijanibi at-turi idh nadayna walakin rahmatan min rabbika litundhira qawman ma atahum min nadhirin min qablika la'allahum yatadhakkaruna
walawla an tusibahum musibatun bima qaddamat aydihim fayaqulu rabbana lawla arsalta ilayna rasulan fanattabi'a ayatika wanakuna mina al-mu'minina
falamma jaahumu al-haqu min indina qalu lawla utiya mith'la ma utiya musa awalam yakfuru bima utiya musa min qablu qalu sih'rani tazahara waqalu inna bikullin kafiruna
qul fatu bikitabin min indi al-lahi huwa ahda min'huma attabi'hu in kuntum sadiqina
fa-in lam yastajibu laka fa-i'lam annama yattabi'una ahwaahum waman adallu mimmani ittaba'a hawahu bighayri hudan mina al-lahi inna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma az-zalimina
walaqad wassalna lahumu al-qawla la'allahum yatadhakkaruna
alladhina ataynahumu al-kitaba min qablihi hum bihi yu'minuna
wa-idha yut'la alayhim qalu amanna bihi innahu al-haqu min rabbina inna kunna min qablihi mus'limina
ulaika yu'tawna ajrahum marratayni bima sabaru wayadrauna bil-hasanati as-sayi-ata wamimma razaqnahum yunfiquna
wa-idha sami'u al-laghwa a'radu anhu waqalu lana a'maluna walakum a'malukum salamun alaykum la nabtaghi al-jahilina
innaka la tahdi man ahbabta walakinna al-laha yahdi man yashau wahuwa a'lamu bil-muh'tadina
waqalu in nattabi'i al-huda ma'aka nutakhattaf min ardina awalam numakkin lahum haraman aminan yuj'ba ilayhi thamaratu kulli shayin riz'qan min ladunna walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
wakam ahlakna min qaryatin batirat ma'ishataha fatil'ka masakinuhum lam tus'kan min ba'dihim illa qalilan wakunna nahnu al-warithina
wama kana rabbuka muh'lika al-qura hatta yab'atha fi ummiha rasulan yatlu alayhim ayatina wama kunna muh'liki al-qura illa wa-ahluha zalimuna
wama utitum min shayin famata'u al-hayati ad-dun'ya wazinatuha wama inda al-lahi khayrun wa-abqa afala ta'qiluna
afaman wa'adnahu wa'dan hasanan fahuwa laqihi kaman matta'nahu mata'a al-hayati ad-dun'ya thumma huwa yawma al-qiyamati mina al-muh'darina
wayawma yunadihim fayaqulu ayna shurakaiya alladhina kuntum taz'umuna
qala alladhina haqqa alayhimu al-qawlu rabbana haulai alladhina aghwayna aghwaynahum kama ghawayna tabarrana ilayka ma kanu iyyana ya'buduna
waqila id'u shurakaakum fada'awhum falam yastajibu lahum wara-awu al-'adhaba law annahum kanu yahtaduna
wayawma yunadihim fayaqulu madha ajabtumu al-mur'salina
fa'amiyat alayhimu al-anbau yawma-idhin fahum la yatasaaluna
fa-amma man taba waamana wa'amila salihan fa'asa an yakuna mina al-muf'lihina
warabbuka yakhluqu ma yashau wayakhtaru ma kana lahumu al-khiyaratu sub'hana al-lahi wata'ala amma yush'rikuna
warabbuka ya'lamu ma tukinnu suduruhum wama yu'linuna
wahuwa al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa lahu al-hamdu fi al-ula wal-akhirati walahu al-huk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
qul ara-aytum in ja'ala al-lahu alaykumu al-layla sarmadan ila yawmi al-qiyamati man ilahun ghayru al-lahi yatikum bidiyain afala tasma'una
qul ara-aytum in ja'ala al-lahu alaykumu an-nahara sarmadan ila yawmi al-qiyamati man ilahun ghayru al-lahi yatikum bilaylin taskununa fihi afala tub'siruna
wamin rahmatihi ja'ala lakumu al-layla wan-nahara litaskunu fihi walitabtaghu min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuruna
wayawma yunadihim fayaqulu ayna shurakaiya alladhina kuntum taz'umuna
wanaza'na min kulli ummatin shahidan faqul'na hatu bur'hanakum fa'alimu anna al-haqa lillahi wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
inna qaruna kana min qawmi musa fabagha alayhim waataynahu mina al-kunuzi ma inna mafatihahu latanuu bil-'us'bati uli al-quwati idh qala lahu qawmuhu la tafrah inna al-laha la yuhibbu al-farihina
wa-ib'taghi fima ataka al-lahu ad-dara al-akhirata wala tansa nasibaka mina ad-dun'ya wa-ahsin kama ahsana al-lahu ilayka wala tabghi al-fasada fi al-ardi inna al-laha la yuhibbu al-muf'sidina
qala innama utituhu ala il'min indi awalam ya'lam anna al-laha qad ahlaka min qablihi mina al-quruni man huwa ashaddu min'hu quwwatan wa-aktharu jam'an wala yus'alu an dhunubihimu al-muj'rimuna
fakharaja ala qawmihi fi zinatihi qala alladhina yuriduna al-hayata ad-dun'ya yalayta lana mith'la ma utiya qarunu innahu ladhu hazzin azimin
waqala alladhina utu al-'il'ma waylakum thawabu al-lahi khayrun liman amana wa'amila salihan wala yulaqqaha illa as-sabiruna
fakhasafna bihi wabidarihi al-arda fama kana lahu min fi-atin yansurunahu min duni al-lahi wama kana mina al-muntasirina

wa-asbaha alladhina tamannaw makanahu bil-amsi yaquluna wayka-anna al-laha yabsutu ar-riz'qa liman yashau min ibadihi wayaqdiru lawla an manna al-lahu alayna lakhasafa bina wayka-annahu la yuf'lihu al-kafiruna
til'ka ad-daru al-akhiratu naj'aluha lilladhina la yuriduna uluwwan fi al-ardi wala fasadan wal-'aqibatu lil'muttaqina
man jaa bil-hasanati falahu khayrun min'ha waman jaa bil-sayi-ati fala yuj'za alladhina amilu as-sayiati illa ma kanu ya'maluna
inna alladhi farada alayka al-qur'ana laradduka ila ma'adin qul rabbi a'lamu man jaa bil-huda waman huwa fi dalalin mubinin
wama kunta tarju an yul'qa ilayka al-kitabu illa rahmatan min rabbika fala takunanna zahiran lil'kafirina
wala yasuddunnaka an ayati al-lahi ba'da idh unzilat ilayka wa-ud'u ila rabbika wala takunanna mina al-mush'rikina
wala tad'u ma'a al-lahi ilahan akhara la ilaha illa huwa kullu shayin halikun illa wajhahu lahu al-huk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
alif-lam-meem
ahasiba an-nasu an yut'raku an yaqulu amanna wahum la yuf'tanuna
walaqad fatanna alladhina min qablihim falaya'lamanna al-lahu alladhina sadaqu walaya'lamanna al-kadhibina
am hasiba alladhina ya'maluna as-sayiati an yasbiquna saa ma yahkumuna
man kana yarju liqaa al-lahi fa-inna ajala al-lahi laatin wahuwa as-sami'u al-'alimu
waman jahada fa-innama yujahidu linafsihi inna al-laha laghaniyyun ani al-'alamina
wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati lanukaffiranna anhum sayyiatihim walanajziyannahum ahsana alladhi kanu ya'maluna
wawassayna al-insana biwalidayhi hus'nan wa-in jahadaka litush'rika bi ma laysa laka bihi il'mun fala tuti'huma ilayya marji'ukum fa-unabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati lanud'khilannahum fi as-salihina

wamina an-nasi man yaqulu amanna bil-lahi fa-idha udhiya fi al-lahi ja'ala fit'nata an-nasi ka'adhabi al-lahi wala-in jaa nasrun min rabbika layaqulunna inna kunna ma'akum awalaysa al-lahu bi-a'lama bima fi suduri al-'alamina
walaya'lamanna al-lahu alladhina amanu walaya'lamanna al-munafiqina
waqala alladhina kafaru lilladhina amanu ittabi'u sabilana walnahmil khatayakum wama hum bihamilina min khatayahum min shayin innahum lakadhibuna
walayahmilunna athqalahum wa-athqalan ma'a athqalihim walayus'alunna yawma al-qiyamati amma kanu yaftaruna
walaqad arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi falabitha fihim alfa sanatin illa khamsina aman fa-akhadhahumu at-tufanu wahum zalimuna
fa-anjaynahu wa-ashaba as-safinati waja'alnaha ayatan lil'alamina
wa-ib'rahima idh qala liqawmihi u'budu al-laha wa-ittaquhu dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamuna

innama ta'buduna min duni al-lahi awthanan watakhluquna if'kan inna alladhina ta'buduna min duni al-lahi la yamlikuna lakum riz'qan fa-ib'taghu inda al-lahi ar-riz'qa wa-u'buduhu wa-ush'kuru lahu ilayhi tur'ja'una
wa-in tukadhibu faqad kadhaba umamun min qablikum wama ala ar-rasuli illa al-balaghu al-mubinu
awalam yaraw kayfa yub'di-u al-lahu al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu inna dhalika ala al-lahi yasirun
qul siru fi al-ardi fa-unzuru kayfa bada-a al-khalqa thumma al-lahu yunshi-u an-nashata al-akhirata inna al-laha ala kulli shayin qadirun
yu'adhibu man yashau wayarhamu man yashau wa-ilayhi tuq'labuna
wama antum bimu'jizina fi al-ardi wala fi as-samai wama lakum min duni al-lahi min waliyyin wala nasirin
wa-alladhina kafaru biayati al-lahi waliqaihi ulaika ya-isu min rahmati wa-ulaika lahum adhabun alimun
fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qalu uq'tuluhu aw harriquhu fa-anjahu al-lahu mina an-nari inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna

waqala innama ittakhadhtum min duni al-lahi awthanan mawaddata baynikum fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya thumma yawma al-qiyamati yakfuru ba'dukum biba'din wayal'anu ba'dukum ba'dan wamawakumu an-naru wama lakum min nasirina
faamana lahu lutun waqala inni muhajirun ila rabbi innahu huwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
wawahabna lahu is'haqa waya'quba waja'alna fi dhurriyyatihi an-nubuwata wal-kitaba waataynahu ajrahu fi ad-dun'ya wa-innahu fi al-akhirati lamina as-salihina
walutan idh qala liqawmihi innakum latatuna al-fahishata ma sabaqakum biha min ahadin mina al-'alamina
a-innakum latatuna ar-rijala wataqta'una as-sabila watatuna fi nadikumu al-munkara fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qalu i'tina bi'adhabi al-lahi in kunta mina as-sadiqina
qala rabbi unsur'ni ala al-qawmi al-muf'sidina
walamma jaat rusuluna ib'rahima bil-bush'ra qalu inna muh'liku ahli hadhihi al-qaryati inna ahlaha kanu zalimina
qala inna fiha lutan qalu nahnu a'lamu biman fiha lanunajjiyannahu wa-ahlahu illa im'ra-atahu kanat mina al-ghabirina
walamma an jaat rusuluna lutan sia bihim wadaqa bihim dhar'an waqalu la takhaf wala tahzan inna munajjuka wa-ahlaka illa im'ra-ataka kanat mina al-ghabirina
inna munziluna ala ahli hadhihi al-qaryati rij'zan mina as-samai bima kanu yafsuquna
walaqad tarakna min'ha ayatan bayyinatan liqawmin ya'qiluna
wa-ila madyana akhahum shu'ayban faqala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha wa-ir'ju al-yawma al-akhira wala ta'thaw fi al-ardi muf'sidina
fakadhabuhu fa-akhadhathumu ar-rajfatu fa-asbahu fi darihim jathimina
wa'adan wathamuda waqad tabayyana lakum min masakinihim wazayyana lahumu as-shaytanu a'malahum fasaddahum ani as-sabili wakanu mus'tabsirina
waqaruna wafir'awna wahamana walaqad jaahum musa bil-bayinati fa-is'takbaru fi al-ardi wama kanu sabiqina

fakullan akhadhna bidhanbihi famin'hum man arsalna alayhi hasiban wamin'hum man akhadhathu as-sayhatu wamin'hum man khasafna bihi al-arda wamin'hum man aghraqna wama kana al-lahu liyazlimahum walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna
mathalu alladhina ittakhadhu min duni al-lahi awliyaa kamathali al-'ankabuti ittakhadhat baytan wa-inna awhana al-buyuti labaytu al-'ankabuti law kanu ya'lamuna
inna al-laha ya'lamu ma yad'una min dunihi min shayin wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
watil'ka al-amthalu nadribuha lilnnasi wama ya'qiluha illa al-'alimuna
khalaqa al-lahu as-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi inna fi dhalika laayatan lil'mu'minina
ut'lu ma uhiya ilayka mina al-kitabi wa-aqimi as-salata inna as-salata tanha ani al-fahshai wal-munkari waladhik'ru al-lahi akbaru wal-lahu ya'lamu ma tasna'una
wala tujadilu ahla al-kitabi illa bi-allati hiya ahsanu illa alladhina zalamu min'hum waqulu amanna bi-alladhi unzila ilayna wa-unzila ilaykum wa-ilahuna wa-ilahukum wahidun wanahnu lahu mus'limuna
wakadhalika anzalna ilayka al-kitaba fa-alladhina ataynahumu al-kitaba yu'minuna bihi wamin haulai man yu'minu bihi wama yajhadu biayatina illa al-kafiruna
wama kunta tatlu min qablihi min kitabin wala takhuttuhu biyaminika idhan la-ir'taba al-mub'tiluna
bal huwa ayatun bayyinatun fi suduri alladhina utu al-'il'ma wama yajhadu biayatina illa az-zalimuna
waqalu lawla unzila alayhi ayatun min rabbihi qul innama al-ayatu inda al-lahi wa-innama ana nadhirun mubinun
awalam yakfihim anna anzalna alayka al-kitaba yut'la alayhim inna fi dhalika larahmatan wadhik'ra liqawmin yu'minuna
qul kafa bil-lahi bayni wabaynakum shahidan ya'lamu ma fi as-samawati wal-ardi wa-alladhina amanu bil-batili wakafaru bil-lahi ulaika humu al-khasiruna
wayasta'jilunaka bil-'adhabi walawla ajalun musamman lajaahumu al-'adhabu walayatiyannahum baghtatan wahum la yash'uruna
yasta'jilunaka bil-'adhabi wa-inna jahannama lamuhitatun bil-kafirina
yawma yaghshahumu al-'adhabu min fawqihim wamin tahti arjulihim wayaqulu dhuqu ma kuntum ta'maluna
ya'ibadiya alladhina amanu inna ardi wasi'atun fa-iyyaya fa-u'buduni
kullu nafsin dhaiqatu al-mawti thumma ilayna tur'ja'una
wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati lanubawwi-annahum mina al-janati ghurafan tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha ni'ma ajru al-'amilina
alladhina sabaru wa'ala rabbihim yatawakkaluna
waka-ayyin min dabbatin la tahmilu riz'qaha al-lahu yarzuquha wa-iyyakum wahuwa as-sami'u al-'alimu
wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda wasakhara as-shamsa wal-qamara layaqulunna al-lahu fa-anna yu'fakuna
al-lahu yabsutu ar-riz'qa liman yashau min ibadihi wayaqdiru lahu inna al-laha bikulli shayin alimun
wala-in sa-altahum man nazzala mina as-samai maan fa-ahya bihi al-arda min ba'di mawtiha layaqulunna al-lahu quli al-hamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la ya'qiluna
wama hadhihi al-hayatu ad-dun'ya illa lahwun wala'ibun wa-inna ad-dara al-akhirata lahiya al-hayawanu law kanu ya'lamuna
fa-idha rakibu fi al-ful'ki da'awu al-laha mukh'lisina lahu ad-dina falamma najjahum ila al-bari idha hum yush'rikuna
liyakfuru bima ataynahum waliyatamatta'u fasawfa ya'lamuna
awalam yaraw anna ja'alna haraman aminan wayutakhattafu an-nasu min hawlihim afabil-batili yu'minuna wabini'mati al-lahi yakfuruna
waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba bil-haqi lamma jaahu alaysa fi jahannama mathwan lil'kafirina
wa-alladhina jahadu fina lanahdiyannahum subulana wa-inna al-laha lama'a al-muh'sinina
alif-lam-meem
ghulibati ar-rumu
fi adna al-ardi wahum min ba'di ghalabihim sayaghlibuna
fi bid'i sinina lillahi al-amru min qablu wamin ba'du wayawma-idhin yafrahu al-mu'minuna
binasri al-lahi yansuru man yashau wahuwa al-'azizu ar-rahimu
wa'da al-lahi la yukh'lifu al-lahu wa'dahu walakinna akthara an-nasi la ya'lamuna
ya'lamuna zahiran mina al-hayati ad-dun'ya wahum ani al-akhirati hum ghafiluna
awalam yatafakkaru fi anfusihim ma khalaqa al-lahu as-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma illa bil-haqi wa-ajalin musamman wa-inna kathiran mina an-nasi biliqai rabbihim lakafiruna

awalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablihim kanu ashadda min'hum quwwatan wa-atharu al-arda wa'amaruha akthara mimma amaruha wajaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati fama kana al-lahu liyazlimahum walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna
thumma kana aqibata alladhina asau as-sua an kadhabu biayati al-lahi wakanu biha yastahziuna
al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu thumma ilayhi tur'ja'una
wayawma taqumu as-sa'atu yub'lisu al-muj'rimuna
walam yakun lahum min shurakaihim shufa'au wakanu bishurakaihim kafirina
wayawma taqumu as-sa'atu yawma-idhin yatafarraquna
fa-amma alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati fahum fi rawdatin yuh'baruna
wa-amma alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina waliqai al-akhirati fa-ulaika fi al-'adhabi muh'daruna
fasub'hana al-lahi hina tum'suna wahina tus'bihuna
walahu al-hamdu fi as-samawati wal-ardi wa'ashiyyan wahina tuz'hiruna
yukh'riju al-haya mina al-mayiti wayukh'riju al-mayita mina al-hayi wayuh'yi al-arda ba'da mawtiha wakadhalika tukh'rajuna
wamin ayatihi an khalaqakum min turabin thumma idha antum basharun tantashiruna
wamin ayatihi an khalaqa lakum min anfusikum azwajan litaskunu ilayha waja'ala baynakum mawaddatan warahmatan inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yatafakkaruna
wamin ayatihi khalqu as-samawati wal-ardi wa-ikh'tilafu alsinatikum wa-alwanikum inna fi dhalika laayatin lil'alimina
wamin ayatihi manamukum bi-al-layli wan-nahari wa-ib'tighaukum min fadlihi inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yasma'una
wamin ayatihi yurikumu al-barqa khawfan watama'an wayunazzilu mina as-samai maan fayuh'yi bihi al-arda ba'da mawtiha inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin ya'qiluna
wamin ayatihi an taquma as-samau wal-ardu bi-amrihi thumma idha da'akum da'watan mina al-ardi idha antum takhrujuna
walahu man fi as-samawati wal-ardi kullun lahu qanituna
wahuwa alladhi yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu wahuwa ahwanu alayhi walahu al-mathalu al-a'la fi as-samawati wal-ardi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu

daraba lakum mathalan min anfusikum hal lakum min ma malakat aymanukum min shurakaa fi ma razaqnakum fa-antum fihi sawaon takhafunahum kakhifatikum anfusakum kadhalika nufassilu al-ayati liqawmin ya'qiluna
bali ittaba'a alladhina zalamu ahwaahum bighayri il'min faman yahdi man adalla al-lahu wama lahum min nasirina
fa-aqim wajhaka lilddini hanifan fit'rata al-lahi allati fatara an-nasa alayha la tabdila likhalqi al-lahi dhalika ad-dinu al-qayimu walakinna akthara an-nasi la ya'lamuna
munibina ilayhi wa-ittaquhu wa-aqimu as-salata wala takunu mina al-mush'rikina
mina alladhina farraqu dinahum wakanu shiya'an kullu hiz'bin bima ladayhim farihuna
wa-idha massa an-nasa durrun da'aw rabbahum munibina ilayhi thumma idha adhaqahum min'hu rahmatan idha fariqun min'hum birabbihim yush'rikuna
liyakfuru bima ataynahum fatamatta'u fasawfa ta'lamuna
am anzalna alayhim sul'tanan fahuwa yatakallamu bima kanu bihi yush'rikuna
wa-idha adhaqna an-nasa rahmatan farihu biha wa-in tusib'hum sayyi-atun bima qaddamat aydihim idha hum yaqnatuna
awalam yaraw anna al-laha yabsutu ar-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
faati dha al-qur'ba haqqahu wal-mis'kina wa-ib'na as-sabili dhalika khayrun lilladhina yuriduna wajha al-lahi wa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
wama ataytum min riban liyarbuwa fi amwali an-nasi fala yarbu inda al-lahi wama ataytum min zakatin turiduna wajha al-lahi fa-ulaika humu al-mud'ifuna
al-lahu alladhi khalaqakum thumma razaqakum thumma yumitukum thumma yuh'yikum hal min shurakaikum man yaf 'alu min dhalikum min shayin sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yush'rikuna
zahara al-fasadu fi al-bari wal-bahri bima kasabat aydi an-nasi liyudhiqahum ba'da alladhi amilu la'allahum yarji'una
qul siru fi al-ardi fa-unzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablu kana aktharuhum mush'rikina
fa-aqim wajhaka lilddini al-qayimi min qabli an yatiya yawmun la maradda lahu mina al-lahi yawma-idhin yassadda'una
man kafara fa'alayhi kuf'ruhu waman amila salihan fali-anfusihim yamhaduna
liyajziya alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati min fadlihi innahu la yuhibbu al-kafirina
wamin ayatihi an yur'sila ar-riyaha mubashiratin waliyudhiqakum min rahmatihi walitajriya al-ful'ku bi-amrihi walitabtaghu min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuruna
walaqad arsalna min qablika rusulan ila qawmihim fajauhum bil-bayinati fa-intaqamna mina alladhina ajramu wakana haqqan alayna nasru al-mu'minina

al-lahu alladhi yur'silu ar-riyaha fatuthiru sahaban fayabsutuhu fi as-samai kayfa yashau wayaj'aluhu kisafan fatara al-wadqa yakhruju min khilalihi fa-idha asaba bihi man yashau min ibadihi idha hum yastabshiruna
wa-in kanu min qabli an yunazzala alayhim min qablihi lamub'lisina
fa-unzur ila athari rahmati al-lahi kayfa yuh'yi al-arda ba'da mawtiha inna dhalika lamuh'yi al-mawta wahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
wala-in arsalna rihan fara-awhu mus'farran lazallu min ba'dihi yakfuruna
fa-innaka la tus'mi'u al-mawta wala tus'mi'u as-suma ad-du'aa idha wallaw mud'birina
wama anta bihadi al-'um'yi an dalalatihim in tus'mi'u illa man yu'minu biayatina fahum mus'limuna
al-lahu alladhi khalaqakum min da'fin thumma ja'ala min ba'di da'fin quwwatan thumma ja'ala min ba'di quwwatin da'fan washaybatan yakhluqu ma yashau wahuwa al-'alimu al-qadiru
wayawma taqumu as-sa'atu yuq'simu al-muj'rimuna ma labithu ghayra sa'atin kadhalika kanu yu'fakuna
waqala alladhina utu al-'il'ma wal-imana laqad labith'tum fi kitabi al-lahi ila yawmi al-ba'thi fahadha yawmu al-ba'thi walakinnakum kuntum la ta'lamuna
fayawma-idhin la yanfa'u alladhina zalamu ma'dhiratuhum wala hum yus'ta'tabuna
walaqad darabna lilnnasi fi hadha al-qur'ani min kulli mathalin wala-in ji'tahum biayatin layaqulanna alladhina kafaru in antum illa mub'tiluna
kadhalika yatba'u al-lahu ala qulubi alladhina la ya'lamuna
fa-is'bir inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun wala yastakhiffannaka alladhina la yuqinuna
alif-lam-meem
til'ka ayatu al-kitabi al-hakimi
hudan warahmatan lil'muh'sinina
alladhina yuqimuna as-salata wayu'tuna az-zakata wahum bil-akhirati hum yuqinuna
ulaika ala hudan min rabbihim wa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
wamina an-nasi man yashtari lahwa al-hadithi liyudilla an sabili al-lahi bighayri il'min wayattakhidhaha huzuwan ulaika lahum adhabun muhinun
wa-idha tut'la alayhi ayatuna walla mus'takbiran ka-an lam yasma'ha ka-anna fi udhunayhi waqran fabashir'hu bi'adhabin alimin
inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati lahum jannatu an-na'imi
khalidina fiha wa'da al-lahi haqqan wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
khalaqa as-samawati bighayri amadin tarawnaha wa-alqa fi al-ardi rawasiya an tamida bikum wabatha fiha min kulli dabbatin wa-anzalna mina as-samai maan fa-anbatna fiha min kulli zawjin karimin
hadha khalqu al-lahi fa-aruni madha khalaqa alladhina min dunihi bali az-zalimuna fi dalalin mubinin
walaqad atayna luq'mana al-hik'mata ani ush'kur lillahi waman yashkur fa-innama yashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fa-inna al-laha ghaniyyun hamidun
wa-idh qala luq'manu li-ib'nihi wahuwa ya'izuhu yabunayya la tush'rik bil-lahi inna as-shir'ka lazul'mun azimun
wawassayna al-insana biwalidayhi hamalathu ummuhu wahnan ala wahnin wafisaluhu fi amayni ani ush'kur li waliwalidayka ilayya al-masiru

wa-in jahadaka ala an tush'rika bi ma laysa laka bihi il'mun fala tuti'huma wasahib'huma fi ad-dun'ya ma'rufan wa-ittabi' sabila man anaba ilayya thumma ilayya marji'ukum fa-unabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
yabunayya innaha in taku mith'qala habbatin min khardalin fatakun fi sakhratin aw fi as-samawati aw fi al-ardi yati biha al-lahu inna al-laha latifun khabirun
yabunayya aqimi as-salata wamur bil-ma'rufi wa-in'ha ani al-munkari wa-is'bir ala ma asabaka inna dhalika min azmi al-umuri
wala tusa'ir khaddaka lilnnasi wala tamshi fi al-ardi marahan inna al-laha la yuhibbu kulla mukh'talin fakhurin
wa-iq'sid fi mashyika wa-ugh'dud min sawtika inna ankara al-aswati lasawtu al-hamiri

alam taraw anna al-laha sakhara lakum ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi wa-asbagha alaykum ni'amahu zahiratan wabatinatan wamina an-nasi man yujadilu fi al-lahi bighayri il'min wala hudan wala kitabin munirin
wa-idha qila lahumu ittabi'u ma anzala al-lahu qalu bal nattabi'u ma wajadna alayhi abaana awalaw kana as-shaytanu yad'uhum ila adhabi as-sa'iri
waman yus'lim wajhahu ila al-lahi wahuwa muh'sinun faqadi is'tamsaka bil-'ur'wati al-wuth'qa wa-ila al-lahi aqibatu al-umuri
waman kafara fala yahzunka kuf'ruhu ilayna marji'uhum fanunabbi-uhum bima amilu inna al-laha alimun bidhati as-suduri
numatti'uhum qalilan thumma nadtarruhum ila adhabin ghalizin
wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda layaqulunna al-lahu quli al-hamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna
lillahi ma fi as-samawati wal-ardi inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-hamidu
walaw annama fi al-ardi min shajaratin aqlamun wal-bahru yamudduhu min ba'dihi sab'atu abhurin ma nafidat kalimatu al-lahi inna al-laha azizun hakimun
ma khalqukum wala ba'thukum illa kanafsin wahidatin inna al-laha sami'un basirun
alam tara anna al-laha yuliju al-layla fi an-nahari wayuliju an-nahara fi al-layli wasakhara as-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri ila ajalin musamman wa-anna al-laha bima ta'maluna khabirun
dhalika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-haqu wa-anna ma yad'una min dunihi al-batilu wa-anna al-laha huwa al-'aliyu al-kabiru
alam tara anna al-ful'ka tajri fi al-bahri bini'mati al-lahi liyuriyakum min ayatihi inna fi dhalika laayatin likulli sabbarin shakurin
wa-idha ghashiyahum mawjun kaz-zulali da'awu al-laha mukh'lisina lahu ad-dina falamma najjahum ila al-bari famin'hum muq'tasidun wama yajhadu biayatina illa kullu khattarin kafurin

yaayyuha an-nasu ittaqu rabbakum wa-ikh'shaw yawman la yajzi walidun an waladihi wala mawludun huwa jazin an walidihi shayan inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun fala taghurrannakumu al-hayatu ad-dun'ya wala yaghurrannakum bil-lahi al-gharuru
inna al-laha indahu il'mu as-sa'ati wayunazzilu al-ghaytha waya'lamu ma fi al-arhami wama tadri nafsun madha taksibu ghadan wama tadri nafsun bi-ayyi ardin tamutu inna al-laha alimun khabirun
alif-lam-meem
tanzilu al-kitabi la rayba fihi min rabbi al-'alamina
am yaquluna if'tarahu bal huwa al-haqu min rabbika litundhira qawman ma atahum min nadhirin min qablika la'allahum yahtaduna
al-lahu alladhi khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi ma lakum min dunihi min waliyyin wala shafi'in afala tatadhakkaruna
yudabbiru al-amra mina as-samai ila al-ardi thumma ya'ruju ilayhi fi yawmin kana miq'daruhu alfa sanatin mimma ta'udduna
dhalika alimu al-ghaybi was-shahadati al-'azizu ar-rahimu
alladhi ahsana kulla shayin khalaqahu wabada-a khalqa al-insani min tinin
thumma ja'ala naslahu min sulalatin min main mahinin
thumma sawwahu wanafakha fihi min ruhihi waja'ala lakumu as-sam'a wal-absara wal-afidata qalilan ma tashkuruna
waqalu a-idha dalalna fi al-ardi a-inna lafi khalqin jadidin bal hum biliqai rabbihim kafiruna
qul yatawaffakum malaku al-mawti alladhi wukkila bikum thumma ila rabbikum tur'ja'una
walaw tara idhi al-muj'rimuna nakisu ruusihim inda rabbihim rabbana absarna wasami'na fa-ir'ji'na na'mal salihan inna muqinuna
walaw shi'na laatayna kulla nafsin hudaha walakin haqqa al-qawlu minni la-amla-anna jahannama mina al-jinati wan-nasi ajma'ina
fadhuqu bima nasitum liqaa yawmikum hadha inna nasinakum wadhuqu adhaba al-khul'di bima kuntum ta'maluna
innama yu'minu biayatina alladhina idha dhukkiru biha kharru sujjadan wasabbahu bihamdi rabbihim wahum la yastakbiruna
tatajafa junubuhum ani al-madaji'i yad'una rabbahum khawfan watama'an wamimma razaqnahum yunfiquna
fala ta'lamu nafsun ma ukh'fiya lahum min qurrati a'yunin jazaan bima kanu ya'maluna
afaman kana mu'minan kaman kana fasiqan la yastawuna
amma alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati falahum jannatu al-mawa nuzulan bima kanu ya'maluna
wa-amma alladhina fasaqu famawahumu an-naru kullama aradu an yakhruju min'ha u'idu fiha waqila lahum dhuqu adhaba an-nari alladhi kuntum bihi tukadhibuna
walanudhiqannahum mina al-'adhabi al-adna duna al-'adhabi al-akbari la'allahum yarji'una
waman azlamu mimman dhukkira biayati rabbihi thumma a'rada anha inna mina al-muj'rimina muntaqimuna
walaqad atayna musa al-kitaba fala takun fi mir'yatin min liqaihi waja'alnahu hudan libani is'raila
waja'alna min'hum a-immatan yahduna bi-amrina lamma sabaru wakanu biayatina yuqinuna
inna rabbaka huwa yafsilu baynahum yawma al-qiyamati fima kanu fihi yakhtalifuna
awalam yahdi lahum kam ahlakna min qablihim mina al-quruni yamshuna fi masakinihim inna fi dhalika laayatin afala yasma'una
awalam yaraw anna nasuqu al-maa ila al-ardi al-juruzi fanukh'riju bihi zar'an takulu min'hu an'amuhum wa-anfusuhum afala yub'siruna
wayaquluna mata hadha al-fathu in kuntum sadiqina
qul yawma al-fathi la yanfa'u alladhina kafaru imanuhum wala hum yunzaruna
fa-a'rid anhum wa-intazir innahum muntaziruna
yaayyuha an-nabiyu ittaqi al-laha wala tuti'i al-kafirina wal-munafiqina inna al-laha kana aliman hakiman
wa-ittabi' ma yuha ilayka min rabbika inna al-laha kana bima ta'maluna khabiran
watawakkal ala al-lahi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan

ma ja'ala al-lahu lirajulin min qalbayni fi jawfihi wama ja'ala azwajakumu allai tuzahiruna min'hunna ummahatikum wama ja'ala ad'iyaakum abnaakum dhalikum qawlukum bi-afwahikum wal-lahu yaqulu al-haqa wahuwa yahdi as-sabila

id'uhum liabaihim huwa aqsatu inda al-lahi fa-in lam ta'lamu abaahum fa-ikh'wanukum fi ad-dini wamawalikum walaysa alaykum junahun fima akhtatum bihi walakin ma ta'ammadat qulubukum wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman

an-nabiyu awla bil-mu'minina min anfusihim wa-azwajuhu ummahatuhum wa-ulu al-arhami ba'duhum awla biba'din fi kitabi al-lahi mina al-mu'minina wal-muhajirina illa an taf 'alu ila awliyaikum ma'rufan kana dhalika fi al-kitabi masturan
wa-idh akhadhna mina an-nabiyina mithaqahum waminka wamin nuhin wa-ib'rahima wamusa wa'isa ib'ni maryama wa-akhadhna min'hum mithaqan ghalizan
liyasala as-sadiqina an sid'qihim wa-a'adda lil'kafirina adhaban aliman
yaayyuha alladhina amanu udh'kuru ni'mata al-lahi alaykum idh jaatkum junudun fa-arsalna alayhim rihan wajunudan lam tarawha wakana al-lahu bima ta'maluna basiran
idh jaukum min fawqikum wamin asfala minkum wa-idh zaghati al-absaru wabalaghati al-qulubu al-hanajira watazunnuna bil-lahi az-zununa
hunalika ub'tuliya al-mu'minuna wazul'zilu zil'zalan shadidan
wa-idh yaqulu al-munafiquna wa-alladhina fi qulubihim maradun ma wa'adana al-lahu warasuluhu illa ghururan
wa-idh qalat taifatun min'hum yaahla yathriba la muqama lakum fa-ir'ji'u wayastadhinu fariqun min'humu an-nabiya yaquluna inna buyutana awratun wama hiya bi'awratin in yuriduna illa firaran
walaw dukhilat alayhim min aqtariha thumma su-ilu al-fit'nata laatawha wama talabbathu biha illa yasiran
walaqad kanu ahadu al-laha min qablu la yuwalluna al-adbara wakana ahdu al-lahi masulan
qul lan yanfa'akumu al-firaru in farartum mina al-mawti awi al-qatli wa-idhan la tumatta'una illa qalilan
qul man dha alladhi ya'simukum mina al-lahi in arada bikum suan aw arada bikum rahmatan wala yajiduna lahum min duni al-lahi waliyyan wala nasiran
qad ya'lamu al-lahu al-mu'awiqina minkum wal-qailina li-ikh'wanihim halumma ilayna wala yatuna al-basa illa qalilan

ashihhatan alaykum fa-idha jaa al-khawfu ra-aytahum yanzuruna ilayka taduru a'yunuhum ka-alladhi yugh'sha alayhi mina al-mawti fa-idha dhahaba al-khawfu salaqukum bi-alsinatin hidadin ashihhatan ala al-khayri ulaika lam yu'minu fa-ahbata al-lahu a'malahum wakana dhalika ala al-lahi yasiran
yahsabuna al-ahzaba lam yadhhabu wa-in yati al-ahzabu yawaddu law annahum baduna fi al-a'rabi yasaluna an anbaikum walaw kanu fikum ma qatalu illa qalilan
laqad kana lakum fi rasuli al-lahi us'watun hasanatun liman kana yarju al-laha wal-yawma al-akhira wadhakara al-laha kathiran
walamma raa al-mu'minuna al-ahzaba qalu hadha ma wa'adana al-lahu warasuluhu wasadaqa al-lahu warasuluhu wama zadahum illa imanan watasliman
mina al-mu'minina rijalun sadaqu ma ahadu al-laha alayhi famin'hum man qada nahbahu wamin'hum man yantaziru wama baddalu tabdilan
liyajziya al-lahu as-sadiqina bisid'qihim wayu'adhiba al-munafiqina in shaa aw yatuba alayhim inna al-laha kana ghafuran rahiman
waradda al-lahu alladhina kafaru bighayzihim lam yanalu khayran wakafa al-lahu al-mu'minina al-qitala wakana al-lahu qawiyyan azizan
wa-anzala alladhina zaharuhum min ahli al-kitabi min sayasihim waqadhafa fi qulubihimu ar-ru'ba fariqan taqtuluna watasiruna fariqan
wa-awrathakum ardahum wadiyarahum wa-amwalahum wa-ardan lam tatauha wakana al-lahu ala kulli shayin qadiran
yaayyuha an-nabiyu qul li-azwajika in kuntunna turid'na al-hayata ad-dun'ya wazinataha fata'alayna umatti'kunna wa-usarrih'kunna sarahan jamilan
wa-in kuntunna turid'na al-laha warasulahu wad-dara al-akhirata fa-inna al-laha a'adda lil'muh'sinati minkunna ajran aziman
yanisaa an-nabiyi man yati minkunna bifahishatin mubayyinatin yuda'af laha al-'adhabu di'fayni wakana dhalika ala al-lahi yasiran
waman yaqnut minkunna lillahi warasulihi wata'mal salihan nu'tiha ajraha marratayni wa-a'tadna laha riz'qan kariman
yanisaa an-nabiyi lastunna ka-ahadin mina an-nisai ini ittaqaytunna fala takhda'na bil-qawli fayatma'a alladhi fi qalbihi maradun waqul'na qawlan ma'rufan

waqarna fi buyutikunna wala tabarrajna tabarruja al-jahiliyati al-ula wa-aqim'na as-salata waatina az-zakata wa-ati'na al-laha warasulahu innama yuridu al-lahu liyudh'hiba ankumu ar-rij'sa ahla al-bayti wayutahhirakum tathiran
wa-udh'kur'na ma yut'la fi buyutikunna min ayati al-lahi wal-hik'mati inna al-laha kana latifan khabiran

inna al-mus'limina wal-mus'limati wal-mu'minina wal-mu'minati wal-qanitina wal-qanitati was-sadiqina was-sadiqati was-sabirina was-sabirati wal-khashi'ina wal-khashi'ati wal-mutasadiqina wal-mutasadiqati was-saimina was-saimati wal-hafizina furujahum wal-hafizati wad-dhakirina al-laha kathiran wad-dhakirati a'adda al-lahu lahum maghfiratan wa-ajran aziman
wama kana limu'minin wala mu'minatin idha qada al-lahu warasuluhu amran an yakuna lahumu al-khiyaratu min amrihim waman ya'si al-laha warasulahu faqad dalla dalalan mubinan

wa-idh taqulu lilladhi an'ama al-lahu alayhi wa-an'amta alayhi amsik alayka zawjaka wa-ittaqi al-laha watukh'fi fi nafsika ma al-lahu mub'dihi watakhsha an-nasa wal-lahu ahaqqu an takhshahu falamma qada zaydun min'ha wataran zawwajnakaha likay la yakuna ala al-mu'minina harajun fi azwaji ad'iyaihim idha qadaw min'hunna wataran wakana amru al-lahi maf'ulan
ma kana ala an-nabiyi min harajin fima farada al-lahu lahu sunnata al-lahi fi alladhina khalaw min qablu wakana amru al-lahi qadaran maqduran
alladhina yuballighuna risalati al-lahi wayakhshawnahu wala yakhshawna ahadan illa al-laha wakafa bil-lahi hasiban
ma kana muhammadun aba ahadin min rijalikum walakin rasula al-lahi wakhatama an-nabiyina wakana al-lahu bikulli shayin aliman
yaayyuha alladhina amanu udh'kuru al-laha dhik'ran kathiran
wasabbihuhu buk'ratan wa-asilan
huwa alladhi yusalli alaykum wamalaikatuhu liyukh'rijakum mina az-zulumati ila an-nuri wakana bil-mu'minina rahiman
tahiyyatuhum yawma yalqawnahu salamun wa-a'adda lahum ajran kariman
yaayyuha an-nabiyu inna arsalnaka shahidan wamubashiran wanadhiran
wada'iyan ila al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirajan muniran
wabashiri al-mu'minina bi-anna lahum mina al-lahi fadlan kabiran
wala tuti'i al-kafirina wal-munafiqina wada' adhahum watawakkal ala al-lahi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan
yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha nakahtumu al-mu'minati thumma tallaqtumuhunna min qabli an tamassuhunna fama lakum alayhinna min iddatin ta'taddunaha famatti'uhunna wasarrihuhunna sarahan jamilan

yaayyuha an-nabiyu inna ahlalna laka azwajaka allati atayta ujurahunna wama malakat yaminuka mimma afaa al-lahu alayka wabanati ammika wabanati ammatika wabanati khalika wabanati khalatika allati hajarna ma'aka wa-im'ra-atan mu'minatan in wahabat nafsaha lilnnabiyyi in arada an-nabiyu an yastankihaha khalisatan laka min duni al-mu'minina qad alim'na ma faradna alayhim fi azwajihim wama malakat aymanuhum likayla yakuna alayka harajun wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman

tur'ji man tashau min'hunna watu'wi ilayka man tashau wamani ib'taghayta mimman azalta fala junaha alayka dhalika adna an taqarra a'yunuhunna wala yahzanna wayardayna bima ataytahunna kulluhunna wal-lahu ya'lamu ma fi qulubikum wakana al-lahu aliman haliman
la yahillu laka an-nisau min ba'du wala an tabaddala bihinna min azwajin walaw a'jabaka hus'nuhunna illa ma malakat yaminuka wakana al-lahu ala kulli shayin raqiban

yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tadkhulu buyuta an-nabiyi illa an yu'dhana lakum ila ta'amin ghayra nazirina inahu walakin idha du'itum fa-ud'khulu fa-idha ta'im'tum fa-intashiru wala mus'tanisina lihadithin inna dhalikum kana yu'dhi an-nabiya fayastahyi minkum wal-lahu la yastahyi mina al-haqi wa-idha sa-altumuhunna mata'an fasaluhunna min warai hijabin dhalikum atharu liqulubikum waqulubihinna wama kana lakum an tu'dhu rasula al-lahi wala an tankihu azwajahu min ba'dihi abadan inna dhalikum kana inda al-lahi aziman
in tub'du shayan aw tukh'fuhu fa-inna al-laha kana bikulli shayin aliman

la junaha alayhinna fi abaihinna wala abnaihinna wala ikh'wanihinna wala abnai ikh'wanihinna wala abnai akhawatihinna wala nisaihinna wala ma malakat aymanuhunna wa-ittaqina al-laha inna al-laha kana ala kulli shayin shahidan
inna al-laha wamalaikatahu yusalluna ala an-nabiyi yaayyuha alladhina amanu sallu alayhi wasallimu tasliman
inna alladhina yu'dhuna al-laha warasulahu la'anahumu al-lahu fi ad-dun'ya wal-akhirati wa-a'adda lahum adhaban muhinan
wa-alladhina yu'dhuna al-mu'minina wal-mu'minati bighayri ma ik'tasabu faqadi ih'tamalu buh'tanan wa-ith'man mubinan
yaayyuha an-nabiyu qul li-azwajika wabanatika wanisai al-mu'minina yud'nina alayhinna min jalabibihinna dhalika adna an yu'rafna fala yu'dhayna wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
la-in lam yantahi al-munafiquna wa-alladhina fi qulubihim maradun wal-mur'jifuna fi al-madinati lanugh'riyannaka bihim thumma la yujawirunaka fiha illa qalilan
mal'unina aynama thuqifu ukhidhu waquttilu taqtilan
sunnata al-lahi fi alladhina khalaw min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdilan
yasaluka an-nasu ani as-sa'ati qul innama il'muha inda al-lahi wama yud'rika la'alla as-sa'ata takunu qariban
inna al-laha la'ana al-kafirina wa-a'adda lahum sa'iran
khalidina fiha abadan la yajiduna waliyyan wala nasiran
yawma tuqallabu wujuhuhum fi an-nari yaquluna yalaytana ata'na al-laha wa-ata'na ar-rasula
waqalu rabbana inna ata'na sadatana wakubaraana fa-adalluna as-sabila
rabbana atihim di'fayni mina al-'adhabi wal-'anhum la'nan kabiran
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la takunu ka-alladhina adhaw musa fabarra-ahu al-lahu mimma qalu wakana inda al-lahi wajihan
yaayyuha alladhina amanu ittaqu al-laha waqulu qawlan sadidan
yus'lih lakum a'malakum wayaghfir lakum dhunubakum waman yuti'i al-laha warasulahu faqad faza fawzan aziman
inna aradna al-amanata ala as-samawati wal-ardi wal-jibali fa-abayna an yahmil'naha wa-ashfaqna min'ha wahamalaha al-insanu innahu kana zaluman jahulan
liyu'adhiba al-lahu al-munafiqina wal-munafiqati wal-mush'rikina wal-mush'rikati wayatuba al-lahu ala al-mu'minina wal-mu'minati wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
al-hamdu lillahi alladhi lahu ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi walahu al-hamdu fi al-akhirati wahuwa al-hakimu al-khabiru
ya'lamu ma yaliju fi al-ardi wama yakhruju min'ha wama yanzilu mina as-samai wama ya'ruju fiha wahuwa ar-rahimu al-ghafuru

waqala alladhina kafaru la tatina as-sa'atu qul bala warabbi latatiyannakum alimi al-ghaybi la ya'zubu anhu mith'qalu dharratin fi as-samawati wala fi al-ardi wala asgharu min dhalika wala akbaru illa fi kitabin mubinin
liyajziya alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati ulaika lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karimun
wa-alladhina sa'aw fi ayatina mu'ajizina ulaika lahum adhabun min rij'zin alimun
wayara alladhina utu al-'il'ma alladhi unzila ilayka min rabbika huwa al-haqa wayahdi ila sirati al-'azizi al-hamidi
waqala alladhina kafaru hal nadullukum ala rajulin yunabbi-ukum idha muzziq'tum kulla mumazzaqin innakum lafi khalqin jadidin
aftara ala al-lahi kadhiban am bihi jinnatun bali alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati fi al-'adhabi wad-dalali al-ba'idi
afalam yaraw ila ma bayna aydihim wama khalfahum mina as-samai wal-ardi in nasha nakhsif bihimu al-arda aw nus'qit alayhim kisafan mina as-samai inna fi dhalika laayatan likulli abdin munibin
walaqad atayna dawuda minna fadlan yajibalu awwibi ma'ahu wat-tayra wa-alanna lahu al-hadida
ani i'mal sabighatin waqaddir fi as-sardi wa-i'malu salihan inni bima ta'maluna basirun

walisulaymana ar-riha ghuduwwuha shahrun warawahuha shahrun wa-asalna lahu ayna al-qit'ri wamina al-jini man ya'malu bayna yadayhi bi-idh'ni rabbihi waman yazigh min'hum an amrina nudhiq'hu min adhabi as-sa'iri
ya'maluna lahu ma yashau min mahariba watamathila wajifanin kal-jawabi waqudurin rasiyatin i'malu ala dawuda shuk'ran waqalilun min ibadiya as-shakuru
falamma qadayna alayhi al-mawta ma dallahum ala mawtihi illa dabbatu al-ardi takulu minsa-atahu falamma kharra tabayyanati al-jinu an law kanu ya'lamuna al-ghayba ma labithu fi al-'adhabi al-muhini
laqad kana lisaba-in fi maskanihim ayatun jannatani an yaminin washimalin kulu min riz'qi rabbikum wa-ush'kuru lahu baldatun tayyibatun warabbun ghafurun
fa-a'radu fa-arsalna alayhim sayla al-'arimi wabaddalnahum bijannatayhim jannatayni dhawatay ukulin khamtin wa-athlin washayin min sid'rin qalilin
dhalika jazaynahum bima kafaru wahal nujazi illa al-kafura
waja'alna baynahum wabayna al-qura allati barakna fiha quran zahiratan waqaddarna fiha as-sayra siru fiha layaliya wa-ayyaman aminina
faqalu rabbana ba'id bayna asfarina wazalamu anfusahum faja'alnahum ahaditha wamazzaqnahum kulla mumazzaqin inna fi dhalika laayatin likulli sabbarin shakurin
walaqad saddaqa alayhim ib'lisu zannahu fa-ittaba'uhu illa fariqan mina al-mu'minina
wama kana lahu alayhim min sul'tanin illa lina'lama man yu'minu bil-akhirati mimman huwa min'ha fi shakkin warabbuka ala kulli shayin hafizun
quli id'u alladhina za'amtum min duni al-lahi la yamlikuna mith'qala dharratin fi as-samawati wala fi al-ardi wama lahum fihima min shir'kin wama lahu min'hum min zahirin
wala tanfa'u as-shafa'atu indahu illa liman adhina lahu hatta idha fuzzi'a an qulubihim qalu madha qala rabbukum qalu al-haqa wahuwa al-'aliyu al-kabiru
qul man yarzuqukum mina as-samawati wal-ardi quli al-lahu wa-inna aw iyyakum la'ala hudan aw fi dalalin mubinin
qul la tus'aluna amma ajramna wala nus'alu amma ta'maluna
qul yajma'u baynana rabbuna thumma yaftahu baynana bil-haqi wahuwa al-fatahu al-'alimu
qul aruniya alladhina alhaqtum bihi shurakaa kalla bal huwa al-lahu al-'azizu al-hakimu
wama arsalnaka illa kaffatan lilnnasi bashiran wanadhiran walakinna akthara an-nasi la ya'lamuna
wayaquluna mata hadha al-wa'du in kuntum sadiqina
qul lakum mi'adu yawmin la tastakhiruna anhu sa'atan wala tastaqdimuna

waqala alladhina kafaru lan nu'mina bihadha al-qur'ani wala bi-alladhi bayna yadayhi walaw tara idhi az-zalimuna mawqufuna inda rabbihim yarji'u ba'duhum ila ba'din al-qawla yaqulu alladhina us'tud'ifu lilladhina is'takbaru lawla antum lakunna mu'minina
qala alladhina is'takbaru lilladhina us'tud'ifu anahnu sadadnakum ani al-huda ba'da idh jaakum bal kuntum muj'rimina

waqala alladhina us'tud'ifu lilladhina is'takbaru bal makru al-layli wan-nahari idh tamurunana an nakfura bil-lahi wanaj'ala lahu andadan wa-asarru an-nadamata lamma ra-awu al-'adhaba waja'alna al-aghlala fi a'naqi alladhina kafaru hal yuj'zawna illa ma kanu ya'maluna
wama arsalna fi qaryatin min nadhirin illa qala mut'rafuha inna bima ur'sil'tum bihi kafiruna
waqalu nahnu aktharu amwalan wa-awladan wama nahnu bimu'adhabina
qul inna rabbi yabsutu ar-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru walakinna akthara an-nasi la ya'lamuna
wama amwalukum wala awladukum bi-allati tuqarribukum indana zul'fa illa man amana wa'amila salihan fa-ulaika lahum jazau ad-di'fi bima amilu wahum fi al-ghurufati aminuna
wa-alladhina yas'awna fi ayatina mu'ajizina ulaika fi al-'adhabi muh'daruna
qul inna rabbi yabsutu ar-riz'qa liman yashau min ibadihi wayaqdiru lahu wama anfaqtum min shayin fahuwa yukh'lifuhu wahuwa khayru ar-raziqina
wayawma yahshuruhum jami'an thumma yaqulu lil'malaikati ahaulai iyyakum kanu ya'buduna
qalu sub'hanaka anta waliyyuna min dunihim bal kanu ya'buduna al-jina aktharuhum bihim mu'minuna
fal-yawma la yamliku ba'dukum liba'din naf 'an wala darran wanaqulu lilladhina zalamu dhuqu adhaba an-nari allati kuntum biha tukadhibuna

wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qalu ma hadha illa rajulun yuridu an yasuddakum amma kana ya'budu abaukum waqalu ma hadha illa if'kun muf'taran waqala alladhina kafaru lil'haqqi lamma jaahum in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
wama ataynahum min kutubin yadrusunaha wama arsalna ilayhim qablaka min nadhirin
wakadhaba alladhina min qablihim wama balaghu mi'shara ma ataynahum fakadhabu rusuli fakayfa kana nakiri
qul innama a'izukum biwahidatin an taqumu lillahi mathna wafurada thumma tatafakkaru ma bisahibikum min jinnatin in huwa illa nadhirun lakum bayna yaday adhabin shadidin
qul ma sa-altukum min ajrin fahuwa lakum in ajriya illa ala al-lahi wahuwa ala kulli shayin shahidun
qul inna rabbi yaqdhifu bil-haqi allamu al-ghuyubi
qul jaa al-haqu wama yub'di-u al-batilu wama yu'idu
qul in dalaltu fa-innama adillu ala nafsi wa-ini ih'tadaytu fabima yuhi ilayya rabbi innahu sami'un qaribun
walaw tara idh fazi'u fala fawta wa-ukhidhu min makanin qaribin
waqalu amanna bihi wa-anna lahumu at-tanawushu min makanin ba'idin
waqad kafaru bihi min qablu wayaqdhifuna bil-ghaybi min makanin ba'idin
wahila baynahum wabayna ma yashtahuna kama fu'ila bi-ashya'ihim min qablu innahum kanu fi shakkin muribin
al-hamdu lillahi fatiri as-samawati wal-ardi ja'ili al-malaikati rusulan uli ajnihatin mathna wathulatha waruba'a yazidu fi al-khalqi ma yashau inna al-laha ala kulli shayin qadirun
ma yaftahi al-lahu lilnnasi min rahmatin fala mum'sika laha wama yum'sik fala mur'sila lahu min ba'dihi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
yaayyuha an-nasu udh'kuru ni'mata al-lahi alaykum hal min khaliqin ghayru al-lahi yarzuqukum mina as-samai wal-ardi la ilaha illa huwa fa-anna tu'fakuna
wa-in yukadhibuka faqad kudhibat rusulun min qablika wa-ila al-lahi tur'ja'u al-umuru
yaayyuha an-nasu inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun fala taghurrannakumu al-hayatu ad-dun'ya wala yaghurrannakum bil-lahi al-gharuru
inna as-shaytana lakum aduwwun fa-ittakhidhuhu aduwwan innama yad'u hiz'bahu liyakunu min ashabi as-sa'iri
alladhina kafaru lahum adhabun shadidun wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabirun
afaman zuyyina lahu suu amalihi faraahu hasanan fa-inna al-laha yudillu man yashau wayahdi man yashau fala tadhhab nafsuka alayhim hasaratin inna al-laha alimun bima yasna'una
wal-lahu alladhi arsala ar-riyaha fatuthiru sahaban fasuq'nahu ila baladin mayyitin fa-ahyayna bihi al-arda ba'da mawtiha kadhalika an-nushuru

man kana yuridu al-'izata falillahi al-'izatu jami'an ilayhi yas'adu al-kalimu at-tayibu wal-'amalu as-salihu yarfa'uhu wa-alladhina yamkuruna as-sayiati lahum adhabun shadidun wamakru ulaika huwa yaburu

wal-lahu khalaqakum min turabin thumma min nut'fatin thumma ja'alakum azwajan wama tahmilu min untha wala tada'u illa bi'il'mihi wama yu'ammaru min mu'ammarin wala yunqasu min umurihi illa fi kitabin inna dhalika ala al-lahi yasirun

wama yastawi al-bahrani hadha adhbun furatun saighun sharabuhu wahadha mil'hun ujajun wamin kullin takuluna lahman tariyyan watastakhrijuna hil'yatan talbasunaha watara al-ful'ka fihi mawakhira litabtaghu min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuruna

yuliju al-layla fi an-nahari wayuliju an-nahara fi al-layli wasakhara as-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri li-ajalin musamman dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum lahu al-mul'ku wa-alladhina tad'una min dunihi ma yamlikuna min qit'mirin
in tad'uhum la yasma'u du'aakum walaw sami'u ma is'tajabu lakum wayawma al-qiyamati yakfuruna bishir'kikum wala yunabbi-uka mith'lu khabirin
