wat-tayra mahshuratan kullun lahu awwabun
washadadna mul'kahu waataynahu al-hik'mata wafasla al-khitabi
wahal ataka naba-u al-khasmi idh tasawwaru al-mih'raba
idh dakhalu ala dawuda fafazi'a min'hum qalu la takhaf khasmani bagha ba'duna ala ba'din fa-uh'kum baynana bil-haqi wala tush'tit wa-ih'dina ila sawai as-sirati
inna hadha akhi lahu tis'un watis'una na'jatan waliya na'jatun wahidatun faqala akfil'niha wa'azzani fi al-khitabi

qala laqad zalamaka bisuali na'jatika ila ni'ajihi wa-inna kathiran mina al-khulatai layabghi ba'duhum ala ba'din illa alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati waqalilun ma hum wazanna dawudu annama fatannahu fa-is'taghfara rabbahu wakharra raki'an wa-anaba
faghafarna lahu dhalika wa-inna lahu indana lazul'fa wahus'na maabin

yadawudu inna ja'alnaka khalifatan fi al-ardi fa-uh'kum bayna an-nasi bil-haqi wala tattabi'i al-hawa fayudillaka an sabili al-lahi inna alladhina yadilluna an sabili al-lahi lahum adhabun shadidun bima nasu yawma al-hisabi
wama khalaqna as-samaa wal-arda wama baynahuma batilan dhalika zannu alladhina kafaru fawaylun lilladhina kafaru mina an-nari
am naj'alu alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati kal-muf'sidina fi al-ardi am naj'alu al-mutaqina kal-fujari
kitabun anzalnahu ilayka mubarakun liyaddabbaru ayatihi waliyatadhakkara ulu al-albabi
wawahabna lidawuda sulaymana ni'ma al-'abdu innahu awwabun
idh urida alayhi bil-'ashiyi as-safinatu al-jiyadu
faqala inni ahbabtu hubba al-khayri an dhik'ri rabbi hatta tawarat bil-hijabi
rudduha alayya fatafiqa mashan bil-suqi wal-a'naqi
walaqad fatanna sulaymana wa-alqayna ala kur'siyyihi jasadan thumma anaba
qala rabbi igh'fir li wahab li mul'kan la yanbaghi li-ahadin min ba'di innaka anta al-wahabu
fasakharna lahu ar-riha tajri bi-amrihi rukhaan haythu asaba
was-shayatina kulla bannain waghawwasin
waakharina muqarranina fi al-asfadi
hadha atauna fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri hisabin
wa-inna lahu indana lazul'fa wahus'na maabin
wa-udh'kur abdana ayyuba idh nada rabbahu anni massaniya as-shaytanu binus'bin wa'adhabin
ur'kud birij'lika hadha mugh'tasalun baridun washarabun
wawahabna lahu ahlahu wamith'lahum ma'ahum rahmatan minna wadhik'ra li-uli al-albabi
wakhudh biyadika digh'than fa-id'rib bihi wala tahnath inna wajadnahu sabiran ni'ma al-'abdu innahu awwabun
wa-udh'kur ibadana ib'rahima wa-is'haqa waya'quba uli al-aydi wal-absari
inna akhlasnahum bikhalisatin dhik'ra ad-dari
wa-innahum indana lamina al-mus'tafayna al-akhyari
wa-udh'kur is'ma'ila wal-yasa'a wadha al-kif'li wakullun mina al-akhyari
hadha dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqina lahus'na maabin
jannati adnin mufattahatan lahumu al-abwabu
muttakiina fiha yad'una fiha bifakihatin kathiratin washarabin
wa'indahum qasiratu at-tarfi atrabun
hadha ma tu'aduna liyawmi al-hisabi
inna hadha lariz'quna ma lahu min nafadin
hadha wa-inna lilttaghina lasharra maabin
jahannama yaslawnaha fabi'sa al-mihadu
hadha falyadhuquhu hamimun waghassaqun
waakharu min shaklihi azwajun
hadha fawjun muq'tahimun ma'akum la marhaban bihim innahum salu an-nari
qalu bal antum la marhaban bikum antum qaddamtumuhu lana fabi'sa al-qararu
qalu rabbana man qaddama lana hadha fazid'hu adhaban di'fan fi an-nari
waqalu ma lana la nara rijalan kunna na'udduhum mina al-ashrari
attakhadhnahum sikh'riyyan am zaghat anhumu al-absaru
inna dhalika lahaqqun takhasumu ahli an-nari
qul innama ana mundhirun wama min ilahin illa al-lahu al-wahidu al-qaharu
rabbu as-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma al-'azizu al-ghafaru
qul huwa naba-on azimun
antum anhu mu'riduna
ma kana liya min il'min bil-mala-i al-a'la idh yakhtasimuna
in yuha ilayya illa annama ana nadhirun mubinun
idh qala rabbuka lil'malaikati inni khaliqun basharan min tinin
fa-idha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fihi min ruhi faqa'u lahu sajidina
fasajada al-malaikatu kulluhum ajma'una
illa ib'lisa is'takbara wakana mina al-kafirina
qala yaib'lisu ma mana'aka an tasjuda lima khalaqtu biyadayya astakbarta am kunta mina al-'alina
qala ana khayrun min'hu khalaqtani min narin wakhalaqtahu min tinin
qala fa-ukh'ruj min'ha fa-innaka rajimun
wa-inna alayka la'nati ila yawmi ad-dini
qala rabbi fa-anzir'ni ila yawmi yub'athuna
qala fa-innaka mina al-munzarina
ila yawmi al-waqti al-ma'lumi
qala fabi'izzatika la-ugh'wiyannahum ajma'ina
illa ibadaka min'humu al-mukh'lasina
qala fal-haqu wal-haqa aqulu
la-amla-anna jahannama minka wamimman tabi'aka min'hum ajma'ina
qul ma asalukum alayhi min ajrin wama ana mina al-mutakalifina
in huwa illa dhik'run lil'alamina
walata'lamunna naba-ahu ba'da hinin
tanzilu al-kitabi mina al-lahi al-'azizi al-hakimi
inna anzalna ilayka al-kitaba bil-haqi fa-u'budi al-laha mukh'lisan lahu ad-dina

ala lillahi ad-dinu al-khalisu wa-alladhina ittakhadhu min dunihi awliyaa ma na'buduhum illa liyuqarribuna ila al-lahi zul'fa inna al-laha yahkumu baynahum fi ma hum fihi yakhtalifuna inna al-laha la yahdi man huwa kadhibun kaffarun
law arada al-lahu an yattakhidha waladan la-is'tafa mimma yakhluqu ma yashau sub'hanahu huwa al-lahu al-wahidu al-qaharu
khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi yukawwiru al-layla ala an-nahari wayukawwiru an-nahara ala al-layli wasakhara as-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri li-ajalin musamman ala huwa al-'azizu al-ghafaru

khalaqakum min nafsin wahidatin thumma ja'ala min'ha zawjaha wa-anzala lakum mina al-an'ami thamaniyata azwajin yakhluqukum fi butuni ummahatikum khalqan min ba'di khalqin fi zulumatin thalathin dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum lahu al-mul'ku la ilaha illa huwa fa-anna tus'rafuna

in takfuru fa-inna al-laha ghaniyyun ankum wala yarda li'ibadihi al-kuf'ra wa-in tashkuru yardahu lakum wala taziru waziratun wiz'ra ukh'ra thumma ila rabbikum marji'ukum fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna innahu alimun bidhati as-suduri

wa-idha massa al-insana durrun da'a rabbahu muniban ilayhi thumma idha khawwalahu ni'matan min'hu nasiya ma kana yad'u ilayhi min qablu waja'ala lillahi andadan liyudilla an sabilihi qul tamatta' bikuf'rika qalilan innaka min ashabi an-nari
amman huwa qanitun anaa al-layli sajidan waqaiman yahdharu al-akhirata wayarju rahmata rabbihi qul hal yastawi alladhina ya'lamuna wa-alladhina la ya'lamuna innama yatadhakkaru ulu al-albabi
qul ya'ibadi alladhina amanu ittaqu rabbakum lilladhina ahsanu fi hadhihi ad-dun'ya hasanatun wa-ardu al-lahi wasi'atun innama yuwaffa as-sabiruna ajrahum bighayri hisabin
qul inni umir'tu an a'buda al-laha mukh'lisan lahu ad-dina
wa-umir'tu li-an akuna awwala al-mus'limina
qul inni akhafu in asaytu rabbi adhaba yawmin azimin
quli al-laha a'budu mukh'lisan lahu dini
fa-u'budu ma shi'tum min dunihi qul inna al-khasirina alladhina khasiru anfusahum wa-ahlihim yawma al-qiyamati ala dhalika huwa al-khus'ranu al-mubinu
lahum min fawqihim zulalun mina an-nari wamin tahtihim zulalun dhalika yukhawwifu al-lahu bihi ibadahu ya'ibadi fa-ittaquni
wa-alladhina ij'tanabu at-taghuta an ya'buduha wa-anabu ila al-lahi lahumu al-bush'ra fabashir ibadi
alladhina yastami'una al-qawla fayattabi'una ahsanahu ulaika alladhina hadahumu al-lahu wa-ulaika hum ulu al-albabi
afaman haqqa alayhi kalimatu al-'adhabi afa-anta tunqidhu man fi an-nari
lakini alladhina ittaqaw rabbahum lahum ghurafun min fawqiha ghurafun mabniyyatun tajri min tahtiha al-anharu wa'da al-lahi la yukh'lifu al-lahu al-mi'ada

alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina as-samai maan fasalakahu yanabi'a fi al-ardi thumma yukh'riju bihi zar'an mukh'talifan alwanuhu thumma yahiju fatarahu mus'farran thumma yaj'aluhu hutaman inna fi dhalika ladhik'ra li-uli al-albabi
afaman sharaha al-lahu sadrahu lil'is'lami fahuwa ala nurin min rabbihi fawaylun lil'qasiyati qulubuhum min dhik'ri al-lahi ulaika fi dalalin mubinin

al-lahu nazzala ahsana al-hadithi kitaban mutashabihan mathaniya taqsha'irru min'hu juludu alladhina yakhshawna rabbahum thumma talinu juluduhum waqulubuhum ila dhik'ri al-lahi dhalika huda al-lahi yahdi bihi man yashau waman yud'lili al-lahu fama lahu min hadin
afaman yattaqi biwajhihi sua al-'adhabi yawma al-qiyamati waqila lilzzalimina dhuqu ma kuntum taksibuna
kadhaba alladhina min qablihim fa-atahumu al-'adhabu min haythu la yash'uruna
fa-adhaqahumu al-lahu al-khiz'ya fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya wala'adhabu al-akhirati akbaru law kanu ya'lamuna
walaqad darabna lilnnasi fi hadha al-qur'ani min kulli mathalin la'allahum yatadhakkaruna
qur'anan arabiyyan ghayra dhi iwajin la'allahum yattaquna
daraba al-lahu mathalan rajulan fihi shurakau mutashakisuna warajulan salaman lirajulin hal yastawiyani mathalan al-hamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna
innaka mayyitun wa-innahum mayyituna
thumma innakum yawma al-qiyamati inda rabbikum takhtasimuna
faman azlamu mimman kadhaba ala al-lahi wakadhaba bil-sid'qi idh jaahu alaysa fi jahannama mathwan lil'kafirina
wa-alladhi jaa bil-sid'qi wasaddaqa bihi ulaika humu al-mutaquna
lahum ma yashauna inda rabbihim dhalika jazau al-muh'sinina
liyukaffira al-lahu anhum aswa-a alladhi amilu wayajziyahum ajrahum bi-ahsani alladhi kanu ya'maluna
alaysa al-lahu bikafin abdahu wayukhawwifunaka bi-alladhina min dunihi waman yud'lili al-lahu fama lahu min hadin
waman yahdi al-lahu fama lahu min mudillin alaysa al-lahu bi'azizin dhi intiqamin

wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda layaqulunna al-lahu qul afara-aytum ma tad'una min duni al-lahi in aradaniya al-lahu bidurrin hal hunna kashifatu durrihi aw aradani birahmatin hal hunna mum'sikatu rahmatihi qul hasbiya al-lahu alayhi yatawakkalu al-mutawakiluna
qul yaqawmi i'malu ala makanatikum inni amilun fasawfa ta'lamuna
man yatihi adhabun yukh'zihi wayahillu alayhi adhabun muqimun
inna anzalna alayka al-kitaba lilnnasi bil-haqi famani ih'tada falinafsihi waman dalla fa-innama yadillu alayha wama anta alayhim biwakilin

al-lahu yatawaffa al-anfusa hina mawtiha wa-allati lam tamut fi manamiha fayum'siku allati qada alayha al-mawta wayur'silu al-ukh'ra ila ajalin musamman inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yatafakkaruna
ami ittakhadhu min duni al-lahi shufa'aa qul awalaw kanu la yamlikuna shayan wala ya'qiluna
qul lillahi as-shafa'atu jami'an lahu mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi thumma ilayhi tur'ja'una
wa-idha dhukira al-lahu wahdahu ish'ma-azzat qulubu alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati wa-idha dhukira alladhina min dunihi idha hum yastabshiruna
quli al-lahuma fatira as-samawati wal-ardi alima al-ghaybi was-shahadati anta tahkumu bayna ibadika fi ma kanu fihi yakhtalifuna
walaw anna lilladhina zalamu ma fi al-ardi jami'an wamith'lahu ma'ahu la-if'tadaw bihi min sui al-'adhabi yawma al-qiyamati wabada lahum mina al-lahi ma lam yakunu yahtasibuna
wabada lahum sayyiatu ma kasabu wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
fa-idha massa al-insana durrun da'ana thumma idha khawwalnahu ni'matan minna qala innama utituhu ala il'min bal hiya fit'natun walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
qad qalaha alladhina min qablihim fama aghna anhum ma kanu yaksibuna
fa-asabahum sayyiatu ma kasabu wa-alladhina zalamu min haulai sayusibuhum sayyiatu ma kasabu wama hum bimu'jizina
awalam ya'lamu anna al-laha yabsutu ar-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
qul ya'ibadiya alladhina asrafu ala anfusihim la taqnatu min rahmati al-lahi inna al-laha yaghfiru ad-dhunuba jami'an innahu huwa al-ghafuru ar-rahimu
wa-anibu ila rabbikum wa-aslimu lahu min qabli an yatiyakumu al-'adhabu thumma la tunsaruna
wa-ittabi'u ahsana ma unzila ilaykum min rabbikum min qabli an yatiyakumu al-'adhabu baghtatan wa-antum la tash'uruna
an taqula nafsun yahasrata ala ma farrattu fi janbi al-lahi wa-in kuntu lamina as-sakhirina
aw taqula law anna al-laha hadani lakuntu mina al-mutaqina
aw taqula hina tara al-'adhaba law anna li karratan fa-akuna mina al-muh'sinina
bala qad jaatka ayati fakadhabta biha wa-is'takbarta wakunta mina al-kafirina
wayawma al-qiyamati tara alladhina kadhabu ala al-lahi wujuhuhum mus'waddatun alaysa fi jahannama mathwan lil'mutakabbirina
wayunajji al-lahu alladhina ittaqaw bimafazatihim la yamassuhumu as-suu wala hum yahzanuna
al-lahu khaliqu kulli shayin wahuwa ala kulli shayin wakilun
lahu maqalidu as-samawati wal-ardi wa-alladhina kafaru biayati al-lahi ulaika humu al-khasiruna
qul afaghayra al-lahi tamurunni a'budu ayyuha al-jahiluna
walaqad uhiya ilayka wa-ila alladhina min qablika la-in ashrakta layahbatanna amaluka walatakunanna mina al-khasirina
bali al-laha fa-u'bud wakun mina as-shakirina
wama qadaru al-laha haqqa qadrihi wal-ardu jami'an qabdatuhu yawma al-qiyamati was-samawatu matwiyyatun biyaminihi sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yush'rikuna
wanufikha fi as-suri fasa'iqa man fi as-samawati waman fi al-ardi illa man shaa al-lahu thumma nufikha fihi ukh'ra fa-idha hum qiyamun yanzuruna
wa-ashraqati al-ardu binuri rabbiha wawudi'a al-kitabu wajia bil-nabiyina was-shuhadai waqudiya baynahum bil-haqi wahum la yuz'lamuna
wawuffiyat kullu nafsin ma amilat wahuwa a'lamu bima yaf 'aluna

wasiqa alladhina kafaru ila jahannama zumaran hatta idha jauha futihat abwabuha waqala lahum khazanatuha alam yatikum rusulun minkum yatluna alaykum ayati rabbikum wayundhirunakum liqaa yawmikum hadha qalu bala walakin haqqat kalimatu al-'adhabi ala al-kafirina
qila ud'khulu abwaba jahannama khalidina fiha fabi'sa mathwa al-mutakabirina
wasiqa alladhina ittaqaw rabbahum ila al-janati zumaran hatta idha jauha wafutihat abwabuha waqala lahum khazanatuha salamun alaykum tib'tum fa-ud'khuluha khalidina
waqalu al-hamdu lillahi alladhi sadaqana wa'dahu wa-awrathana al-arda natabawwa-u mina al-janati haythu nashau fani'ma ajru al-'amilina
watara al-malaikata haffina min hawli al-'arshi yusabbihuna bihamdi rabbihim waqudiya baynahum bil-haqi waqila al-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
ha-meem
tanzilu al-kitabi mina al-lahi al-'azizi al-'alimi
ghafiri ad-dhanbi waqabili at-tawbi shadidi al-'iqabi dhi at-tawli la ilaha illa huwa ilayhi al-masiru
ma yujadilu fi ayati al-lahi illa alladhina kafaru fala yaghrur'ka taqallubuhum fi al-biladi
kadhabat qablahum qawmu nuhin wal-ahzabu min ba'dihim wahammat kullu ummatin birasulihim liyakhudhuhu wajadalu bil-batili liyud'hidu bihi al-haqa fa-akhadhtuhum fakayfa kana iqabi
wakadhalika haqqat kalimatu rabbika ala alladhina kafaru annahum ashabu an-nari

alladhina yahmiluna al-'arsha waman hawlahu yusabbihuna bihamdi rabbihim wayu'minuna bihi wayastaghfiruna lilladhina amanu rabbana wasi'ta kulla shayin rahmatan wa'il'man fa-igh'fir lilladhina tabu wa-ittaba'u sabilaka waqihim adhaba al-jahimi
rabbana wa-adkhil'hum jannati adnin allati wa'adttahum waman salaha min abaihim wa-azwajihim wadhurriyyatihim innaka anta al-'azizu al-hakimu
waqihimu as-sayiati waman taqi as-sayiati yawma-idhin faqad rahim'tahu wadhalika huwa al-fawzu al-'azimu
inna alladhina kafaru yunadawna lamaqtu al-lahi akbaru min maqtikum anfusakum idh tud'awna ila al-imani fatakfuruna
qalu rabbana amattana ith'natayni wa-ahyaytana ith'natayni fa-i'tarafna bidhunubina fahal ila khurujin min sabilin
dhalikum bi-annahu idha du'iya al-lahu wahdahu kafartum wa-in yush'rak bihi tu'minu fal-huk'mu lillahi al-'aliyi al-kabiri
huwa alladhi yurikum ayatihi wayunazzilu lakum mina as-samai riz'qan wama yatadhakkaru illa man yunibu
fa-id'u al-laha mukh'lisina lahu ad-dina walaw kariha al-kafiruna
rafi'u ad-darajati dhu al-'arshi yul'qi ar-ruha min amrihi ala man yashau min ibadihi liyundhira yawma at-talaqi
yawma hum barizuna la yakhfa ala al-lahi min'hum shayon limani al-mul'ku al-yawma lillahi al-wahidi al-qahari
al-yawma tuj'za kullu nafsin bima kasabat la zul'ma al-yawma inna al-laha sari'u al-hisabi
wa-andhir'hum yawma al-azifati idhi al-qulubu lada al-hanajiri kazimina ma lilzzalimina min hamimin wala shafi'in yuta'u
ya'lamu khainata al-a'yuni wama tukh'fi as-suduru
wal-lahu yaqdi bil-haqi wa-alladhina yad'una min dunihi la yaqduna bishayin inna al-laha huwa as-sami'u al-basiru

awalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina kanu min qablihim kanu hum ashadda min'hum quwwatan waatharan fi al-ardi fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunubihim wama kana lahum mina al-lahi min waqin
dhalika bi-annahum kanat tatihim rusuluhum bil-bayinati fakafaru fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu innahu qawiyyun shadidu al-'iqabi
walaqad arsalna musa biayatina wasul'tanin mubinin
ila fir'awna wahamana waqaruna faqalu sahirun kadhabun
falamma jaahum bil-haqi min indina qalu uq'tulu abnaa alladhina amanu ma'ahu wa-is'tahyu nisaahum wama kaydu al-kafirina illa fi dalalin
waqala fir'awnu dharuni aqtul musa walyad'u rabbahu inni akhafu an yubaddila dinakum aw an yuz'hira fi al-ardi al-fasada
waqala musa inni udh'tu birabbi warabbikum min kulli mutakabbirin la yu'minu biyawmi al-hisabi

waqala rajulun mu'minun min ali fir'awna yaktumu imanahu ataqtuluna rajulan an yaqula rabbiya al-lahu waqad jaakum bil-bayinati min rabbikum wa-in yaku kadhiban fa'alayhi kadhibuhu wa-in yaku sadiqan yusib'kum ba'du alladhi ya'idukum inna al-laha la yahdi man huwa mus'rifun kadhabun
yaqawmi lakumu al-mul'ku al-yawma zahirina fi al-ardi faman yansuruna min basi al-lahi in jaana qala fir'awnu ma urikum illa ma ara wama ahdikum illa sabila ar-rashadi
waqala alladhi amana yaqawmi inni akhafu alaykum mith'la yawmi al-ahzabi
mith'la dabi qawmi nuhin wa'adin wathamuda wa-alladhina min ba'dihim wama al-lahu yuridu zul'man lil'ibadi
wayaqawmi inni akhafu alaykum yawma at-tanadi
yawma tuwalluna mud'birina ma lakum mina al-lahi min asimin waman yud'lili al-lahu fama lahu min hadin

walaqad jaakum yusufu min qablu bil-bayinati fama zil'tum fi shakkin mimma jaakum bihi hatta idha halaka qul'tum lan yab'atha al-lahu min ba'dihi rasulan kadhalika yudillu al-lahu man huwa mus'rifun mur'tabun
alladhina yujadiluna fi ayati al-lahi bighayri sul'tanin atahum kabura maqtan inda al-lahi wa'inda alladhina amanu kadhalika yatba'u al-lahu ala kulli qalbi mutakabbirin jabbarin
waqala fir'awnu yahamanu ib'ni li sarhan la'alli ablughu al-asbaba
asbaba as-samawati fa-attali'a ila ilahi musa wa-inni la-azunnuhu kadhiban wakadhalika zuyyina lifir'awna suu amalihi wasudda ani as-sabili wama kaydu fir'awna illa fi tababin
waqala alladhi amana yaqawmi ittabi'uni ahdikum sabila ar-rashadi
yaqawmi innama hadhihi al-hayatu ad-dun'ya mata'un wa-inna al-akhirata hiya daru al-qarari
man amila sayyi-atan fala yuj'za illa mith'laha waman amila salihan min dhakarin aw untha wahuwa mu'minun fa-ulaika yadkhuluna al-janata yur'zaquna fiha bighayri hisabin
wayaqawmi ma li ad'ukum ila an-najati watad'unani ila an-nari
tad'unani li-akfura bil-lahi wa-ush'rika bihi ma laysa li bihi il'mun wa-ana ad'ukum ila al-'azizi al-ghafari
la jarama annama tad'unani ilayhi laysa lahu da'watun fi ad-dun'ya wala fi al-akhirati wa-anna maraddana ila al-lahi wa-anna al-mus'rifina hum ashabu an-nari
fasatadhkuruna ma aqulu lakum wa-ufawwidu amri ila al-lahi inna al-laha basirun bil-'ibadi
fawaqahu al-lahu sayyiati ma makaru wahaqa biali fir'awna suu al-'adhabi
an-naru yu'raduna alayha ghuduwwan wa'ashiyyan wayawma taqumu as-sa'atu adkhilu ala fir'awna ashadda al-'adhabi
wa-idh yatahajjuna fi an-nari fayaqulu ad-du'afau lilladhina is'takbaru inna kunna lakum taba'an fahal antum mugh'nuna anna nasiban mina an-nari
qala alladhina is'takbaru inna kullun fiha inna al-laha qad hakama bayna al-'ibadi
waqala alladhina fi an-nari likhazanati jahannama id'u rabbakum yukhaffif anna yawman mina al-'adhabi
qalu awalam taku tatikum rusulukum bil-bayinati qalu bala qalu fa-id'u wama du'au al-kafirina illa fi dalalin
inna lanansuru rusulana wa-alladhina amanu fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya wayawma yaqumu al-ashhadu
yawma la yanfa'u az-zalimina ma'dhiratuhum walahumu al-la'natu walahum suu ad-dari
walaqad atayna musa al-huda wa-awrathna bani is'raila al-kitaba
hudan wadhik'ra li-uli al-albabi
fa-is'bir inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun wa-is'taghfir lidhanbika wasabbih bihamdi rabbika bil-'ashiyi wal-ib'kari
inna alladhina yujadiluna fi ayati al-lahi bighayri sul'tanin atahum in fi sudurihim illa kib'run ma hum bibalighihi fa-is'ta'idh bil-lahi innahu huwa as-sami'u al-basiru
lakhalqu as-samawati wal-ardi akbaru min khalqi an-nasi walakinna akthara an-nasi la ya'lamuna
wama yastawi al-a'ma wal-basiru wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati wala al-musiu qalilan ma tatadhakkaruna
inna as-sa'ata laatiyatun la rayba fiha walakinna akthara an-nasi la yu'minuna
waqala rabbukumu id'uni astajib lakum inna alladhina yastakbiruna an ibadati sayadkhuluna jahannama dakhirina
al-lahu alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-layla litaskunu fihi wan-nahara mub'siran inna al-laha ladhu fadlin ala an-nasi walakinna akthara an-nasi la yashkuruna
dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum khaliqu kulli shayin la ilaha illa huwa fa-anna tu'fakuna
kadhalika yu'faku alladhina kanu biayati al-lahi yajhaduna
al-lahu alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-arda qararan was-samaa binaan wasawwarakum fa-ahsana suwarakum warazaqakum mina at-tayibati dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum fatabaraka al-lahu rabbu al-'alamina
huwa al-hayu la ilaha illa huwa fa-id'uhu mukh'lisina lahu ad-dina al-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
qul inni nuhitu an a'buda alladhina tad'una min duni al-lahi lamma jaaniya al-bayinatu min rabbi wa-umir'tu an us'lima lirabbi al-'alamina

huwa alladhi khalaqakum min turabin thumma min nut'fatin thumma min alaqatin thumma yukh'rijukum tif'lan thumma litablughu ashuddakum thumma litakunu shuyukhan waminkum man yutawaffa min qablu walitablughu ajalan musamman wala'allakum ta'qiluna
huwa alladhi yuh'yi wayumitu fa-idha qada amran fa-innama yaqulu lahu kun fayakunu
alam tara ila alladhina yujadiluna fi ayati al-lahi anna yus'rafuna
alladhina kadhabu bil-kitabi wabima arsalna bihi rusulana fasawfa ya'lamuna
idhi al-aghlalu fi a'naqihim was-salasilu yus'habuna
fi al-hamimi thumma fi an-nari yus'jaruna
thumma qila lahum ayna ma kuntum tush'rikuna
min duni al-lahi qalu dallu anna bal lam nakun nad'u min qablu shayan kadhalika yudillu al-lahu al-kafirina
dhalikum bima kuntum tafrahuna fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi wabima kuntum tamrahuna
ud'khulu abwaba jahannama khalidina fiha fabi'sa mathwa al-mutakabirina
fa-is'bir inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun fa-imma nuriyannaka ba'da alladhi na'iduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilayna yur'ja'una

walaqad arsalna rusulan min qablika min'hum man qasasna alayka wamin'hum man lam naqsus alayka wama kana lirasulin an yatiya biayatin illa bi-idh'ni al-lahi fa-idha jaa amru al-lahi qudiya bil-haqi wakhasira hunalika al-mub'tiluna
al-lahu alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-an'ama litarkabu min'ha wamin'ha takuluna
walakum fiha manafi'u walitablughu alayha hajatan fi sudurikum wa'alayha wa'ala al-ful'ki tuh'maluna
wayurikum ayatihi fa-ayya ayati al-lahi tunkiruna
afalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablihim kanu akthara min'hum wa-ashadda quwwatan waatharan fi al-ardi fama aghna anhum ma kanu yaksibuna
falamma jaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati farihu bima indahum mina al-'il'mi wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
falamma ra-aw basana qalu amanna bil-lahi wahdahu wakafarna bima kunna bihi mush'rikina
falam yaku yanfa'uhum imanuhum lamma ra-aw basana sunnata al-lahi allati qad khalat fi ibadihi wakhasira hunalika al-kafiruna
Ha-meem
tanzilun mina ar-rahmani ar-rahimi
kitabun fussilat ayatuhu qur'anan arabiyyan liqawmin ya'lamuna
bashiran wanadhiran fa-a'rada aktharuhum fahum la yasma'una
waqalu qulubuna fi akinnatin mimma tad'una ilayhi wafi adhanina waqrun wamin baynina wabaynika hijabun fa-i'mal innana amiluna
qul innama ana basharun mith'lukum yuha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahun wahidun fa-is'taqimu ilayhi wa-is'taghfiruhu wawaylun lil'mush'rikina
alladhina la yu'tuna az-zakata wahum bil-akhirati hum kafiruna
inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati lahum ajrun ghayru mamnunin
qul a-innakum latakfuruna bi-alladhi khalaqa al-arda fi yawmayni wataj'aluna lahu andadan dhalika rabbu al-'alamina
waja'ala fiha rawasiya min fawqiha wabaraka fiha waqaddara fiha aqwataha fi arba'ati ayyamin sawaan lilssailina
thumma is'tawa ila as-samai wahiya dukhanun faqala laha walil'ardi i'tiya taw'an aw karhan qalata atayna tai'ina
faqadahunna sab'a samawatin fi yawmayni wa-awha fi kulli samain amraha wazayyanna as-samaa ad-dun'ya bimasabiha wahif'zan dhalika taqdiru al-'azizi al-'alimi
fa-in a'radu faqul andhartukum sa'iqatan mith'la sa'iqati adin wathamuda
idh jaathumu ar-rusulu min bayni aydihim wamin khalfihim alla ta'budu illa al-laha qalu law shaa rabbuna la-anzala malaikatan fa-inna bima ur'sil'tum bihi kafiruna
fa-amma adun fa-is'takbaru fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi waqalu man ashaddu minna quwwatan awalam yaraw anna al-laha alladhi khalaqahum huwa ashaddu min'hum quwwatan wakanu biayatina yajhaduna
fa-arsalna alayhim rihan sarsaran fi ayyamin nahisatin linudhiqahum adhaba al-khiz'yi fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya wala'adhabu al-akhirati akhza wahum la yunsaruna
wa-amma thamudu fahadaynahum fa-is'tahabbu al-'ama ala al-huda fa-akhadhathum sa'iqatu al-'adhabi al-huni bima kanu yaksibuna
wanajjayna alladhina amanu wakanu yattaquna
wayawma yuh'sharu a'dau al-lahi ila an-nari fahum yuza'una
hatta idha ma jauha shahida alayhim sam'uhum wa-absaruhum wajuluduhum bima kanu ya'maluna
waqalu lijuludihim lima shahidttum alayna qalu antaqana al-lahu alladhi antaqa kulla shayin wahuwa khalaqakum awwala marratin wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
wama kuntum tastatiruna an yashhada alaykum sam'ukum wala absarukum wala juludukum walakin zanantum anna al-laha la ya'lamu kathiran mimma ta'maluna
wadhalikum zannukumu alladhi zanantum birabbikum ardakum fa-asbahtum mina al-khasirina
fa-in yasbiru fan-naru mathwan lahum wa-in yasta'tibu fama hum mina al-mu'tabina
waqayyadna lahum quranaa fazayyanu lahum ma bayna aydihim wama khalfahum wahaqqa alayhimu al-qawlu fi umamin qad khalat min qablihim mina al-jini wal-insi innahum kanu khasirina
waqala alladhina kafaru la tasma'u lihadha al-qur'ani wal-ghaw fihi la'allakum taghlibuna
falanudhiqanna alladhina kafaru adhaban shadidan walanajziyannahum aswa-a alladhi kanu ya'maluna
dhalika jazau a'dai al-lahi an-naru lahum fiha daru al-khul'di jazaan bima kanu biayatina yajhaduna
waqala alladhina kafaru rabbana arina alladhayni adallana mina al-jini wal-insi naj'alhuma tahta aqdamina liyakuna mina al-asfalina
inna alladhina qalu rabbuna al-lahu thumma is'taqamu tatanazzalu alayhimu al-malaikatu alla takhafu wala tahzanu wa-abshiru bil-janati allati kuntum tu'aduna
nahnu awliyaukum fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya wafi al-akhirati walakum fiha ma tashtahi anfusukum walakum fiha ma tadda'una
nuzulan min ghafurin rahimin
waman ahsanu qawlan mimman da'a ila al-lahi wa'amila salihan waqala innani mina al-mus'limina
wala tastawi al-hasanatu wala as-sayi-atu id'fa' bi-allati hiya ahsanu fa-idha alladhi baynaka wabaynahu adawatun ka-annahu waliyyun hamimun
wama yulaqqaha illa alladhina sabaru wama yulaqqaha illa dhu hazzin azimin
wa-imma yanzaghannaka mina as-shaytani nazghun fa-is'ta'idh bil-lahi innahu huwa as-sami'u al-'alimu
wamin ayatihi al-laylu wan-naharu was-shamsu wal-qamaru la tasjudu lilshamsi wala lil'qamari wa-us'judu lillahi alladhi khalaqahunna in kuntum iyyahu ta'buduna
fa-ini is'takbaru fa-alladhina inda rabbika yusabbihuna lahu bi-al-layli wan-nahari wahum la yasamuna
wamin ayatihi annaka tara al-arda khashi'atan fa-idha anzalna alayha al-maa ih'tazzat warabat inna alladhi ahyaha lamuh'yi al-mawta innahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
inna alladhina yul'hiduna fi ayatina la yakhfawna alayna afaman yul'qa fi an-nari khayrun am man yati aminan yawma al-qiyamati i'malu ma shi'tum innahu bima ta'maluna basirun
inna alladhina kafaru bil-dhik'ri lamma jaahum wa-innahu lakitabun azizun
la yatihi al-batilu min bayni yadayhi wala min khalfihi tanzilun min hakimin hamidin
ma yuqalu laka illa ma qad qila lilrrusuli min qablika inna rabbaka ladhu maghfiratin wadhu iqabin alimin

walaw ja'alnahu qur'anan a'jamiyyan laqalu lawla fussilat ayatuhu a'jamiyyun wa'arabiyyun qul huwa lilladhina amanu hudan washifaon wa-alladhina la yu'minuna fi adhanihim waqrun wahuwa alayhim aman ulaika yunadawna min makanin ba'idin
walaqad atayna musa al-kitaba fa-ukh'tulifa fihi walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laqudiya baynahum wa-innahum lafi shakkin min'hu muribin
man amila salihan falinafsihi waman asaa fa'alayha wama rabbuka bizallamin lil'abidi
ilayhi yuraddu il'mu as-sa'ati wama takhruju min thamaratin min akmamiha wama tahmilu min untha wala tada'u illa bi'il'mihi wayawma yunadihim ayna shurakai qalu adhannaka ma minna min shahidin
wadalla anhum ma kanu yad'una min qablu wazannu ma lahum min mahisin
la yasamu al-insanu min du'ai al-khayri wa-in massahu as-sharu fayausun qanutun

wala-in adhaqnahu rahmatan minna min ba'di darraa massathu layaqulanna hadha li wama azunnu as-sa'ata qaimatan wala-in ruji'tu ila rabbi inna li indahu lalhus'na falanunabbi-anna alladhina kafaru bima amilu walanudhiqannahum min adhabin ghalizin
wa-idha an'amna ala al-insani a'rada wanaa bijanibihi wa-idha massahu as-sharu fadhu du'ain aridin
qul ara-aytum in kana min indi al-lahi thumma kafartum bihi man adallu mimman huwa fi shiqaqin ba'idin
sanurihim ayatina fi al-afaqi wafi anfusihim hatta yatabayyana lahum annahu al-haqu awalam yakfi birabbika annahu ala kulli shayin shahidun
ala innahum fi mir'yatin min liqai rabbihim ala innahu bikulli shayin muhitun
ha-meem
ain-seen-qaf
kadhalika yuhi ilayka wa-ila alladhina min qablika al-lahu al-'azizu al-hakimu
lahu ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi wahuwa al-'aliyu al-'azimu
takadu as-samawatu yatafattarna min fawqihinna wal-malaikatu yusabbihuna bihamdi rabbihim wayastaghfiruna liman fi al-ardi ala inna al-laha huwa al-ghafuru ar-rahimu
wa-alladhina ittakhadhu min dunihi awliyaa al-lahu hafizun alayhim wama anta alayhim biwakilin
wakadhalika awhayna ilayka qur'anan arabiyyan litundhira umma al-qura waman hawlaha watundhira yawma al-jam'i la rayba fihi fariqun fi al-janati wafariqun fi as-sa'iri
walaw shaa al-lahu laja'alahum ummatan wahidatan walakin yud'khilu man yashau fi rahmatihi waz-zalimuna ma lahum min waliyyin wala nasirin
ami ittakhadhu min dunihi awliyaa fal-lahu huwa al-waliyu wahuwa yuh'yi al-mawta wahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
wama ikh'talaftum fihi min shayin fahuk'muhu ila al-lahi dhalikumu al-lahu rabbi alayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi unibu
fatiru as-samawati wal-ardi ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwajan wamina al-an'ami azwajan yadhra-ukum fihi laysa kamith'lihi shayon wahuwa as-sami'u al-basiru
lahu maqalidu as-samawati wal-ardi yabsutu ar-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru innahu bikulli shayin alimun

shara'a lakum mina ad-dini ma wassa bihi nuhan wa-alladhi awhayna ilayka wama wassayna bihi ib'rahima wamusa wa'isa an aqimu ad-dina wala tatafarraqu fihi kabura ala al-mush'rikina ma tad'uhum ilayhi al-lahu yajtabi ilayhi man yashau wayahdi ilayhi man yunibu

wama tafarraqu illa min ba'di ma jaahumu al-'il'mu baghyan baynahum walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika ila ajalin musamman laqudiya baynahum wa-inna alladhina urithu al-kitaba min ba'dihim lafi shakkin min'hu muribin

falidhalika fa-ud'u wa-is'taqim kama umir'ta wala tattabi' ahwaahum waqul amantu bima anzala al-lahu min kitabin wa-umir'tu li-a'dila baynakumu al-lahu rabbuna warabbukum lana a'maluna walakum a'malukum la hujjata baynana wabaynakumu al-lahu yajma'u baynana wa-ilayhi al-masiru
wa-alladhina yuhajjuna fi al-lahi min ba'di ma us'tujiba lahu hujjatuhum dahidatun inda rabbihim wa'alayhim ghadabun walahum adhabun shadidun
al-lahu alladhi anzala al-kitaba bil-haqi wal-mizana wama yud'rika la'alla as-sa'ata qaribun
yasta'jilu biha alladhina la yu'minuna biha wa-alladhina amanu mush'fiquna min'ha waya'lamuna annaha al-haqu ala inna alladhina yumaruna fi as-sa'ati lafi dalalin ba'idin
al-lahu latifun bi'ibadihi yarzuqu man yashau wahuwa al-qawiyu al-'azizu
man kana yuridu hartha al-akhirati nazid lahu fi harthihi waman kana yuridu hartha ad-dun'ya nu'tihi min'ha wama lahu fi al-akhirati min nasibin
am lahum shurakau shara'u lahum mina ad-dini ma lam yadhan bihi al-lahu walawla kalimatu al-fasli laqudiya baynahum wa-inna az-zalimina lahum adhabun alimun
tara az-zalimina mush'fiqina mimma kasabu wahuwa waqi'un bihim wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati fi rawdati al-janati lahum ma yashauna inda rabbihim dhalika huwa al-fadlu al-kabiru

dhalika alladhi yubashiru al-lahu ibadahu alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati qul la asalukum alayhi ajran illa al-mawadata fi al-qur'ba waman yaqtarif hasanatan nazid lahu fiha hus'nan inna al-laha ghafurun shakurun
am yaquluna if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban fa-in yasha-i al-lahu yakhtim ala qalbika wayamhu al-lahu al-batila wayuhiqqu al-haqa bikalimatihi innahu alimun bidhati as-suduri
wahuwa alladhi yaqbalu at-tawbata an ibadihi waya'fu ani as-sayiati waya'lamu ma taf 'aluna
wayastajibu alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati wayaziduhum min fadlihi wal-kafiruna lahum adhabun shadidun
walaw basata al-lahu ar-riz'qa li'ibadihi labaghaw fi al-ardi walakin yunazzilu biqadarin ma yashau innahu bi'ibadihi khabirun basirun
wahuwa alladhi yunazzilu al-ghaytha min ba'di ma qanatu wayanshuru rahmatahu wahuwa al-waliyu al-hamidu
wamin ayatihi khalqu as-samawati wal-ardi wama batha fihima min dabbatin wahuwa ala jam'ihim idha yashau qadirun
wama asabakum min musibatin fabima kasabat aydikum waya'fu an kathirin
wama antum bimu'jizina fi al-ardi wama lakum min duni al-lahi min waliyyin wala nasirin
wamin ayatihi al-jawari fi al-bahri kal-a'lami
in yasha yus'kini ar-riha fayazlalna rawakida ala zahrihi inna fi dhalika laayatin likulli sabbarin shakurin
aw yubiq'hunna bima kasabu waya'fu an kathirin
waya'lama alladhina yujadiluna fi ayatina ma lahum min mahisin
fama utitum min shayin famata'u al-hayati ad-dun'ya wama inda al-lahi khayrun wa-abqa lilladhina amanu wa'ala rabbihim yatawakkaluna
wa-alladhina yajtanibuna kabaira al-ith'mi wal-fawahisha wa-idha ma ghadibu hum yaghfiruna
wa-alladhina is'tajabu lirabbihim wa-aqamu as-salata wa-amruhum shura baynahum wamimma razaqnahum yunfiquna
wa-alladhina idha asabahumu al-baghyu hum yantasiruna
wajazau sayyi-atin sayyi-atun mith'luha faman afa wa-aslaha fa-ajruhu ala al-lahi innahu la yuhibbu az-zalimina
walamani intasara ba'da zul'mihi fa-ulaika ma alayhim min sabilin
innama as-sabilu ala alladhina yazlimuna an-nasa wayabghuna fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi ulaika lahum adhabun alimun
walaman sabara waghafara inna dhalika lamin azmi al-umuri
waman yud'lili al-lahu fama lahu min waliyyin min ba'dihi watara az-zalimina lamma ra-awu al-'adhaba yaquluna hal ila maraddin min sabilin

watarahum yu'raduna alayha khashi'ina mina ad-dhuli yanzuruna min tarfin khafiyyin waqala alladhina amanu inna al-khasirina alladhina khasiru anfusahum wa-ahlihim yawma al-qiyamati ala inna az-zalimina fi adhabin muqimin
wama kana lahum min awliyaa yansurunahum min duni al-lahi waman yud'lili al-lahu fama lahu min sabilin
is'tajibu lirabbikum min qabli an yatiya yawmun la maradda lahu mina al-lahi ma lakum min malja-in yawma-idhin wama lakum min nakirin

fa-in a'radu fama arsalnaka alayhim hafizan in alayka illa al-balaghu wa-inna idha adhaqna al-insana minna rahmatan fariha biha wa-in tusib'hum sayyi-atun bima qaddamat aydihim fa-inna al-insana kafurun
lillahi mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi yakhluqu ma yashau yahabu liman yashau inathan wayahabu liman yashau ad-dhukura
aw yuzawwijuhum dhuk'ranan wa-inathan wayaj'alu man yashau aqiman innahu alimun qadirun
wama kana libasharin an yukallimahu al-lahu illa wahyan aw min warai hijabin aw yur'sila rasulan fayuhiya bi-idh'nihi ma yashau innahu aliyyun hakimun
wakadhalika awhayna ilayka ruhan min amrina ma kunta tadri ma al-kitabu wala al-imanu walakin ja'alnahu nuran nahdi bihi man nashau min ibadina wa-innaka latahdi ila siratin mus'taqimin
sirati al-lahi alladhi lahu ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi ala ila al-lahi tasiru al-umuru
ha-meem
wal-kitabi al-mubini
inna ja'alnahu qur'anan arabiyyan la'allakum ta'qiluna
wa-innahu fi ummi al-kitabi ladayna la'aliyyun hakimun
afanadribu ankumu ad-dhik'ra safhan an kuntum qawman mus'rifina
wakam arsalna min nabiyyin fi al-awalina
wama yatihim min nabiyyin illa kanu bihi yastahziuna
fa-ahlakna ashadda min'hum batshan wamada mathalu al-awalina
wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda layaqulunna khalaqahunna al-'azizu al-'alimu
alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-arda mahdan waja'ala lakum fiha subulan la'allakum tahtaduna
wa-alladhi nazzala mina as-samai maan biqadarin fa-ansharna bihi baldatan maytan kadhalika tukh'rajuna
wa-alladhi khalaqa al-azwaja kullaha waja'ala lakum mina al-ful'ki wal-an'ami ma tarkabuna
litastawu ala zuhurihi thumma tadhkuru ni'mata rabbikum idha is'tawaytum alayhi wataqulu sub'hana alladhi sakhara lana hadha wama kunna lahu muq'rinina
wa-inna ila rabbina lamunqalibuna
waja'alu lahu min ibadihi juz'an inna al-insana lakafurun mubinun
ami ittakhadha mimma yakhluqu banatin wa-asfakum bil-banina
wa-idha bushira ahaduhum bima daraba lilrrahmani mathalan zalla wajhuhu mus'waddan wahuwa kazimun
awaman yunasha-u fi al-hil'yati wahuwa fi al-khisami ghayru mubinin
waja'alu al-malaikata alladhina hum ibadu ar-rahmani inathan ashahidu khalqahum satuk'tabu shahadatuhum wayus'aluna
waqalu law shaa ar-rahmanu ma abadnahum ma lahum bidhalika min il'min in hum illa yakhrusuna
am ataynahum kitaban min qablihi fahum bihi mus'tamsikuna
bal qalu inna wajadna abaana ala ummatin wa-inna ala atharihim muh'taduna
wakadhalika ma arsalna min qablika fi qaryatin min nadhirin illa qala mut'rafuha inna wajadna abaana ala ummatin wa-inna ala atharihim muq'taduna
qala awalaw ji'tukum bi-ahda mimma wajadttum alayhi abaakum qalu inna bima ur'sil'tum bihi kafiruna
fa-intaqamna min'hum fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu al-mukadhibina
wa-idh qala ib'rahimu li-abihi waqawmihi innani baraon mimma ta'buduna
illa alladhi fatarani fa-innahu sayahdini
waja'alaha kalimatan baqiyatan fi aqibihi la'allahum yarji'una
bal matta'tu haulai waabaahum hatta jaahumu al-haqu warasulun mubinun
walamma jaahumu al-haqu qalu hadha sih'run wa-inna bihi kafiruna
waqalu lawla nuzzila hadha al-qur'anu ala rajulin mina al-qaryatayni azimin

ahum yaqsimuna rahmata rabbika nahnu qasamna baynahum ma'ishatahum fi al-hayati ad-dun'ya warafa'na ba'dahum fawqa ba'din darajatin liyattakhidha ba'duhum ba'dan sukh'riyyan warahmatu rabbika khayrun mimma yajma'una
walawla an yakuna an-nasu ummatan wahidatan laja'alna liman yakfuru bil-rahmani libuyutihim suqufan min fiddatin wama'arija alayha yazharuna
walibuyutihim abwaban wasururan alayha yattakiuna
wazukh'rufan wa-in kullu dhalika lamma mata'u al-hayati ad-dun'ya wal-akhiratu inda rabbika lil'muttaqina
waman ya'shu an dhik'ri ar-rahmani nuqayyid lahu shaytanan fahuwa lahu qarinun
wa-innahum layasuddunahum ani as-sabili wayahsabuna annahum muh'taduna
hatta idha jaana qala yalayta bayni wabaynaka bu'da al-mashriqayni fabi'sa al-qarinu
walan yanfa'akumu al-yawma idh zalamtum annakum fi al-'adhabi mush'tarikuna
afa-anta tus'mi'u as-suma aw tahdi al-'um'ya waman kana fi dalalin mubinin
fa-imma nadhhabanna bika fa-inna min'hum muntaqimuna
aw nuriyannaka alladhi wa'adnahum fa-inna alayhim muq'tadiruna
fa-is'tamsik bi-alladhi uhiya ilayka innaka ala siratin mus'taqimin
wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'aluna
wasal man arsalna min qablika min rusulina aja'alna min duni ar-rahmani alihatan yu'baduna
walaqad arsalna musa biayatina ila fir'awna wamala-ihi faqala inni rasulu rabbi al-'alamina
falamma jaahum biayatina idha hum min'ha yadhakuna
wama nurihim min ayatin illa hiya akbaru min ukh'tiha wa-akhadhnahum bil-'adhabi la'allahum yarji'una
waqalu yaayyuha as-sahiru ud'u lana rabbaka bima ahida indaka innana lamuh'taduna
falamma kashafna anhumu al-'adhaba idha hum yankuthuna
wanada fir'awnu fi qawmihi qala yaqawmi alaysa li mul'ku mis'ra wahadhihi al-anharu tajri min tahti afala tub'siruna
am ana khayrun min hadha alladhi huwa mahinun wala yakadu yubinu
falawla ul'qiya alayhi aswiratun min dhahabin aw jaa ma'ahu al-malaikatu muq'tarinina
fa-is'takhaffa qawmahu fa-ata'uhu innahum kanu qawman fasiqina
falamma asafuna intaqamna min'hum fa-aghraqnahum ajma'ina
faja'alnahum salafan wamathalan lil'akhirina
walamma duriba ub'nu maryama mathalan idha qawmuka min'hu yasidduna
waqalu aalihatuna khayrun am huwa ma darabuhu laka illa jadalan bal hum qawmun khasimuna
in huwa illa abdun an'amna alayhi waja'alnahu mathalan libani is'raila
walaw nashau laja'alna minkum malaikatan fi al-ardi yakhlufuna
wa-innahu la'il'mun lilssa'ati fala tamtarunna biha wa-ittabi'uni hadha siratun mus'taqimun
wala yasuddannakumu as-shaytanu innahu lakum aduwwun mubinun
walamma jaa isa bil-bayinati qala qad ji'tukum bil-hik'mati wali-ubayyina lakum ba'da alladhi takhtalifuna fihi fa-ittaqu al-laha wa-ati'uni
inna al-laha huwa rabbi warabbukum fa-u'buduhu hadha siratun mus'taqimun
fa-ikh'talafa al-ahzabu min baynihim fawaylun lilladhina zalamu min adhabi yawmin alimin
hal yanzuruna illa as-sa'ata an tatiyahum baghtatan wahum la yash'uruna
al-akhilau yawma-idhin ba'duhum liba'din aduwwun illa al-mutaqina
ya'ibadi la khawfun alaykumu al-yawma wala antum tahzanuna
alladhina amanu biayatina wakanu mus'limina
ud'khulu al-janata antum wa-azwajukum tuh'baruna
yutafu alayhim bisihafin min dhahabin wa-akwabin wafiha ma tashtahihi al-anfusu wataladhu al-a'yunu wa-antum fiha khaliduna
watil'ka al-janatu allati urith'tumuha bima kuntum ta'maluna
lakum fiha fakihatun kathiratun min'ha takuluna
inna al-muj'rimina fi adhabi jahannama khaliduna
la yufattaru anhum wahum fihi mub'lisuna
wama zalamnahum walakin kanu humu az-zalimina
wanadaw yamaliku liyaqdi alayna rabbuka qala innakum makithuna
laqad ji'nakum bil-haqi walakinna aktharakum lil'haqqi karihuna
am abramu amran fa-inna mub'rimuna
am yahsabuna anna la nasma'u sirrahum wanajwahum bala warusuluna ladayhim yaktubuna
qul in kana lilrrahmani waladun fa-ana awwalu al-'abidina
sub'hana rabbi as-samawati wal-ardi rabbi al-'arshi amma yasifuna
fadharhum yakhudu wayal'abu hatta yulaqu yawmahumu alladhi yu'aduna
wahuwa alladhi fi as-samai ilahun wafi al-ardi ilahun wahuwa al-hakimu al-'alimu
watabaraka alladhi lahu mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma wa'indahu il'mu as-sa'ati wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
wala yamliku alladhina yad'una min dunihi as-shafa'ata illa man shahida bil-haqi wahum ya'lamuna
wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqahum layaqulunna al-lahu fa-anna yu'fakuna
waqilihi yarabbi inna haulai qawmun la yu'minuna
fa-is'fah anhum waqul salamun fasawfa ya'lamuna
ha-meem
wal-kitabi al-mubini
inna anzalnahu fi laylatin mubarakatin inna kunna mundhirina
fiha yuf'raqu kullu amrin hakimin
amran min indina inna kunna mur'silina
rahmatan min rabbika innahu huwa as-sami'u al-'alimu
rabbi as-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma in kuntum muqinina
la ilaha illa huwa yuh'yi wayumitu rabbukum warabbu abaikumu al-awalina
bal hum fi shakkin yal'abuna
fa-ir'taqib yawma tati as-samau bidukhanin mubinin
yaghsha an-nasa hadha adhabun alimun
rabbana ik'shif anna al-'adhaba inna mu'minuna
anna lahumu ad-dhik'ra waqad jaahum rasulun mubinun
thumma tawallaw anhu waqalu mu'allamun majnunun
inna kashifu al-'adhabi qalilan innakum aiduna
yawma nabtishu al-batshata al-kub'ra inna muntaqimuna
walaqad fatanna qablahum qawma fir'awna wajaahum rasulun karimun
an addu ilayya ibada al-lahi inni lakum rasulun aminun
wa-an la ta'lu ala al-lahi inni atikum bisul'tanin mubinin
wa-inni udh'tu birabbi warabbikum an tarjumuni
wa-in lam tu'minu li fa-i'taziluni
fada'a rabbahu anna haulai qawmun muj'rimuna
fa-asri bi'ibadi laylan innakum muttaba'una
wa-ut'ruki al-bahra rahwan innahum jundun mugh'raquna
kam taraku min jannatin wa'uyunin
wazuru'in wamaqamin karimin
wana'matin kanu fiha fakihina
kadhalika wa-awrathnaha qawman akharina
fama bakat alayhimu as-samau wal-ardu wama kanu munzarina
walaqad najjayna bani is'raila mina al-'adhabi al-muhini
min fir'awna innahu kana aliyan mina al-mus'rifina
walaqadi ikh'tarnahum ala il'min ala al-'alamina
waataynahum mina al-ayati ma fihi balaon mubinun
inna haulai layaquluna
in hiya illa mawtatuna al-ula wama nahnu bimunsharina
fatu biabaina in kuntum sadiqina
ahum khayrun am qawmu tubba'in wa-alladhina min qablihim ahlaknahum innahum kanu muj'rimina
wama khalaqna as-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma la'ibina
ma khalaqnahuma illa bil-haqi walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
inna yawma al-fasli miqatuhum ajma'ina
yawma la yugh'ni mawlan an mawlan shayan wala hum yunsaruna
illa man rahima al-lahu innahu huwa al-'azizu ar-rahimu
inna shajarata az-zaqumi
ta'amu al-athimi
kal-muh'li yaghli fi al-butuni
kaghalyi al-hamimi
khudhuhu fa-i'tiluhu ila sawai al-jahimi
thumma subbu fawqa rasihi min adhabi al-hamimi
dhuq innaka anta al-'azizu al-karimu
inna hadha ma kuntum bihi tamtaruna
inna al-mutaqina fi maqamin aminin
fi jannatin wa'uyunin
yalbasuna min sundusin wa-is'tabraqin mutaqabilina
kadhalika wazawwajnahum bihurin inin
yad'una fiha bikulli fakihatin aminina
la yadhuquna fiha al-mawta illa al-mawtata al-ula wawaqahum adhaba al-jahimi
fadlan min rabbika dhalika huwa al-fawzu al-'azimu
fa-innama yassarnahu bilisanika la'allahum yatadhakkaruna
fa-ir'taqib innahum mur'taqibuna
ha-meem
tanzilu al-kitabi mina al-lahi al-'azizi al-hakimi
inna fi as-samawati wal-ardi laayatin lil'mu'minina
wafi khalqikum wama yabuthu min dabbatin ayatun liqawmin yuqinuna
wa-ikh'tilafi al-layli wan-nahari wama anzala al-lahu mina as-samai min riz'qin fa-ahya bihi al-arda ba'da mawtiha watasrifi ar-riyahi ayatun liqawmin ya'qiluna
til'ka ayatu al-lahi natluha alayka bil-haqi fabi-ayyi hadithin ba'da al-lahi waayatihi yu'minuna
waylun likulli affakin athimin
yasma'u ayati al-lahi tut'la alayhi thumma yusirru mus'takbiran ka-an lam yasma'ha fabashir'hu bi'adhabin alimin
wa-idha alima min ayatina shayan ittakhadhaha huzuwan ulaika lahum adhabun muhinun
min waraihim jahannamu wala yugh'ni anhum ma kasabu shayan wala ma ittakhadhu min duni al-lahi awliyaa walahum adhabun azimun
hadha hudan wa-alladhina kafaru biayati rabbihim lahum adhabun min rij'zin alimun
al-lahu alladhi sakhara lakumu al-bahra litajriya al-ful'ku fihi bi-amrihi walitabtaghu min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuruna
wasakhara lakum ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi jami'an min'hu inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yatafakkaruna
qul lilladhina amanu yaghfiru lilladhina la yarjuna ayyama al-lahi liyajziya qawman bima kanu yaksibuna
man amila salihan falinafsihi waman asaa fa'alayha thumma ila rabbikum tur'ja'una
walaqad atayna bani is'raila al-kitaba wal-huk'ma wan-nubuwata warazaqnahum mina at-tayibati wafaddalnahum ala al-'alamina
waataynahum bayyinatin mina al-amri fama ikh'talafu illa min ba'di ma jaahumu al-'il'mu baghyan baynahum inna rabbaka yaqdi baynahum yawma al-qiyamati fima kanu fihi yakhtalifuna
thumma ja'alnaka ala shari'atin mina al-amri fa-ittabi'ha wala tattabi' ahwaa alladhina la ya'lamuna
innahum lan yugh'nu anka mina al-lahi shayan wa-inna az-zalimina ba'duhum awliyau ba'din wal-lahu waliyyu al-mutaqina
hadha basairu lilnnasi wahudan warahmatun liqawmin yuqinuna
am hasiba alladhina ij'tarahu as-sayiati an naj'alahum ka-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati sawaan mahyahum wamamatuhum saa ma yahkumuna
wakhalaqa al-lahu as-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi walituj'za kullu nafsin bima kasabat wahum la yuz'lamuna
afara-ayta mani ittakhadha ilahahu hawahu wa-adallahu al-lahu ala il'min wakhatama ala sam'ihi waqalbihi waja'ala ala basarihi ghishawatan faman yahdihi min ba'di al-lahi afala tadhakkaruna
waqalu ma hiya illa hayatuna ad-dun'ya namutu wanahya wama yuh'likuna illa ad-dahru wama lahum bidhalika min il'min in hum illa yazunnuna
wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin ma kana hujjatahum illa an qalu i'tu biabaina in kuntum sadiqina
quli al-lahu yuh'yikum thumma yumitukum thumma yajma'ukum ila yawmi al-qiyamati la rayba fihi walakinna akthara an-nasi la ya'lamuna
walillahi mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi wayawma taqumu as-sa'atu yawma-idhin yakhsaru al-mub'tiluna
watara kulla ummatin jathiyatan kullu ummatin tud'a ila kitabiha al-yawma tuj'zawna ma kuntum ta'maluna
hadha kitabuna yantiqu alaykum bil-haqi inna kunna nastansikhu ma kuntum ta'maluna
fa-amma alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati fayud'khiluhum rabbuhum fi rahmatihi dhalika huwa al-fawzu al-mubinu
wa-amma alladhina kafaru afalam takun ayati tut'la alaykum fa-is'takbartum wakuntum qawman muj'rimina
wa-idha qila inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun was-sa'atu la rayba fiha qul'tum ma nadri ma as-sa'atu in nazunnu illa zannan wama nahnu bimus'tayqinina
wabada lahum sayyiatu ma amilu wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
waqila al-yawma nansakum kama nasitum liqaa yawmikum hadha wamawakumu an-naru wama lakum min nasirina
dhalikum bi-annakumu ittakhadhtum ayati al-lahi huzuwan wagharratkumu al-hayatu ad-dun'ya fal-yawma la yukh'rajuna min'ha wala hum yus'ta'tabuna
falillahi al-hamdu rabbi as-samawati warabbi al-ardi rabbi al-'alamina
walahu al-kib'riyau fi as-samawati wal-ardi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ha-meem
tanzilu al-kitabi mina al-lahi al-'azizi al-hakimi
ma khalaqna as-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma illa bil-haqi wa-ajalin musamman wa-alladhina kafaru amma undhiru mu'riduna
qul ara-aytum ma tad'una min duni al-lahi aruni madha khalaqu mina al-ardi am lahum shir'kun fi as-samawati i'tuni bikitabin min qabli hadha aw atharatin min il'min in kuntum sadiqina
waman adallu mimman yad'u min duni al-lahi man la yastajibu lahu ila yawmi al-qiyamati wahum an du'aihim ghafiluna
wa-idha hushira an-nasu kanu lahum a'daan wakanu bi'ibadatihim kafirina
wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qala alladhina kafaru lil'haqqi lamma jaahum hadha sih'run mubinun
am yaquluna if'tarahu qul ini if'taraytuhu fala tamlikuna li mina al-lahi shayan huwa a'lamu bima tufiduna fihi kafa bihi shahidan bayni wabaynakum wahuwa al-ghafuru ar-rahimu
qul ma kuntu bid'an mina ar-rusuli wama adri ma yuf'alu bi wala bikum in attabi'u illa ma yuha ilayya wama ana illa nadhirun mubinun
qul ara-aytum in kana min indi al-lahi wakafartum bihi washahida shahidun min bani is'raila ala mith'lihi faamana wa-is'takbartum inna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma az-zalimina
waqala alladhina kafaru lilladhina amanu law kana khayran ma sabaquna ilayhi wa-idh lam yahtadu bihi fasayaquluna hadha if'kun qadimun
wamin qablihi kitabu musa imaman warahmatan wahadha kitabun musaddiqun lisanan arabiyyan liyundhira alladhina zalamu wabush'ra lil'muh'sinina
inna alladhina qalu rabbuna al-lahu thumma is'taqamu fala khawfun alayhim wala hum yahzanuna
ulaika ashabu al-janati khalidina fiha jazaan bima kanu ya'maluna

wawassayna al-insana biwalidayhi ih'sanan hamalathu ummuhu kur'han wawada'athu kur'han wahamluhu wafisaluhu thalathuna shahran hatta idha balagha ashuddahu wabalagha arba'ina sanatan qala rabbi awzi'ni an ashkura ni'mataka allati an'amta alayya wa'ala walidayya wa-an a'mala salihan tardahu wa-aslih li fi dhurriyyati inni tub'tu ilayka wa-inni mina al-mus'limina
ulaika alladhina nataqabbalu anhum ahsana ma amilu wanatajawazu an sayyiatihim fi ashabi al-janati wa'da as-sid'qi alladhi kanu yu'aduna

wa-alladhi qala liwalidayhi uffin lakuma ata'idanini an ukh'raja waqad khalati al-qurunu min qabli wahuma yastaghithani al-laha waylaka amin inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun fayaqulu ma hadha illa asatiru al-awalina
ulaika alladhina haqqa alayhimu al-qawlu fi umamin qad khalat min qablihim mina al-jini wal-insi innahum kanu khasirina
walikullin darajatun mimma amilu waliyuwaffiyahum a'malahum wahum la yuz'lamuna

wayawma yu'radu alladhina kafaru ala an-nari adhhabtum tayyibatikum fi hayatikumu ad-dun'ya wa-is'tamta'tum biha fal-yawma tuj'zawna adhaba al-huni bima kuntum tastakbiruna fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi wabima kuntum tafsuquna
wa-udh'kur akha adin idh andhara qawmahu bil-ahqafi waqad khalati an-nudhuru min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi alla ta'budu illa al-laha inni akhafu alaykum adhaba yawmin azimin
qalu aji'tana litafikana an alihatina fatina bima ta'iduna in kunta mina as-sadiqina
qala innama al-'il'mu inda al-lahi wa-uballighukum ma ur'sil'tu bihi walakinni arakum qawman tajhaluna
falamma ra-awhu aridan mus'taqbila awdiyatihim qalu hadha aridun mum'tiruna bal huwa ma is'ta'jaltum bihi rihun fiha adhabun alimun
tudammiru kulla shayin bi-amri rabbiha fa-asbahu la yura illa masakinuhum kadhalika najzi al-qawma al-muj'rimina

walaqad makkannahum fima in makkannakum fihi waja'alna lahum sam'an wa-absaran wa-afidatan fama aghna anhum sam'uhum wala absaruhum wala afidatuhum min shayin idh kanu yajhaduna biayati al-lahi wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
walaqad ahlakna ma hawlakum mina al-qura wasarrafna al-ayati la'allahum yarji'una
falawla nasarahumu alladhina ittakhadhu min duni al-lahi qur'banan alihatan bal dallu anhum wadhalika if'kuhum wama kanu yaftaruna
wa-idh sarafna ilayka nafaran mina al-jini yastami'una al-qur'ana falamma hadaruhu qalu ansitu falamma qudiya wallaw ila qawmihim mundhirina
qalu yaqawmana inna sami'na kitaban unzila min ba'di musa musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi yahdi ila al-haqi wa-ila tariqin mus'taqimin
yaqawmana ajibu da'iya al-lahi waaminu bihi yaghfir lakum min dhunubikum wayujir'kum min adhabin alimin
waman la yujib da'iya al-lahi falaysa bimu'jizin fi al-ardi walaysa lahu min dunihi awliyau ulaika fi dalalin mubinin
awalam yaraw anna al-laha alladhi khalaqa as-samawati wal-arda walam ya'ya bikhalqihinna biqadirin ala an yuh'yiya al-mawta bala innahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
wayawma yu'radu alladhina kafaru ala an-nari alaysa hadha bil-haqi qalu bala warabbina qala fadhuqu al-'adhaba bima kuntum takfuruna
fa-is'bir kama sabara ulu al-'azmi mina ar-rusuli wala tasta'jil lahum ka-annahum yawma yarawna ma yu'aduna lam yalbathu illa sa'atan min naharin balaghun fahal yuh'laku illa al-qawmu al-fasiquna
alladhina kafaru wasaddu an sabili al-lahi adalla a'malahum
wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati waamanu bima nuzzila ala muhammadin wahuwa al-haqu min rabbihim kaffara anhum sayyiatihim wa-aslaha balahum
dhalika bi-anna alladhina kafaru ittaba'u al-batila wa-anna alladhina amanu ittaba'u al-haqa min rabbihim kadhalika yadribu al-lahu lilnnasi amthalahum

fa-idha laqitumu alladhina kafaru fadarba ar-riqabi hatta idha athkhantumuhum fashuddu al-wathaqa fa-imma mannan ba'du wa-imma fidaan hatta tada'a al-harbu awzaraha dhalika walaw yashau al-lahu la-intasara min'hum walakin liyabluwa ba'dakum biba'din wa-alladhina qutilu fi sabili al-lahi falan yudilla a'malahum
sayahdihim wayus'lihu balahum
wayud'khiluhumu al-janata arrafaha lahum
yaayyuha alladhina amanu in tansuru al-laha yansur'kum wayuthabbit aqdamakum
wa-alladhina kafaru fata'san lahum wa-adalla a'malahum
dhalika bi-annahum karihu ma anzala al-lahu fa-ahbata a'malahum
afalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablihim dammara al-lahu alayhim walil'kafirina amthaluha
dhalika bi-anna al-laha mawla alladhina amanu wa-anna al-kafirina la mawla lahum
inna al-laha yud'khilu alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu wa-alladhina kafaru yatamatta'una wayakuluna kama takulu al-an'amu wan-naru mathwan lahum
waka-ayyin min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatan min qaryatika allati akhrajatka ahlaknahum fala nasira lahum
afaman kana ala bayyinatin min rabbihi kaman zuyyina lahu suu amalihi wa-ittaba'u ahwaahum

mathalu al-janati allati wu'ida al-mutaquna fiha anharun min main ghayri asinin wa-anharun min labanin lam yataghayyar ta'muhu wa-anharun min khamrin ladhatin lilsharibina wa-anharun min asalin musaffan walahum fiha min kulli at-thamarati wamaghfiratun min rabbihim kaman huwa khalidun fi an-nari wasuqu maan hamiman faqatta'a am'aahum
wamin'hum man yastami'u ilayka hatta idha kharaju min indika qalu lilladhina utu al-'il'ma madha qala anifan ulaika alladhina taba'a al-lahu ala qulubihim wa-ittaba'u ahwaahum
wa-alladhina ih'tadaw zadahum hudan waatahum taqwahum
fahal yanzuruna illa as-sa'ata an tatiyahum baghtatan faqad jaa ashratuha fa-anna lahum idha jaathum dhik'rahum
fa-i'lam annahu la ilaha illa al-lahu wa-is'taghfir lidhanbika walil'mu'minina wal-mu'minati wal-lahu ya'lamu mutaqallabakum wamathwakum

wayaqulu alladhina amanu lawla nuzzilat suratun fa-idha unzilat suratun muh'kamatun wadhukira fiha al-qitalu ra-ayta alladhina fi qulubihim maradun yanzuruna ilayka nazara al-maghshiyi alayhi mina al-mawti fa-awla lahum
ta'atun waqawlun ma'rufun fa-idha azama al-amru falaw sadaqu al-laha lakana khayran lahum
fahal asaytum in tawallaytum an tuf'sidu fi al-ardi watuqatti'u arhamakum
ulaika alladhina la'anahumu al-lahu fa-asammahum wa-a'ma absarahum
afala yatadabbaruna al-qur'ana am ala qulubin aqfaluha
inna alladhina ir'taddu ala adbarihim min ba'di ma tabayyana lahumu al-huda as-shaytanu sawwala lahum wa-amla lahum
dhalika bi-annahum qalu lilladhina karihu ma nazzala al-lahu sanuti'ukum fi ba'di al-amri wal-lahu ya'lamu is'rarahum
fakayfa idha tawaffathumu al-malaikatu yadribuna wujuhahum wa-adbarahum
dhalika bi-annahumu ittaba'u ma askhata al-laha wakarihu rid'wanahu fa-ahbata a'malahum
am hasiba alladhina fi qulubihim maradun an lan yukh'rija al-lahu adghanahum
walaw nashau la-araynakahum fala'araftahum bisimahum walata'rifannahum fi lahni al-qawli wal-lahu ya'lamu a'malakum
walanabluwannakum hatta na'lama al-mujahidina minkum was-sabirina wanabluwa akhbarakum
inna alladhina kafaru wasaddu an sabili al-lahi washaqqu ar-rasula min ba'di ma tabayyana lahumu al-huda lan yadurru al-laha shayan wasayuh'bitu a'malahum
yaayyuha alladhina amanu ati'u al-laha wa-ati'u ar-rasula wala tub'tilu a'malakum
inna alladhina kafaru wasaddu an sabili al-lahi thumma matu wahum kuffarun falan yaghfira al-lahu lahum
fala tahinu watad'u ila as-salmi wa-antumu al-a'lawna wal-lahu ma'akum walan yatirakum a'malakum
innama al-hayatu ad-dun'ya la'ibun walahwun wa-in tu'minu watattaqu yu'tikum ujurakum wala yasalkum amwalakum
in yasalkumuha fayuh'fikum tabkhalu wayukh'rij adghanakum

haantum haulai tud'awna litunfiqu fi sabili al-lahi faminkum man yabkhalu waman yabkhal fa-innama yabkhalu an nafsihi wal-lahu al-ghaniyu wa-antumu al-fuqarau wa-in tatawallaw yastabdil qawman ghayrakum thumma la yakunu amthalakum
inna fatahna laka fathan mubinan
liyaghfira laka al-lahu ma taqaddama min dhanbika wama ta-akhara wayutimma ni'matahu alayka wayahdiyaka siratan mus'taqiman
wayansuraka al-lahu nasran azizan
huwa alladhi anzala as-sakinata fi qulubi al-mu'minina liyazdadu imanan ma'a imanihim walillahi junudu as-samawati wal-ardi wakana al-lahu aliman hakiman
liyud'khila al-mu'minina wal-mu'minati jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha wayukaffira anhum sayyiatihim wakana dhalika inda al-lahi fawzan aziman

wayu'adhiba al-munafiqina wal-munafiqati wal-mush'rikina wal-mush'rikati az-zanina bil-lahi zanna as-sawi alayhim dairatu as-sawi waghadiba al-lahu alayhim wala'anahum wa-a'adda lahum jahannama wasaat masiran
walillahi junudu as-samawati wal-ardi wakana al-lahu azizan hakiman
inna arsalnaka shahidan wamubashiran wanadhiran
litu'minu bil-lahi warasulihi watu'azziruhu watuwaqqiruhu watusabbihuhu buk'ratan wa-asilan
inna alladhina yubayi'unaka innama yubayi'una al-laha yadu al-lahi fawqa aydihim faman nakatha fa-innama yankuthu ala nafsihi waman awfa bima ahada alayhu al-laha fasayu'tihi ajran aziman

sayaqulu laka al-mukhalafuna mina al-a'rabi shaghalatna amwaluna wa-ahluna fa-is'taghfir lana yaquluna bi-alsinatihim ma laysa fi qulubihim qul faman yamliku lakum mina al-lahi shayan in arada bikum darran aw arada bikum naf 'an bal kana al-lahu bima ta'maluna khabiran
bal zanantum an lan yanqaliba ar-rasulu wal-mu'minuna ila ahlihim abadan wazuyyina dhalika fi qulubikum wazanantum zanna as-sawi wakuntum qawman buran
waman lam yu'min bil-lahi warasulihi fa-inna a'tadna lil'kafirina sa'iran
walillahi mul'ku as-samawati wal-ardi yaghfiru liman yashau wayu'adhibu man yashau wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman

sayaqulu al-mukhalafuna idha intalaqtum ila maghanima litakhudhuha dharuna nattabi'kum yuriduna an yubaddilu kalama al-lahi qul lan tattabi'una kadhalikum qala al-lahu min qablu fasayaquluna bal tahsudunana bal kanu la yafqahuna illa qalilan

qul lil'mukhallafina mina al-a'rabi satud'awna ila qawmin uli basin shadidin tuqatilunahum aw yus'limuna fa-in tuti'u yu'tikumu al-lahu ajran hasanan wa-in tatawallaw kama tawallaytum min qablu yu'adhib'kum adhaban aliman

laysa ala al-a'ma harajun wala ala al-a'raji harajun wala ala al-maridi harajun waman yuti'i al-laha warasulahu yud'khil'hu jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu waman yatawalla yu'adhib'hu adhaban aliman
laqad radiya al-lahu ani al-mu'minina idh yubayi'unaka tahta as-shajarati fa'alima ma fi qulubihim fa-anzala as-sakinata alayhim wa-athabahum fathan qariban
wamaghanima kathiratan yakhudhunaha wakana al-lahu azizan hakiman
wa'adakumu al-lahu maghanima kathiratan takhudhunaha fa'ajjala lakum hadhihi wakaffa aydiya an-nasi ankum walitakuna ayatan lil'mu'minina wayahdiyakum siratan mus'taqiman
wa-ukh'ra lam taqdiru alayha qad ahata al-lahu biha wakana al-lahu ala kulli shayin qadiran
walaw qatalakumu alladhina kafaru lawallawu al-adbara thumma la yajiduna waliyyan wala nasiran
sunnata al-lahi allati qad khalat min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdilan
wahuwa alladhi kaffa aydiyahum ankum wa-aydiyakum anhum bibatni makkata min ba'di an azfarakum alayhim wakana al-lahu bima ta'maluna basiran

humu alladhina kafaru wasaddukum ani al-masjidi al-harami wal-hadya ma'kufan an yablugha mahillahu walawla rijalun mu'minuna wanisaon mu'minatun lam ta'lamuhum an tatauhum fatusibakum min'hum ma'arratun bighayri il'min liyud'khila al-lahu fi rahmatihi man yashau law tazayyalu la'adhabna alladhina kafaru min'hum adhaban aliman

idh ja'ala alladhina kafaru fi qulubihimu al-hamiyata hamiyyata al-jahiliyati fa-anzala al-lahu sakinatahu ala rasulihi wa'ala al-mu'minina wa-alzamahum kalimata at-taqwa wakanu ahaqqa biha wa-ahlaha wakana al-lahu bikulli shayin aliman

laqad sadaqa al-lahu rasulahu ar-ru'ya bil-haqi latadkhulunna al-masjida al-harama in shaa al-lahu aminina muhalliqina ruusakum wamuqassirina la takhafuna fa'alima ma lam ta'lamu faja'ala min duni dhalika fathan qariban
huwa alladhi arsala rasulahu bil-huda wadini al-haqi liyuz'hirahu ala ad-dini kullihi wakafa bil-lahi shahidan

muhammadun rasulu al-lahi wa-alladhina ma'ahu ashiddau ala al-kufari ruhamau baynahum tarahum rukka'an sujjadan yabtaghuna fadlan mina al-lahi warid'wanan simahum fi wujuhihim min athari as-sujudi dhalika mathaluhum fi at-tawrati wamathaluhum fi al-injili kazar'in akhraja shatahu faazarahu fa-is'taghlaza fa-is'tawa ala suqihi yu'jibu az-zura'a liyaghiza bihimu al-kufara wa'ada al-lahu alladhina amanu wa'amilu as-salihati min'hum maghfiratan wa-ajran aziman
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tuqaddimu bayna yadayi al-lahi warasulihi wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha sami'un alimun
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tarfa'u aswatakum fawqa sawti an-nabiyi wala tajharu lahu bil-qawli kajahri ba'dikum liba'din an tahbata a'malukum wa-antum la tash'uruna
inna alladhina yaghudduna aswatahum inda rasuli al-lahi ulaika alladhina im'tahana al-lahu qulubahum lilttaqwa lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun azimun
inna alladhina yunadunaka min warai al-hujurati aktharuhum la ya'qiluna
walaw annahum sabaru hatta takhruja ilayhim lakana khayran lahum wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
yaayyuha alladhina amanu in jaakum fasiqun binaba-in fatabayyanu an tusibu qawman bijahalatin fatus'bihu ala ma fa'altum nadimina

wa-i'lamu anna fikum rasula al-lahi law yuti'ukum fi kathirin mina al-amri la'anittum walakinna al-laha habbaba ilaykumu al-imana wazayyanahu fi qulubikum wakarraha ilaykumu al-kuf'ra wal-fusuqa wal-'is'yana ulaika humu ar-rashiduna
fadlan mina al-lahi wani'matan wal-lahu alimun hakimun

wa-in taifatani mina al-mu'minina iq'tatalu fa-aslihu baynahuma fa-in baghat ih'dahuma ala al-ukh'ra faqatilu allati tabghi hatta tafia ila amri al-lahi fa-in faat fa-aslihu baynahuma bil-'adli wa-aqsitu inna al-laha yuhibbu al-muq'sitina
innama al-mu'minuna ikh'watun fa-aslihu bayna akhawaykum wa-ittaqu al-laha la'allakum tur'hamuna

yaayyuha alladhina amanu la yaskhar qawmun min qawmin asa an yakunu khayran min'hum wala nisaon min nisain asa an yakunna khayran min'hunna wala talmizu anfusakum wala tanabazu bil-alqabi bi'sa as-s'mu al-fusuqu ba'da al-imani waman lam yatub fa-ulaika humu az-zalimuna

yaayyuha alladhina amanu ij'tanibu kathiran mina az-zani inna ba'da az-zani ith'mun wala tajassasu wala yaghtab ba'dukum ba'dan ayuhibbu ahadukum an yakula lahma akhihi maytan fakarih'tumuhu wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha tawwabun rahimun
yaayyuha an-nasu inna khalaqnakum min dhakarin wa-untha waja'alnakum shu'uban waqabaila lita'arafu inna akramakum inda al-lahi atqakum inna al-laha alimun khabirun
qalati al-a'rabu amanna qul lam tu'minu walakin qulu aslamna walamma yadkhuli al-imanu fi qulubikum wa-in tuti'u al-laha warasulahu la yalit'kum min a'malikum shayan inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
innama al-mu'minuna alladhina amanu bil-lahi warasulihi thumma lam yartabu wajahadu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim fi sabili al-lahi ulaika humu as-sadiquna
qul atu'allimuna al-laha bidinikum wal-lahu ya'lamu ma fi as-samawati wama fi al-ardi wal-lahu bikulli shayin alimun
yamunnuna alayka an aslamu qul la tamunnu alayya is'lamakum bali al-lahu yamunnu alaykum an hadakum lil'imani in kuntum sadiqina
inna al-laha ya'lamu ghayba as-samawati wal-ardi wal-lahu basirun bima ta'maluna
qaf wal-qur'ani al-majidi
bal ajibu an jaahum mundhirun min'hum faqala al-kafiruna hadha shayon ajibun
a-idha mit'na wakunna turaban dhalika raj'un ba'idun
qad alim'na ma tanqusu al-ardu min'hum wa'indana kitabun hafizun
bal kadhabu bil-haqi lamma jaahum fahum fi amrin marijin
afalam yanzuru ila as-samai fawqahum kayfa banaynaha wazayyannaha wama laha min furujin
wal-arda madadnaha wa-alqayna fiha rawasiya wa-anbatna fiha min kulli zawjin bahijin
tabsiratan wadhik'ra likulli abdin munibin
wanazzalna mina as-samai maan mubarakan fa-anbatna bihi jannatin wahabba al-hasidi
wan-nakhla basiqatin laha tal'un nadidun
riz'qan lil'ibadi wa-ahyayna bihi baldatan maytan kadhalika al-khuruju
kadhabat qablahum qawmu nuhin wa-ashabu ar-rasi wathamudu
wa'adun wafir'awnu wa-ikh'wanu lutin
wa-ashabu al-aykati waqawmu tubba'in kullun kadhaba ar-rusula fahaqqa wa'idi
afa'ayina bil-khalqi al-awali bal hum fi labsin min khalqin jadidin
walaqad khalaqna al-insana wana'lamu ma tuwaswisu bihi nafsuhu wanahnu aqrabu ilayhi min habli al-waridi
idh yatalaqqa al-mutalaqiyani ani al-yamini wa'ani as-shimali qa'idun
ma yalfizu min qawlin illa ladayhi raqibun atidun
wajaat sakratu al-mawti bil-haqi dhalika ma kunta min'hu tahidu
wanufikha fi as-suri dhalika yawmu al-wa'idi
wajaat kullu nafsin ma'aha saiqun washahidun
laqad kunta fi ghaflatin min hadha fakashafna anka ghitaaka fabasaruka al-yawma hadidun
waqala qarinuhu hadha ma ladayya atidun
alqiya fi jahannama kulla kaffarin anidin
manna'in lil'khayri mu'tadin muribin
alladhi ja'ala ma'a al-lahi ilahan akhara fa-alqiyahu fi al-'adhabi as-shadidi
qala qarinuhu rabbana ma atghaytuhu walakin kana fi dalalin ba'idin
qala la takhtasimu ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bil-wa'idi
ma yubaddalu al-qawlu ladayya wama ana bizallamin lil'abidi
yawma naqulu lijahannama hali im'talati wataqulu hal min mazidin
wa-uz'lifati al-janatu lil'muttaqina ghayra ba'idin
hadha ma tu'aduna likulli awwabin hafizin
man khashiya ar-rahmana bil-ghaybi wajaa biqalbin munibin
ud'khuluha bisalamin dhalika yawmu al-khuludi
lahum ma yashauna fiha waladayna mazidun
wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu min'hum batshan fanaqqabu fi al-biladi hal min mahisin
inna fi dhalika ladhik'ra liman kana lahu qalbun aw alqa as-sam'a wahuwa shahidun
walaqad khalaqna as-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma fi sittati ayyamin wama massana min lughubin
fa-is'bir ala ma yaquluna wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulu'i as-shamsi waqabla al-ghurubi
wamina al-layli fasabbih'hu wa-adbara as-sujudi
wa-is'tami' yawma yunadi al-munadi min makanin qaribin
yawma yasma'una as-sayhata bil-haqi dhalika yawmu al-khuruji
inna nahnu nuh'yi wanumitu wa-ilayna al-masiru
yawma tashaqqaqu al-ardu anhum sira'an dhalika hashrun alayna yasirun
nahnu a'lamu bima yaquluna wama anta alayhim bijabbarin fadhakkir bil-qur'ani man yakhafu wa'idi
wad-dhariyati dharwan
fal-hamilati wiq'ran
fal-jariyati yus'ran
fal-muqasimati amran
innama tu'aduna lasadiqun
wa-inna ad-dina lawaqi'un
was-samai dhati al-hubuki
innakum lafi qawlin mukh'talifin
yu'faku anhu man ufika
qutila al-kharasuna
alladhina hum fi ghamratin sahuna
yasaluna ayyana yawmu ad-dini
yawma hum ala an-nari yuf'tanuna
dhuqu fit'natakum hadha alladhi kuntum bihi tasta'jiluna
inna al-mutaqina fi jannatin wa'uyunin
akhidhina ma atahum rabbuhum innahum kanu qabla dhalika muh'sinina
kanu qalilan mina al-layli ma yahja'una
wabil-ashari hum yastaghfiruna
wafi amwalihim haqqun lilssaili wal-mahrumi
wafi al-ardi ayatun lil'muqinina
wafi anfusikum afala tub'siruna
wafi as-samai riz'qukum wama tu'aduna
fawarabbi as-samai wal-ardi innahu lahaqqun mith'la ma annakum tantiquna
hal ataka hadithu dayfi ib'rahima al-muk'ramina
idh dakhalu alayhi faqalu salaman qala salamun qawmun munkaruna
faragha ila ahlihi fajaa bi'ij'lin saminin
faqarrabahu ilayhim qala ala takuluna
fa-awjasa min'hum khifatan qalu la takhaf wabasharuhu bighulamin alimin
fa-aqbalati im'ra-atuhu fi sarratin fasakkat wajhaha waqalat ajuzun aqimun
qalu kadhaliki qala rabbuki innahu huwa al-hakimu al-'alimu
qala fama khatbukum ayyuha al-mur'saluna
qalu inna ur'sil'na ila qawmin muj'rimina
linur'sila alayhim hijaratan min tinin
musawwamatan inda rabbika lil'mus'rifina
fa-akhrajna man kana fiha mina al-mu'minina
fama wajadna fiha ghayra baytin mina al-mus'limina
watarakna fiha ayatan lilladhina yakhafuna al-'adhaba al-alima
wafi musa idh arsalnahu ila fir'awna bisul'tanin mubinin
fatawalla biruk'nihi waqala sahirun aw majnunun
fa-akhadhnahu wajunudahu fanabadhnahum fi al-yami wahuwa mulimun
wafi adin idh arsalna alayhimu ar-riha al-'aqima
ma tadharu min shayin atat alayhi illa ja'alathu kar-ramimi
wafi thamuda idh qila lahum tamatta'u hatta hinin
fa'ataw an amri rabbihim fa-akhadhathumu as-sa'iqatu wahum yanzuruna
fama is'tata'u min qiyamin wama kanu muntasirina
waqawma nuhin min qablu innahum kanu qawman fasiqina
was-samaa banaynaha bi-aydin wa-inna lamusi'una
wal-arda farashnaha fani'ma al-mahiduna
wamin kulli shayin khalaqna zawjayni la'allakum tadhakkaruna
fafirru ila al-lahi inni lakum min'hu nadhirun mubinun
wala taj'alu ma'a al-lahi ilahan akhara inni lakum min'hu nadhirun mubinun
kadhalika ma ata alladhina min qablihim min rasulin illa qalu sahirun aw majnunun
atawasaw bihi bal hum qawmun taghuna
fatawalla anhum fama anta bimalumin
wadhakkir fa-inna ad-dhik'ra tanfa'u al-mu'minina
wama khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illa liya'buduni
ma uridu min'hum min riz'qin wama uridu an yut'imuni
inna al-laha huwa ar-razaqu dhu al-quwati al-matinu
fa-inna lilladhina zalamu dhanuban mith'la dhanubi ashabihim fala yasta'jiluni
fawaylun lilladhina kafaru min yawmihimu alladhi yu'aduna
wat-turi
wakitabin masturin
fi raqqin manshurin
wal-bayti al-ma'muri
was-saqfi al-marfu'i
wal-bahri al-masjuri
inna adhaba rabbika lawaqi'un
ma lahu min dafi'in
yawma tamuru as-samau mawran
watasiru al-jibalu sayran
fawaylun yawma-idhin lil'mukadhibina
alladhina hum fi khawdin yal'abuna
yawma yuda'una ila nari jahannama da'an
hadhihi an-naru allati kuntum biha tukadhibuna
afasih'run hadha am antum la tub'siruna
is'lawha fa-is'biru aw la tasbiru sawaon alaykum innama tuj'zawna ma kuntum ta'maluna
inna al-mutaqina fi jannatin wana'imin
fakihina bima atahum rabbuhum wawaqahum rabbuhum adhaba al-jahimi
kulu wa-ish'rabu hanian bima kuntum ta'maluna
muttakiina ala sururin masfufatin wazawwajnahum bihurin inin
wa-alladhina amanu wa-ittaba'athum dhurriyyatuhum biimanin alhaqna bihim dhurriyyatahum wama alatnahum min amalihim min shayin kullu im'ri-in bima kasaba rahinun
wa-amdadnahum bifakihatin walahmin mimma yashtahuna
yatanaza'una fiha kasan la laghwun fiha wala tathimun
wayatufu alayhim ghil'manun lahum ka-annahum lu'lu-on maknunun
wa-aqbala ba'duhum ala ba'din yatasaaluna
qalu inna kunna qablu fi ahlina mush'fiqina
famanna al-lahu alayna wawaqana adhaba as-samumi
inna kunna min qablu nad'uhu innahu huwa al-baru ar-rahimu
fadhakkir fama anta bini'mati rabbika bikahinin wala majnunin
am yaquluna sha'irun natarabbasu bihi rayba al-manuni
qul tarabbasu fa-inni ma'akum mina al-mutarabisina
am tamuruhum ahlamuhum bihadha am hum qawmun taghuna
am yaquluna taqawwalahu bal la yu'minuna
falyatu bihadithin mith'lihi in kanu sadiqina
am khuliqu min ghayri shayin am humu al-khaliquna
am khalaqu as-samawati wal-arda bal la yuqinuna
am indahum khazainu rabbika am humu al-musaytiruna
am lahum sullamun yastami'una fihi falyati mus'tami'uhum bisul'tanin mubinin
am lahu al-banatu walakumu al-banuna
am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qaluna
am indahumu al-ghaybu fahum yaktubuna
am yuriduna kaydan fa-alladhina kafaru humu al-makiduna
am lahum ilahun ghayru al-lahi sub'hana al-lahi amma yush'rikuna
wa-in yaraw kis'fan mina as-samai saqitan yaqulu sahabun markumun
fadharhum hatta yulaqu yawmahumu alladhi fihi yus'aquna
